story:
Evolve Heated Hoodie | Powered by USB Power Bank

Hoodies are one of the most popular ways to stay warm and comfortable year-round, but now you can have the added convenience of heat, powered by any 2.1Amp or higher USB Power Bank. We want you to be the pioneers - the first to wear our Evolve Heated Hoodie! With your support, we can bring the Evolve heated hoodie to market sooner, in time for this holiday season.

If our goal is met, we will be able to ship the heated hoodie and USB Power Banks by December 1, 2015.

*If you contribute to our heated hoodie, we will email you to confirm your preferred size and color*

The Evolve Heated Hoodie has 1 flexible heating panel on the back, and 1 panel on each chest so your entire core will remain warm, while the heat is activated. Each heating panel has a thin, breathable mesh layer to maximize efficient heat transfer.



We wanted you to be naturally warm as well, so we lined the entire heated hoodie with a soothing plush fleece, including the sleeves and hood, with the outer layer is a thick polyester spandex blend. 


The Evolve heated hoodie is powered by a wide variety of standard 2.0Amp USB Power Banks, instead of being tied to a traditional battery. Having a USB power bank heat your hoodie, you are not limited to just one battery, per product - rather this allows you to also charge your phone, tablet, or anything else you can plug into the USB power bank. All of this in a comfy hoodie will keep your adventure going.

*Donate $25.00 and receive our USB Power Bank*


Machine Washable and Dryer Safe










Flexible Heating Element:

 

Flexible heating elements are the key to lightweight heat-on-demand. These durable panels are in all of our clothes and are built to prevent short circuiting and have a built in fail-safe. 


Plush Fleece with Efficient Heat Transfer

Soft mesh fleece lines the entire hoodie, including the hood. This lining acts as a natural insulator to keep you warm, comfortable and traps the heat. 

*If you contribute to our heated hoodie, we will email you to confirm your preferred size and color*

We understand that not everyone will be able to contribute but you can still help! Sharing this campaign with friends, family and colleagues is invaluable support.

story:
You will be contacted via email, after campaign finishes for size and variation choice.


People trust formal wear. If you wear a shirt – you are serious about what you are saying. The concept of the whole project is to make a uniform for everyone. We are combining designer ideas, our know-how in making it fit and finalizing it with state-of-the-art quality.

With this project we want to make daily office wear more stylish, yet affordable to everyone. Our goal is to make Women's and Men's wear collection available at reasonable pricing and suitable for everyday life. Apart of our work we worked on this project for 3 months and now we are ready to bring to the world this unique product. 

We decided to start with very basic thing – shirt. It’s compatible with virtually any piece of your wardrobe. By focusing on only one product we were able to polish it, making it near to perfect. We have carefully select fabrics, trims, production techniques and even threads were considered without any compromises. 

By bying this kind of product in the store you are mostly paying not for the product, but for the markup.  Sometimes cost of the product could be only 5% of the price you pay. 


Diagrams shows an estimation on price for this kind of product based on our own research.

In order to kick-off we need to collect so called "MOQ" (Minimum order quantity) to place an order on one of the most advanced factories in Europe. By placing an order on this factory we can ensure state-of-art quality and price balance which is so necessary for our product. We need your support to buy fabrics, trims, threads and cover labor costs. 




We started a small company called Fashion-Uniforms half year ago. Ilya is a famous designer of MTM clothing and Jeff is uniform specialist. We are making small custom-made fashion projects for small companies, in other words we are dressing people. We have collected some experience in this field and decided to move further. 

At the moment corporate fashion is old-fashioned. Absence of good taste and pursuit for revenues are pushing big players not to update their corporate wear collections and make people look like "corporate robots". We are insane enough to believe that we can change this by bringing very basic products with a designer spirit.

story:
The P-ONE is our take on the sport and cool-style wrist watch. With this project, our goal is to create a beautiful, contemporary timepiece using innovative materials . The inspiration for this design are best supercar of the 1970's. The dial and face of P-one are evocative of italian supercar vintage, ready to reach the max speed, and the the square lines inside watch remember the lines of  super cool italian cars of all time .The watch will only be available in 2 very limited editions Black and White exclusive to Indiegogo, and will only be available during this campaign.



Mykonos Design is a Italian watches design company founded by designer Luca Vitiello. Italian brand takes its inspiration from Mykonos— a geographic leader in entertainment, design, and culture for centuries. Mykonos keeps its finger on the pulse of fashion and world markets with attention to contemporary trends and global wants but the brand is markedly Italian in our choices of material, and general tastes. The ultimate objective is to manufacture a design with beautiful facets and technical specs.


How will the funds used?

With 5 years of experience, our team  create cool watches at an affordable price. With the funds we receive, we will be able to follow  the design process until completion of the product, create the new molds necessary for manufacturing, and  insure a fantastic end result.

We need Your support!

Despite  presence in the design watches industry, Mykonos design is a small design lab that has never received any outside funding and by contributing to this campaign, not only do you get a truly limited edition timepiece and you also help support Mykonos Design.

FAQ

Please read through the FAQ before supporting our project.

1.  When will I get my P-ONE ?

Our goal is to ship the watches to the awesome Indiegogo supporters by the end of 2015. As we have produced timepieces for the last 5 years, we are confident in our projected time of completion.

2.  Is P-ONE unisex? Will it fit my wrist?

Yes, this watch is unisex 

size dial diameter 4 cm

dial thickness 1 cm

band lenght 24 cm

band width 2,2 cm

3.  Is the P-ONE waterproof?

Yes, although we do not recommend diving with it.  P-ONE is waterproof 3 ATM

4. Is there a warranty?

You will receive our standard 1-year warranty. Battery Life 2 Years

5. What materials were used to build the P-ONE?

Case : alloy aluminum

Band : rubber

Movement : japan quartz

6.  Is there a number for Customer Service?

For any questions, problems and send another email to our customer service (support@mykonos-design.com) our staff will be available to answer all your needs or concerns.

story: We have stopped the campaign and explained why in the update.

story:
Talk about me is talk about BUIG!

Due to my stature and body structure for a long time I was forced to wear what the market had for me and not what I would like. So, my mother and I began to design my most elegant pieces that  with the help of a seamstress became real, beautiful and coveted.
I soon realized the extent of this problem, and how I could contribute to minimizing it.
With my experience in textiles, in 2009 I began to develop all the research and gathering information essential to the creation of the BUIG silhouette. In 2013 we start to create collections exclusively  for the wardrobe of a group of women who voluntarily tested them, and it was from these results that we decide to test the market. We are now at a crucial point in the development of our brand, in which we need to open ourselves to other countries, increasing the visibility and distribution of our collections. For this we need financial resources, and start this Crowdfunding, asking for your help to our project!

Falar de mim é falar da BUIG!

Devido à minha estatura e estrutura de corpo durante muito tempo fui obrigada a vestir o que o mercado tinha para mim e não o que gostaria.
Então, eu e a minha mãe começamos a desenhar as minhas peças mais elegantes que com a ajuda de uma costureira se tornaram reais, bonitas e cobiçadas.
Cedo percebi a dimensão deste problema, e como eu poderia contribuir para o minimizar.
Com experiência na área da textil, em 2009 comecei a desenvolver todo um trabalho de pesquisa e recolha de informação essenciais à criação da silhueta  BUIG.
Em 2013 começamos a criar colecções destinadas única e exclusivamente para o guarda-roupa de um grupo de mulheres que se voluntariamente as testaram, e foi a partir destes resultados que começamos, a comercializar a marca.
Estamos agora num ponto crucial de desenvolvimento da nossa marca, em que necessitamos de nos abrir ao exterior, aumentando a visibilidade e a distribuição das nossas colecções.

Para isso necessitamos de recursos financeiros, e por isso iniciamos este Corwdfunding, pedindo a sua ajuda ao nosso projecto!

story:
Short Summary

My name is May Yusuf Abdihalim I am originally from Somalia I came to Canada in 1997, my time in Canada was great and is still great, I graduated high school with honors and started a four-year Nursing School, in University of Western Ontario. I completed the first year of nursing and my second year of Nursing I was diagnosed with a disability, that made it difficult for me to finish my program, so I dropped out of nursing when in the second year. Forward to  8 years later, I am struggling to make ends meet and on social assistance with over 15000 of debt which includes a student loan. I am starting this campaign Nursing Scrubs Online Store in order to get out of poverty, and also help nurses get beautiful affordable nursing outfits.

What We Need 

Support a struggling young lady start an e-commerce business in order for her get out of poverty by donating 5, 10 or 20, or as much as you can

The Impact

The impact this business will make is that first and foremost it will get me and my family out of poverty and also we will give back to the community that helped us get out of poverty. 

Plant a seed of charity and see that seed produce many beneficial fruits. 

 Challenges

I am willing to work hard and put all the effort to start and operate a successful e-commerce business will you support me in this endeavor. Thank you in advance and God Almighty Bless you and Your Family. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell your friends family social groups to help me out as a struggling young lady who has a hope of starting a business to pay my debts to get out of poverty and support my family

story:
People love watches. They’re fashionable and functional and a great way to express your personality. But what people don’t love is the way they dig into your hand when your wrist is bent. So I set out to design a watch that wouldn’t irritate your hand, but was still stylish and unique. The result; a unisex half-moon watch called the EDGE.

 

 

My fully funded Kickstarter ended May 13th. Now the watches have been put into production. Since this watch is a limited edition, only 200 will be made. So far 137 watches have been pre-ordered. There are only 51 Edge watches available. Since our first stretch goal was unlocked we are able to create the 'Lefty' version of the Edge. There are 15 'lefty' Edge watches available.

All watches are individually labelled 001, 002, 003... of  200. On the case back is the designers signature: Brandon Hnedak, company logo and information about the watch.

There are three color variations available; Silver, 14k Gold and 14k Rose Gold.

38mm unisex watches:

 

 

 

Features:

 

 

Mock - up:

 

Product Photography:

 

 

 

 

Edge watch prototype before assembly:

 

 

 

UNLOCKED: 'Lefty' Edge

 

 

Questions or concerns?

Feel free to send me a message

story:
The SOUL of the Problem

As a result of social and environmental disaster across the centuries, anywhere from half a million to one million Haitians live in the Dominican Republic. Some where born there, others are recent refugees. Most lack—or have been actively denied—Dominican citizenship, and with it the rights that it entails: K-12 education, essential medical access, basic care, the ability to work in a career that does not involve backbreaking labor. The largest ethnic minority in the Dominican Republic, Haitians are plagued by a very-present racism and face stigmatization and abuse on a daily basis.

The SOUL of Our Team

Since the Mid-80’s, Friends of Colegio Moriah (FCM) has been assisting this population through the development of a school staffed by local leaders and teachers; biannual mobile medical clinics from the US; and, most recently, a permanent medical facility that will also be managed by nationals.

Mark and Rebecca, co-founders of Common Grace Inc (SOUL®), participated in FCM’s biannual medical project in January of 2014 along with their daughter Maryah. At that time, Rebecca was inspired to pursue a nursing degree. She recently graduated from a program here in Corning, receiving the Clinical Excellence in Nursing Award, and is now an RN working in a local hospital.

Mark and Rebecca’s daughter Maryah will be graduating next year with her degree in nursing as well. Similar to her mom, Maryah was inspired to pursue a career in medicine while serving for 6 months in 2016 at FCM’s school in the Dominican Republic. She and her mom are excited to be on the January 2018 FCM medical mission trip and to give back to the community that ignited their passion to give their lives over to serving others through nursing.

Also on the FCM US team of 30 are Misha and Sanna, another two of Mark and Rebecca’s daughters. Both girls enjoy home-education and volunteering in the community, and are looking forward to supporting the medical personnel on the team.

As he did on the 2014 medical team, Mark will be assisting the team by performing patient intake. Mark has a passion for people, for change and for sustainability. Locally, much of his current focus is on launching into the growing agri-tourism sector in the Finger Lakes of NY with his mind for "farm to table" and sustainable, renewable energy. Mark has also connected people around the world in the Corning, New York glass art heritage of Hawkes, Carder, Steuben and Kish and the beauty and meaning of a symbol copyrighted as SOUL® - a glass art jewelry pendant now to be enjoyed by thousands.

The Product of Our SOUL

SOUL®, by Common Grace Inc., is a hand-made jewelry pendant crafted using the finest crystal in America. Our Corning, New York artists and craftspeople use a 17th Century European technique of copper-wheel lathe engraving to create the piece which we first marketed at the Corning Museum of Glass. High-art experts applaud the design for its conceptual purity. Wearers connect emotionally because of SOUL’s meaning as a symbol for “their own soul” or their feeling “to have soul.” For some of us, SOUL is a symbol that captures the emotions of friendship and trust, or motherhood, sisterhood, and brotherhood. For others, SOUL is an expression of determination and courage. Some also wear SOUL to convey romance, passion, and intimacy. All of us wear SOUL to provide hope because each soul pendant purchase is missional and gives life to individuals who need it.

Though local to a community, SOUL’s mission is global. And though its conceptual design is new, it is connected to history. The circle shape and light event caused by glass engraving has been a symbol for soul, life or eternity for cultures dating back more than 6000 years when craftspeople carved dents in glass drinking cups to captivate the attention of the Pharaohs. Today, SOUL is made from the finest glass in America, and sourced in an environmentally conscientious manner. The same raw material used to create Fiber Optic Cable is used to create SOUL jewelry. In other words, the same material that allows you to talk on the phone or send an e-mail now communicates beauty and meaning in the form of luxury jewelry. Since crystal glass is neither a liquid nor a solid, it is the perfect material to symbolize SOUL.  

The SOUL of Our Culture

We believe SOUL® of Corning, New York, can be the perfect cultural artifact. We shape culture, and culture shapes us. SOUL, as a concrete piece of culture, has the potential to first inspire you as you wear it, and next, through your purchase, to change culture by funding the care of those who are unwell. These individuals, once healed, will be able to live fully and share their souls - their hopes, their passions - with their communities. Healthy people create healthy culture.

SOUL® is poised to become a cultural archetype and is now launching into the high-art/high-craft market with exclusivity in brand and design. We have proven the market, we have proven our process, we have over 1500 Soul pendants at various points of our 22 hand-crafted stages at SOULworks™, and we have over 200 now ready for shipment.

The Impact of Your SOUL

SOUL® is the perfect symbol to give some hope and why we invite you to support our current global cultural project: conducting medical clinics on the Caribbean Island of Hispanola. Together with the FCM medical professional team, we will be providing 180-300+ patients per day with preventative care and treatment. Together with you, we will be growing a healthier culture.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot make a purchase, contribute this way:

  • Ask friends to spread the word. Let them know about SOUL and our human rights issue in the Dominican Republic.
  • Simply use the Indiegogo share tools!

High-art experts applaud the design for its conceptual purity. Wearers connect emotionally because of SOUL’s meaning as a symbol for “their own soul” or their feeling “to have soul.” For some of us, SOUL is a symbol that captures the emotions of friendship and trust, or motherhood, sisterhood, and brotherhood. For others, SOUL is an expression of determination and courage. Some also wear SOUL to convey romance, passion, and intimacy. All of us wear SOUL to provide hope because each soul pendant purchase is missional and gives life to individuals who need it.
Though local to a community, SOUL’s mission is global. And though its conceptual design is new, it is connected to history. The circle shape and light event caused by glass engraving has been a symbol for soul, life or eternity for cultures dating back more than 6000 years when craftspeople carved dents in glass drinking cups to captivate the attention of the Pharaohs. Today, SOUL is made from the finest glass in America, and sourced in an environmentally conscientious manner. The same raw material used to create Fiber Optic Cable is used to create SOUL jewelry. In other words, the same material that allows you to talk on the phone or send an e-mail now communicates beauty and meaning in the form of luxury jewelry. Since crystal glass is neither a liquid nor a solid, it is the perfect material to symbolize SOUL.  
The SOUL of Our Culture
We believe SOUL® of Corning, New York, can be the perfect cultural artifact. We shape culture, and culture shapes us. SOUL, as a concrete piece of culture, has the potential to first inspire you as you wear it, and next, through your purchase, to change culture by funding the care of those who are unwell. These individuals, once healed, will be able to live fully and share their souls - their hopes, their passions - with their communities. Healthy people create healthy culture.
SOUL® is poised to become a cultural archetype and is now launching into the high-art/high-craft market with exclusivity in brand and design. We have proven the market, we have proven our process, we have over 1500 Soul pendants at various points of our 22 hand-crafted stages at SOULworks™, and we have over 200 now ready for shipment.
The Impact of Your SOUL
SOUL® is the perfect symbol to give some hope and why we invite you to support our current global cultural project: conducting medical clinics on the Caribbean Island of Hispanola. Together with the FCM medical professional team, we will be providing 180-300+ patients per day with preventative care and treatment. Together with you, we will be growing a healthier culture.
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cannot make a purchase, contribute this way:

Ask friends to spread the word. Let them know about SOUL and our human rights issue in the Dominican Republic.
Simply use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Portuguese artisans of Khepry are the same men and women who work for some of the greatest brands in the world. Their professionalism is deeply rooted in tradition and so they have flourished for generations. Together, we create a shoe with its own identity and design, manufactured with the highest quality, Therefore, comfort is our greatest concern.

The traditional construction is combined with our innovative design and bold attitude. Khepry shoes are made thinking about the contemporary man, bold but in a subtle way.

You may be leading a startup or running a Fortune 500 company, Khepry shoes make you feel comfortable in any situation, but more than that, they make you feel different and bold.

Khepry will be your new ally to find the best, comfortable and stylish luxury shoes.

 

Help us start our first production!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Khepry is concerned about the environmental impact associated with the manufacturing process, activities, products and services. Therefore, Khepry intends to do so in a sustainable way, reconciling its needs for growth and consolidation in the market, with the need to protect the environment.

This is why we choose suppliers that share our concern and who, like us, foster a thorough management of the whole process of developing and manufacturing the respective products.

Each pair of Khepry shoes is made of genuine leather. The manual process gives each pair their unique characteristics, and undergoes a rigorous inspection to ensure that each shoe is of the highest quality.

Our manufacturing process is done manually and constantly supervised. Each shoe has a great precision and know-how to ensure that the result is flawless.

 

 

Our business model is disruptive, eliminating middlemen and retailers. Khepry has reshaped the entire development and manufacturing process in order to optimize costs so we can give our financers a new opportunity to purchase high quality products at a more affordable price.

 

​

Luxury, comfort and quality has a place of enormous prominence in our brand. Khepry shoes are bold, flexible and light. We spent a lot of time developing our shoes to make sure we didn’t miss any detail, and of course, we didn’t cut at any expenses.

 

 

That’s why all Khepry footwear:
 

  • Are made of genuine leather personally selected;
     
  • Uses a lightweight sole made of recycled tire rubber, which allows easy and effortless movements and greater adhesion to the ground;
     
  • Are made in order to reduce pressure points around the heel and middle of the foot;
     
  • Allows you to relieve stress while walking because all the shoe is cushioned, and with time the cushion adapts to your foot to improve comfort;
     
  • Uses microfiber lining with absorbent properties to absorb sweat;

 

 

 

At khepry we take very serious the environmental problems, but we also have a promise to you, to present the best products. With that in mind we created a luxurious collection, with minimum impact. This was possible by using recycled wood in the boxes, leather tanned without chemicals, a sole made of recycled tire rubber and making sure that our suppliers follow the same work ethics as we do.

To make sure that khepry makes a significant difference in the world we made a partnership with One Tree Planted organization, wich mean that every time you buy our shoes YOU are making a visible and quick difference by planting two trees in an african forest with a high risk of deforestation.

Have a look at their project HERE. 

 

 

 Was designed towards the man who looks for a way to make a difference, and uses the best products on the market in a subtle yet fashionable and exquisite way.
 This collection is divided in two lines, a casual and a sports one, with unique combinations of colors and materials.

 

 

 

 

 

Our shoes go far beyond comfort and style.

By eliminating middlemen and retailers, we were able to channel resources and produce the highest quality products at a more affordable price. The luxury doesn’t need to be super expensive, but making shoes with the best materials on the market has its price. Khepry is transparent in its decisions, and have the best materials, and the best manufacturers.

Our financiers deserve the best and Khepry knows that.

That’s why each order is treated as unique, with care and respect, so that when you receive it you could feel how special you are to us.

Each package is composed by a wooden box, lined with soft and luxurious velvet. And each shoe is sent inside a bag with double functionality, in addition to protecting the shoe it can still be used to clean it.

 

 

 

 

Khepry was not created on a whim. It is the product of years of research and training in the footwear sector. The founder, Jorge Silva, has spent the last few years training, researching and working in the shoe industry in Northern Portugal. With a degree in Footwear Design, he devoted all his time to the realization of a dream, using the experience and knowledge acquired, Jorge created Khepry.

To ensure that our financers receive a high quality service, Khepry partnered with an experienced logistics and shoe distribution team.

We are excited to share our products and our vision with the world!

 

 

Khepry shoes are available from sizes 39 to 45 (European size). By the instructions we give, you are able to find  your model and size and, if the size you ordered is not the best, we will exchange it for you (please see the DELIVERY section below for shipping rates and our exchange policy).

Measure with a ruler in cm the distance between the toes and the heel of your foot (like the instructions below)

​

After taking the measurement, see in our table which number corresponds to the length of your foot.

 

 

Khepry is an ambitious brand. We make luxury shoes for everyone, with characteristics that you will love. By meeting our financing goals we want to offer more products and more options.

Our expansion goal is to start the production of the already created models that will launch the brand's first collection. Help us reach our financing goal so we can show you how much more Khepry has to offer!

 

As soon as the campaign is over, we will have 2-4 weeks to send in the inquiries and get back the necessary information about the models and size of all financing. The faster we get this information, the lower the likelihood of delays!

The production can take from 6 to 8 weeks and will be shipped within 4 weeks.

 

 

We will do everything in our power to ensure compliance with the schedule.

 

Khepry is a startup and works with very small margins, so we can not avoid the shipping costs. The cost of international shipments will depend on the destination. Orders shipped within the EU will not incur customs duties, but will be subject to VAT (value added tax).

 If necessary, local duties and taxes will be charged by the competent authority in the country of destination. (Please determine these charges locally.)

 

QUALITY

We have spent a lot of time looking for the best suppliers and manufacturers in Portugal, who have the best materials, the best facilities and most importantly, the experience to create a luxury shoe worldwide. We didn’t skip any expenses to ensure you will get the best product possible.

 

ACCESSIBILITY

By implementing a disruptive business model that delivers your shoes directly from the artisan's hand to your door, we have eliminated the need for tenants and other intermediaries. The finish and luxury that you will experience with our shoes is unparalleled. We did this for you.

 

COMMUNICATION

 Your commitment to us is the beginning of a long and beautiful relationship. Khepry is committed to you. We will maintain our strong relationship, offer incredible products and communicate with you at every step of the way. If you have any questions, please contact us at any time!

 

CONSISTENCY

Each Khepry shoe is handmade, meaning that there will never be two pairs looking exactly the same. However, each pair goes through a thorough inspection process to ensure the quality you expect from a luxury brand globally is present.

 

EXPERIENCE AND CONFIDENCE

We don’t promise what we can’t keep. We have the infrastructures to guarantee a quiet process, from the order to the delivery. We want to be your go-to brand,and we hope to gain your trust.

 

We are building more than a shoe, we are building a family. The Khepry Family!

 

YOU are essential to the success of our campaign and ultimately to our company. Without you we have no reason to exist. We need your support to get us off the ground and ensure that modern men everywhere have access to Portuguese luxury shoes!

Be a part of our group of friends and help us by sharing our campaign with YOUR group of friends.

If you love fairies  as much as I do, you will love this  1.25"  soft enamel die cast metal pin with a straight pin back with backing,  The pin will be produced by a third party.  Campaign funds will be used to meet the minimum costs for the production. There are two currently planned variants:

Plain white Wings
Glitter White Wings

If we reach full funding then a 3rd surprise variant will be added to the mix!

Nothing can be truer than fairy wisdom. It is as true as Sunbeams - Douglas Jerrold

Do you know someone who loves fairies? 
Please share our campaign with your friends and family through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and through email!

story: .

Sunglasses are a must, and for those of you who have lots of them, that unique eyewear will be definitely something different in your collection.

These are suitable for any face, show your unique and high-end taste. It is suitable as a high fashion accessory and daily wears all year round.
 

Sparky sunglasses are customizable. The flexibility can come in a variety of ways. They are unisex, for male and female
 

  My concept for "Sparky" sunglasses is simple:  create a quality pair of sunglasses that are unique & stylish, yet very durable, but without the outrageously high price tag.

Here is my  "piercing sunglasses"  collection, check it out!
 

Take a look at my unique handcrafted sunglasses.
 

 Buying sunglasses shouldn't be all about the brand. You don’t have to spend the most money in order to get the best eyewear.

"Colorful" collection, matching sunglasses + pin, unique design


Did  you see Gucci rhinestone sunglasses rhinestone? It's beautiful, but I don't want to accidentally forget it somewhere on the beach.

"Shiny" collection , matching sunglasses + necklace, unique design

I have developed a design that looks and works very well. Some of the sunglasses are very unique and can't be recreated a second time. I'm using high-end lenses. I put a lot of energy and time to create unique style sunglasses.


"Shiny" collection , matching sunglasses + earrings, unique design

  Not only do sunglasses protect our eyes from the harsh rays of the sun, but they also look super stylish while doing it too!
"steampunk" collection, unique design

YOU'LL ACTUALLY WANT TO ROCK THIS SUMMER!
  There are endless possibilities with patterns and colors that I can create!
  I also have a huge collection of "piercing sunglasses" check it out!


 

 Glasses make you feel as though you are in your comfort zone. When you feel comfortable in your skin based on whatever reason you choose to wear sunglasses, you become confident. You can face the world boldly. Consider this reason why you wear sunglasses.

 

These unique glasses are an easy way to add flavor to your outfit and capture the admiring glance of those around you.

Designer glasses have become a stylish accessory, with their help you can significantly change the overall appearance, emphasize the image, correct individual features.

Often, when buying glasses, people just look at their functional part and do not think that this accessory is a part of a person's image. Сolored glasses are the highlight of the current and upcoming seasons. They suit liberated, perhaps creative people. Or those who want to assert themselves and show themselves off.

 

I have always liked bright things and unique style, and all sorts of handicrafts - all this I found embodiment in sunglasses of unique design.

Sparky sunglasses are customizable. The flexibility can come in a variety of ways. They are unisex, for male and female

VEMORE 

LIVE MORE, BE MORE

 

We are a team of two guys, which we had as projects: E-commerce of cell phones and technology, Own brand of watches, Community manager of Instragram accounts & advertising and marketing degree.
When we started VEMORE we only had one goal in mind: to launch a brand of sunglasses with varied, exclusive and high-quality designs at a reasonable price. In order to compete with the big brands which get a + 1000% per unit.

More info on our watches can be found on our website here.

More info on our watches can be found on our website here.

 

 

 

 

More info on our watches can be found on our website here.

 

 

 

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 

We are beginners on Indiegogo, but we and our manufacturing partners have years of experience in the industry! We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Firstly, our production is quite advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over a year designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples.

Secondly, we have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterward.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

story:
Update - Thursday, 3/16/17

Today is the day that the new travel ban was slated to go into effect. This hurts a lot of people and is a stepping stone to the enablement of  more hate and violence towards refugees, immigrants, Muslims, and people of color. Thankfully, it was blocked by a federal judge, but it's not over yet.

In light of this, we've released a brand new design (see below) and donating 25% of the profits from every single tee ordered during this campaign to the International Rescue Committee, an organization committed to supporting and empowering refugees and people who've been affected by conflict and disaster to rebuild their lives in dignity.

WHY

It struck us that there was so much we wanted to express about ourselves and our beliefs beyond the halls of Facebook and dinnertime conversations. We wanted to wear clothes that meant something to us and represented our worldview, and we suspect that you may feel the same.

Let’s celebrate and promote our differences because that’s what we love about this country. Share your culture, your experiences, what you love, your worries, how you see the world. All in one shirt (no, really).

The designs are meant to be thought-provoking and inclusive. They’re a way to express what you believe every day, wherever you go. By incorporating subtle phrases and colors into our designs, our aim is to create images that could spur open dialogue.

VISION

We’re living in a unique and strange time in this country’s history. Like many people, we’ve had our eyes glued to the news this past election cycle. While we voted, there’s a lot more we can do to convey our values. Our vision is to turn Interim Apparel into a true brand and take it beyond tees. This campaign is the first step to reaching that goal and you're integral to making it happen.

DESIGNS

Every single person we've asked for feedback from on our two designs has a different interpretation. That’s our purpose and what we love about these tees - they’re an open forum for different thoughts, ideas, and experiences.

It makes us smile to watch a person’s reaction when we show them one of the designs and ask, “what does that mean to you?". You can see the wheels start to churn inside their minds and a splay of emotions play across their faces as they consider, deep down, the complexity of what they see. It’s both exciting and extremely gratifying to watch.

Please see the image carousel underneath the video for more photos

We offer both women's and men's/unisex fits

 

*NEW DESIGN*

About the Shirts

This will be the softest tee you've ever owned! We didn't cut corners. We chose a high quality poly/cotton blend fabric. They're so soft, you'll want to snuggle with it. These tees have a "retail fit", meaning they fit like a nice top you buy from the store. They're not boxy and rough like all those free t-shirts many of us collected in college.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What do your clothes mean to you? When you look at these tees, what do you see? We’re willing to bet that if you ask the person next to you, you’ll get a different answer. 

A top may seem small, but clothes are powerful. They always have been. They say a picture’s worth a thousand words. How much is it worth when you put that picture on a shirt and hundreds of people see it? Let's find out!

That’s what we’re going for here at Interim Apparel. We’re friends who got together to create something bigger than ourselves, and we need your support to make this a reality.

 

 

FUNDING

In order to keep the tees at this $25 price point, we need to reach a minimum order goal. So, we’re running a fixed campaign, meaning that we can’t print these amazing tees unless we hit the $2800 funding goal. 

That’s where you come in. There's 3 ways to contribute:

1) Order a tee (or two)

2) Make a $5 or $10 contribution

3) Click the Facebook share button at the top of this page and share this campaign with your friends and family to spread the word! To date, 42% of our backers found us through a shared link!!!

If just 1 person from your network makes 1 contribution, this campaign would end in 1 more week!

We can’t know yet exactly where Interim Apparel will take us, but it seems interesting and challenging, and we're ready to find out. Join us!

 

TEAM

 

FAQs

  1. Is my credit card charged when I contribute? Nope. Since this is a fixed campaign, your card will only be charged once the campaign fulfills its goal. It may show as 'pending' in your account.
  2. When will I get my shirt? The timeline above says by July, but it's highly likely you'll get it earlier. We will keep all backers updated of the progress in the weeks following the campaign.
  3. What's your refund and exchange policy? We will send you an email confirming your order after the campaign ends. If you ordered the wrong size/fit or want to switch designs, you'll have the opportunity to make changes. We'll make exchanges if we send the wrong item or the tee doesn't arrive as described. Refunds are on a case-by-case basis, but hey, we know life happens! We're happy to work with you.
  4. Can I contribute a different amount? Of course! Pick any perk and, when you checkout, there will be an option to alter the dollar amount. 
  5. Can I place an order after the campaign ends? Yup! We'll be launching an online store after the campaign. Timeline to be determined, though, since shipping out the tees from this campaign will be our first priority.
  6. Do you ship internationally? Not yet, but it's something we're considering for when we launch our site. It'll depend on how much demand there is for international shipping.

 

TIMELINE

So, we’re running a fixed campaign, meaning that we can’t print these amazing tees unless we hit the $2800 funding goal. That’s where you come in. There's 3 ways to contribute:1) Order a tee (or two)2) Make a $5 or $10 contribution3) Click the Facebook share button at the top of this page and share this campaign with your friends and family to spread the word! To date, 42% of our backers found us through a shared link!!!If just 1 person from your network makes 1 contribution, this campaign would end in 1 more week!We can’t know yet exactly where Interim Apparel will take us, but it seems interesting and challenging, and we're ready to find out. Join us! TEAM FAQs

Is my credit card charged when I contribute? Nope. Since this is a fixed campaign, your card will only be charged once the campaign fulfills its goal. It may show as 'pending' in your account.


When will I get my shirt? The timeline above says by July, but it's highly likely you'll get it earlier. We will keep all backers updated of the progress in the weeks following the campaign.

What's your refund and exchange policy? We will send you an email confirming your order after the campaign ends. If you ordered the wrong size/fit or want to switch designs, you'll have the opportunity to make changes. We'll make exchanges if we send the wrong item or the tee doesn't arrive as described. Refunds are on a case-by-case basis, but hey, we know life happens! We're happy to work with you.

Can I contribute a different amount? Of course! Pick any perk and, when you checkout, there will be an option to alter the dollar amount. 

Can I place an order after the campaign ends? Yup! We'll be launching an online store after the campaign. Timeline to be determined, though, since shipping out the tees from this campaign will be our first priority.

Do you ship internationally? Not yet, but it's something we're considering for when we launch our site. It'll depend on how much demand there is for international shipping.
 TIMELINE

story:
Hi, I’m Mario and the 2Bsafe backpack is the result of my latest living experiences.

 

As an entrepreneur, I believe that our mission is to be able to listen to the needs of a certain group of people, create a solution, and bring it to the market. That's the reason why I started my travel a few years ago, and I have been living and working in different countries, sleeping in airports, hostels, couch surfing, Airbnb, ... Only God knows.

On my way, I had the chance to cross paths with lots of people from different places, and different backgrounds. Exchange stories and experiences, share ideas and listen to their problems with an active listening attitude. With this project in mind, I started to enquiry some fellow travellers about what they would like to improve in their backpacks and I carefully kept the record among my travel notes.

After a deep and comprehensive read and handpicking the core ideas, I started the R&D stage. Materials, designs, similar products, tech improvements and manufacturers... 

Join the new era for anti-theft gear.

 

2Bsafe is one step ahead of any other anti-theft gear in the market right now. For that reason, kick-off the mass production requires the investment of a community of backers, and after screening different platforms, INDIEGOGO is the platform of choice, and our backers will receive a special consideration. Super early birds discounts and bundle packs, stretch goals and customization options.
 
 

 

  • Safety and Accessibility: Numbers combination, Padlocks, Keys, Hidden zippers,... Until now, we believed that to have a safe bag, we have to go through a hell of protocols if we want to quickly access to it. 2Bsafe takes the challenge. Months of research and tests showed biometrics as an increasing trend, and fingerprint scanning as the technology of choice. Fingerprint reading has a wide implementation in our world and proven efficiency for both, personal and professional.  

 

 

 

 

  • Toughness VS Weight: We tend to think that a thick and heavy construction goes along with a better protection than lighter materials. Most of the top manufacturers, they offer heavy and thick fabrics combined with layers of other materials (like plastics or even steel) to offer better protection. But this solutions are rather heavy and offering a poor extra resistance. Our military-grade fabric outperforms every other known material in terms of resistance to cut, abrasion and tearing and its strength-to-weight ratio is up to 15 times higher than steel or even 40% higher than para-aramid (A.K.A. Kevlar), and, It's only 0.945 g/cm3, which means that it can float in the water. 2Bsafe is not only theft-proof but a pretty resistant bag for everything.

 

 

 

  • Capacity VS Mobility: When it comes to space, there is no easy answer, no statistics, no quick solution... For a day backpack, every person has different needs, that's the only fact. For some people 10L bag is enough, for some not even 50L... Things were not easy here because sometimes we overlook some of the most evident and basic solutions. 2Bsafe can be a minimalistic, slim and stylish laptop backpack with 10L and only 10cm wide, enough for a laptop, tablet, some notebooks, documents and some extra stuff for a work-and-back-home day, or gain a whole load of space opening the expansion zipper and reaching a volume of 22L with two separated areas. Also, 2Bsafe's slim and neat design makes the space inside easier to manage, increasing the net usability of the volume. Even with our best effort... I think for some of us it's never enough.

 

 

 

The Impact

Budget travel, Remote working, Co-living, Hostels, Airbnb,... All these concepts are shaping the world today. Due to the increasing mobility and the connectivity thirst in our daily life, we tend to carry along, a more sophisticated (and expensive!) equipment. Tablets, laptops, smartphones, cameras... are the favourite and easiest target for thieves.

Travelling is available for a vast majority of the population, and airports, stations, hostels, have become a perfect environment for those who want to take advantage of small security failures. This fast-moving lifestyle makes possible for us to travel to another country, faster and cheaper than ever, but also, makes possible for an avid thief to steal today a backpack and sell its content tomorrow 10000 miles away.

2Bsafe is the needed evolution of our traditional gear to adapt to the modern life. The technology plays on the side of the thieves, but now, also on our side. 

 

Risks & Challenges

2Bsafe means a new step in the search for the perfect backpack, we know this is an endless path, we know the perfect back probably doesn't exist, but I think we got closer to the perfect anti-theft day backpack. 

 

 

So, at this point, we are successfully done with the research and technological development (RTD), the production of the first set of working prototypes, assumed the mould fees, and ready for mass production stage.

Our manufacturer has proven broad experience with backpacks and bags and we have already tested their products and quality through our prototyping and testing stage, that results in a super high-quality product made of A+ grade materials. Definitely looks like a million dollar! And safe enough to keep a million dollar...

 

  • Our funding goal is 80.000 EUR. This funds will be invested mainly in the production of the first batch (see graphics below), as well as strong logistics system to make sure everybody receives their purchase in the best way. There is also budget for improvements and customisation, we want to hear your ideas and put them in!.
  • We will reward our INDIEGOGO backers with exclusive discounts! Up to 50% off from retail price. Also, we have some awesome surprises as giveaways and stretch goals.
  • In case we don't reach the goal we still will try to accomplish our commitment with our backers, sending them the product, or returning back the money by the deadline. And we promise we will try to come back with all the lessons learned for a second try.   

 

Create a brand new product and all the learning that involves, and, in addition, the chance to make a crowdfunding campaign which is an exciting method to interact with a community of people interested in your idea. That is what makes the project be real, even before being actually produced.

Our main goal is not only the funds but the experience and the learning. The feedback from the community and improve on the go. 

We want to hear from all of our backers, all the good and all the not-so-good. And we want to put our project in front of the audience and grow it together. Thanks for being part of it.

Some opportunities come just once and we have exclusive discounts and deals for our INDIEGOGO backers. Don't miss yours!!.

 

Thanks for reading and please contribute or just share it as a gesture of appreciation for our work.

story:
Short Summary

Rexcraft is  focused strictly on men's accessories. We encourage you to wear something unique, but at the same time to be yourself. We came up with an idea of scarf/cowl. Something that is easy to wear, stays on its place and keeps its shape all the time, and most importantly, every man looks good in it!

Cowl is made of high quality Italian fabric. Outer layer is made of made of wool, inner lining is made of  soft, warm fabric. It warms and protects from wind and is suitable for all seasons. You can cover face or just your neck. Size is universal, looks good on and under the outer garment. It has snap fastener- once shaped, cowl won't deform.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising funds for the further development of our product line. We have already made a very limited production of Rexcraft cowls. It works and it looks stunning. We chose two types of fabric, that from our experience people like best, and propose them to you- SALT & PEPPER  and DIAGONAL / LIGHT GREY. 

 

When we start shipping?

We will begin shipping on january/february 2018.

Risks

We have already made small production of this item, unless our Italian material manufacturer  delays, there are no searious risks involved here. You will get your cowl and we will deliver it as fast as we can!

story:
Introducing The Leather Gentleman’s Set

We present a universal and convenient kit for men that can be used in everyday life. Travel bag will be your indispensable friend on the journey. Briefcase is perfect for all work accessories and becomes a good property. A wallet emphasizes your personality and style. All this we have combined in our project called The Leather Gentleman's Set.

 

Travel Bag

- Soft felt lining
- High-quality YKK zipper
- Large zipper compartment for documents and tickets
- Spacious main compartment
- Convenient access to things, Adjustable leather strap
- 2 Large external compartments for quick access to the most necessary things  
- High-quality leather
- Cosmetic bag as a gift

  • Height 25 cm
  • Length 48 cm
  • Width 21 cm

 

Briefcase

- 15" laptop sleeve
- 2 Compartments for notebooks
- High-quality leather
- Double hook for keys and headphones
 - Zipper compartment for documents
- Soft felt lining, Adjustable leather strap
- Large external compartment for tablet or morning press
-  2 Pen compartments
- High-quality YKK zipper

  • Height 27 cm
  • Length 40 cm
  • Width 8 cm

 

Long Wallet

-  10 card slots
- Large compartment for coins
- Two compartments for banknotes
- 2 Large compartments for documents and phone
- Removable hand strap for greater convenience

  • Length 21.5 cm
  • Width 12 cm

 

Our Story

 

Hi, our names are Rustam Matiev and Alexander Lyashenko.

Our company "Svernut Hand Made" is engaged in tailoring men's and women's accessories by hand made to order.

Our goal is to produce the best accessories in the world! We are grateful to everyone who does not "pass" by, read the post to the end and share with friends! Maybe right now they are looking for a good accessory or a gift to their loved ones!

We were born in the same city, we studied and grew up together. “Svernut Hand Made” exists more than 3 years. Customers of our products are people from all over the world. Over the past year, we produced more than 200 units of our products.

The idea to produce leather goods came to Rustam in 2010 when he studied at the Technology and Design College. He was always interested in the topic deals with producing clothes and haberdashery.

When he was a student, he, like everyone else, wanted to make some money for his small expenses, but he had no desire to work for hire, he wanted something of his own, then he loudly declared that he wanted his own Business. Naturally, there was no money and there was no knowledge of doing business either, but one day an idea appeared.

He decided to make covers for phones and tablets made of leather. The first trial product was a cover for the tablet, which he made from leather red women's boots bought in the second-hand. Three months after the purchase of equipment and all materials, he soon expanded the range to purses and bags. Therefore, the brand Svernut Hand Made was created.

Alexander always had a desire to dress well and at the same time run his own business. Thus, there was the idea of his own brand. Once met with Rustam, he talked about his new hobby. Since then, we have been working on “Svernut Hand Made” together.

We always look at the people around us, what they like about what they use and how theydress. We try to follow the trends and make our own changes, but of course, in the future we want to create a trend ourselves.

In autumn we are going to open a workshop, where our customers can come and see the whole range of products live, and also see how we produce goods. For this, we have created a new project that will enable us to fulfill our dream.

That is why it is very IMPORTANT for us tell about us to your friends.

Thank you for your attention and have a nice day!

 

How to Pre-Order

1. Choose a reward level.

Indiegogo only allows you to choose one reward level at a time. 

2. If you want to add something, check out the Rewards Menu at the top.

If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Reward menu at the very top. If it's in the Reward Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. You can only add things to your reward that are in the Reward Menu.

3. Relax, you're done for now.

All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey.

 

Thank you for your support!

The reason we exist and can create beautifully made bags is because of your support and excitement for our vision!

 

 

Policy

We must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and The Leather Gentleman's Set will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.

Svernut Hand Made has a keen understanding of the fact that delays in the fashion industry are sometimes inevitable, so our anticipated delivery dates are conservative estimates. If all runs smoothly there is a chance you will receive your bag earlier than expected!

Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this campaign or by Svernut Hand Made.

Production time 2-3 months after the end of the campaign

Svernut Hand Made “The Leather Gentleman's Set” Indiegogo Shipping Policy

INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS:

Svernut Hand Made leverages a network of international shipping hubs that provide various services, depending on the destination. Prior to shipping an order we cannot guarantee which shipping hub or service or warehouse will be used. We can guarantee that our system is optimized to find the fastest ground service possible.

International Delivery Times: Orders typically take 2-4 weeks to reach certain destinations due to complexities associated with international shipping and local customs.

Customs & Duties: Our international shipping hubs are purposed to help reduce complexities and duties (where applicable) associated with international shipments. Svernut Hand Made is not responsible for any customs, duties or import fees associated with receiving your Svernut Hand Made order.

Svernut Hand Made “The Leather Gentleman's Set” Indiegogo Warranty & Return Policy

While all of our products include a warranty against any manufacturer defects, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards. We will consider exchanges on a case-by-case basis.

story:
Who we are?

 When you think deeper, time is not very close to watches. It runs despite them. It ignores watches when they brake. But watches are the good things that lets us define How did it get so late so soon?

By frequently wondering about phenomenon of time we decided to express this with interest in watches and all of the timekeeping industry. From background in philosophy, communications, manufacturing, physics and business development we brought this idea in to reality.

Explaining the essence 


When there are so many things that changes over the day, there must be something that maintains the balance of change.
You change mood, activities, attitudes. You shift from home to work from work to sports and always have to adapt these changes to your outfit (at least we hope you do).
We have one sexy thing which has no need for replacement.

IT's SOME LOOPS


Apple watch band that is strong enough to keep your watch on a wrist, but at the same time a little bit stretchy to make it good in workouts. It’s stylish enough to be noticed by those thyme lemonade drinking fashionistas and pretty classy to be complimented by business people from the top floor office.

 

BENEFITS

 

 

YOU WONDER WHY SOME LOOPS ARE SO BENEFICIAL?


No, more wondering. The key is in the stubborn, but cute animals - Merino Sheeps. These creatures always happy to exchange our hugs and love to their wool and we are happy to accept them. Because merino wool is one of the best materials nature has to offer us. It is very good at low or high temperatures keeping body at normal temperature and dealing with natural body climate. It is used in performance textile, shoes, clothes, fashion accessories and has great texture and feel to skin.


SUSTAINABILITY

Sustainable, means you will be in beat with modern world caring about place we live in.

AND WE PROVE THAT BY: 

Attractiveness of see and touch

SOME LOOPS has a stylish fury feel and look which might remind what the real cosiness is. Imagine that some cute creature loops around your wrist which reflects the warm of your body.  

 

 

SOME LOOPS comes in various colors

 

Feedback from our first time users

Needed funding

Main goal of campaign is to setup a better tooling for production so that we could be able to produce more consistently and in bigger capacity. Important part is to get materials needed for production in wholesale prices that would allow to reduce cost of final product. Then we would also be able to rent out place for manufacturing and operations. We have already tested this product with our happy customers, but our production is of a too small scale. A lot of money goes in to research and development of technology to make it even better. Our goal is to make this material as wide spread as any other popular watch band material so that people would use less resources than they do now and would be more satisfied with their watches and bands overall.

 

Know your wrist size

Other Ways You Can Help

We definitely understand that some people can't contribute... but that doesn't mean you can't help! We'd love if you could help us get the word out by making some noise about our campaign. 

Spread Some Loops on your social networks and pass it around your friend group via email.

Wishing you the best,

Some loops Team
story_txt:
Who we are? When you think deeper, time is not very close to watches. It runs despite them. It ignores watches when they brake. But watches are the good things that lets us define How did it get so late so soon?By frequently wondering about phenomenon of time we decided to express this with interest in watches and all of the timekeeping industry. From background in philosophy, communications, manufacturing, physics and business development we brought this idea in to reality.Explaining the essence When there are so many things that changes over the day, there must be something that maintains the balance of change.You change mood, activities, attitudes. You shift from home to work from work to sports and always have to adapt these changes to your outfit (at least we hope you do).We have one sexy thing which has no need for replacement.IT's SOME LOOPSApple watch band that is strong enough to keep your watch on a wrist, but at the same time a little bit stretchy to make it good in workouts. It’s stylish enough to be noticed by those thyme lemonade drinking fashionistas and pretty classy to be complimented by business people from the top floor office. BENEFITS  YOU WONDER WHY SOME LOOPS ARE SO BENEFICIAL?No, more wondering. The key is in the stubborn, but cute animals - Merino Sheeps. These creatures always happy to exchange our hugs and love to their wool and we are happy to accept them. Because merino wool is one of the best materials nature has to offer us. It is very good at low or high temperatures keeping body at normal temperature and dealing with natural body climate. It is used in performance textile, shoes, clothes, fashion accessories and has great texture and feel to skin.
SUSTAINABILITYSustainable, means you will be in beat with modern world caring about place we live in.AND WE PROVE THAT BY: Attractiveness of see and touchSOME LOOPS has a stylish fury feel and look which might remind what the real cosiness is. Imagine that some cute creature loops around your wrist which reflects the warm of your body.    
SOME LOOPS comes in various colors Feedback from our first time usersNeeded fundingMain goal of campaign is to setup a better tooling for production so that we could be able to produce more consistently and in bigger capacity. Important part is to get materials needed for production in wholesale prices that would allow to reduce cost of final product. Then we would also be able to rent out place for manufacturing and operations. We have already tested this product with our happy customers, but our production is of a too small scale. A lot of money goes in to research and development of technology to make it even better. Our goal is to make this material as wide spread as any other popular watch band material so that people would use less resources than they do now and would be more satisfied with their watches and bands overall. Know your wrist sizeOther Ways You Can HelpWe definitely understand that some people can't contribute... but that doesn't mean you can't help! We'd love if you could help us get the word out by making some noise about our campaign. Spread Some Loops on your social networks and pass it around your friend group via email.Wishing you the best,Some loops Team

story:
Do you love to move? Do you want stylish and functional pants with big zipper pockets that you can wear anytime, anywhere? If yes, Avenqi is made for you! Avenqi is the first, women-focused, movement culture brand founded by a parkour woman of color. Our designs are created in-house and can’t be found anywhere else. They are made for people who love movement and want functional, high-quality clothes that can seamlessly integrate into your daily life so you can wear anytime, anywhere, and look good!

The name Avenqi is created from the words Aventail, and Qi. Aventail is a medieval piece of armor that protects the neck and shoulders, and Qi means energy or life-force in Chinese. These two words combine the founder’s fascination with medieval knights and castles, and her origins in China.

Avenqi aims to provide a solution to the lack of women clothing options and accurate female representation and presence within the alternative movement community. Whether you do parkour, MovNat, martial arts, climbing, or other types of movement, our clothes are made for you! 

Avenqi is both created and inspired by powerful women in movement doing what they love and on a continuous journey for self-improvement in their practice.

 

This is an ALL OR NOTHING CAMPAIGN! This amazing project will only get funded if we meet our goal.

$20,000 goes toward:

  • Producing the black joggers with important upgrades to YKK zippers.
  • Future inventory for more original designs and products, including tops, bottoms, and even shoes!
  • Business services and setup fees.
  • Packaging, shipping, and other office/business supplies. 

 

 

Stylish & Functional

Specialized 2-in-1 Zipper Pockets

Banded Ankle Cuffs

Comfortable Waistband

 

Celebrating Movement Culture: 

What is “movement culture?” It is a collective of functional training methods emphasizing functional/primal movements, mobility, and longevity. It is more about enjoying the process, self-improvement and exploration, and realizing that all different types of movement is connected, whether it’s throwing, catching, crawling, rolling, swimming, climbing, running, or jumping.

All movement is connected. Some disciplines we practice include: parkour, Ido Portal, MovNat, martial arts/combatives, lifting, climbing, calisthenics, slacklining, skateboarding, and much more!

 

Made and tested by women athletes with muscles.

 

Women’s Pants Size Chart (in)

Estimated to ship in May 2020.

 

Contribute to our campaign and help bring Avenqi to life!

Spread the word and share our Indiegogo campaign with friends and family! Please follow our Instagram and Facebook @avenqi. Thank you!

 

Share link: https://igg.me/at/avenqi 

Risks and challenges

The main challenges involve the logistics of transporting and importing the finished goods, especially with the Coronavirus in China. This could include shipment or customs delays, quality control problems or third party shipping delays. Some delays could happen but we will strive to  ship on time.

Thank you for supporting our vision for this one-of-a-kind movement culture brand!

story:
Who we are:

Born in Los Angeles California and bred in the pacific northwest, the inspiration of Koboko was sparked out of a desire for individualism in style and a sense of adventure.

 

Our Motto:

We live and breathe the phrase “carve out your path” and our designs are evidenced in the provision of comfort wrapped around the spirit of relaxation.

 

What makes us unique?

Koboko’s patented flip flop designs are unmistakable and constructed with high-quality materials that are battle tested and wearable on almost any terrain. Our solution addresses a commonly asked question "How long do I have to wait to break in my flip flops?" We have developed a concept that facilitates an accelerated "break-in" evolution of your flip flop experience while simultaneously providing the required foot and arch support.

Our Mission:

We're on a mission to inspire individuality and freedom of spirit through bold, beautiful, and comfortable sandals that you can wear almost anywhere.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get:

A lot of blood sweat and tears went into perfecting our prototypes, now we need your support in bringing this product to market. We will be taking in pre-orders on our crowdfund campaign which is an opportunity to get a pair of Koboko flip flops at an early bird special rate and simultaneously help us bring this product to market. We really need your participation and energy to make this happen. There will be campaign rewards offered with enticing discounts for you to take advantage of.

When we reach and surpass our goal, we will utilize the contributions to start production immediately! And if we do not meet our goal, your full contribution will be returned to you.

 

Our Collection:

 

Risks & Challenges:

I am quite aware of the unfortunate instances and frustrations surrounding unfulfilled orders. You may have the best product in the world, but if you’re unable to fulfill your customer demands in a timely fashion... Well, I think you know where I’m headed. I’m also very aware of the need to be as communicative as possible with the status of your orders and inquiries, all of which amounts to providing stellar customer service!

We have worked very hard to close the “order to receipt” gaps by identifying manufacturers providing end to end supply chain solutions, and minimizing the number of entities in the overall fulfillment process.

However, working with other vendors and manufacturers does open up more opportunities for delay in the manufacturing and distribution process. We are committed to do everything in our power to deliver our product on time, but a potential setback could be based on factors beyond our control. In the event that this occurs, please be assured that we are working diligently to get everything on track.

We will endeavor to be as transparent and timely with our communication, which is something we can definitely control 100 percent of the time. Our goal, in the event of an untimely and unforeseen hiccup is to keep everyone informed and up to date on our progress until every pair of Koboko Flip Flops is delivered.

Additional impact

Now, for those of you who may not be able to contribute finacially, you can still help by spreading the word and telling your friends and family. You'd be surprised how powerful the word of mouth can be!

story:
Order your custom suit today and claim your power.

Subscribe for updates here: thetylmen.com. 

 

Problem

A nice suit is expensive. The average price for a custom suit ranges between $1,000 and $1,500. It's difficult to find an affordable custom suit. Everyone deserves the confidence of a great suit. That’s why we’re using technology to bring you new, affordable experience to purchasing custom suits. 

Solution

We’re building a fashion tech store in an electric van. We're integrating 3D scanning and augmented reality technologies that will take more than 200 unique measurements to help determine the best fit and style for each client’s suit. By doing so, we’re able to charge $599 for your handmade suit, significantly less than our competition like J Hilburn or Tom James. Our suits are priced similar to Indochino, except, our quality far surpasses them. We source the best wools and fabrics and hand make your suit. Your friends will think you started buying $2,000 suits.

Our store can host up to 5 people at a time. We'll have air filtration ensuring a continuous, clean flow of air. 

We'll scan you in 9 seconds to have a custom fit like no other.  We're using AR technology to help style your new suit. 

We can travel to you by appointment or you can stop on by! We'll be all over. 

  

Brand History

Since our inception four years ago, Tylmen has been a 100% minority owned business with a vision to accelerate achievement.  Everyone deserves the confidence that comes with a suit, regardless of age or income. 

We've been recognized nationwide in GQ, Forbes, ABC, Good Morning America, Robb Report, and the Chicago Tribune.  Over the past year, we've expanded our business to include the sourcing of fabrics and developed key relationships to bring high quality suits to market.

How it works 

Once you buy a suit, we come to you! In the summer of 2022, we are traveling across the USA and Canada one bringing this experience to you. In order to receive your custom suit,  you must be available in one of the cities below. Once we determine you best fit and style using 3D and augmented reality, we'll deliver your suit in 14 days. 

Participating cities: Chicago, Minneapolis, Vancouver, Seattle, Portland, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Denver, Dallas, Austin, New Orleans, Miami, Atlanta, Nashville, Saint louis, Detroit, Toronto, New York city, Washington DC, Greeensboro.

The Store 

It's 100% Electric. We'll produce zero emissions. We're invested in moving towards a carbon neutral society, but with style. 

Technology to enhance your experience. 3D scanning and augmented reality are tech advances in the fashion industry to personalize and enhance the quality of your garments. 

Mobility to cater to an ever changing world. Your time is valuable and we want to compliment your busy lifestyle. The Tylmen will accommodate your schedule.  

Air Filtration Systems. We're dedicated to client safety. In 2020 we learned how important it is to prepare and plan for any infectious disease. We are implementing air filtration systems that continuously remove 99.9% of airborne pathogens, bacteria, and viruses every few seconds.

 

The Suit

 

Few clothiers can make a suit this good.  

The best fabrics. We source the highest grade wools and blends, sustainably, from Mexico. We work with a family owned textile company that has produced quality fabrics for over 100 years.

Handmade. Your suit is made full canvas (the highest quality) in a neighboring city from where we source our fabrics which allows us to deliver on quick turnaround times. 

 

"If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life."

- Marcus Garvey 

Investment

In order to build our first zero emissions store, we need $110,000. The money will go to the manufacturing of the store (electric van) and the cost of goods (your full canvas suit). 

We need to raise the full amount in order to deliver on our promises, that's why we have a fixed goal. We are committed to providing the best quality suits using 3D/AR technology. 

The Impact

Tylmen will only utilize electric vans, ensuring a zero emissions storefront. Our garments will be made to order allowing us to also reduce our carbon footprint with manufacturing. We are invested in building a sustainable environment that empowers the people who live in it.

Risks & Challenges

We have manufacture and supply chain partners as well as a functional design layout of our store. We're in conversation with a couple electric car manufacturers and have good understanding of the time it will take to deliver our electric store. Our founder is a MBA student at Washington University's Olin Business School with an extensive network of mentors, professors, and entrepreneurs to assist and advise with the development.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word. Follow us on instagram @thetylmen. 

As a current graduate student and former D1 football player, I know how difficult it can be to get a custom suit. Suits provide a new level of confidence, and I want to make sure there is an affordable, high quality option out there for every kind of customer. I believe integrating technology and sustainability is the next evolution of retail that will make Tylmen products accessible throughout the entire country. The launch of our zero emissions storefront and electric van will help us meet this goal. 

Thank you for your support! 

We cannot wait to see you on the tour. 

#StayEmpowered

 

As Featured In

The launch of our zero emissions storefront and electric van will help us meet this goal.

story:
Designed in Estonia 

Made with utmost care for the smallest details, so typical of Estonian products, Tymer Harmony is the wearable for everyone: it retains the elegance of a classic watch but includes novelty. It embraces the past, while looking into the future. The eco-friendly, sustainable, healthy future.

 

It's time for the watch that always fits in

With just one, universal design, we were able to fine tune every single detail, from the texture of the bracelet, through watch hands, to the tone of the hour indicators. Its design is minimalist, stylish and timeless. Harmony is as elegant as it is smart: equipped with blood oxygen and heart rate meters, LEDs that notify you about missed calls and unread notifications, as well as sleep tracking, so that you never miss a beat throughout the day. Thanks to the screenless design, the battery life reaches 21 days on a single charge*. The data from the sensors can synchronize with Apple's Health and Google Fit apps, so you can access it the way that suits you best.

*based on approximate power consumption, the real performance might differ slightly.


World's first eco-friendly smartwatch

According to data gathered by WWF, the problem of climate change has not been appropriately addressed by the watchmaking industry. Tymer was founded in 2021, so we are well aware of the importance of sustainability of everything that’s manufactured nowadays. With the world turning to environmentally friendly manufacturing techniques and resources and renewable energy sources, and away from highly-processed materials, we want to contribute to this global trend by making a durable, high quality product that won't need to be exchanged at any point in the upcoming years and won't factor into the pollution of our planet.

Our contribution to global reforestation

To help our planet more, we set out to plant as many trees as possible with the revenue generated by our company. At the end of every month, for every watch sold we will donate a part of our income to One Tree Planted, a charity working on global reforestation, to facilitate their planting of 5 trees. With 1000 contributors, we will be able to help to plant 5000 trees, which combined will produce approximately 580 tonnes of oxygen each year. This is vital for the wellbeing of people in sparsely forested regions, as well as to reducing the carbon dioxide pollution in densely populated areas. 

Drawings

Progress

We have completed the design phase, we have all the blueprints, models and data necessary. The funds gathered will allow us to develop a prototype, start the production and shipment. The product is expected to ship to backers on December 16, 2021. 

We appreciate your support so much, we can't wait to release the final version! If you have any questions, please contact us via the contact form here on Indiegogo, on our website, or at contact@tymer.eu
