story:
As Seen On:

The Time Bum

Worn & Wound

Watching Wrists

Anokhi Magazine



Overview:

About Us:

We at SURI Timepieces design high quality mechanical timepieces inspired by science. By pairing our passion of watches and science, we created a unique platform to raise awareness of certain diseases. Starting off with our Mito watch, we are raising awareness for mitochondrial disease.

The name Mito is derived from the cellular organelle found in our bodies - the mitochondrion. Mitochondria are the power houses of our bodies that utilize the glucose/sugars from our food and convert them into energy in order for us to function. Each cell in our body contains thousands of copies of mitochondrial DNA (the blueprint to create functional mitochondria). However, for every 1/4,000 people, a mutation within the mitochondrial DNA may arise, leading to mitochondrial dysfunction. Impairment of mitochondrial function results in several developmental disorders, muscle weakness/pain, and even organ failure. Simply put, without healthy mitochondria, we would cease to function.

By creating the Mito, we hope to spark public interest in what mitochondria are and the debilitating disease people have to live with. For every watch sold, a portion of the funds will go directly to foundations supporting mitochondrial research.

This watch isn't just a fashion piece, it's a support for a good cause!


The Design:

The inner bezel of the watch contains a unique twist – the mitochondrial DNA map (represented by small dashes around the perimeter of the dial). This map is the blueprint for the development of mitochondria in our bodies.

The Mito - mitochondrial DNA map (highlighted in red)

 The Mito features:

  • Unisex design
  • 316L Stainless-Steel case
  • 40mm face (excld. crown) x 11mm thickness x 20mm lug-wight x 47mm lug-to-lug length
  • Lug-holes
  • 150 meters water-resistance
  • Anti-reflective coating on a domed sapphire crystal
  • screw-down crown
  • Miyota 9015 automatic movement

 Three dial colour/style options:

  • black
  • white/silver
  • brushed stainless-steel

What makes us different than the rest:

Science + Watches = A Unique Inspiration

We wanted to create a watch with a story – something that can act as a conversation piece. The Mito has been designed and created to create awareness of mitochondrial disease.

In terms of the watch itself, we have spared no expense at providing you a watch with materials and features that many rivals don’t offer at this price point:

  • domed sapphire crystal - usually an extra when it comes to watches, comes standard with the Mito. Sapphire crystal provides the maximum protection against scratches.
  • anti-reflective (AR) coating - once again, usually an extra, is another standard feature on the Mito. AR coating means maximum clarity in all lighting conditions.
  • 150 meter water resistance (WR) + screw-down crown - typical classically designed watches would come with a very low WR (< 50 meters). However, we wanted to make sure you could, for example, go for a swim with your Mito. Therefore, we have designed a case that is pressure tested to 150 meters. (Note: the crown [attached at 3 o'clock position used to adjust the time] must be pushed down closed to ensure water-tightness)  
  • Miyota 9015 automatic movement - created by the world-renowned Japanese watch company Citizen, the Miyota 9015 has become a largely popular choice for automatic movements. The Miyota 9015 has been a tried-and-true competitor to the commonly used Swiss movements. An automatic movement means that this watch does not contain a battery. In fact, when worn, the action/movement of your wrist rotates a rotor that winds the watch. When fully wound, you can expect the watch to run for 48 hours if left off your wrist.

The Perks - What do YOU get?

1 - Your choice of a dial colour (black, silver, stainless-steel finish)

2 - A black genuine leather strap

3 - A protective watch travel case (that can hold up to three 40mm sized watches!)


4* - A 20mm black NATO strap.


*if selected as an additional perk (Thank you card + 20mm black NATO strap).

For watch perks - Note: please add (B) for black, (S) for silver, or (SS) for stainless-steel in your Shipping Address Name! Example: "(B) NAME"

Timeline:

Risks and challenges:

As with any project, finding a good manufacturer is not an easy task. After a long search, we are confident that we have found a manufacturer that is able to provide our customers a quality timepiece. We have acquired three working prototypes (one of each dial style) which have exceeded every measure in terms of quality and control.

In terms of the design of the watch, the prototypes of the three Mito's we have acquired have luminescent hour and minute hands (and hour markers for the brushed stainless-steel dial). However, due to the minimal thickness of the hour and minute hands, the manufacturer could not apply enough luminescent material. Thus, this resulted in poor luminescence in dark conditions. We are actively trying our best to see what the best option will be in order to resolve this issue. The following are the two options: 1) slightly altering the hour/minute hands, increasing thickness to allow more luminescent material, or 2) opting out of luminescent material and providing polished hands. We will work with our manufacturer to determine what would be best for the watch.

Please contact suri.timepieces@gmail.com for any questions/concerns/media inquires.
PRE-ORDER YOURS NOW!

Follow us on:
www.suritimepieces.com
Facebook
Instagram

story:
Have you ever wished you had a waterproof case designed specifically for your diabetes devices? Ever wondered why no one has made one yet?

WE DID TOO. That's why we decided to design and make the dSHELL Turtyl. It's a modern case for your modern diabetes device needs. 

The dSHELL Turtyl is a waterproof case with an IP68 Rating that fits the Dexcom G4 CGM receiver. This means can be submerged into 3 meters of water for 30 minutes. This is our first dSHELL product of many, and we will use the IndieGoGo project platform to gauge how and when we can provide other future products.

Colors from the get go. We're offering the Turtyl in Green, Blue, Black, Pink, Orange, and White starting...now!


No longer will your CGM go dead from a splash of water, or a fall from your night stand. No longer will kids being kids interfere with the shelf life of your receiver, as it is joyously thrown into the bath, toilet, pool, sink, or dog/kitty water bowl.

Now it can handle sweat from long bike rides, be on your side while swimming laps, be on your ankle while surfing, or pretty much anything active that involves water--the dSHELL will be there with you!

We're also offering the dSHELL Half Shell, a case that offers simple coverage, a belt clip and is fitted to the Dexcom G4 receiver. The Half Shell is not waterproof, or IP68 rated. 

 The "Half Shell" case with clip.


The dSHELL Creators

Combined we are a product designer and a product user. 

Adam Jackson is a mechanical engineer and has been designing underwater housing kits for the past several years. His expertise has brought the dSHELL into physical form.


Jason McKenzie has lived with Type-1 Diabetes for 20+ years and is an advocate for creating experiences rooted in freedom and empowerment. His motivation and vision for keeping diabetes real has brought the dSHELL from an idea into a reality.


Together we are creating a response to a community need via the spirit of a turtle.



GIVING BACK to the COMMUNITY

We believe we are the community we create and that we are all in this together. With that we are pledging 3% of our funds to the Diabetes Hands Foundation (www.diabeteshf.org). This organization is a true beacon of service as they create foundations to community. We are honored to have the opportunity to share the fruits of this project with them.

Turtyl Power

We chose the name Turtyl (Gaelic for Turtle) for many reasons. Among the "shell" qualities that protect the internal from the external world, the Turtle also carries the energy of persistence, staying grounded in the face of chaos, steady paced, immaculate navigation skills, and the ability to walk peacefully. The Turtle represents the spirit of the water and the land as it dances patiently with both environments. How can the dSHELL Turtyl represent this in your life?

story:
It's time to GIVE more:

We built this brand on the principle that quality does not have to be expensive. That passion to make a better product is more important than costly marketing and inflated popular name brands. We wanted to make a luxury watch but without the middleman, fancy branding, and costly marketing schemes. After hundreds of hours researching which features you want in a watch, what design was going to be the most meaningful, and more efficient manufacturing techniques; the GIVE watch was born. What resulted was a simple, elegant watch that replaces the ludicrously expensive name brand watches in both quality and price. 

Buying from GIVE vs. Others:

Why Watches?

Sometimes something is more than it appears. This watch, for example, is more than just a watch. It is the means to a much larger end. It isn’t just something you wear, but a goal to improve the lives of all those with whom you come in contact. It is meant to be a reminder, a symbol of the power of charitable thought. Building a watch was an intentional choice because it is so visible. Other people will admire your watch and ask you about it, and we hope that each time you will look down and remember that you helped someone. If you are running late, going to a meeting, or rushing to get to a movie on time you will check your watch, and each time you see your GIVE watch we hope you will in turn remember to think how you can "GIVE your time" to the people around you despite your busy schedule.

Not just a pretty face: 

Wherever life takes you, whether it is a fancy dinner or backpacking in the mountains, you can be confident your GIVE watch won’t let you down. GIVE watches are a perfect blend of elegance and durability .

 

 

Styled Simplicity:

 

 

Design is in the details:

 

 

 

Our "AHA" moment:

The innovative idea behind our GiVING back program is unique. It's different than how most companies give back. You've heard of the phrase, "Buy one of our shoes, and we'll give one of our shoes." Or, "Buy a pair glasses, and we'll give someone in need a pair of glasses." But what if you're not particularly passionate about giving glasses to someone? What if you had a family member that had cancer?

So instead of making the decision for you, we want to empower you to determine which charity you want to support with your purchase. We have teamed up with some of the most well known charities throughout the world to ensure our profits reach the most amount of people. When you have picked which watch design you love the most, you select which of the 5 movements you would like to give back to. We then donate proceeds from your watch purchase the movement of your choice.

So tell me, how do the charities work?  

So instead of making the decision for you, we are asking you to make the decision and designate which charity receives the donation from your purchase. 

Water: When you buy a GIVE watch and choose Water, your purchase will GIVE twelve people clean water through charitywater.org. One watch can help 12 people!

 

 

Hunger: If you choose Hunger at checkout your purchase will GIVE to Actionagainsthunger.org to provide five people with a warm meal.

 

 

Cancer: We have teamed up with Livestrong to provide support for cancer patients, survivors, and families. This will help their members receive financial support in providing cheaper screenings, treatment, and relief.

 

 

Education: When you choose education at checkout you will GIVE five children new study materials, technology, or improved classroom environment.

 

 

Animals: Each time you select Animals at checkout it will GIVE two abused or neglected animals a second chance. Animals are just as deserving of our attention as people and working with American Humane will make sure we help as many animals as possible. 

 

 

Stretch goal definition: A stretch goal is an additional goal set for our campaign when we exceed our initial funding goal. As we reach these stretch goals we will release the following products for our current backers, or new customers to buy. 

 

Team

We are a collection of like minded people. We are creative both in our pursuits of affordable fashion as well as our approaches to raise awareness of those in need. Our desire to help those in need comes from direct experience in 3rd world countries. We have witnessed firsthand not only the suffering that comes from immense poverty, but also the huge difference that even a small amount of resources can make. We realize how fortunate we are to live where we do and have what we have, but also how much work there is to do. Rather than dwell on the negative, we are hopeful and excited at the prospect of making a difference wherever we can. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Like our campaign? GIVE your friends a heads up by sharing this with them by clicking one of the social media buttons up top.

As a way to GIVE back to our awesome supporters, we created a referral program! For every 3 people you refer that contribute to our campaign, we'll GIVE you a watch of your choice on for free on us! We will reach out to you once you've hit 3 referrals.

Log into your Indiegogo account (required for tracking referrals)

On the left side of the screen, go to the Indiegogo share tools

Click the "Link" Icon to get your personalized URL

Copy the URL and send it to 3 people you have in mind

*For best results, personal mediums like email & text are most effective.

 

 

FAQ

Q: Where do I select which Charity Movement I want to support at checkout?

A: At the time of purchase you will see the option to choose your preferred charity. 

Q: How did you decide which charities?

A: We conducted a Facebook poll to 3,000 people and found the 5 most common charities movements people wanted to support were - water, hunger, cancer, education, and animal relief.

Q: Will you be supporting more charities in the future?

A: Absolutely. After we are funded we will ask our backers for suggested Charities and look into where our profits can help the most amount of people.

Q: How long after it funds should it take to get my watch 

A: Our team is ready to ship out as many watches as possible. We have an established inventory, and we are excited to make an impact in the world. You should receive your watch within just a week or two of purchase.

story:
Ellen Griffin and  How it started

In the late 90's opened under the name Barracuda Bay the journey began from a one bedroom apartment making exotic dance/ aerialist costumes to a full warehouse in Florida over the next few years.  The line went on later to include swimwear and bikinis. After several years and some life changes we closed our doors and stepped away from the industry.

Fast forward to October 2016 , The plans began to go in to effect to reopen the business completely updated with a twist.

 

                                     Our designs and what makes ours different

Enter, Zombikinis with a whole new take on bikinis, exotics and custom fabric printing. We offer hand made in the U.S.A .products. Featuring artist designed fabrics and prints that will be licensed exclusively to us as well as unique and one of a kind bikinis and exotic dance wear. Using artwork by various artists in combination with our fabric manufacturer to create limited edition designs on high quality stretch fabrics.

We have tested our Zombikinis and exotic wear under some of the worst of conditions to find the best results in durability, longevity, and design.

While all of our tags are clearly marked hand wash only and should be maintained as such.

We have tested them in the washer and dryer repeatedly, pool water, salt water, fresh water, and dance clubs all over. Doing deliberately everything possibly wrong to see what holds up to the test of life. (These little things are tough)

Because the truth is we all buy items, never read the tags or forget that they should be treated as delicates and we do bad things to them.

“Zombikinis are Tag-less” We use waterproof ink to inner stamp all of our items, no more itchy tags, or damaged items from pulling the tags out. No one ever did the beach walk - n - scratch and made it look good, so tags be gone.

 

                                                   The Indiegogo Exclusive Offering 

              Free Shipping on all U.S Perks  additional fees apply for out of country

“The Paint Your Own Bikini” package. Pick from several styles of custom designed artwork for your bikini + you get a set of 6 waterproof paint/markers with a paintbrush type tip on one side and a marker type tip on the other.

Pick your bikini, pick your design, pick your paint color kit and paint away allowing you to create your own one of a kind colored swimsuit.

Paint your own designs are limited to 200 of each design and color. Once they sell out we will introduce new art designs . Allowing you to keep your bikini looking different from the rest and painted by the best- You.

Once this Indiegogo is over we will release them on our website

www.zombikinis.com

Step by Step to paint your own

Any variation you chose to paint

                                                                    Funding Goals

We are starting with 1,500.00 for the first goal , this will help us to buy in larger quantity's of fabric so we can have more physical items in stock and on hand. Allowing us to change out the artwork every few months keeping our prints and designs fresh.

The optimum goal raised would be between 5,000 -7,000

Quick breakdown

10-12 large bolts of custom fabric approximately 4,000

1 additional commercial machine 1,200

1 large bolt of lining 900

 

                                                                  Zombikinis Promise


At Zombikinis our mission has always been to provide the best quality Bikinis and Exotic Dance wear at reasonable prices. We believe that customer service and satisfaction should be the #1 concern for building a strong business foundation. The integrity of customers, employees, subcontractors, and sponsors should be held in the highest regard. These people are the backbone of any successful company large or small. It is our goals to continue to sponsor and support new and upcoming talent in a growing industry as well as to promote a strong self worth in individuals. To open the doors to new jobs, opportunity's and help people achieve their goals in life without the boundaries of race, sex, or creed.
To do business the way it was meant to be done for real people by real people. We truly believe there are no limits to what greatness one can achieve in life. Be who you are do what you believe and anything is possible.

 

                  

                                           

                                                                     End Game

We do not want to be the biggest company but a most creatively unique one.

A place where you can create your own bikinis, and express your self with wearable art . Life should be about fun, those little things that make us different from each other, in a world becoming of clones be yourself.


Distinctively different and freakishly fun – Zombikinis

 

 Size Chart

       Fabric Guide

Paint your Own Bikini Sets are available in  
Blue Koi - Black Skull - Red Skull

Mini Sets are available in  
G-String - Ty Side G String- T Back  and all come with a Triangle Top

story_txt:
Ellen Griffin and  How it started
In the late 90's opened under the name Barracuda Bay the journey began from a one bedroom apartment making exotic dance/ aerialist costumes to a full warehouse in Florida over the next few years.  The line went on later to include swimwear and bikinis. After several years and some life changes we closed our doors and stepped away from the industry.
Fast forward to October 2016 , The plans began to go in to effect to reopen the business completely updated with a twist.

 
                                     Our designs and what makes ours different
Enter, Zombikinis with a whole new take on bikinis, exotics and custom fabric printing. We offer hand made in the U.S.A .products. Featuring artist designed fabrics and prints that will be licensed exclusively to us as well as unique and one of a kind bikinis and exotic dance wear. Using artwork by various artists in combination with our fabric manufacturer to create limited edition designs on high quality stretch fabrics.
We have tested our Zombikinis and exotic wear under some of the worst of conditions to find the best results in durability, longevity, and design.
While all of our tags are clearly marked hand wash only and should be maintained as such.
We have tested them in the washer and dryer repeatedly, pool water, salt water, fresh water, and dance clubs all over. Doing deliberately everything possibly wrong to see what holds up to the test of life. (These little things are tough)
Because the truth is we all buy items, never read the tags or forget that they should be treated as delicates and we do bad things to them.
“Zombikinis are Tag-less” We use waterproof ink to inner stamp all of our items, no more itchy tags, or damaged items from pulling the tags out. No one ever did the beach walk - n - scratch and made it look good, so tags be gone.


 
                                                   The Indiegogo Exclusive Offering 
              Free Shipping on all U.S Perks  additional fees apply for out of country
“The Paint Your Own Bikini” package. Pick from several styles of custom designed artwork for your bikini + you get a set of 6 waterproof paint/markers with a paintbrush type tip on one side and a marker type tip on the other.
Pick your bikini, pick your design, pick your paint color kit and paint away allowing you to create your own one of a kind colored swimsuit.
Paint your own designs are limited to 200 of each design and color. Once they sell out we will introduce new art designs . Allowing you to keep your bikini looking different from the rest and painted by the best- You.
Once this Indiegogo is over we will release them on our website
www.zombikinis.com
Step by Step to paint your own

Any variation you chose to paint


                                                                    Funding Goals
We are starting with 1,500.00 for the first goal , this will help us to buy in larger quantity's of fabric so we can have more physical items in stock and on hand. Allowing us to change out the artwork every few months keeping our prints and designs fresh.
The optimum goal raised would be between 5,000 -7,000
Quick breakdown
10-12 large bolts of custom fabric approximately 4,000
1 additional commercial machine 1,200
1 large bolt of lining 900

 
                                                                  Zombikinis Promise
At Zombikinis our mission has always been to provide the best quality Bikinis and Exotic Dance wear at reasonable prices. We believe that customer service and satisfaction should be the #1 concern for building a strong business foundation. The integrity of customers, employees, subcontractors, and sponsors should be held in the highest regard. These people are the backbone of any successful company large or small. It is our goals to continue to sponsor and support new and upcoming talent in a growing industry as well as to promote a strong self worth in individuals. To open the doors to new jobs, opportunity's and help people achieve their goals in life without the boundaries of race, sex, or creed.To do business the way it was meant to be done for real people by real people. We truly believe there are no limits to what greatness one can achieve in life. Be who you are do what you believe and anything is possible.
 
                  

                                           
                                                                     End Game
We do not want to be the biggest company but a most creatively unique one.
A place where you can create your own bikinis, and express your self with wearable art . Life should be about fun, those little things that make us different from each other, in a world becoming of clones be yourself.
Distinctively different and freakishly fun – Zombikinis
 
 Size Chart

       Fabric Guide

Due to the amount of options we offer Sponsors who purchase bundles please contact us for sizing and fabrics choices.  
Paint your Own Bikini Sets are available in  Blue Koi - Black Skull - Red Skull
Mini Sets are available in  G-String - Ty Side G String- T Back  and all come with a Triangle Top
Mini Sets and Custom Bikinis are available in fabricsEvil Eye Large - Evil Eye Small - Side Eye  - Black Zombie - Green Zombie - Blue Fairy - Squidly - 
Time Line

story:
“Not bag”-Solar + more….A New Moment for a Solar Bag

Different from the typical solar knapsack in the market,

“Not bag” gives you the unique experiences of solar bag for the daily life and all you need.

This is not only a tote bag but the most convenient, user friendly, reliable and secured solar tote bag in big volume.

It provides the solar direct or wireless charge for the mobile device anytime when desire.  You will not miss any call and leave your mobile device behind with the call alerts and anti-loss GPS function.

Dedicated inner bag with non-scratch zippers, velcro and elastic for all those things to be securely kept and it can be a Waist-bag for your passport, cards, money notes and mobile for traveling.  

The material of the bag itself was laminated with the solar panel inside EVA which is durable and cool looking.

The material MUST be easy to care for or how can it be with you daily!!!!

It is incredibly durable and can sustain extreme heat, sharp objects, and even water leaving no stain or marks.  Whether you are using it for work, traveling, or casual outings, it brings you the light weight and easy to care experience that no other solar bags can.

On the other hand, all the electronic devices are protected with Nano-coating for rain proof and you don’t have to worry that the devices will be damaged even the bag is open and all those devices were not covered.

Hi May, it's yours own "Personalized plate"

It is your own "Not Bag"-the plate of the bag and all those devices will be laser with your name on it, and it is the unique one for you!!! 

Not bag-means simplicity and can be everything:)

-"Not bag" size: what a wonderful size and volume for daily use in L420 x W340 x D120mm and strap length is 570mm which is 17 Liter cacapity.

Carrying notebook, lunch box, windbreaker, water, DSLR camera and anything for work, play and leisure daily.

Solar supply: what a big panel in L300mm x W350mm with 5V and 8W power supply.

GPS Anti-loss device that you will not miss your phone and your "Not bag"!!!

-it goes with free apps and supports IOS and Android, and the most update Bluetooth 4.0 low energy consumption technology.

It provides you with 2-way alerts no matter the mobile and such device are apart, both alerted.

Charge your mobile on the go

-Wireless Charge power bank with 5000mAh high power Lithium-polymer battery which is lightweight and good enough for daily use.

Easy to read the battery status for recharging and wireless charge output with LED indicating light.

Support input and output at the same time that you don’t have to wait to charge the power bank since they work simultaneously.  

The Solar panel is connected to the power bank for recharging with Sunshine at any time, and it also supports wall that they can work at the same time.

Receiver included is compatible to Lighting for iphone/Micro USB Android device/Type C to support mobile not capable of wireless charge.

Excellent performance with 3 big pure copper coil wires for wireless power supply and gives you no worries to charge the mobile on the go.  

Call alerts: it’s not only call alerts for calls and messages but more + more.

-Step counts/Distance measuring/Calorie consumption management/Sleep management/Event trigger(water drinking, taking medicine, meeting etc)/Call reminder/Clock/Sedentary reminder/Anti-loss alerts/Remote camera/Vibration alarm clock

It supports IOS and Android with free apps and Bluetooth 4.0 low energy consumption technology.

You can clip it or wear it as smart watch whatever you want.

Inner bag? Waist bag?

-Best fits when it is attached to "Not bag" for your daily belongings.

Fits well for passport, money notes, mobile and more for traveling when detached.

Two openings are at front with the unique zipper with no teeth which are not stuck or won't create scratch.

The back can be opened to hide the strap when it is with "Not bag" (of course you can also store something inside), it has elastic bands with rubber-coated that helps to hold things more stable and secure.

The fabric of the back is silk-touch polyester satin which is extremely soft and comfortable to skin.

"Not bag" Solar + more 

It is the first product we are going to launch and we sincerely hope to have your back up to make it life and no matter what, appreciate much of your time spent in reading it and we will keep bringing you more innovative ideas, Thanks again and looking forward to have your feedback!!!!

Not only thanks but it's spectral motivation to drive us to go forward and further!

 

 

Risk and Challenges

The prototype has been made, the related apps and all those hardware are also ready.  We are aware that there might be challenges in manufacturing, production and shipping.  We promise to keep an eye on every single process to ensure the shipment on time with excellent product to you.  If any issue comes out during the process or there are obstacles that will potentially cause the delay, we will do our best to fix it and keep you well informed.

After all, We are so excited to bring it to you and it's really “Not bag”!!!!!:)

Q and A


Q1/ How to take care of Not bag?
A1/ Wipe with clean water is fine.

Q2/ Can Not bag be folded and bend?
A2/ The area with Solar panels can not be folded and bend. Otherwise, it will damage the Solar performance.

Q3/ How long does it take to fully charge a mobile phone via Solar power?
A3/ It depends on the battery capacity of the mobile and the period of the direct sunlight exposure.
Generally, sunlight exposure at noon would be considered the peak hour to produce the maximum solar output.

Q4/ Do you ship worldwide?
A4/ We utilize courier services to ship worldwide for the countries that are not restricted.

Q5/ Does the delivery fee include import duties?
A5/ No, it does not include import duties and we will mark “Personal Gift with no commercial value”.  At the same time, you may want to check if there is any import duties at your end.  

Q6/ How long does it take for the package to reach me?
A6/ It will be around 14 working days when dispatch for U.S/EU/Asia countries.  For the rest of world, we will quote country by country.

Q7/ How long does it take to fully charge the power bank by wall charge?
A7/ Approximately 6-7 hours.

Q8/ Does the power bank support both solar power charge and wall charge at the same time?
A8/ Yes, it supports both inputs at the same time.

Q9/ How long does it take to fully charge the mobile by wireless charge?
Q9/ It depends on the battery capacity of the mobile.  Generally, it takes 3-4 hours for mobile batteries that are in 2000mAh.

Q10/ How many times can the power bank to charge the mobile? 
A10/ It is depend the battery capacity of the mobile. For your ref., it will be around 2 times for the mobile battery in 2000mAh.

Q11/ Does the power bank have USB output?
A11/ Yes, it has one USB output in 5v/2a.

Q12/ If my mobile does not have wireless charge, what can I do?
A12/ Don’t worry, we will provide wireless charge receiver.  You can simply plug it to your mobile phone and it works.

Q13/ How can I know the wireless charge power bank is working?
A13/ It has LED indicating light and it shows the battery capacity, input charges light will flash when it works and wireless charging light will flash also when it outputs.

Q14/ What is the weight of the wireless charge power bank?

A14/ It is only 120g.

Q15/ What is the weight of Call alerts device?
A15/ It is only 5g with clips and 18g with strap as smart watch.

Q16/ How to charge the Call alerts device?
A16/ Micro USB

Q17/ How long does it take to fully charge the Call alerts?
A17/ It takes less than 2 hours.

Q18/ What is the stand by time of Call alerts?
A18/ Approximately 3-5 days.

Q19/ What type of Android and IOS does Call alerts support?
A19/ Android 4.4 or above and IOS7.1 or above. For example, iphone 4s/5/5c/5s/6/6+/7/7+

Q20/ What is the weight of GPS Anti-loss device?
A20/ It is 4g with battery.

Q21/ What is the size of GPS Anti-loss device?
A21/ It is 15x15x4mm

Q22/ What is the battery type of GPS Anti-loss device?
A22/ It is CR2032.

Q23/ What long does the battery last for the GPS Anti-loss device?
A23/ It lasts about 6 months.

Q24/ What is the maximum range of the GPS Anti-loss device?
A24/ Approximately 45 feet.

Q25/ What type of Android and IOS does GPS Anti-loss device support?
A25/ Android 4.3 or above and IOS5.0 or above. For example, iphone 4s/5/5c/5s/6/6+/7/7+

Q26/ Does the GPS Anti-loss device support Google Map?
A26/ Yes.

Q27/It the Waist-bag washable?
A27 / Yes, it is washable and please read the care label for detail instruction.

Q28/ What is the size of the Waist bag?
A28/ It is L135 x W295mm.

Q29/ What is the weight of the Waist bag?
A29/ It is 90g.

Q30/ What is the strap length of the Waist bag?
A30/ It is 740mm lay flat.  If you need longer length please let us know.

Q31/ Any Maintenance services?

A31/ Yes, we provide 6-months maintenance services for Wireless charge power bank，wireless charge receiver, call alerts  and GPS anti-loss device, except for cause by recklessness or willful acts that we will send you a new one by courier-collect,

story: Campaign Cancelled
story_txt: Campaign Cancelled

story:
Vita Calces is more than just a watch company its a society! 

Our Goal

The goal of this project is to raise the funds to order and distribute our first watch collection. We have put a lot of time and money into our design and setting up our supply chain. The funding from this will go to ordering our first collection and setting up our network and shop.

We wanted to find a way that we could make a difference in this world, help people and push civilization in the right direction. We designed these watches and hope to sell them all over the world, 30% of our profits go directly to a charity or cause in our network. We are starting with Water.org to provide fresh clean water to people in developing countries. Every single watch we sell will be donating 30% right to that cause. Today we start with water, but we hope to grow our network to tree planting, green energy, and natural disaster relief funds. We want to not just have a brand, but a statement that our watches and the people that wear them make a difference in the world! The goal we have set allows us to receive our first shipment of watches that we have worked very hard to design. Once we have met our goal we will be selling online and trying to grow our movement across the globe. 

Once we have established our company we plan to include a serial number lookup for all purchasers. This will allow people to see exactly were their donations are going.

We at Vita Calces thank you for supporting us and for making a difference by helping those in need.

Our Products

Risks and challenges

The biggest challenge we faced was securing a supply chain, we have overcome this by increasing our suppliers so we will not fall short of product. We also have reached out to fulfillment centers in order to keep up with growing demand as we gain steam.

Another challenge we are facing is building our charity network, right now we have partnered up with Water.org and are looking to expand, however since charities work on low budgets, response times can sometimes be slow. We plan to overcome this after crowdfunding by volunteering to help these organizations ourselves when we can!

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

1. Decide how many VIBRATO Signature Watches you would like then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. Receive and fill out the survey for colour choices via email

4. We receive your colour choices and prepare your watch. 

5. You receive your order and your expression is in your hands :)

 

Personality is what defines us as individuals.

We realised through understanding the meaning of colour that we could all express our personality through the colours we align to and that colour meaning correlates directly with personality traits. 

We have taken this understanding to introduce a men's watch brand that is vibrant & bold into the marketplace, a brand that focuses on delivering high quality, fashionable products that help you make a personality statement. 

Colour plays a vital role in the world we live in

We are launching this campaign on the back of our  VIBRATO Originals colour palette (Blue, Red, White & Yellow) which we feel gives us a great opportunity to tap into a strong set of personalities. Personalities that represent us through the colours we come into contact with on a daily basis. 

Personality is the original personal property.

However we would love to introduce more colour palettes and styles based on our brand ethos and represent the personalities that match. By bringing our Signature Watches directly via Indiegogo we are able to connect to our potential consumers and cut out the retailers and middlemen.  This allows us to have first hand feedback and makes us accountable to only you our customers and also allows us to offer a great quality product for half the price retailers would charge.

VIBRATO Signature Colourway Two

Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.

We drew inspiration for our "Signature Collection" from the idea that colour accessories can be a great extension to our personalities. This idea of a product that allows you to express yourself in this manner was ambitious at first, but we wanted to take the opportunity to introduce it to market and create quality products, for a fraction of our competitors' prices. We are hopeful that crowdfunding will kickstart a new movement and fund our very first project.

Our collection is backed by a warranty

By working together with a network of experienced manufacturing partners, we have put together a product and brand that we are very proud of and hope you will be too.. From the design to the hardcase snap box packaging that the watch arrives in, every nuance of our Signature Collection has been looked over in detail to ensure that the watches are built to last. 

We're confident that your VIBRATO Signature Watch will be durable and stand up to everyday wear. We wanted to keep the case strong and aligned to our vibrant and bold ethos, at 13mm thick and 47mm in diameter. To increase durability, we decided on a 316L steel case. This allows for a strong case that is also a perfect weight to the touch. It is the industry standard when it comes to luxury watches. 

If anything were to happen to your watch, we hope that you will send it back to us for repair or replacement. We will cover all internal parts should they ever fail you within our 2 year warranty period.

SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Case Diameter: 47 mm 
  • Case Thickness: 13 mm 
  • Face Diameter: 42 mm 
  • Band Material: Genuine Leather Band 
  • Band Width: 24 mm 
  • Lug Width: 2.3mm 
  • Total Weight: 113g 
  • Case Material: 316L Steel 
  • Back Plating: Stainless Steel 
  • Clasp: Standard Buckle Clasp 
  • Clasp Material: Stainless Steel 
  • Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Glass  
  • Display: 3-hand Analog  
  • Movement: Japanese Miyota Movement
  • Water Resistant: 5 ATM / 50 Meters

Our Goals

This is where Indiegogo comes in. We need your support to launch our line of watches. We are raising funding specifically for further R&D, manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for the VIBRATO Signature Watch collection. Your support for the production of these affordable, quality watches will also make them available to all in the future. And of course, you will be the first to own one of our Signature watches.

About the company

VIBRATO Signature Watches consists of a diverse team of creative product designers with cross-functional skills within the fields of design, development, and manufacturing. We have come together as a team that brings experience in bringing innovative products to life. 

Munya will be spearheading the design and development of the Signature collection, while Carmen and Jeremy supervise logistics, communications, and backer relations. With the support of the rest of our experienced team including graphic designers and our digital marketing team, we are ready to build you a product that you can proudly support.

.

Other Ways You Can Help

We'd love to get the word out to as many people as possible & you can help us by sharing our story with the people you know and can reach. Help us make as much noise as possible. The share tools are at the top of the page :) 

Thank You for taking time out to read our story
story_txt:
First time to Indiegogo?
It's super easy!
1. Decide how many VIBRATO Signature Watches you would like then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."
2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
3. Receive and fill out the survey for colour choices via email
4. We receive your colour choices and prepare your watch. 
5. You receive your order and your expression is in your hands :)
 
Personality is what defines us as individuals.

We realised through understanding the meaning of colour that we could all express our personality through the colours we align to and that colour meaning correlates directly with personality traits. 

We have taken this understanding to introduce a men's watch brand that is vibrant & bold into the marketplace, a brand that focuses on delivering high quality, fashionable products that help you make a personality statement. 
Colour plays a vital role in the world we live in

We are launching this campaign on the back of our  VIBRATO Originals colour palette (Blue, Red, White & Yellow) which we feel gives us a great opportunity to tap into a strong set of personalities. Personalities that represent us through the colours we come into contact with on a daily basis. 
Personality is the original personal property.

However we would love to introduce more colour palettes and styles based on our brand ethos and represent the personalities that match. By bringing our Signature Watches directly via Indiegogo we are able to connect to our potential consumers and cut out the retailers and middlemen.  This allows us to have first hand feedback and makes us accountable to only you our customers and also allows us to offer a great quality product for half the price retailers would charge.
VIBRATO Signature Colourway Two

Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.

We drew inspiration for our "Signature Collection" from the idea that colour accessories can be a great extension to our personalities. This idea of a product that allows you to express yourself in this manner was ambitious at first, but we wanted to take the opportunity to introduce it to market and create quality products, for a fraction of our competitors' prices. We are hopeful that crowdfunding will kickstart a new movement and fund our very first project.
Our collection is backed by a warranty

By working together with a network of experienced manufacturing partners, we have put together a product and brand that we are very proud of and hope you will be too.. From the design to the hardcase snap box packaging that the watch arrives in, every nuance of our Signature Collection has been looked over in detail to ensure that the watches are built to last. 
We're confident that your VIBRATO Signature Watch will be durable and stand up to everyday wear. If anything were to happen to your watch, we hope that you will send it back to us for repair or replacement. We will cover all internal parts should they ever fail you within our 2 year warranty period.

Band Material: Genuine Leather Band

Your support for the production of these affordable, quality watches will also make them available to all in the future. And of course, you will be the first to own one of our Signature watches.

story:
Our Hats are:

1) Made from premium fabric. We use only the highest quality wool twill fabric. This is an extremely superior fabric, used only by top craftsmen. It's 300 grams and designed to have an amazing soft feel but endure the most brutal conditions.

2) Backed by a 10 year guarantee. We're confident that your 365 hat will be with the most durable hat you've ever owned. We're so confident that we are backing our hats up with a 10 year guarantee.

3) Made in America. Paying attention to details is vital to us, so wanted to be very hands on with the production process. We teamed up with production facilities that pay proper attention to quality, people and procedures right here in New York.

4) Sold Directly to you. Kickstarter allows us to cut out the retail channel and offer you a hat that typically would retail for $120 at under $70.

Our journey started almost two years ago when we took a different approach to how hats are made. Our love for quality products led us on a mission to design the perfect hat. In late 2012, we teamed up with a small group craftsmen in Harlem NY, and started selling our goods online. Our designs were noticed and gained popularity due to simple urban design, but we wanted to take it step further.

We see a hat industry dominated by cottons, nylon, and straw blends. The hat industry is lacking quality and design. We want to craft a hat that is not only stylish, but made from materials that are actually functional, and last for at least 10 years. We call our strategy 'Sustainable Fashion.'

Most brands these days purposely make goods which are meant to fall apart after a few wears. This process is called Planned obsolescence. This is a business strategy in which the obsolescence (the process of becoming obsolete—that is, unfashionable or no longer usable) of a product is planned and built into it from its conception. This is done so that in future the consumer feels a need to purchase new products and services that the manufacturer brings out as replacements for the old ones.

Read more at: 

http://www.economist.com/node/13354332#B2zkbmxmPkTyQjfH.99

After searching through hundreds of textiles combinations, we chose an incredible wool material which is light weight yet durable. Functionality was key, and we found the perfect textile to compliment the life of an outdoor fanatic. With your early support today, we'll use the funds to begin the production of the 365 hat collection.

The 365 hat is not only perfection in terms of engineering and production, but it's rich in its concept and quality. Unlike most other hats on the market, the 365 hat can sustain the sun, snow, and any weather in between. We wanted the design to be simple and classic, so we stripped the hat down to it's bare essentials.

The 365 is heat processed from a textile which always retains its shape. The hat can be stuffed into your bag without a worry. The hat will look exactly as it did when you're ready to wear it again.

To create a quality product, we chose a durable wool fabric. This innovative fabric is treated to retain it's shape for the life of the hat, which gives added versatility. The hat is waterproof, as well as sweat & stain resistant. We worked with Bollman Hat company in NYC, a staple in the hat industry for 145 years, to provide us with the top quality wool available in the United States. Our simple design is finished off with adjustable leather drawstrings. 

Detachable ear protectors

Ideal for those frigid days when your ears feel frozen. The 365 features a Velcro strip which is compatible with the detachable ear protectors. You can easily attached or remove the ear protectors depending on the season.


We wanted a design that could be flexible to your individual style, so we developed 3 color options to choose from:

The Veneto is a classic design ideal for outdoor enthusiast. The Veneto featured a heat processed brim with no additional stitching, light-weight leather drawstrings, and small ventilation holes near the brim. This is a simple design which speaks volumes. Available in Red, Brown & Black

Brown color shown above in shade and natural lighting

Made for the fashion forward explorer. Dress up, or dress down with the Manila hat. Features light-weight lambskin drawstrings, and a double enforced stitching on the brim and ventilation holes near the brim. Pair this hat perfectly with your favorite Fall jacket, and look fresh on your next adventure. Available in Red, Brown & Black

Red color shown above in shade and natural lighting

This is the perfect hat to pair up with just about any outfit. Not only is the Riyadh functional, but it will add personality to your everyday outfit. The simple design is contrasted beautifully with the heavy leather drawstrings. Features double enforced brim stitching, and ventilation for cooling. This hat demands attention without asking for it. Available in Red, Brown & Black


Black color shown above in shade and natural lighting

Place a measuring tape around your head about 1/8" above your ear, across the mid-forehead, completely circling your head. Hold the tape firmly, but not too tightly. You need to measure your head exactly where the hat will sit. If your measurement falls between sizes, choose the next largest size. Typically, an average man will wear a Large, and a majority women wear Small.

Our team has spent nearly 10 months perfecting the 365 hat, and tested its functionality through various weather conditions. This has become more than a passion, but rather a mission to bring quality goods back to hard working people. We want to make sure outdoor fanatics like us never have to get soaked in the rain, or sunburn in the heat. If for any reason you are not satisfied with the quality of your 365 hat, we'll replace the hat for you. If the hat gets damaged due to the weather or looses it's shape.. we will be more than happy to replace the hat for you! We're putting 10 year stamp on that.


Risks & Challenges

The 365 hats are hand treated by the most skilled craftsmen in New York City. This method of keeping our manufacturing locally allows our team to be very hands on throughout the entire production process, and gives us the chance to tackle any obstacles before they become a big concern.

Additionally, we source our wool directly from the oldest hat mill in New York, The Bollman Hat company. Being in business for 145 years proves their excellence and ensures us that the 365 will be top quality.

story:
No sub-standard quality watches from us! 

We ensure quality by using the most durable and sought after materials in the watch industry, some of which are used by big player watch companies. We also use components by renown companies like Citizen Miyota to ensure quality. To add on to the strict quality control checks that will be carried out after production, I will personally do checks one-by-one to ensure that the watch(es) you receive are of unparalleled quality. 


No cracks, no scratches, no fuss.

Our mineral crystal is specially hardened to prevent scratches  and treated with an anti-reflective coating which reduces glare and dirt marks, ensuring your watch stays clean and easy to read. Your SHIBUSA watch will never give off a blurred,dirty look that most other mineral crystal watches show.

                                                   

Scratch-free all day, keeping it fresh.

We use PVD Coated 316L Stainless Steel commonly found in many luxury watches. It is robust and durable, and does not rust, making it the benchmark material for all steel watches.

Why PVD Coated?

PVD Coating, or sometimes also known as ION plating can make a watch resistant to scratches due to its ability in reducing friction on metal parts. It not only makes the watch look aesthetically pleasing, but also keeps your watch in mint condition. In the event of a knock or scratch from another object, you can be assured that your SHIBUSA watch is more likely to take the paint off another object, than have its own paint scratched off!

                              

Going for a swim? No problem.

Our watches are water resistant up to a 5 ATM. Good for showering and snorkeling, but it is probably not a good idea to deep sea dive with it.

Japanese Perfection.

Citizen Miyota is a Japanese company well-known for being the engine of many watches around the globe. The Japanese have a reputation for craftsmanship, precision, and attention to detail. We only seek the best components with superior quality, thus selecting the Miyota 0S21 Chronograph Quartz movement was only natural to ensure perfection in every watch.


For the best comfort!

Our straps are made of 100% Genuine leather which seasons over time as you wear it, but never loses its classic look and feel. Which is unlike most leather straps in the watch industry that are made of short-lived synthetic materials.


                                                    43mm Case Diameter
                                                    11mm Case Thickness
                                                         24mm Lug Width



                  Isamashi No.1 Blackout (BO1)

$119 USD + Free Shipping Worldwide

Expected future price: $150 USD

*Please comment the perk code & strap you want after purchase*


Isamashi No.1 Black Gold (BG1)

$119 USD + Free Shipping Worldwide

Expected future price: $150 USD

*Please comment the perk code& strap you want after purchase*


Isamashi No.1 Champagne

$119 USD + Free Shipping Worldwide

Expected future price: $150 USD

*Please comment the perk code & strap you want after purchase.*


Three Of A Kind (3OAK)

Receive 3 Isamashi No.1 Watches of your choice with this special bundle deal, only available here as a perk on Indiegogo.

$300 USD + Free Shipping Worldwide 
Expected future price: $450 USD

*Please comment the perk codes & straps you want after purchase.*


Here's the HARD TRUTH; Most watch brands mark their prices upwards by 5-15X their cost price by the time it arrives in the store. This is attributable to having business activities in between such as a middleman, retail stores etc. Ultimately, this drives their profit margins sky high and leaves a hole in the pockets of consumers. Also, where is the quality you are getting for the price you pay?                                                                         

We aim to be affordable, all without compromising on the high-quality a watch should have. This is why we sell our watches straight to the consumer, which means we cut the need of having operations in-between that create a bigger hole in your pocket.

We aim to reduce or totally eradicate opacity many businesses have to ensure that our customers will never have doubts about their purchase.

SHIBUSA in Japanese: Simple, Subtle, and Unobstructed beauty.

A mix of class with a twist of modern day street fashion, conveyed on your wrist. Hence our motto: “Tell the time, Make a statement." 

                          

Our watches are versatile, sleek and unique, allowing it to be worn in any setting. 


I am a 19 year old student, eager entrepreneur, and fellow watch enthusiast. I started falling in love with watches after taking notice of the many watches my dad collected. He would line them up neatly on his bedside table, which have intrigued me about their origins and designs.And from a young age, I always knew I wanted work with watches in the future, which eventually became a life long ambition. 

The thought of low-quality, unreliable, and costly watches being released into the market made me upset. The quality on most of these watches is sub-par at best, most having low build quality, causing them to feel cheap and fragile.

 This made me have a sudden realization: What better way to share my passion with others, than to start my own brand of affordable, stylish and durable watches?

This led to the creation of SHIBUSA, providing a watch that is versatile, and affordable, all without compromising on the quality and solid feel of a finely made watch.

Who knows? This might be the first step for me, and I want you to be a part of it.


First Design Sketch

3D Model of Watch(Second Idea)

Final Design

story:
THE HEAT EXPERIENCE STORY

As most Norwegians, we were practically born and raised outdoors. Spending time in nature is a part of our everyday life – all year around, and in all weather conditions. Living in 2016, tech is slowly but steadily offering solutions to improve these outdoor experiences.

 

HEATED VESTS

Heat Experience heated vests for men and women are designed for outdoorsy people like ourselves. The vests are padded with Thinsulate insulation, one of the most experienced suppliers of insulation in the world.

Heat Experience heated vests is designed to fit as a mid-layer piece, and can be well used between a base-layer and outer layer. However, if you're moving, or the conditions are suitable, the garment can also be a perfect "stand-alone" piece without the extra layers.

Thinsulate’s design wicks away moisture. In the sides of the vest we have strategically placed mesh materials to provide good breathability – to ensure the garment don't feel "clammy" even though it supplies heat.

 

 

 

HEATED MID-LAYER PANTS

Heat Experience unisex heated mid layer pants are designed for the cold outdoor moments when you want to sit still and just enjoy.

You can wear these flexible and robust pants and turn up the heat when you need it.

Alternatively you can easily zip them on and off without having to remove the outer layer pant or shoes.

BATTERY

Our light weight battery is rechargeable at least 500 times and can easily be replaced making it possible for you to pack extra batteries if you are planning a longer trip.

The battery is CE and SGS approved from our  factory which has many years of battery production experience.

To produce our first line, we now need to sell our first products to release additional funding from Innovation Norway. We would love for you to join us and secure your very own heated apparel – designed by Norwegians for outdoor enthusiasts around the globe.

 

 

 

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

THE TEAM

 

GOOD TO KNOW

Certifications/Regulations: Since we are manufacturing electronics, there are various tests, including FCC and CE, that we will need to do. These tests often reveal design flaws that require changes in the design. Our timeline takes into account the potential need for retesting.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other taxes, as we're happy to ship all over the world.

 

WARRANTY

Our batteries, heating elements, zippers and seams all come with a two year warranty. If you for some reason should need to make use of this warranty, please consult with us before you send your product back – we will be happy to help you in any way we can.

Take a picture of the fault of the product, and send it to warranty@heatx.no, together with a description of what's happened to your product. 

Please note that we will cover your costs in the following prioritized order:

  1. Tailor costs
  2. New product
  3. Money back

QUESTIONS?

Feel free to ask us anything - we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

Chat: https://purechat.me/heatexperience

Email: contact@heatx.no

Phone: Leave us your number and available time slot on chat or email, and we'll call you up.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are confident we have chosen a great supplier for our products. However, this is also the area we believe unexpected problems with delivery dates and quality control might occur.

We will take different precautionary measures to make sure our heated apparel has the highest quality in the market, including visiting our factory before approving a bulk production.
story_txt:
THE HEAT EXPERIENCE STORY
As most Norwegians, we were practically born and raised outdoors. Spending time in nature is a part of our everyday life – all year around, and in all weather conditions. Living in 2016, tech is slowly but steadily offering solutions to improve these outdoor experiences.

 
HEATED VESTS
Heat Experience heated vests for men and women are designed for outdoorsy people like ourselves. The vests are padded with Thinsulate insulation, one of the most experienced suppliers of insulation in the world.

Heat Experience heated vests is designed to fit as a mid-layer piece, and can be well used between a base-layer and outer layer. However, if you're moving, or the conditions are suitable, the garment can also be a perfect "stand-alone" piece without the extra layers.

Thinsulate’s design wicks away moisture. In the sides of the vest we have strategically placed mesh materials to provide good breathability – to ensure the garment don't feel "clammy" even though it supplies heat.

 

 

 
HEATED MID-LAYER PANTS
Heat Experience unisex heated mid layer pants are designed for the cold outdoor moments when you want to sit still and just enjoy.

You can wear these flexible and robust pants and turn up the heat when you need it.

Alternatively you can easily zip them on and off without having to remove the outer layer pant or shoes.

BATTERY
Our light weight battery is rechargeable at least 500 times and can easily be replaced making it possible for you to pack extra batteries if you are planning a longer trip.

The battery is CE and SGS approved from our  factory which has many years of battery production experience.

To produce our first line, we now need to sell our first products to release additional funding from Innovation Norway. We would love for you to join us and secure your very own heated apparel – designed by Norwegians for outdoor enthusiasts around the globe.

story:
What's our GOAL? 

We want to give football fans around the world a way to proudly express their passion, which, unless you buy your team's merchandise, is almost impossible to find. It is not just about the team we support, it is about the game itself.

Our products are meant to celebrate unforgettable happenings in the history of this sport. For that, we created Playmaker, a clothing brand that combines great quality and environmentally friendly products, with great players, teams and memorable moments in football history.

Our goal is to give the world a way to proudly wear their passion for the game and to deliver the emotion of a late winner in each and every one of our products.

Our Tactics

Okay guys, let's get to the point. 
Right now we have a collection of designs, divided into 4 different categories: Legends, Historic Moments, Famous Quotes and Branding.

We are launching with 6 designs, even though we have more. We were able to get a reliable supplier, from whom we ordered our first samples. After developing our products, we are now at a point where we need our first orders to get things going. Right now we need 10,000€ so that we can order our first shipment from the supplier, build our online store, and face our market. So, as our brand ambassadors, you are now our playmakers. If you want to be part of the team, help us, and we will work harder every day to make this dream come true. So, are you our number 10?

        

 

Are we Fair Players? Obviously! 

Here are our secret weapons:

- 100% organic cotton, grown using methods and materials that have a low impact on the environment (fair-trade cotton)

- Water-based ink for the printing, free of plastics and PVC, which makes it also eco-friendly

- All printed information, no itchy tags on the t-shirts

- Ecological cardboard packing for shipment. 

Our suppliers were picked based on these specific attributes, ensuring that all the manufacturing processes are done in LEED certified factories. So when you buy our tees, you can be sure that you have the best product in your hands. We know the importance of preserving the world we live in, and as real playmakers, we will try our best to do so. We want to win, but in the end, we want to do in a classy and harmless way. 

So are you fit to wear the shirt?

We are not doubting that you have what it takes. Now you just need to know how big you are. Here you have a little help:

 

 

Description

Small (S) cm

Medium (M) cm

Large (L) cm

Extra Large (XL) cm

Chest

50

52

54

56

West

49

51

53

55

Bottom

49

51

53

55

Total Solder

43

45

47

49

Total Front Length

72

74

76

78

 

You can either score, or assist us

In order to reach our 10000€ goal, there are two ways you can help us. The first one, and the most important is by getting one of our t-shirts, or a few if you really like them. Of course that by doing this you will get an incredible launching discount, because you will forever be special for us. It will work as a pre-order for you. If we reach our goal, then we will place our first order to our supplier and deliver the t-shirts to you in December (estimated date).  

If, for some reason, you don't want to get one of our incredible products, but you really liked us, no worries. You can donate us money so we reach our goal and get things going. Even 1€ will be a huge help. Every counts for us right now. If you join the donation list, we will ensure that you will also get a discount in a future order, to show our appreciation. 
 

So, you can be a striker, and get this stunning tees, or you can be a winger and assist us to get to the goal. Choose wisely!

 

Team Line-up

In 2017, we gathered to start this amazing project. 3 football enthusiasts, supporting different colours but sharing the same emotion. Football is apart of our lives 24/7. We went through joy and disappointments, we laughed and we cried, we were victorious and we were defeated, but in the end the feeling is always there. And this can not go unnoticed. Because we know that there are billions like us. That enjoy a brilliant goal, a stunning pass ou a mind blowing dribble. And we want to seize that moment and remember it forever. That's how Playmaker Clothing was idealized, and later on created. Meet the team: 

Alexandro Ferreira

José Alves 

Hafizul Islam

 

Final Score

Our first goal is without a doubt to launch our business. For that, we need to get this campaign on track so we can put our first tees out. We want to have cool and unique designs that every football fan will love to wear. We are aiming for a global market. Football is a worldwide sport with billions of fans. We created this clothing brand because we feel that there is a huge opportunity in this market and a real need among enthusiasts. When it comes to football-related wearables, other than the official club merchandises, there aren't other casual options. We believe that football fans deserve to be able to express their passion every day. And for that, Playmaker Clothing was created. 

 

Don't get caught offside!

What are you waiting for? Don't want to be apart of the game? If you are not sure about getting one of our products yet, don't worry! Share our campaign, our brand, and our products; and we will be equally thankful to you. Let us know what you think about our products so that we can get better and better every day. Be our number 10! Be a Playmaker!
