We created this clothing brand because we feel that there is a huge opportunity in this market and a real need among enthusiasts. When it comes to football-related wearables, other than the official club merchandises, there aren't other casual options. We believe that football fans deserve to be able to express their passion every day. And for that, Playmaker Clothing was created. 


 
Don't get caught offside!

What are you waiting for? Don't want to be apart of the game? If you are not sure about getting one of our products yet, don't worry! Share our campaign, our brand, and our products; and we will be equally thankful to you. Let us know what you think about our products so that we can get better and better every day. Be our number 10! Be a Playmaker!

story:
SNEAKERS OF DESIGN IN 9 COLORS

                                                                    

                   

                    

 

 

 

 

 

MEN and WOMEN

¡LET'S ENJOY!

 

Made in Spain totally,

Quality and Ethical Factory

 

¿QUESTIONS, DOUBTS ?

PLEASE NOTE HOU​RLY DIFFERENCE

 (LET´S OPEN CHAT OF OUR WEB PAGE (BELOW) , IT IS IN PINK BOX )

 

                                                                                        

                                                                                                   

LET´S CHAT WITH US .

   OR

LET´S WRITE US AN EMAIL

 

 

internacionalsetnika@gmail.com

 

✨COMMUNICATING BEFORE GETTING THE PERK

✨We are honest , you can ask first through email if we have your size and color available, and if it is in stock then you can get the perk, if it is not so , we shall put  your order as pending, and we will notify you when it is ready, So then you can get the perk. Other option,,,, you can contribute and if your size or color are not available , you can wait until manufacturing it .We will update   production status permanently✨

 

MEASURE OUR FEET TO FIND OUT OUR SIZE

 Measure the feet with the sock you normally wear, or without socks if you do not wear them, but always you have to measure at  THE END OF THE DAY  when THE FOOT IS EXPANDED or  WHEN you have had activity,( WALK A LONG TIME, CLIMB STAIRS...)   because feet  expand throughout the day and with physical activity . 

        If you measure feet EARLY IN THE MORNING you may get UNRELIABLE RESULTS .

 

¿ HOW DOES YOU MEASURE YOUR FEET ?

 

1-The heel is supported in wall        2- your position must be straight completely

3- Put a paper sheet under your feet and it must be support in the wall exactly (picture 1 )

4- The heel should not be very crushed or pressed against the wall, only touching the wall slightly  ¡ VERY IMPORTANT !

5- Trace the outline of your foot , with the pencil perpendicular to the floor (picture 2 ) , IT IS BETTER IF SOMEONE HELPS YOU

drawing a line parallel to the wall that passes through the longest point of your foot ( it can be  BIG TOE  or INDEX TOE,  see picture  4).

6- you must measure both feet and choose the longest

7- Let´s MEASURE from line that passes through the longest point of big toe to line that passes through longest point of the heel . The RULER must have 90º an angle with those lines.​ 

So you are being precise

Remember,you have to measure your foot with the sock you use frequently, or without it, if you don't use socks

 

 

 

Picture 9

MEASURING THE LENGTH OF THE FOOT 

 

 

PICTURE   7

PICTURE 8

MEASURING THE FOOT WIDTH WITH AN INSOLE OF YOUR SNEAKERS

 

 

PENCIL POSITION

If you do not place the pencil in the correct position the size will be wrong, please be careful.

You must consider that if you place the crooked pencil  ,  a variation of 3,3 milimeters   is very easy and that variation is half size less or more  and you can feel tight your foot or a little loose .

Therefore be careful and precise​.

AN EXAMPLE 

( LENGTH in CM ( with your normal socks   )  + 1,5 CENTIMETRES ) X  1,5 =   your SIZE

23,5 centimetres length of my foot with my normal socks   + 1,5 cm = 25 ctms

25 centimetres X 1,5 = 37,50 EUROPEAN SIZE

We recommend 38 size

 

GUIDE OF SIZES

( FOOT LENGTH     +      1,5 CM )  x   1 ,5         =             SIZE

If you don´t use socks , you  must measure without socks

Remember these sneakers are  CASUAL STYLE SNEAKERS for wearing , walking , working , some event,partying, shining .. .and for whatever you want.......but if you are going to do sports with certain degree of intensity frequently, you must tell  us it.)

                        FOOT LENGTH + 1,5 CM===YOUR SIZE ===>> FOOT WIDTH

                

                        23,16  + 1,5     =   24,66 centimetres     =  37  SIZE       86,30  mm width

                           23,83 + 1,5     =   25,33 centimetres      =  38 SIZE        87,40  mm width

                        24,50  + 1,5     =   26,00 centimetres     =  39 SIZE        88,40 mm width

                        25,16  + 1,5     =   26,66 centimetres     =   40 SIZE       90,40 mm width

                        25,83  + 1,5     =  27,33 centimetres      =    41 SIZE       92,70  mm width

                        26,5    + 1,5     =  28,0 centimetres        =    42 SIZE      94,80  mm width

                        27,16   + 1,5     =  28,66 centimetres      =    43 SIZE      95,54  mm width

                        27,83  + 1,5     =  29,33 centimetres       =    44 SIZE      98,26  mm width

                        28,50  +  1,5    =   30,00 centimetres     =    45 SIZE      99,70  mm width

 

AVALAIBLE DELIVERIES FOR NOVEMBER

( IN LITTLE STOCK )

THE REST OF THE ORDERS  WILL BEGIN TO MANUFACTURE AS THEY ARRIVE .

 

PLEASE IF YOU WANT TO GET A PERK AND YOU DON'T SEE YOUR SIZE OR COLOR SPECIFIED ON THE TABLE, PLEASE CONTACT US , IT MAY BE THAT YES, IT IS (it could be mistake ), OR YOU CAN ASK IT TO US FOR THE NEXT ORDER.

If there are orders in smaller sizes 36- or higher sizes 45-46- we shall manufacture them.

EUROPEAN SIZE

  37----38----39----40----41----42----43----44

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

          ✨ANOTHER PAYMENT METHOD✨

(BY TRANSFER)

 

                                                 

 

✨PAYMENT BY TRANSFER , ¡  COMMISSIONS FREE FOR CHANGING OF CURRENCY !

LET´S CONTACT US

 

✨ ¿What about with the countries which Europe has a FREE TRADE AGREEMENT with them?

¿Do you benefit from exemption from duties and taxes and other charges?

We have the EXPORT REGISTER number, so that the countries with which Europe has a free trade agreement (SOUTH KOREA, JAPAN, MEXICO, CANADA ,,, AND OTHERS), OUR CUSTOMERS CAN BENEFIT FROM REDUCTION OR ELIMINATION OF THE PAYMENT OF tariffs, taxes and customs fees. ALWAYS THINKING IN OUR CUSTOMERS.

 

" PLEASE LET'S REMEMBER WHEN YOU MAKE AN ORDER  AND YOU ARE RESIDENT OUT OF EUROPEAN UNION,   SOME POSSIBLE CUSTOMS CHARGES , TAXES , DUTIES OR CUSTOMS CLEARANCE FEES OR CHARGES RELATED TO YOUR ORDER (if there are), WILL BE SATISFIED BY CUSTOMER OR BACKER. "

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SETNIKA  SHOES,   A NEW STYLE IS BORN 

EMERALD GREEN SETNIKA SHOES

LAVENDER LILAC SETNIKA SHOES

 

MAROON SETNIKA SHOES 

FUCHSIA SETNIKA SHOES

PURPLE SETNIKA SHOES

TURQUOISE BLUE SETNIKA SHOES

PISTACHIO GREEN SETNIKA SHOES

NAVY BLUE SETNIKA SHOES

RASPBERRY PINK SETNIKA SHOES

 WORTHY EMPLOYMENT of all workers who sew, cut and paste these shoes, they earn decent wages and work 8 hours with their vacations and their social security, we do not believe in a fashion industry that lowers prices with THE COST OF  HUMAN RIGHTS.

✨"IF YOU PURCHASE SOMETHING  very CHEAP, IN REALITY IT IS NOT SO , SOMEONE IN ASIA, OR ANOTHER COUNTRY IS PAYING YOU WITH HIS REDUCTION OF RIGHTS AND SEMI-SLAVERY, SOMETIMES WITHOUT SEMI"

 

✨VIRALIZE ,, VIRALIZE  thus.. you can help 

follow us in FACEBOOK-- @zapatillassetnika

INSTAGRAM- setnika_zapatillas

y share, share ....please.

 

                                             FOLLOW US AND SHARE IT PLEASE 

                                                                                  

 

 I shall always be grateful with any kind of help from a greater contribution to a minor, because everything costs effort to get it, but I also appreciate that you share my brand, my website (https://setnika.com), follow me on facebook or instagram and share, if you want to see the nine colors of the models click in this link -https://setnika.com/tienda-online-moda-etnica/zapatillas-estilo-tribal-etnico-urbano/

-it's a way to help me too.

You can also use the tools of this platform to SHARE.

I want to finish with a phrase that I like very much:

"EVERYTHING YOU DO FOR SOMEONE NOW, SOME DAY, SOMEBODY WILL DO FOR YOU WHAT YOU NEED

¿ Who am I and what does  my brand SETNIKA represent ?

My name is JUAN JOSÉ, I'm from a small town called Nava de Abajo in the province of ALBACETE. I am a dreamer as you can be it , and I make an efforts to achieve my dreams with  determination, because there is no other way.

I am the creator of the brand of SNEAKERS - SETNIKA, with a peculiar style, for boys and girls of receptive and dared mentality who like to wear a different point and mark trend .

We distinguish ourselves by using LIVE and INTENSIVE colors and some more classic, total a range of 9 colors, which will delight the dared.

With your help, in this first phase I want to check the public acceptance of my brand and product and thus be able to set new goals.

 WHAT DO YOU THINK ? .MY MOST SINCERE gratitude ONLY WITH YOUR INTEREST, whether you contribute or not.

 

What I need and what get those who contribute


What I intend in this first phase after creating the brand, is to see the acceptance of my brand and product, and the degree of satisfaction of the public.

The money obtained with the contributions will be used to support the small business that I have as an entrepreneur and make new orders if there are.

What do you get?

What you get is a quality product, comfortable and durable, of a GREAT BEAUTY, DIVERSITY AND COLORFUL,  you can give yourself different looks from a casual -urban style  to a more formal and elegant, always marking trends and being dared.

SOCIAL IMPACT (DECENT EMPLOYMENT )


 WORTHY EMPLOYMENT of all workers who sew, cut and paste these shoes, they earn decent wages and work 8 hours with their vacations and their social security, we do not believe in a fashion industry that lowers prices with THE COST OF  HUMAN RIGHTS.

"IF YOU PURCHASE SOMETHING  very CHEAP, IN REALITY IT IS NOT SO , SOMEONE IN ASIA, OR ANOTHER COUNTRY IS PAYING YOU WITH HIS REDUCTION OF RIGHTS AND SEMI-SLAVERY , SOMETIMES WITHOUT SEMI"

The contributions are important because they would allow me to sustain the business, which is in a very primitive state, and little by little with contributions I can mark new goals. I hope this business goes ahead because I would like to make a lot of very new designs that I have in mind.

Very important for me if the business goes ahead is to contribute to social causes such as making a foundation for the education of children, but it is very far away is only an aspiration.

Risks and Challenges

I want to realize my dream, and I know that the risks are many, and the challenges too, I shall make  my best efforts because I want to see my brand and my product succeed, but none will be able to say that I did not try  work very hard and I gave  all my efforts, A lot of time and I do not see the light, but I imagine that it is somewhere and I walk towards it, maybe I find it maybe not, but I walk and I try to go towards it.

"ALWAYS WHEN YOU START ANYTHING, IF YOU ARE NOT ONLY, YOU HAVE MANY BALLOTS THAT YOUR ENTREPRENEURSHIP IS A SUCCESS, THE ACCOMPANIED PATH IS BETTER"

I'm in an initial phase but my next challenges would be to launch my brand and publicize it, expand it, and enter other markets like the rest of Europe and World, and of course create a lot of more models, very creative and desired ... But that is far away, I must climb the first step of the ladder first ....

✨CLEANLINESS OF SNEAKERS, and REMOVING THE BAD SMELL.

¿ CAN WE WASH OUR SNEAKERS IN THE WASHING MACHINE ?

The most of sneakers are not ready to put in the washing machine. Adhesives and the materials with which they are made can deteriorate or even  to detach the sole of the sneakers.

MANUAL CLEANING OF THE SNEAKERS.

You just need:

-A soft bristle brush, can be BRUSH of teeth or nails,

-Neutral soap and a sponge or cloth.

 

To clean the sneakers, we will make a mixture with warm water and neutral soap, and apply it with the sponge or cloth .. In areas that are dirtier, we will put more emphasis to remove them. With neutral soap and warm water. Simply wash your sneakers (without submerging them) very dirty with water with neutral soap.

With another sponge clean and moistened with warm water, we will remove the excess soap that has been left in the sneakers. Let it to dry with air , without any source of heat nearby , nor directly to the sun, Nor  use of dryers. If there is any stain left, you can repeat these steps again. But never use bleach that can spoil the sneakers.

If after washing, some stains persist, you can ADD BICARBONATE to the water and soap and to rub again, you add bicarbonate until results are seen,  you do not add much the first time (a teaspoon of coffee would be fine as a start.

- To Remove the rests of soap from the sneakers, we will pass a damp cloth throughout the sneaker until there is no soap or dirt left.

- Before letting them dry, put some paper inside each sneaker to absorb moisture and not deform the sneaker.

CLEANING OF THE AREAS OF COW FUR.

Our sneakers are combined with  zones of COW FUR (in the area of ​​the laces and the heel).

In this area we will apply ammonia and vinegar depending on whether the color is dark or light, but only if there have been difficult spots, if not, remember:

WARM WATER + NEUTRAL SOAP + TO RUB WITH TOOTHBRUSH + TO REMOVE THE  SOAP WITH ANOTHER  DIFFERENT DAMP CLOTH.

1 - First we will remove the dirt with the soft bristle brush.

1-1 For those difficult spots that have remained on the sneakers, we will apply a mixture of warm water with ammonia and neutral soap if the color of the cow fur is clear and brushing in favor of the hair.  With ammonia and neutral soap (with light colors) An excellent product to remove stains, without bleaching .

For grease spots.

Dilute AMMONIA in a little water.

(a teaspoon of ammonia (5ml), in 2 liters of warm water) .Add 10 ml of neutral soap . Take a brush and moisten it in the mixture of ammonia and neutral soap.

Brush the stain. Remember to do it in the direction of the hair. What should you do? Use the brush to remove the first layer of dust and accumulated dirt, inside and outside the sneaker.

Then dilute a teaspoon of ammonia in the two liters of warm water and add also the neutral soap.

1-2 With VINEGAR if the color is dark, with the same brush in favor of the hair. Remove the rest of the mixture with the dampened brush in warm water and let them to dry with air.

When they dry, brushing again. With vinegar (dark colors) Wet a clean cloth or sponge with vinegar. Rub on the stain. Remember to do it in the direction of the hair.

For oil or grease stains, apply a bit of SODIUM BICARBONATE or TALCUM POWDER on the stain, and leave it on overnight. OIL OR FAT SPOTS ----- APPLY BICARBONATE POWDER ON STAIN AND LEAVE ALL NIGHT ACT.

 

REMOVING OF THE BAD SMELLS IN SNEAKERS.

 

With SODIUM BICARBONATE .

If your SNEAKERS smell bad, you should clean them inside. To do this, it is best to use sodium bicarbonate. Sprinkle the sodium bicarbonate  inside in your smelly shoes and let it act for at least 12 hours.

Then remove the bicarbonate. It is sold in supermarkets or hardware store at € 1-1.5 / kg

 Inside with ALCOHOL .

Another way to clean and disinfect your shoes inside is with a vaporizer with alcohol. Let the powdered alcohol inside  of the shoe evaporate completely in all corners, before using your shoes again.

4. Put the filled returns form and the invoice provided with your parcel back inside the transparent pouch and let's  stick it to the parcel. Do not put any of these documents inside of the box,  customs inspection need to see these documents , then they must remain visible.

5. When the parcel is ready to be returned, please let's  go to some postal service of your country and ship the parcel to:

Juan José Díaz Tárraga.

Calle noria, Nº23

Código postal: 02142

Localidad: Nava de Abajo ( POZOHONDO )

ALBACETE (ESPAÑA )

  Return costs TO SPAIN  are not covered by Juan José Díaz Tárraga.

 

6.Let's  Make sure you receive a receipt with a tracking code after shipping your parcel, it is your  proof of shipment.

When we receive your return, we shall process it as quick as possible. Juan josé díaz tárraga will not accept  charges of ( customs clearance fees , shipping costs, taxes, duties, and other charges)  linked to your return.

Parcels that do not comply with these instructions will be returned to the sender( you, backer ).

LET´S WRITE US AN EMAIL
 

 
internacionalsetnika@gmail.com
 
✨COMMUNICATING BEFORE GETTING THE PERK
✨We are honest , you can ask first through email if we have your size and color available, and if it is in stock then you can get the perk, if it is not so , we shall put  your order as pending, and we will notify you when it is ready, So then you can get the perk. Other option,,,, you can contribute and if your size or color are not available , you can wait until manufacturing it .We will update   production status permanently✨
 
MEASURE OUR FEET TO FIND OUT OUR SIZE
 Measure the feet with the sock you normally wear, or without socks if you do not wear them, but always you have to measure at  THE END OF THE DAY  when THE FOOT IS EXPANDED or  WHEN you have had activity,( WALK A LONG TIME, CLIMB STAIRS...)   because feet  expand throughout the day and with physical activity . 
        If you measure feet EARLY IN THE MORNING you may get UNRELIABLE RESULTS .
 
¿ HOW DOES YOU MEASURE YOUR FEET ?
 
1-The heel is supported in wall        2- your position must be straight completely
3- Put a paper sheet under your feet and it must be support in the wall exactly (picture 1 )
4- The heel should not be very crushed or pressed against the wall, only touching the wall slightly  ¡ VERY IMPORTANT !
5- Trace the outline of your foot , with the pencil perpendicular to the floor (picture 2 ) , IT IS BETTER IF SOMEONE HELPS YOU
drawing a line parallel to the wall that passes through the longest point of your foot ( it can be  BIG TOE  or INDEX TOE,  see picture  4).
6- you must measure both feet and choose the longest
7- Let´s MEASURE from line that passes through the longest point of big toe to line that passes through longest point of the heel . The RULER must have 90º an angle with those lines.​ 
So you are being precise

Remember,you have to measure your foot with the sock you use frequently, or without it, if you don't use socks
 
 

 
Picture 9
MEASURING THE LENGTH OF THE FOOT 
 

 
PICTURE   7

PICTURE 8
MEASURING THE FOOT WIDTH WITH AN INSOLE OF YOUR SNEAKERS
 

 
PENCIL POSITION
If you do not place the pencil in the correct position the size will be wrong, please be careful.
You must consider that if you place the crooked pencil  ,  a variation of 3,3 milimeters   is very easy and that variation is half size less or more  and you can feel tight your foot or a little loose .
Therefore be careful and precise​.

AN EXAMPLE 
( LENGTH in CM ( with your normal socks   )  + 1,5 CENTIMETRES ) X  1,5 =   your SIZE
23,5 centimetres length of my foot with my normal socks   + 1,5 cm = 25 ctms
25 centimetres X 1,5 = 37,50 EUROPEAN SIZE 
We recommend 38 size
 
GUIDE OF SIZES
( FOOT LENGTH     +      1,5 CM )  x   1 ,5         =             SIZE
If you don´t use socks , you  must measure without socks
Remember these sneakers are  CASUAL STYLE SNEAKERS for wearing , walking , working , some event,partying, shining .. .and for whatever you want.......but if you are going to do sports with certain degree of intensity frequently, you must tell  us it.)
                        FOOT LENGTH + 1,5 CM===YOUR SIZE ===>> FOOT WIDTH
                
                        23,16  + 1,5     =   24,66 centimetres     =  37  SIZE       86,30  mm width
                           23,83 + 1,5     =   25,33 centimetres      =  38 SIZE        87,40  mm width
                        24,50  + 1,5     =   26,00 centimetres     =  39 SIZE        88,40 mm width
                        25,16  + 1,5     =   26,66 centimetres     =   40 SIZE       90,40 mm width
                        25,83  + 1,5     =  27,33 centimetres      =    41 SIZE       92,70  mm width
                        26,5    + 1,5     =  28,0 centimetres        =    42 SIZE      94,80  mm width
                        27,16   + 1,5     =  28,66 centimetres      =    43 SIZE      95,54  mm width
                        27,83  + 1,5     =  29,33 centimetres       =    44 SIZE      98,26  mm width
                        28,50  +  1,5    =   30,00 centimetres     =    45 SIZE      99,70  mm width
 
AVALAIBLE DELIVERIES FOR NOVEMBER
( IN LITTLE STOCK )
THE REST OF THE ORDERS  WILL BEGIN TO MANUFACTURE AS THEY ARRIVE .
 
PLEASE IF YOU WANT TO GET A PERK AND YOU DON'T SEE YOUR SIZE OR COLOR SPECIFIED ON THE TABLE, PLEASE CONTACT US , IT MAY BE THAT YES, IT IS (it could be mistake ), OR YOU CAN ASK IT TO US FOR THE NEXT ORDER.
If there are orders in smaller sizes 36- or higher sizes 45-46- we shall manufacture them.
EUROPEAN SIZE
  37----38----39----40----41----42----43----44

I want to finish with a phrase that I like very much:
"EVERYTHING YOU DO FOR SOMEONE NOW, SOME DAY, SOMEBODY WILL DO FOR YOU WHAT YOU NEED
¿ Who am I and what does  my brand SETNIKA represent ?

My name is JUAN JOSÉ, I'm from a small town called Nava de Abajo in the province of ALBACETE. I am a dreamer as you can be it , and I make an efforts to achieve my dreams with  determination, because there is no other way.
I am the creator of the brand of SNEAKERS - SETNIKA, with a peculiar style, for boys and girls of receptive and dared mentality who like to wear a different point and mark trend .
We distinguish ourselves by using LIVE and INTENSIVE colors and some more classic, total a range of 9 colors, which will delight the dared.
With your help, in this first phase I want to check the public acceptance of my brand and product and thus be able to set new goals.
 WHAT DO YOU THINK ? .MY MOST SINCERE gratitude ONLY WITH YOUR INTEREST, whether you contribute or not.
 
What I need and what get those who contribute
What I intend in this first phase after creating the brand, is to see the acceptance of my brand and product, and the degree of satisfaction of the public.
The money obtained with the contributions will be used to support the small business that I have as an entrepreneur and make new orders if there are.
What do you get?
What you get is a quality product, comfortable and durable, of a GREAT BEAUTY, DIVERSITY AND COLORFUL,  you can give yourself different looks from a casual -urban style  to a more formal and elegant, always marking trends and being dared.
SOCIAL IMPACT (DECENT EMPLOYMENT )
 WORTHY EMPLOYMENT of all workers who sew, cut and paste these shoes, they earn decent wages and work 8 hours with their vacations and their social security, we do not believe in a fashion industry that lowers prices with THE COST OF  HUMAN RIGHTS.
"IF YOU PURCHASE SOMETHING  very CHEAP, IN REALITY IT IS NOT SO , SOMEONE IN ASIA, OR ANOTHER COUNTRY IS PAYING YOU WITH HIS REDUCTION OF RIGHTS AND SEMI-SLAVERY , SOMETIMES WITHOUT SEMI"
The contributions are important because they would allow me to sustain the business, which is in a very primitive state, and little by little with contributions I can mark new goals. I hope this business goes ahead because I would like to make a lot of very new designs that I have in mind.
Very important for me if the business goes ahead is to contribute to social causes such as making a foundation for the education of children, but it is very far away is only an aspiration.
Risks and Challenges
I want to realize my dream, and I know that the risks are many, and the challenges too, I shall make  my best efforts because I want to see my brand and my product succeed, but none will be able to say that I did not try  work very hard and I gave  all my efforts, A lot of time and I do not see the light, but I imagine that it is somewhere and I walk towards it, maybe I find it maybe not, but I walk and I try to go towards it.
"ALWAYS WHEN YOU START ANYTHING, IF YOU ARE NOT ONLY, YOU HAVE MANY BALLOTS THAT YOUR ENTREPRENEURSHIP IS A SUCCESS, THE ACCOMPANIED PATH IS BETTER"
I'm in an initial phase but my next challenges would be to launch my brand and publicize it, expand it, and enter other markets like the rest of Europe and World, and of course create a lot of more models, very creative and desired ... But that is far away, I must climb the first step of the ladder first ....

 ✨GDPR --"General Data Protection Regulation"--

The privacy of the customer is the first for me , if our product likes you , You will search our website and will buy again, we do not want to bomb anyone with advertising.

✨DELIVERY POLICY AND  TIME, MODE.
✨ ¿What about with the countries which Europe has a FREE TRADE AGREEMENT with them?
¿Do you benefit from exemption from duties and taxes and other charges?
We have the EXPORT REGISTER number, so that the countries with which Europe has a free trade agreement (SOUTH KOREA, JAPAN, MEXICO, CANADA ,,, AND OTHERS), OUR CUSTOMERS CAN BENEFIT FROM REDUCTION OR ELIMINATION OF THE PAYMENT OF tariffs, taxes and customs fees. ALWAYS THINKING IN OUR CUSTOMERS.
 ✨ When I order my SETNIKA sneakers through Indiegogo, ¿when will I get them?
 

 
When the Indiegogo's campaign ends,  we shall need time for manufacturing , although IT IS IMPORTANT FOR TELLING TO YOU, " WE BEGIN THE CAMPAIGN WITH A STOCK of  approximately  130 PAIRS" ( manufactured for preparing and giving good backer service in INDIEGOGO), and we have purchased all the materials to our suppliers for manufacturing other 100 pairs , only for selling in INDIEGOGO . 
The time of  manufacturing  is around  one  and half month ( approximately, it can be less or some days more).
 You will be informed during all the process , because we give you updates permanently and the SETNIKA team will be available to answer your questions and doubts.
✨¿ When do you get them in your address ?
-If there is stock of your color or size , we shall begin sending before the month after the campaign began (even before).
-As our campaign will last 60 days , we have 130 pairs , more 100 for manufacturing , probably before the campaign ends, those 100 pairs will be manufactured and will be able to be sent.
-If the  demand of product is high, we would make larger orders to satisfy our backers( always if it is possible)
-Once the campaign is ended ,  if there are enough sales, we will have a delivery policy daily or two-three times for  week .
-After receiving your tracking number, it takes about 3-4 days  to be delivered in EUROPEAN UNION and 5-6 days to USA & CANADÁ , AUSTRALIA and NEW ZEALAND  6-7 days, JAPAN approximately 7 days, MÉXICO and  SOUTH KOREA  4- 5 days, NORWAY and SWITZERLAND 3-4 days.
-Usually , the sneakers can be delivered before, in some cases.
- I am sorry , but some possible customs or different charges , taxes, customs clearance fees or duties , (all related to you order ) ,out of the European Union will be satisfied by the backers .( if there are charges)
-DELIVERY MODE is door to door .
 
European law about deliveries:
"If you do not receive the products within 30 days, or within the agreement period, you must communicate it to the seller and grant a reasonable additional period for delivering. For example, if the seller informs you that the delivery is delayed one week due to problems with its suppliers, it is prudent to grant him,  one more week."
(time depends on the urgency) .Please note this is crowdfunding , and we are little entrepreneurs that are beginning.
I ask for empathy , understanding , and patience, althought I shall try to send as soon as possible. If you don´t have it , and your perk was not sent, you can ask for a refund.
 
✨CLEANLINESS OF SNEAKERS, and REMOVING THE BAD SMELL.
¿ CAN WE WASH OUR SNEAKERS IN THE WASHING MACHINE ?
The most of sneakers are not ready to put in the washing machine. Adhesives and the materials with which they are made can deteriorate or even  to detach the sole of the sneakers.
MANUAL CLEANING OF THE SNEAKERS.
You just need:
-A soft bristle brush, can be BRUSH of teeth or nails,
-Neutral soap and a sponge or cloth.
 
To clean the sneakers, we will make a mixture with warm water and neutral soap, and apply it with the sponge or cloth .. In areas that are dirtier, we will put more emphasis to remove them. With neutral soap and warm water. Simply wash your sneakers (without submerging them) very dirty with water with neutral soap.
With another sponge clean and moistened with warm water, we will remove the excess soap that has been left in the sneakers. Let it to dry with air , without any source of heat nearby , nor directly to the sun, Nor  use of dryers. If there is any stain left, you can repeat these steps again. But never use bleach that can spoil the sneakers.
If after washing, some stains persist, you can ADD BICARBONATE to the water and soap and to rub again, you add bicarbonate until results are seen,  you do not add much the first time (a teaspoon of coffee would be fine as a start.
- To Remove the rests of soap from the sneakers, we will pass a damp cloth throughout the sneaker until there is no soap or dirt left.
- Before letting them dry, put some paper inside each sneaker to absorb moisture and not deform the sneaker.
CLEANING OF THE AREAS OF COW FUR.
Our sneakers are combined with  zones of COW FUR (in the area of ​​the laces and the heel).
In this area we will apply ammonia and vinegar depending on whether the color is dark or light, but only if there have been difficult spots, if not, remember:
WARM WATER + NEUTRAL SOAP + TO RUB WITH TOOTHBRUSH + TO REMOVE THE  SOAP WITH ANOTHER  DIFFERENT DAMP CLOTH.
1 - First we will remove the dirt with the soft bristle brush.
1-1 For those difficult spots that have remained on the sneakers, we will apply a mixture of warm water with ammonia and neutral soap if the color of the cow fur is clear and brushing in favor of the hair.  With ammonia and neutral soap (with light colors) An excellent product to remove stains, without bleaching .
For grease spots.
Dilute AMMONIA in a little water.
(a teaspoon of ammonia (5ml), in 2 liters of warm water) .Add 10 ml of neutral soap . Take a brush and moisten it in the mixture of ammonia and neutral soap.
Brush the stain. Remember to do it in the direction of the hair. What should you do? Use the brush to remove the first layer of dust and accumulated dirt, inside and outside the sneaker.
Then dilute a teaspoon of ammonia in the two liters of warm water and add also the neutral soap.
1-2 With VINEGAR if the color is dark, with the same brush in favor of the hair. Remove the rest of the mixture with the dampened brush in warm water and let them to dry with air.
When they dry, brushing again. With vinegar (dark colors) Wet a clean cloth or sponge with vinegar. Rub on the stain. Remember to do it in the direction of the hair.
For oil or grease stains, apply a bit of SODIUM BICARBONATE or TALCUM POWDER on the stain, and leave it on overnight. OIL OR FAT SPOTS ----- APPLY BICARBONATE POWDER ON STAIN AND LEAVE ALL NIGHT ACT.
 
REMOVING OF THE BAD SMELLS IN SNEAKERS.
 
With SODIUM BICARBONATE .
If your SNEAKERS smell bad, you should clean them inside. To do this, it is best to use sodium bicarbonate. Sprinkle the sodium bicarbonate  inside in your smelly shoes and let it act for at least 12 hours.
Then remove the bicarbonate. It is sold in supermarkets or hardware store at € 1-1.5 / kg
 Inside with ALCOHOL .
Another way to clean and disinfect your shoes inside is with a vaporizer with alcohol. Let the powdered alcohol inside  of the shoe evaporate completely in all corners, before using your shoes again.

" We apply the return/exchange policy adapted to the countries where orders are sent, their laws and theirs circumstances in each country ".

Perks are incentives offered to backers in exchange for their support
Crowdfunding is not shopping SITE. Your contribution is a way to support our project. 
Remember , Orders from 'backers' are NOT "REAL PURCHASES" per se, but rather a "CONTRIBUTION with a "REWARD" in return for believing in and for funding the project of the Sneakers.
The  period for desisting (European law ) of your purchase is 14 calendar days since delivery date ( provided by our courier ) , this is a consideration period , and you have to decide if you want the product definitively or you want a return. This period of consideration is the same for Europeans,  Americans,Canadians,  Australians , New zealanders, South koreans ,Mexicans, Japaneses..., ( non-european citizens ).
If you decide to return it , you have to communicate   us you want to return the purchase and since that moment (date ) you have 14 days for returning it (if you reside in EUROPEAN UNION) Americans ,Canadians, Australians , New zealanders, South Koreans ,Mexicans, Japaneses, or , non-european backers have one week more (21 days for longer routes ) .The reason for the return in non-European countries only will be if the product is defective due to defect of manufacturing ,never damaged  by customer (all this is because there are customs clearance fees , taxes, duties, probably charges,  more procedures and longer routes , and shipping costs more expensive....), , however, you can make an exchange, for that you must read our policy of exchanges.
To avoid factory defects, we apply quality control, verifying all products before being sent to backers.
We will assume the cost of all  returns ,  if the sneakers are defective  , as long as the defect of the sneakers is  justified duly and  the sneakers delivered within the return period ( 14 DAYS ) after the communication .
The customer must justify with clear photos the defects of the products to authorize the return or exchange.
Tiny defects will not be considered, we refer to defects that affect the longevity or lifetime of the shoes. 
And the Refunds will be made when  the product is  in our facilities , we shall postpone the refund until we have received the returned sneakers  by the backer, and  we have verified that are perfect conditions . There is not right to desisting out of this period of 14 days..
For returns and exchanges In Europe we apply European laws.
For all the backers ( all countries) , please note we cannot accept returns/exchanges that show visible signs of having been worn. That is why we recommend testing your SETNIKA SHOES on a carpeted surface into the home.
If the product has manifest symptoms of use , scratched sole, stains, or wrinkles, we reserve ourselves the right not to proceed with the refund for the return of the product, due to the economic damage caused to us, given the difficulty of being able to sell the product again. If that is  the case, the refund will not occur .
The shoes must be returned in their original condition and in their original box.
The product must come to our facilities With their accessories or complements ( protection paper ), labels ,  packing bags and boxes in perfect condition, .The shoes must be returned in their original condition and in their original box. If that is not   the case,  we reserve the right to charge an extra 10% of the value of the product (without shipping costs).
--For Backers from all the countries :
"The shipping medium and shipments company is chosen by the backer, and paid for him. Every Return shipping costs , return costs, and taxes ,customs clearance fees, duties(if there are) or other charges linked to your return are not covered by juan josé díaz tárraga , It is backer´s matter. Then every return expense is covered by backer."
Please you have to remember that some possible customs or different charges , taxes, duties, customs clearance fees or other charges related to your return, out of the European Union will be satisfied by the customer/backer.
 You can return your shoes and we shall a refund (it will be made when the product is in our facilities ,) . Juan josé díaz Tárraga will cover the refund of the value of the sneakers  paid by the backer,  , except for the shipping costs. The shipping price will be established by us according to our couriers' tariffs (we do this because the sneakers' price has included shipping costs ).
Hence, PLEASE NOTE
Perks are incentives offered to backers in exchange for their support
Crowdfunding is not shopping. Your contribution is a way to support our project. 
THEN DOESN'T HAVE  SENSE A RETURN,( but it is possible if you want ).
 
If the customer / backer requests a return/exchange  within 14 days after reception, the refund will be made when the product is in our facilities, if the sneakers are delivered to us in perfect conditions, but please you note you have to pay both  shipping costs  ( both ways  in the case of exchange), it is because  client/ backer  was  who requested /ordered a shipment of the product. European laws  are applied to European Citizens , we must count shipping costs and VAT (21 %).
2- WHAT IS YOUR  REFUNDS POLICY ?
Perks are incentives offered to backers in exchange for their support
Crowdfunding is not shopping site. Your contribution is a way to support our project. 
Remember , Orders from 'backers' are NOT "REAL PURCHASES" per se, but rather a "CONTRIBUTION with a "REWARD" in return for believing in and for funding the project of the Sneakers.
 You can return your shoes and we shall a refund (it will be made when the product is in our facilities ,) . Juan josé díaz Tárraga will cover the refund of the value of the sneakers  paid by the backer,  , except for the shipping costs. The shipping price will be established by us according to our couriers' tariffs (we do this because the sneakers' price has included shipping costs ).
 
--For Backers from all the countries :
"The shipping medium and shipments company is chosen by the backer, and paid for him. Every Return shipping costs , return costs, and taxes ,customs clearance fees , duties ( if there are) or other charges linked to your return are not covered by juan josé díaz tárraga , It is backer´s matter. Then every return expense is covered by backer."
Our returns policy allows you to return unused products within 14 days of receiving them. Please note we cannot accept returns that show visible signs of having been worn. That is why we recommend testing your SETNIKA SHOES on a carpeted surface indoors. The shoes must be returned in their original condition and in their original box. If that is not the case, the refund will not occur. Return shipping costs are not covered by Juan José Díaz Tárraga ( customs clearance fees, shipping costs , taxes , duties and other charges,( if there are )
Refunds will be made once we have verified in our facilities that everything is correct, unused sneakers  and in perfect condition, and delivered in  original box with their accessories in good condition.The method of payment used to refund the money will be that we have operational at that moment , can be  transferwise or other.( all this if Indiegogo does not make the refund, if the time corresponds to indiegogo because the campaign has not ended, or  before 10 days since you paid in INDEMAN CAMPAIGN, in those cases it corresponds to indiegogo to make the refund if perk was not sent to you, if it was , then you have to contact with me .
The currency used for refunding will be in euros in Europe and out of Europe , in the currency  you have paid (dollars USA, dollars CANADÁ, AUD, NZD, JYP, KWR, MXN).If the shipping costs are included in the price , we will calculate the amount to be refunded based on the tariffs of our courier. Let's remember that shipping costs are high and expensive.
 
European law about deliveries:
"If you do not receive the products within 30 days, or within the agreement period, you must communicate it to the seller and grant a reasonable additional period for delivering. For example, if the seller informs you that the delivery is delayed one week due to problems with its suppliers, it is prudent to grant him,  one more week."
(time depends on the urgency)Please note this is crowdfunding , and we are little entrepreneurs that are beginning.
I ask for empathy , understanding , and patience, althought I shall try to send as soon as possible. If you don´t have it , and your perk was not sent, you can ask for a refund.
 
3- WHAT HAPPEN IF A BACKER WHO LIVES OUT OF EUROPEAN UNION  HAS A CUSTOMS OR DIFFERENT  CHARGE?
We are sorry but some possible customs or different charges  or customs clearance fees, taxes or duties,or charges related to your order, out of the European Union, will be satisfied by the customer/backer . . Our backers are the most important for us , my gratitude for them  or you . I do every efforts for having a  affordable price  for you (backers ).
4- WHICH IS EXCHANGE POLICY OF SIZE  OF THE SNEAKERS?
As I am a micro-startup I work with limited  and very low budget, that’s why if there is a need for an exchange ( for size  ), we shall need to charge for the shipping both ways (both shipping costs), IN OUR MIND is to collaborate with half the costs if our startup grows....soon.
  Everyway we shall do all the possible to avoid unnecessary charges ,We put at your disposal a size guide, to calculate exactly your size of the sneakers, and you can also ask us for advice for choosing your size , and I hope you can understand shortage of the money  does not let to give all I want . I hope you can understand us. 
MEASURING CORRECTLY YOUR FEET IS VERY IMPORTANT
PROCESS of EXCHANGE for SIZE.
Remember you have 14 days for request an exchange , since delivery date(by our courier).
1-If you want an exchange, you can write to  "   internacionalsetnika@gmail.com  " and let's tell us what problem you have with your size.
2-As soon as possible you will receive an email to tell you if there is stock of that color with your new size. If there is stock we continue processing your exchange , if there is not stock of  your size, we shall put your exchange as pending, and we continue processing until when your product is ready ,please note we are manufacturing often , and  we shall update the production status frequently. Other option we can offer other color with your new size, if there is stock.Please note we cannot accept exchanges that show visible signs of having been worn. That is why we recommend testing your SETNIKA SHOES on a carpeted surface indoors.
If the product has manifest symptoms of use , scratched sole, stains, or wrinkles, we reserve ourselves the right not to proceed with the exchange of the product, due to the economic damage caused to us, given the difficulty of being able to sell the product again. If that is  the case, the refund will not occur . The exchanges are in unused products.
3. Let's prepare your parcel. The sneakers must be  in its  original  box, and the accessories and sneakers in perfect conditions.
3.1. Let's put  the filled returns form and the invoice provided ,  with your parcel back in the inside the transparent pouch and  let´s stick it to the parcel (outwardly) . Do not put any of these documents in the inside of the box of sneakers ,  these documents  need to remain visible for customs inspection. (only out of european union countries)
 3.2.Let´s fill in the returns form provided ,on your parcel and let's add it into your box of sneakers.(European countries)
4-Let´s earn the exchange money into our account,  you remember the total is for both ways. The  method  of payment will be  that we have operational at that moment, it  can be transferwise or other. We shall calculate the exact quantity for shipments of  both ways according to our courier and we shall tell you as soon as possible.
5. After that,  Your parcel will be picked up in your address, and will come to our facilities, where once we verify all is perfect conditions, we will proceed to send the new pair, as fast as possible .
6. After that  You will receive  a  new tracking number to deliver your parcel to you.
7.Juan josé díaz tárraga will not take  some charges or some customs clearance fees, taxes or duties ( if there are) related to your exchange. , (If it there are.)
8-After receiving your tracking number, it takes about 24-48 h to be delivered in European Union and 3- 4 days to USA & CANADÁ .
Parcels that do not comply with these instructions will be returned to the sender (you , backer).
 
 
5- AVOIDING EXCHANGES OF THE SIZE 
We put at your disposal a size guide, to calculate exactly your size of the sneakers, and you can also ask us for advice for choosing your size. Once the size  is chosen, we do not make returns for that reason, so if you want a exchange, the customer must assume its cost in both ways.There are only returns for reasons of factory defect, if the defect is  demonstrated clearly and duly.We ask for understanding because we are a little start up that is starting.
6- DO I HAVE TO PAY ANYTHING FOR THE RETURN / REFUND OF A DEFECTIVE ARTICLE ?
We will assume the costs of all  returns /refunds ,  if the sneakers are defective  ( factory defect )  , as long as the defect of the sneakers is  justified duly and  within the return period ( 14 calendar days )   .
The customer/ backer must justify with clear photos the defects of the products to authorize the return and refund.
Tiny defects will not be considered, we refer to defects that affect the longevity or lifetime of the shoes. 
7- DO WE MAKE QUALITY CONTROL BEFORE SENDING THE PRODUCTS TO CUSTOMERS?
To avoid factory defects, we apply quality control, verifying all products before being sent to customers/backers.If we do not have evidence that this defect or damage has been caused for us or in the manufacturing process, we will not proceed with the refund, because before sending we perform quality control.
WE CAN SEND YOU  PHOTOS OF THE SNEAKERS BEFORE BEING SENT.
 
8-RETURN PROCESS
 

 
EUROPEAN Countries
1. Let's Prepare your parcel. Make sure the sneakers are inside the original box and both are in perfect  and original condition .
2.Let's fill  the returns form and put it in your parcel ( inside of your box of sneakers). For downloading the form you have a link here in the story .
DOWNLOAD RETURN FORM HERE
3. Let's  fill the tracking number field correctly with the same tracking number used by DHL to deliver you,   your parcel.
4. When your parcel is ready to be returned, please , let's go to a postal service of your country and ship us the box to:
JUAN  JOSÉ DÍAZ TÁRRAGA ,
CALLE NORIA, Nº 23,
CÓDIGO POSTAL: 02142   
 NAVA DE ABAJO ( POZOHONDO )
ALBACETE (ESPAÑA )
  Return costs to spain  are not covered by juan josé díaz tárraga.
5.Let's  Make sure you receive a receipt with a tracking code after shipping your parcel, it is your  proof of shipment.
When we receive your return, we shall process it as quick as possible. Juan josé díaz tárraga will not accept  charges of ( customs clearance fees( if there are , shipping costs, duties( if there are),taxes( if there are),and other charges)  linked to your return.
Parcels that do not comply with these instructions will be returned to the sender( you, backer ).
 
 NON-EUROPEAN Countries 
1.Let's prepare your parcel. Let's Make sure yourself the sneakers are inside the original  box, and both are in perfect  and original condition ..
2. Let's download returns form on the following link of our Indiegogo campaign (Returns Form).      DOWNLOAD RETURNS FORM  HERE
3. LET'S FILL THE TRACKING NUMBER  field correctly with the same tracking number used by DHL  to deliver you  your parcel, it is for avoiding extra customs charges related to your return.
4. Put the filled returns form and the invoice provided with your parcel back inside the transparent pouch and let's  stick it to the parcel. Do not put any of these documents inside of the box,  customs inspection need to see these documents , then they must remain visible.
5. When the parcel is ready to be returned, please let's  go to some postal service of your country and ship the parcel to:
Juan José Díaz Tárraga.
Calle noria, Nº23
Código postal: 02142
Localidad: Nava de Abajo ( POZOHONDO )
ALBACETE (ESPAÑA )
  Return costs TO SPAIN  are not covered by Juan José Díaz Tárraga.
 
6.Let's  Make sure you receive a receipt with a tracking code after shipping your parcel, it is your  proof of shipment.
When we receive your return, we shall process it as quick as possible. Juan josé díaz tárraga will not accept  charges of ( customs clearance fees , shipping costs, taxes, duties, and other charges)  linked to your return.
Parcels that do not comply with these instructions will be returned to the sender( you, backer ).

story:
​


.Innovated by a team experienced with superior design and watchmaking from 2001, TbButi inspired a trend of upmarket luxury designer watches.

.4 years later we are bringing the iconic minimalist Cockpit automatic chronograph watch back with a new vision: new design, same quality, IndieGoGo special prices.

 

 
.THE TBBUTI IS NOW AFFORDABLE.

 .LUXURY WATCHES

.SWISS QUALITY STANDARDS FOR A FAIR PRICE.

.CUTTING MARGINS BY SELLING DIRECT TO BACKERS.

 

.Famed watch designer, Eddie Willson, works for the best. At aged 28 he made the TbButi into the Magnum chronograph, one of the masterpieces of our brand.

.When it came to re-designing the dials of cockpit masterpiece, Eddie Willson was the obvious choice.



 Titanium version number is 001-120 and Stainless steel version number is 000-500

Why are our watches Made in Switzerland?

 

We understand that only Swiss manufacturing can make high-quality watches. Although we don’t have much money yet, we insist that watches must be made in Switzerland because we also watch lovers.

 .The Swiss watch and style icon of 2001 has been brought back to the future.

.Today's TbButi is still designed in Italy and manufactured in Switzerland. 

.We want to offer the same quality at a fair price. 






 

TbButi believes that if you know more about the watch, you will find that this watch is complicated to produce.  The difficulty is on the technique of the accessories on the cockpit dial.

 
 

Why do we choose the Eta movement?

For a brand, it takes a lot of money and resources to produce its movement. Now, we not much money, we have chosen the eta movement as the movement of our brand watch because it is recognised worldwide. High quality and stable movement.




 

Packaging

Your TbButi  watch will arrive in a beautiful wood box with an embossed logo 



 

Warranty

The warranty is valid for five years upon reception of the watch and covers any functional defects that may result from faulty manufacturing. TbButi will repair your watch free of charge. Every TbButi watch comes with a warranty card matching the serial number of the watch.




 

 For more information,pls visit: https://www.tbbuti.ch/ 

We hope to use Indiegogo to achieve our design philosophy. We will use this funding to develop and deliver better designs and products. 


Our small team has more than two decades of experience in the industries of watches, luxury and design. We pride ourselves on attention to detail and the quality of our products. Nevertheless, some slight delivery delays could be incurred due to delivery and destination factors beyond our control. Our production partner is a Swiss national, established for several years in Hong Kong. He has already successfully supplied a Kickstarter campaign and is used to working for the biggest and best brands of the watch industry. Our partner was carefully chosen for his capacity to handle large orders with perfect execution and the highest quality. The pictures shown are prototypes, and the final products will be even better. However, if by chance, anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

story:
Short Summary

After extensive research and professional feedback, we have created a collection of stylish and exciting swim shorts designs. Incorporating our passion to fight back against the onslaught of plastic that is destroying our environment, we are using only recycled materials in our swim shorts.

Partnering with Repreve, a world leader in high quality recycled fabrics, we have figured out that for every pair of swim shorts we produce, we are reusing five plastic bottles.

 

Our lifetime guarantee

At BluTide we are dedicated to producing top-shelf luxury apparel, that's why we stand behind them with our Lifetime Guarantee. If your shorts or any other product from our website fall apart and its not your fault, we will replace them or refund you free of charge. Simple.

For full terms and conditions please see our website www.blutide.co.uk

 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute the first bulk of BluTide swim shorts.

Our funding goal is £15,000. To show our appreciation for your contributions, we are offering some major discounts on our swim shorts. In addition, and for a short time only, we will offer a minimum of 50% discounts on all our other existing products.

 

The Impact

Our goal is to offer our customers top-quality clothing while giving back to our planet. In addition to using only recycled materials to manufacture our swim shorts. We will also pledge to fund the removal of plastic bottles from the ocean or coastline with every purchase.

 

Risks & Challenges

Because we have already partnered with an established manufacturer, producing products for some of the worlds largest organisations, along with fabrics from Repreve, there is very little inherent risk.

We have already created a small quantity order, and tested the quality of our swimwear giving us complete confidence that our range is ready to be produced on a larger scale. For all other products including beanies, caps and shirts, mass production has begun and we currently have some stock.

If any delays do arise between now and the time that we intend to fulfil our orders, we will be sure to keep all our contributors updated.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for BluTide by sharing our campaign link on Instagram (@BluTideUK). Spread the word about what we are doing for the fashion industry and for the environment!

We appreciate all support, monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.

 

Any questions?

Please contact us directly via email at info@blutide.co

story:
Short Summary

 

My name is Elsa Åkesson, the founder of the Socks company. I am originally a London based artist looking to create a socks company to provide both customers' daily need of socks and to drive people to recycle more. 

In order to do so in the most effective way I decided to create primarily a subscription based model which eliminates the trouble of physically finding new socks, as customers can automatically receive their new socks every month.

As a main aim, I would like to remind people the importance of recycling and helping the environment in some way. As a result I have decided to implement a recycling system to subscribers, where old and unwanted socks can be recuperated by us for a good cause. 

I have also decided to implement a new innovation which is coffee in the textile. Coffee is an ecological component that absorbs bad odors. 

With the help of all the contributors I will be able to make my vision into a reality and start a new movement of socks recycling. With the help of the contributors I will also be able to expand into ecological socks in the future, only using natural materials such as bamboo. With your help we can start helping the planet together in some way. And by all means providing you with better quality daily socks in return. 

The funds I will hopefully be receiving will be going towards firstly, production prices, secondly to marketing and thirdly to investments that I will need to make in order to launch the brand. 

If you are willing to spread the word out, I kindly ask you to share the link, so that we can start something great together, because only with your help will I be able to achieve this great vision. 

I thank you very much for your precious time 

kindly, Elsa

story:
We all have heavy responsibilities weighing down on us every single day. Having lunch at times becomes a 'to do' because we just don't have the time unfortunately. With a combination of work,family and friends, life just becomes overwhelming. 

 

Not to mention our 5 time obligatory praying needs. This is something we cannot falter on my dear brother's and sister's, since it is mandatory. It's a lot to take on for anybody. I myself had a difficult time juggling it all. I work from 9-4, then usually go do my daily grocery run on my way home. Then arrive home and do some prep work, eat dinner with the family, watch some television and by the time I get up to get my mother's evening milk... its 10:30pm (where does the time go)? 

 

I fell asleep one night thinking how busy life had become and to be honest I was missing a few prayers on a daily basis. I felt weak, and numb inside (honest to god truth) from praying five times daily. I automatically went to three and praying the missed two before heading off to bed almost every day. My body was telling me to get back on track but my mind was boggled down with all my responsibilities that I was just unable to do so. With that heavy weight resting on my chest, I fell asleep asking that night asking the LORD for guidance.  

 

Upon waking up the next morning, I came up with an idea. This idea drove me to other ideas and here I'm here asking for your approval as well as your backing. It's something I truly believe in and I am very passionate about. I use this device to keep myself from missing any more prayers. It's comfortable and trendy, and does what it is suppose to do. It notifies me through my body. A vibration sequence travels through my arm, regardless of what I am doing and allows me to organize my time more efficiently. Furthermore, I take the few minutes necessary and complete my prayers, which for me is my #1 priority. I feel like someone else when I don't perform my obligations (similar to that snickers commercial:) I feel hollow and alone and when I bend down to ask for forgiveness I feel whole again. I'm hoping you all feel the same. Support Deen&Dunya and talk about it amongst your peers, colleagues and family members and make this a household name. 

 

  • Teach your children the value of prayer. My son wears it and notifies me as soon as it starts to vibrate on his arm and then joins me in prayer.

 

  •  It has a compass embedded within the bracelet to let you know the direction in which you should be facing. 

 

  • The icons light up, depending on which prayer it is when it vibrates. Just to make things a little easier. 

 

  •  It is great for elders, who have a hard time hearing. This device has zero sound. 

 

  • Very important to have for people who are constantly busy, and need the reminder. 

 

  •  Great for someone who is around noise all the time. The vibration will always notify you throughout this chaos. 

 

  •  The band will be adjustable for all ages and wrist sizes. 

 

  •  The design is unisex, and will benefit everyone. 

 

Deen & Dunya will be associated with an application. All you have to do is put in the Country code you reside in and let D&D do its job. It will notify you on a day to day basis. It is a must have if your looking to aim high and strive to be the best in God's eyes as well as everyone else's. Amen.

 

Note: Anyone who is having issues donating to the page itself, can e-transfer the funds to deenanddunyaprayer@gmail.com and we will guarantee that your donations be added to our page on Indiegogo.com

story:
The 1882 Dress Watch    

 

The 1882 is our take on the everyday dress watch.  Designed to be versatile, durable, and accessible.   This model will accent your style, never contradicting it.  Minimal but distinctive detailing for the working professional, the spirited artist, or anyone looking for a watch to suit both casual and formal occasions.

 

 

The Design

The design of the 1882 was inspired by classic Bauhaus traditions and the modern world.  Lack of clutter, subtle styling, and soft lines allow for the watch to be quietly eye-catching. 

 

 

Functionality has not been forgotten with the inclusion of a circular date window at the six o'clock position. 

 

 

We have carefully considered every design detail: case height and width, seconds hand visibility, logo placement, case and crystal material and shape, movement precision, detailing and finishing. . . 

 

 

The result?  A smart, understated, and functional everyday watch for nearly any context.  

 

The Case

Dressy does not mean dainty; this watch is built to last.  The watch is encased in a surgical-grade stainless steel enclosure.  The caseback is adorned with an engraving of an Oriental Magpie, the national bird of South Korea whose stunning wing profile provided the inspiration for our logo.  This watch is strong and ready to go with you nearly everywhere, you'll never need to baby this timepiece.  

 

 

The Sapphire Glass

Despite the higher costs of production, we chose to build this watch with a sapphire glass.  This is to provide the highest level of protection available.  The crystal is scratch-proof and highly durable.  The 1882 crystal is double domed to reduce optical distortion while providing an interesting aesthetic dimension to the face of the watch. 

 

 

The Specifics

Case: 40mm | Surgical Grade Stainless Steel

Movement: Japanese Quartz | Miyota 2315

Crystal: Scratch-Resistant Sapphire | Domed

Depth: 12mm

Water Resistance: 5 ATM Splashproof | 164 feet

Strap: 20mm | Quick-Release Genuine Leather

Warranty: Two Years

 

 

The Process

It starts with an idea and a drawing.  Draft after draft, what began as a circle on a piece of paper slowly evolved into a solid impression.  Once the conceptual process was finished, we put our ideas onto software to give us a stronger idea of what the model would actually look like.  More changes were made at this stage as we noticed what will and will not actually work.  

 

 

After this step, prototypes were constructed in order to provide us with the kinds of insight that a drawing or 3D model cannot.  Revisions didn't stop with the prototypes, when the first physical draft is in hand, we made the final design decisions that lead to what eventually became the 1882.   

Finally, our watches are assembled in a dust-free environment by a highly skilled manufacturing firm with over twenty-four years of experience constructing quality timepieces.  

What this means for you is that you can wear a Park & Christian with confidence.  Every single detail of your watch is deliberately considered and thought out.  

 

Sustainability 

Park & Christian watches are built to last, not to be thrown away.  Longevity is one of the paramount virtues to traditional watchmaking, the 1882 will be with you for the long-haul. 

Stainless steel is one of the most recycled materials on the planet.  The materials used for this watch won't be found polluting our precious oceans.  

 

 

 

The Team

Park & Christian was formed by two cousins with roots in South Korea and the United States.  Fueled by a mutual love for watch design we teamed up in Seoul to convert our vision of versatility and availability to reality.  Park & Christian is built on a foundation of honest and transparent values as a watch studio.  This commitment is evident in our decision to attach our names to this project.  No snobbery, no gimmicks, and no platitudes.

E-Mail : parkandchristian@gmail.com

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Delivery time: When manufacturing, the obvious risk is that suppliers may not fulfill our order on time, however we're working closely with a manufacturer that we know and trust. Their productivity has yet to provide any reason to doubt their ability to fulfill our production order. We are set on getting your watch on your wrist on time.  

Please also keep in mind that the COVID-19 pandemic has resulted in worldwide delays in shipping.  

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of Korea, you'll be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Customs: Sometimes customs can take a while as you'd probably know already. We wish we could fix it but unfortunately we can't, patience is the key. We will be in touch frequently with campaign updates and be sure to be completely transparent in every regard possible. Thanks.

 

---------------------------------------------

 

The 1882 Dress Watch  
상 세 정 보

  • 디자인

- 독일의 바우하우스 양식을 기초로 하며, 현대적인 요소를 재해석하여 디자인 하였습니다.
 

  • 성능

- 돔형 사파이어 크리스탈 렌즈를 채택하여 스크래치나 충격으로부터 보다 자유롭게 사용 가능합니다.
- 깔끔한 시인성으로 시간의 직관성을 높였습니다.
- 50M 방수 기능으로 생활 방수가 가능합니다.
- 퀵릴리즈 가죽 밴드 채용으로 밴드의 탈착이 손쉽게 가능합니다.
 

  • 상세 정보

- 케이스 : 지름 40MM로 보편적인 사이즈의 시계입니다.
- 밴드 넓이 : 20MM로 보편적인 사이즈이며, 쉽게 가죽밴드 등 다른 밴드로도 교체하여 사용할 수 있습니다.
- 무브먼트 : Japanese Quartz | Miyota 2315 (일제 쿼츠/미요타 2315)
- 두께 : 12MM
- 보증기간 : 2년
 

  • 제품 제작 및 배송 정보

- 3월 : 펀딩 종료
- 4-5월 : 펀딩 목표 달성(100% 이상) 시 제품 제작
- 5월 : 제품 발송

 

기타 안내사항

안녕하세요. 마이크로브랜드 시계 컴퍼니 Park & Christian 입니다.
저희 시계를 인디고고를 통해 찾아주심에 정말 감사드립니다.
현재 COVID-19로 인해 생산 및 배송관련하여 약간의 딜레이가 발생할 수있으나
저희를 믿고 펀딩해주신 여러분들께  꼭 보답하는 의미로 제대로 발송되고 배송 받으실 수 있도록
보다 열심히 노력하겠습니다.
각종 문의사항은 저희 이메일이나 인스타그램 메시지를 보내주시면 빠르게 답변 해 드리겠습니다.

* 이메일 : parkandchristian@gmail.com
* 인스타그램 : @parkandchristian

감사합니다.

story:
We only make fabulous front-fastening bras and matching knickers. That’s it.

Up Front and Fabulous Limited was founded by Lucinda Kowol, Bridget Townsend and Giles Tilley. Three women with a host of business experience between them who are determined to give bra wearers a better choice.

Why Front Fastening Bras?

We think the real question is -

Why back fastening bras?

The 2 surveys (Populous) we commissioned showed us that:

Half of us already do our bra up in front, swivelling it around to get it on. Not only does it chafe, but all that pulling and stretching decreases the life of the bra.

The other half contort our arms into a back arm lock every morning, felons all for the crime of bra wearing.  

There is enough discussion on the putting on of bras to warrant 58 million results on a Google search. Over a million are “How to” videos.

Come on, should we really need this much help? 

We wear bras all day, every day and it’s high time they were made to suit us. It’s 2020, not 1920! 

We women are good at putting up with stuff that we use or deal with every day that’s not really designed for us. It's time for change.

So, what do we want?

Two-thirds of the women we surveyed said they want to buy front fastening bras but believe they don’t exist.  

75% said they were unhappy with current sizing. 

Our survey revealed that fit and comfort are women’s top priority followed by look and style.  

What does this mean?

We can’t just make the same old back-fastening designs with a front closure. We have to be creative, innovative and test, test, test. Up Front & Fabulous bras all have

  • Fabulous front-fastenings
  • Fabulous fit
  • Fabulous feel

A few facts for you:

  • We are female founded and led.  
  • We use high-quality fabrics and finishes and make every effort to ensure they ethically sourced. 
  • Our 1st collection will include underwired and non-wired bras for everyday through to special occasion wear. 
  • We are developing innovative fasteners and design features to improve fit and comfort without detracting from style. Our bras are up front and fabulous.
  • Our initial size range covers band sizes 32 to 40 and cup sizes A to E. We are developing better sizing and will expand our size range progressively.
  • Our bras will be made in Casablanca in a workshop which has a school attached to help young women in the region gain skills and employment. They are very well-established with an impressive list of lingerie clients so we are more than pleased that they have chosen to work with a start-up like ours. 
  • We will only be selling online at upfrontandfabulous.com. No third parties to deal with, no buck passing, just us. We will let you know when the site is live.
  • We are based in the UK, near Oxford. We will be shipping internationally. 

 

Where will your money go?

A big chunk will buy all our fabric, lace, fasteners and accessories. When you are the new kid on the block you have to pay upfront. (well, we had to say it once...)

Another big chunk will go to manufacturing.

Design and sizing development will use a fair amount too.

And finally, we will be able to finish our Shopify website so that we can launch.

What do you get for helping us? 

First - Thank you for donations of any amount. It means everything to us. We can’t do this without you. 

For all donations up to £120 we have a special range of discount vouchers for purchasing from our 1st collection.  

We have designed a fabulous Limited Edition bra and knicker set to say thank you, thank you, thank you for donations of £120 and up! 

The Limited Edition design has a vintage echo in 2 beautiful contrasting shades of teal blue pure silk with a touch of elastane for a smooth fit.

Numbers are limited, so claim yours soon! 

What have we done so far?

We created Up Front & Fabulous Limited in October 2015 and finally had the time to start our business planning, design and development in  2017.  Since then, we've raised some friends and family funding which has got us this far, researched the industry, produced our business plans, designed made and tested a number of prototypes, found our suppliers and manufacturing partners and discovered Indiegogo.

Who are we?

Oh, and we all wear bras. 

We may be female founders of a certain age but we put our years of business and personal experience to good use. We've been friends for over 40 years and so far, so good. 

We like this: The latest surveys/articles (The FT, the BBC, Huffington Post, The Guardian,  Business Insider...). suggest that start-ups run by women over 40, have a higher chance of success than those started by youngsters.  

So, no, we are not 22-year-olds holed up in our parents’ garage but that doesn’t make this silver generation start-up any the less worth watching.

Website & Social Media

Obviously, we won't be putting our website live until we've manufactured our 1st collection. Don't worry though, we will let you know when you can browse and buy using your donation perk discount vouchers.

We do, however, have our Facebook, Instagram,  Twitter  and Linked in pages up and running.  We will bring you the news as it happens. Please share our news, give us your feedback and join in.

Please, if there's anything else you want to know, just ask. 

Thank you

We aren't sure if or how this is usually done but we are going to do it anyway. We have been so very lucky with our crowdfunding team and we want to say thank you to them.

Our two marvellous models, Jenny Tollady and Aleesha Hansel. You were both a joy to work with and we are very proud to have you show off our prototypes so brilliantly.  Thank you Jenny and thank you, Aleehsa.  

The fabulous Grace Finney - our COVID-19 silver lining.  While on furlough from her day job, she volunteered to help with our creatives and CRM/databases.  Grace, you are always a morale booster with your positive, cheerful attitude and so much of all the really good stuff here is thanks to you. Thank you, Grace.

Our video man and photographer, Dave Hammant. You went the extra mile through all the changes and upheavals due to our three divergent, busy lives, COVID-19 and your own full timetable in good humour with great results. Thank you, Dave. 

We also want to thank our families and friends who have been instrumental in getting us this far.  They have unstintingly provided us with moral, emotional and early funding support as well as the odd kick where we needed it.  Thank you.

The economy needs us,

women who want front fastening bras need us and

we. need. you.

Thank you
