It’s 2020, not 1920! We women are good at putting up with stuff that we use or deal with every day that’s not really designed for us. It's time for change.So, what do we want?Two-thirds of the women we surveyed said they want to buy front fastening bras but believe they don’t exist.  75% said they were unhappy with current sizing. Our survey revealed that fit and comfort are women’s top priority followed by look and style.  What does this mean?We can’t just make the same old back-fastening designs with a front closure. We have to be creative, innovative and test, test, test. Up Front & Fabulous bras all have
Fabulous front-fastenings
Fabulous fit
Fabulous feel
A few facts for you:
We are female founded and led.  
We use high-quality fabrics and finishes and make every effort to ensure they ethically sourced. 
Our 1st collection will include underwired and non-wired bras for everyday through to special occasion wear. 
We are developing innovative fasteners and design features to improve fit and comfort without detracting from style. Our bras are up front and fabulous.
Our initial size range covers band sizes 32 to 40 and cup sizes A to E. We are developing better sizing and will expand our size range progressively.
Our bras will be made in Casablanca in a workshop which has a school attached to help young women in the region gain skills and employment. They are very well-established with an impressive list of lingerie clients so we are more than pleased that they have chosen to work with a start-up like ours. 
We will only be selling online at upfrontandfabulous.com. No third parties to deal with, no buck passing, just us. We will let you know when the site is live.
We are based in the UK, near Oxford. We will be shipping internationally. 
 Where will your money go?A big chunk will buy all our fabric, lace, fasteners and accessories. When you are the new kid on the block you have to pay upfront. (well, we had to say it once...)Another big chunk will go to manufacturing.Design and sizing development will use a fair amount too.And finally, we will be able to finish our Shopify website so that we can launch.What do you get for helping us? First - Thank you for donations of any amount. It means everything to us. We can’t do this without you. For all donations up to £120 we have a special range of discount vouchers for purchasing from our 1st collection.  We have designed a fabulous Limited Edition bra and knicker set to say thank you, thank you, thank you for donations of £120 and up! The Limited Edition design has a vintage echo in 2 beautiful contrasting shades of teal blue pure silk with a touch of elastane for a smooth fit.Numbers are limited, so claim yours soon! What have we done so far?We created Up Front & Fabulous Limited in October 2015 and finally had the time to start our business planning, design and development in  2017.  Since then, we've raised some friends and family funding which has got us this far, researched the industry, produced our business plans, designed made and tested a number of prototypes, found our suppliers and manufacturing partners and discovered Indiegogo.Who are we?Oh, and we all wear bras. We may be female founders of a certain age but we put our years of business and personal experience to good use. We've been friends for over 40 years and so far, so good. We like this: The latest surveys/articles (The FT, the BBC, Huffington Post, The Guardian,  Business Insider...). suggest that start-ups run by women over 40, have a higher chance of success than those started by youngsters.  So, no, we are not 22-year-olds holed up in our parents’ garage but that doesn’t make this silver generation start-up any the less worth watching.Website & Social MediaObviously, we won't be putting our website live until we've manufactured our 1st collection. Don't worry though, we will let you know when you can browse and buy using your donation perk discount vouchers.We do, however, have our Facebook, Instagram,  Twitter  and Linked in pages up and running.  We will bring you the news as it happens. Please share our news, give us your feedback and join in.Please, if there's anything else you want to know, just ask. Thank youWe aren't sure if or how this is usually done but we are going to do it anyway. We have been so very lucky with our crowdfunding team and we want to say thank you to them.Our two marvellous models, Jenny Tollady and Aleesha Hansel. You were both a joy to work with and we are very proud to have you show off our prototypes so brilliantly.  Thank you Jenny and thank you, Aleehsa.  The fabulous Grace Finney - our COVID-19 silver lining.  While on furlough from her day job, she volunteered to help with our creatives and CRM/databases.  Grace, you are always a morale booster with your positive, cheerful attitude and so much of all the really good stuff here is thanks to you. Thank you, Grace.Our video man and photographer, Dave Hammant. You went the extra mile through all the changes and upheavals due to our three divergent, busy lives, COVID-19 and your own full timetable in good humour with great results. Thank you, Dave. We also want to thank our families and friends who have been instrumental in getting us this far.  They have unstintingly provided us with moral, emotional and early funding support as well as the odd kick where we needed it.  Thank you.The economy needs us,women who want front fastening bras need us andwe. need. you.Thank you

story:
Short Summary

I started my corporate career as a single mom barely making ends meet.  My career provided me the opportunity to obtain my college degree and climb the corporate ladder.  I'm thankful for all the opportunities that were provided to me that allowed me to take care of my family.  However, after doing the same type of work for over 40 years I found that I had lost my passion.  Grey Horse Boutique allows me to be creative and the ability to procure merchandise inspired by my love of nature, horses, friendship, and family.  Most rewarding is finding merchandise with a purpose like Milk Barn who is dedicated to bringing restoration to rescue child soldiers and children orphaned by war in D.R. Congo Africa. for more information on this effort please visit exileinternational.org

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking for cash flow to keep the dream alive.  Helping this dream to stay alive also helps others in the process.  I know that this business has the making of success but  I need just a little bit of help to move forward. 

The Impact

Procuring merchandise that gives back gives my customers a sense of helping others while giving at the same time.  My goal is to help other women who have faced some of the same difficulties by offering their products in my store.  It's a triple give back situation.

Risks & Challenges

I have faced so many challenges in my life  I know I can overcome this bump in the road.  As a single teenage mother forced to leave home at age 16 with nothing I know how to build something out of nothing.

There of course if always the risk but many rewards can be received by knowing that you have succeeded in reaching your dreams. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute please share the word about Grey Horse Boutique, LLC in Benicia California.  And I'm always looking artist and merchandise with a cause.

story:
ABOUT US 

ANJANA JEWELS brings to you MOAH, exquisite and exclusive Jewelry in Sterling Silver and Gold embellished with the rich hues and colors of Gem Stones. The designs are unique and attractive and the lure of each piece promises to last a lifetime. 

HOW IT STARTED

My name is Anjana. I hold an MBA degree in marketing and began my career as a webmaster. Many of my clients were jewelers. While creating their web presence jewelry just grew on me. I realised I have found my true calling where I could exploit my creativity to the hilt and create 'real' and lasting pieces for people and families to cherish. There was a lot to learn and I had no coach. It took many years of learning bit by bit and a course in jewelry manufacture where I learnt to make jewelry by my own hand ( soldering, sawing, wire drawing, plate making, annealing, filing, polishing and the works).

Eventually, in 2005 my jewelry business came into existence. By 2007 my business was formally registered, I registered for my export licence too and set up my own handmade jewelry workshop where we made custom jewelry pieces by hand.

We got our own jewelry brand name "MOAH" registered soon after. 

WHY WE REQUIRE FUNDING

We got hit by the global recession of 2008. I tried to sustain my workshop but could manage for only a few months. My fledgling enterprise suffered a big blow. 

I began outsourcing the actual making of my designs to some outside manufacturing units whom I could trust. But I could not unleash my creativity anymore the way I did earlier with my own workshop. It became very limiting for me. Also, there were no economies of scale. The costing of my jewelry was not as comfortable anymore thereby impacting my sales adversely. 

Indian economy took some time to revive. The golden days are not back yet. But things are looking up.

At this juncture I really feel its time to set up my own blissful workshop again. With online selling structures in place I can really, truly make use of both my skills to create unique and beautiful designs, and to make them available across the world. This time round I would also like to add some good state-of-the art machinery to the workshop.

YOUR SUPPORT IS HUMBLY REQUESTED

I do request for your support. I cannot manage this on my own. I have put up a Jewelry Collection as a reward for your support. These are all original MOAH jewelry designs. I am sure the reward will be a match for your support and will bring great joy to you, and maybe gets passed down in your family for generations. Who knows :-) !!!

WHERE THE MONEY GOES

First and foremost, a big part of the funds that get generated go into crafting the promised rewards for you. It is precious handcrafted jewelry after all.

The balance of the funds that get generated go first into getting fresh and latest tools, equipment, chemicals, furniture and machinery for manufacture. 

The third major expense would be to get good staff and artisans. 

The fourth important expense is renting / buying a space suitable for the workshop depending upon the volume of support generated. 

If we still have balance funds we will spend them in upgrading our online shop at www.moah.in. That is critical too as through it we will be able to bring to you the latest products right at your doorstep wherever you are. 

If we reach our goal partially we will invest on priority in the first two, i.e., tools, machinery etc for the workshop, and getting good artisans to work for us. 

YOUR REWARDS 
We have some wonderful jewelry on offer as a reward. We are sure you would treasure these pieces. You can also create a jewelry set by selecting multiple perks like the MOAH Champa Earrings, MOAH Champa Bracelet and MOAH Champa Cluster Pendant. We will be adding more pieces on the go. So make sure to keep looking and sharing our project with friends and family. 
1. $5 Reward is an an e.Thank You Card. We truly are grateful for your contribution. 
 
2. $ 25 Reward is an an e.Thank You Card plus the sweet handcrafted MOAH Champa Earrings with the small flowers polished in Gold & Silver tones. 

 

3.  $50 : Reward is an e.Thank You Card plus the lovely handcrafted MOAH Champa Cluster Pendant with small flowers polished in Gold & Silver tones. 

  

 

4. $ 100 : Your reward is an e.Thank You Card and the beautiful handcrafted MOAH Ring of Pearl Bells.

 

5. $ 125 : Your reward is an e.Thank You Card and the most beautiful handcrafted MOAH Champa Bracelet polished in two tones of Gold and Silver.

 

6. $ 150 : Your reward is an e.Thank You Card and the most beautiful handcrafted MOAH Champa Bracelet of large flowers polished in two tones of Gold and Silver.

 
7. $400 : Your reward is an e.Thank You Card and the most beautiful handcrafted MOAH Peacock Feather Pendant Earrings Set made of Sterling Silver and set with Zircons and the most beautiful Blue Topaz.

 

8. $ 500 : Your reward is an e.Thank You Card and the most elegant handcrafted MOAH Signature Cufflinks engraved with your own name or that of someone you are gifting the cufflinks to, and set with a real diamond  which will come to you duly certified by the ace Government owned Gemstone Laboratory of Jaipur. The Silver on the edges of the diamond will be polished with Gold to give it its classy look. The cufflinks are highly reflective of light. Hence so much of reflection is showing on them in the picture. 

 

9. $ 1000 : Your reward is an e.Thank You Card and the most beautiful handcrafted MOAH Ethnic Pendant Earrings Set made in the traditional Indian style made of Sterling Silver and set with Zircons and the most beautiful Blue Topaz. Beautiful Fresh Water Pearls are set in it and dangle gently on the ends to shimmer and enhance your femininity. 

 

Please note : 

We are going to provide the most secure shipping for your reward. VAT and duty as applicable in your country will have to be borne by you.

We will be connecting with you to get your ring sizes and bracelet sizes etc. as applicable.

ADDITIONAL SOCIAL IMPACT OF YOUR CONTRIBUTION

While skilled artisans are required to create gorgeous jewelry pieces, we would also be needing to hire less skilled or variously skilled people for work as office help, packaging, cleaning, organising the work space, etc.. For this we plan to hire women who are now single with the responsibility of bringing up their children on them. The more we grow as an enterprise, the more we will be able to support such women. I am one such woman and I know what it takes to rebuild life. 
 
We also support Pahal, a charity which helps street children get education in schools thereby transforming their lives and that of their future generations. Without their intervention these children would have either been cleaning streets, or begging etc.. The august work being done by Pahal can be viewed on www.pahaljaipur.com. We pledge to give Pahal 2% of whatever money finally gets credited to our account through this campaign. We will keep you posted on this. 
 
OTHER WAYS IN WHICH YOU CAN HELP.
We understand that some of you may not want to contribute. And its just fine. You are just as important to us. 
 
Please support us by sharing this campaign with your family, friends and strangers via Facebook, Email, Twitter and the like. You can use the tools for sharing offered by this website. Help us spread the word !!! And we will be just as grateful.

story:
Welcome!

Secret Shimapan is the very first brand of underwear that changes colors when you put them on! We use a combination of regular ink and a unique thermosensitive ink that reacts to your body heat, turning transparent at 31°C/88°F, creating a beautiful shimapan pattern.

These cute bikini-cut cotton panties not only come in gorgerous blue, pink, green or black models, but with enough funding, will also come in sizes that fit even the curviest of women, transgender ladies, and guys who just want to wear cute underwear.

Why do we need $8,500?

  • As it turns out, in order to comply with quality standards, we need to buy a  whooping 10 kilograms of specially made ink. This alone will cost us $1,000 dollars.
  • Then we need to pay everyone who is working on this project. This will be another $1,000.
  • We're going to have to buy the panties too, which amounts to $1,100.
  • Finally there's the costs to buy a domain, build an webpage, and basically set up the entire online shop infrastructure after the campaign ends. All this amounts to a total of $903.50 to make the shop work for an entire year.

Wait, that doesn't amount to $8,500, so what gives?

Well, part of your donations won't go towards funding the project and paying the people. It will go towards manufacturing your very own Secret Shimapans, and sending them to you!

Sounds great! But how do i choose my sizes, colours, and styles?

Don't worry, you'll be able to choose the sizes, colors and styles of your Secret Shimapan after the campaign ends, via a link with a form to fill out. Meanwhile, here's an approximate size chart.

Now, onto the perks!

$1 USD: Aw, you shouldn't have...

A token donation. Every dollar counts!

$10 USD: Secret ShimapArt Pack

If you donate $10 to the campaign, we'll give you a digital art pack full of adorable Secret Shimapan-related art, made by artists such as Bikupan, Arlymone, Nittydraws and Astral Lamb, among many others! Here, have a little preview:

Of course, every perk above this price also gets a free ShimArt Pack

$30 USD: A Secret Shimapan

When you donate $25 for the panty and $5 for shipping to the US and Mexico, you'll be reciving your very own Secret Shimapan! This cotton panty comes with a color change quality guarantee, meaning that, if it ever stops changing as vividly as it did on the first day, we'll change it for a new one, free of charge.

$55 USD: 3x2 Pack

Donate $50 (plus shipping) and you'll get not two, but three Secret Shimapan, meaning every panty will cost you 66% of it's original price.

$80 USD: 4x3 Pack

A 3x3 pack, plus another panty.

$130 USD: 8x5 Pack

Buy five Secret Shimapan, and we'll give you one for each day of the week, plus one more to do the laundry in! This means each panty will cost you 62.% of it's original price.

$155 USD: 10x6 Pack!

You know what, we like you. That is why, if you buy six Secret Shimapan, we'll give you four more entirely free. You'll be getting each shimapan at 60% of it's original price, the lowest price you might ever get out of a special sale once we have the online shop up and running. Get them while they're still warm!


But that's not all! Time for some stretch goals.

(Image by Arylmone)

$9,000: Polka dot Secret Shimapan

Panties that change from flat colors to a polka dot design. Both white dots on red background and red dots on white background will be aviliable!

$10,000: Secret Thigh-highs

The same idea, but higher: Flat-colored thigh-highs that become striped when you put them on! They will also be aviliable in blue, pink, green and black models. Of course, once we reach the stretch goal, they'll be added as a new perk.

$11,000: Secretacles

We've all seen enough japanese animation to know where this is going! These panties will change from a flat color to a neat betentacled design.

(Image by Arylmone)

$20,000: Secret Shimapan, male bikini cut

For transgender ladies and guys who just want to look fabulous, we'll order custom made panties with a femenine bikini cut, but with enough extra space in the front.

$100,000: Water changing swimsuits

If we manage to raise $100,000, we'll go full out and create a line of swimsuits that change color when you get into the water.

Spread the word!

Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help us succeed:

  • Share it verbally and by email with your friends.
  • Share and like us on our following social media platforms:

You can find us on:

facebook.com/SecretShimapan
@SecretShimapan
SecretShimapan.tumblr.com

And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! They are mighty indeed.

FAQ

Are they safe to wear?

Of course. We use oil-based rubberized ink with the exact same properties than any other serigraphy ink on the market (besides the thermosensitive effect). It complies with the Official Mexican Norm for chemical composition and use on clothing.

How much is shipping?

The shipping fare of $5.00 in North America and Mexico is already accounted into the perk cost. An extra of $10.00 is needed for shipping to the rest of the world.

When will I get my shima?

Our manufacturing partner, Mahaua is standing by and excited to start producing the Secret Shimapan. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work.

Allowing for 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have Secret Shimapan delivered to you within 3 months after the end of the campaign. And we will do everything within our control to expedite the process to get them to you as soon as possible.

How can I wash them?

Wash your Secret Shimapan with clothes of like color, using cold water. However, you should not iron them, put them in the dryer, or otherwise expose them to high temperatures for an extended time.

Will the colors stop changing?
Absolutely not. We are so confident in our color changing ink that, as long as you wash them properly, if it starts working less than perfect at any point, we'll replace your panty with a new one, free of charge!

Buy five Secret Shimapan, and we'll give you one for each day of the week, plus one more to do the laundry in! This means each panty will cost you 62.% of it's original price.
$155 USD: 10x6 Pack!
You know what, we like you. That is why, if you buy six Secret Shimapan, we'll give you four more entirely free. You'll be getting each shimapan at 60% of it's original price, the lowest price you might ever get out of a special sale once we have the online shop up and running. Get them while they're still warm!

But that's not all! Time for some stretch goals.


(Image by Arylmone)
$9,000: Polka dot Secret Shimapan

Panties that change from flat colors to a polka dot design. Both white dots on red background and red dots on white background will be aviliable!
$10,000: Secret Thigh-highs
The same idea, but higher: Flat-colored thigh-highs that become striped when you put them on! They will also be aviliable in blue, pink, green and black models. Of course, once we reach the stretch goal, they'll be added as a new perk.
$11,000: Secretacles
We've all seen enough japanese animation to know where this is going! These panties will change from a flat color to a neat betentacled design.


(Image by Arylmone)

$20,000: Secret Shimapan, male bikini cut
For transgender ladies and guys who just want to look fabulous, we'll order custom made panties with a femenine bikini cut, but with enough extra space in the front.
$100,000: Water changing swimsuits
If we manage to raise $100,000, we'll go full out and create a line of swimsuits that change color when you get into the water.
Spread the word!


Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help us succeed:

Share it verbally and by email with your friends.

Share and like us on our  following social media platforms:

You can find us on:
facebook.com/SecretShimapan@SecretShimapanSecretShimapan.tumblr.comAnd remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! They are mighty indeed.



FAQ


Are they safe to wear?
Of course. We use oil-based rubberized ink with the exact same properties than any other serigraphy ink on the market (besides the  thermosensitive effect). It complies with the Official Mexican Norm for chemical composition and use on clothing.
How much is shipping?The shipping fare of $5.00 in North America and Mexico is already accounted into the perk cost. An extra of $10.00 is needed for shipping to the rest of the world.

When will I get my shima?
Our manufacturing partner, Mahaua is standing by and excited to 
start producing the Secret Shimapan. As soon as our campaign ends, they will
 get to work.
Allowing for 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to 
have Secret Shimapan delivered to you within 3 months after the end of the 
campaign. And we will do everything within our control to expedite the 
process to get them to you as soon as possible.
How can I wash them?

Wash your Secret Shimapan with clothes of like color, using cold water. However, you should not iron them, put them in the dryer, or otherwise expose them to high temperatures for an extended time.



Will the colors stop changing?
Absolutely not. We are so confident in our color changing ink that, as long as you wash them properly, if it starts working less than perfect at any 
point, we'll replace your panty with a new one, free of charge!

story:
TrackLock

Lots of us carry bags, for school, for work or for travel. We keep important things in our bag... but sometimes they get stolen or we just forget them at places. 
You may lose your bag, but your bag won't lose you.

Let's put an end to losing our stuff.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to raise $60 000 in the next 30 days to get this project into production. We need the funds tooling and getting the product in your hands.
  • Tracklock is a simple device that notifies you and your mobile device of the location of your bag while keeping the contents secure. You may lose your bag, but your bag won't lose you.
  • If we don't reach our goal. The funds will be sent back to you.

The Impact

You won't feel the pain of losing your valuables and the hassle of replacing them. It shares the opportunity for the Indie community to get a useful smart device.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge we face is hitting our minimum quantity of 15 000 production units.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Can't wait for you to use it!

story:
All over the world people are confronted by deadly or poisonous snakes, spiders, scorpions, wasps and more!  Most creepy crawlies love to hide in dark cool places which is exactly what our vacant boots and shoes supply, both indoors and out!
    
My idea began when I was working on a Gold Mining Camp in Western Australia.  I quickly became aware of how many creepy crawlies lived among us and soon heard stories of the excruciating pain inflicted from spider bites and the horrors of ongoing treatment for reoccurring ulcers some bites can cause, all making me uncomfortably aware of 'What could be lurking in my boots!' 

Spiders, snakes, lizards, centipedes, scorpions, bees - the list was endless!

Because of these creatures crawling around I witnessed something of a morning ritual, where everyone noisily banged boots and shoes on the sides of buildings, onto the ground or slamming their boots together to rid them of any unwanted biters – the braver ones inserting their bare hands or upturning each boot over their eyes!! 

These actions, I discovered were not just limited to the Gold Mine, they are daily habits of everyday people all throughout Australia and in fact all around the world!
I wondered,  how can this problem be fixed?

So I designed... The Biter Fighters!


              


The Biter Fighter is made from specially selected foam balls that are tethered together to make a unit.  By simply compressing and inserting the balls into each boot the Biter Fighter foam expands to help prevent snakes, spiders centipedes and other creepy crawlies from entering your vacant boots or shoes!


             


                                   

                                  

   

                         

                                                                         

                                                   

      


As we develop further into their territories, the more these creatures make our homes and work places their habitat which also makes contact with them increasingly more common.

I am pleased to say that the Biter Fighter not only helps to protect our hands and feet from being bitten or stung, it also helps to prevent many of our important insects and small animals from being squashed accidentally!


          

TESTIMONIALS 

Sally    "When Bronwyn first told me about Biter Fighters, my reaction was 'WOW' What a brilliant idea!  I had been bitten by a spider that was lurking in my favourite pair of Dr Marten boots which were on my bedroom floor!  Unusually my boot was rubbing, I removed the boot to find a blister on my ankle, the blister burst and a big lump appeared!  Over time it got worse with the flesh being eaten away, a week off work and a course of antibiotics.    Biter Fighters are great I use them indoors and out and they will certainly put my mind to rest when we go camping" 

                     'PLACE TO HIDE'                                            'PEACE OF MIND'          

                V       

            

Deanne  "My 3 year old daughter never wore those boots again - after a centipede bit her! But no bities in our boots now! The Biter Fighters are the best!  With 8 pairs of boots at our back door (riding boots and work boots) we all feel stress-free pulling our boots on knowing they are creepy crawly free!"                     

                          

TESTING & EDUCATING

As there are so many creepy crawlies, all with very different habits and functions, major testing was required to ensure that these insects and small animals did not get into the plugged footwear. 

We will certainly never forget our dealings with all the bugs and animals that helped us prove the Biter Fighter successful in keeping the creepy crawlies out! 

IF OUR PRODUCT CAN PROTECT YOU IN AUSTRALIA... IT'S SURE TO PROTECT YOU ANYWHERE ELSE IN THE WORLD!


       

The photos used in this campaign show a number of the test subjects that volunteered for the greater good of their species and ours of course!  They represent some of the more common varieties that live around us and below we have also noted how they actually help us.  

            

             (No animals were harmed during the testing of the Biter Fighters :) 

We believe it is vitally important that we educate our children to respect our wildlife teaching them to live alongside our animals and insects, allowing them do their job as nature intended.



OUR CRAZY RIDE

Our Biter Fighter project has taken years of personal time, money and sometimes even tears, but with real persistence we have achieved the best design, the right foams and minimized packaging for easy shipping.  

We were even awarded the Australian New Inventors 'Peoples Choice' Award!

'TALK ABOUT PROUD!!'

Unfortunately we then learnt a very important, heartbreaking and expensive lesson on Importing - Always Always do your own Quality Control first! Our initial shipment was a disaster!  This was a huge set back and nearly broke us, but now armed with new knowledge and a new manufacturer, we have overcome!

                  'WE ARE BACK & EVEN MORE DETERMINED TO SUCCEED!

   

THE CREW

Our team, family and friends have been amazing as they are often forced to step out of their comfort zone and help with collecting, transporting, photographing, chasing or just hearing about some creepy crawly.  Their support and patience has been paramount in moving this project forward.    

WITH A LITTLE HELP FROM OUR FRIENDS           

With prototypes, vacuum packaging, Patent and Trademarks organised we are close to achieving our goal.  

Sixty thousand dollars will allow us to move to the next stage of manufacturing and purchase larger quantities of foam balls to provide a better price (especially for the early birds) as well as tweak a few things with our packaging!

By pre-ordering your very own Biter Fighters you will be assisting us to keep the creepy crawlies out and to keep you and your family safe from nasty bites and stings at a better price!

There is so much more to making a foam ball than one would think, especially when you get over certain sizes.  It is imperative that the foam has the correct density for ease of compression and then good recovery.  Minimal pitting, raking and pimples are also important. 

We have previously paid for 2 templates and performed extensive testing on the Medium and Large foam balls.  Our foam testing consisted of the following:      

                

With help from the 'People of Indiegogo' the next step is to make the Small Biter Fighter template so we can ensure that Children as well as Men and Women all over the world have access to our full range of products.  

                                                    Our Vacuum packed Samples

                              

                                        Front                                                               Back

You can help us bring our dream to reality and take Biter Fighters to the World market in 2016!


STRETCH GOALS

Should we surpass our Goal - WOW AND THANK YOU!  we will go straight to our Kids Novelty Biter Fighters, working on bringing an assortment of fun animals and fun faces to brighten everyone's day!

                                       (Silly Sample possibilities are endless)

       

                              We would be very happy to put the 'Silly into being Safe!'


Then for the Adults... Deodorized Balls!  Biter Fighter Balls that is - Deodorized!    Just a little assistance with that old smelly boot problem!   We think it would be good business sense to bring an array of different deodorizers to our range both to add a fresh scent to your boots and to discourage the critters.        

                 

Then if going really, really well, AGAIN, THANK YOU ALL! - we will look at ongoing corporate logo runs... for the company who has everything or those at one with your business  (Safety, Work Wear, Boot, Shoe and Glove Brands, Pest Control, Camping or Caravan, Mining, Oil or Gardening Companies)   


 We could do it all!  Varied Ball Colours, Names, Company Logos, Original Designs!

             

                        

PERK #1 - EARLY BIRD - KIDS SINGLES   $12.00

   +

1 x Small Red Biter Fighter Set for Kids                                                                                        1 x Small Blue Biter Fighter Set for Kids

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK #2 - EARLY BIRD - ADULT - SINGLES  $15.00

    +  

1 x Medium Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                           1 x Large Blue Biter Fighter  

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK #3 - EARLY BIRD - FAMILY PACK     $24.00

   x 1

1 x Small Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                                1 x Small Blue Biter Fighter                                                                                                               1 x Medium Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                             1 x  Large Blue Biter Fighter

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK #4 - EARLY BIRD - DOUBLE FAMILY PACK  $46.00

   +  

2 x Small Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                                2 x Small Blue Biter Fighter                                                                                                               2 x Medium Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                           2 x  Large Blue Biter Fighter

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK #5 - EARLY BIRD - QUAD PACK   $88.00

 +  +   + 

 4 x Small Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                                4 x Small Blue Biter Fighter                                                                                                                4 x Medium Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                        4 x Large Blue Biter Fighter

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK #6  - EARLY BIRD - QUIN PACK    $100.00

 +  +   + +  

5 x Small Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                            5 x Small Blue Biter Fighter                                                                                                               5 x Medium Red Biter Fighter                                                                                                           5 x Large Blue Biter Fighter

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK #7  -  MAKING IT PERSONAL/BUSINESS $5,500.00

Personalized or Corporate branding, get your Biter Fighters Personalized!
Camp, School, Club or Company Logo
Minimum order 1000 of one size


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Why are the Biter Fighter foam balls out of shape when first opened?

The foam is vacuum packaged which removes all the air from the foam.  Simply massage air back into foam and allow the balls to expand overnight or place the foam balls into a laundry bag and wash delicately, then dry thoroughly.

Do I use the string to pull the Biter Fighters out of the shoes or boots?

This is not recommended - gently pinch the foam and pull to remove the balls.

Is the Biter Fighter washable?

Yes gentle wash using a laundry bag is best and dry out of direct sunlight.

Can the Biter Fighter go in the dryer?

This is not recommended, hang out of direct sunlight and away from direct heat.

Is the smaller Biter Fighter best for gloves?

The small Biter Fighter is great for gloves.  It is not recommended for elasticated gloves over long periods.

How do I know what size Biter Fighter fits my boot or shoe best?

The foam ball should be slightly bigger than the opening of the shoe or boot.  Insert the compressed foam ball half to three quarters of the way into the shoe opening, adjust the ball to fill gaps.  If applicable pull shoe tongue up and tighten the laces creating a snugger fit around the ball.  If there are still gaps you may need to go to the next size up.  The foam ball only requires light pressure on the shoe to create a seal.  If the foam ball is too big and pushes the shoes outwards - go to a smaller size.

What do I do if the Biter Fighter balls get wet?

Simply wash gently and dry out of direct sunlight or heat and ensure the foam is clean and dry before placing into vacant shoes or boots.

How do I maintain my Biter Fighters? 

Ensure footwear is clean, dry and vacant.  Refrain from pulling on the string and aerate foam balls often.  Wash when needed and dry naturally!  Cared for this way your Biter Fighters will be fighting for you for a long time to come!

   

 Bron - Inventor 

    Bart - long time supporter, partner and motivator 

     Sophie - Daughter, photographer and supporter Extraordinaire!

Danny and Coco our wonderful Manufacturers

Michael - Critters Up Close Mandurah WA (Awesome Educator on Oz wildlife)      

Mel - Perth Design Web and Print

David - Creative Forte Fremantle WA, helping with our video                                         

Teisha - Our Online Canteen - for all the hours away from you own business that you gifted to me

Plus so many more amazing people whose care and support has got us here!

Thank u Love u xxx

story:
Most customizable cases feature a single design and require customers to purchase a whole new case to change the style. There are also skins on the market, those must be applied (tediously) directly onto the phone and most of the time can't be reapplied. If you ever tried to apply a skin to a phone (or reapply), then you know what I am talking about.

The new My Case Face Case along with the INSERTs is the solution for infinite customization for a much lower cost than the other mentioned solution. Isn't that already great? But wait, that's not all.

Not only we wanted to give infinite customization options with a stylish case but we also wanted to develop a case that provides the highest levels of protection and cutting off the bulk down to the form factor of the device. We have been developing The My Case Face Case for over 18 Months. We have been testing, developing and listening to current customers needs and ideas. This is it. We worked hard to make this case the best it can be. The market wants it and needs it!

Our team strongly believes mycaseface.com is the future of mobile phone customization, from the personal to the corporate level. With the new My Case Face Case, we will be able (with your help) to put the power of individualization and maximum device protection into the customer’s hand.

My Case Face Case's are structurally sound with a high-tech impact absorbent interior structure as well as a bumper with integrated screen protector (yes, this is a one and only on the market) available in a wide range of colors to match your unique INSERT and accompanying WALLPAPER design and taste. 

The back cover is transparent and scratch resistant allowing for the design to shine. 

The Back cover, bumper along with the integrated screensaver gives your device a never before seen all around protection.

To display your visual masterpiece, we have developed a dynamic plastic insert that is Flexible, Durable, Water and UV Resistant and Printable on both sides. 

Our mycaseface.com online design tool lets you upload and design your image in minutes. 

Too lazy to create a design? No problem; mycaseface.com also offers pre-made designs in our daily growing gallery, organized into categories. The designs in the Gallery are created by professional artists who get commissions for each sale. The designs can be purchased as is or can be further edited to customize it to your liking. 

Once printed, the plastic insert can be slid easily into the case between the clear cover and the phone showcasing your creation. 

Our free and easy to use online design tool also lets you generate a matching WALLPAPER that you can display on your screen. 

Experience a whole new world of mobile customization and device protection. 

mycaseface.com give your case a face :)

Some Product Features Are:

  • Stylish And Slim Profile Bumper
  • All-Around Protection
  • Ultra-High Impact Absorbing Interior Properties
  • Powered By Advanced Drop Technology
  • Scratch-Resistant Transparent Back Cover
  • Integrated Screen Protector
  • Available In Attractive Fashion Colors
  • Compatible With 3th-Party Headphones Including Beats By Dr. Dre
  • Design Allows For Easy Access To All Ports and Buttons 
  • Available For The 
  • -iPhone 6 / 6s  
  • -iPhone 6+ / 6s+
  • -Galaxy S6

Perks:

Use Of Funds:

We have everything ready for mass manufacturing.
The last couple of months our Team has 3D printed, tested and fine-tuned all Brand/Models.

The funds raised here will be used only to mass manufacture the CASES.

Everything else is already in place. 

Each case has 2 parts front and back. 
Meaning we need 2 moulds for each phone model. E.g.: iPhone 6 x 2 moulds, iPhone 6 plus x 2 moulds etc..

After The Campaign Is Successfully Funded:

Once the IndieGoGo campaign is funded, we will send out a backer survey to gather all your reward choices (Device, Colors, etc.) and your shipping address. After getting most of the surveys back, We’ll commence production. Based on the factories estimate, this process should take about 30 days to complete dependent on volume. We're going to make the Cases at a responsible factory with that We've done a lot of business with manufacturing the first generation of this case. Once the production is completed, Cases will be shipped to our office in Los Angeles, California (2 weeks) and then repackage individual orders to ship out to backers (1 week). So all in all, you should get your Cases and Inserts in about 60-70 days after the campaign ends. Thanks for your support. Let's rock!

We have learned a lot developing the first generation of The My Case face Case and learn and listen from existing customers feedback.

First generation of the My Case Face Case (currently sold at mycaseface.com):

Risks and challenges

Since we have already created a working product, we believe the risks are few. In addition to having a product in use, we have also been in contact with many manufacturers about the best way to manufacture this piece at the different volumes it may be ordered in. You can rest assured that you will be getting a product that we have tested and approved of.

The biggest risk we see are copycats. However, we are on top of our game and will continue to come up with innovative ideas and listen to our customers and markets need. After all, we have the first mover advantage if we are able to raise the funds here with your support.

Our mission at My Case Face is and always will be to provide custom designed phone cases to fit each customer's individual personality. We are 100% committed to providing a satisfying experience for every customer every time.

Overseeing the creation of the inserts and manufacturing of the cases relies on working with the right suppliers which we have already identified so production of The My Case Face Case can start immediately after successfully raising the funds here with your help.

We did all the prep work and sure that the production process should be smooth. After all, I have already manufacturing experience of the first generation of this case and all went well.

Please support a small company with made in the USA products.

For some fun here our My Case Face song :):
story_txt:
Most customizable cases feature a single design and require customers to purchase a whole new case to change the style. There are also skins on the market, those must be applied (tediously) directly onto the phone and most of the time can't be reapplied. If you ever tried to apply a skin to a phone (or reapply), then you know what I am talking about.The new My Case Face Case along with the INSERTs is the solution for infinite customization for a much lower cost than the other mentioned solution. Isn't that already great? But wait, that's not all.Not only we wanted to give infinite customization options with a stylish case but we also wanted to develop a case that provides the highest levels of protection and cutting off the bulk down to the form factor of the device. We have been developing The My Case Face Case for over 18 Months. We have been testing, developing and listening to current customers needs and ideas. This is it. story:
Life is Made for Good Journeys

As the saying goes, the journey is just as important as the destination. 

But what actually, makes a journey worth the while?

Often times during our journeys, we are caught up with unexpected hiccups - be it misplacing our passport, having to face the wrath of messy cables or encountering the dreaded incident of a water bottle leakage that ends up destroying our gadgets and important documents.

 
 

We strongly believe that journeys should be hassle-free. You're on a journey to do big and important things. You're out there to build great memories, forge new friendships and connections. You don't have the time to worry about trivial issues. We'll take care of that for you so you can focus on the things that matter.



The Swanston is a multi-functional bag with modular detachable pouches that keep all your travel essentials in check, and much more. 

It is designed to not just function well, but looks just as awesome because first impressions count. The Swanston allows you to swiftly transition from boardroom meetings to leisure strolls, stylishly and effortlessly.


Backpack


Briefcase


Messenger


Timeless and classy on the outside, packed with function on the inside. The Swanston covers your everyday needs as a modern traveller - all in one bag.






Signature Dual-Strap System - Versatile and modular, this allows you to compartmentalize your travel needs.


Premium materials - High-quality, durable, water-resistant materials with a smooth and luxurious touch - vegan micro-fibre leather and nylon fabric. Micro-fibre leather is the highest of quality amongst synthetic leather types and is more eco-friendly than PVC.


Zinc-Alloy hardware - Our rust-resistant zinc-alloy hardware comes with a light gold electroplated finish for a touch of class.


Cable/Gadget Organizers - We've all been too familiar with disorganized cables. Now you can say goodbye to that mess!


Handle Slip-through - Take the burden away from your shoulders and stroll with ease with the slip-through feature.


Spacious and Organized Compartments - The main compartment fits up to a week's worth of clothing, has ample compartments for books, documents, pens and slots for SIM/MicroSIM cards.


Reinforced Handles - The handles are constructed for added durability and to accommodate heavier loads.


Detachable Water Bottle Bag - The bag is water-resistant and can be placed either horizontally or vertically depending on use.


Side Straps - Designed for quick and convenient access.


Hidden Shoulder Straps - Stowaway shoulder straps with pockets and padding for comfort.


For one bag, you get an extra two more!

Zippered Pouch - Detachable and interchangeable front pouch for loose items such as passport, cards, cash, phone. Perfect for parties or even a quick trip to the grocers'!


Laptop Sleeve - Detachable padded laptop sleeve. Fits up to a 15" laptop and A4-sized documents. 



Hey there, I'm Jo On, founder and Chief Exploration Officer at Goodtabi.

Goodtabi, literally translated as (yep,you guessed it) Good Journeys, is an extension of a personal problem that stemmed from an unhappy journey back in 2013 when I was travelling along the countryside of Yilan, Taiwan. 

It was during then when a coffee bottle I had brought along with me during the trip decided to take a leak and damaged everything I had inside my backpack - including my camera - a tool that I carry with me everywhere I travel to document the many great memories a good journey can offer.

This incident sparked a bigger mission within myself - in which journeys should be experienced comfortably and positively. Not just for myself, but for everyone.

Sincerely,

Jo

We've collaborated with talented artist Anna Rastorgueva on a tote bag created for all creatives, be it artists, designers or architects. The Montmartre tote, named after the Montmartre in Paris - a cultural mecca of modern art - is a bag designed for your creative journeys. Here is Anna's take on this artistic hub.

The Montmartre is currently at the prototyping stages. Click on the link below and sign up to get updated with the progress and be a part of this exciting journey! 

We're always looking forward to sharing stories of your journeys through collaborations. Feel free to drop us a line if you're interested or for just a chat.

Note: The Montmartre is not part of this Indiegogo campaign. 


Campaign Fulfillment


Our fulfillment plan is certified by Floship, an experienced crowdfunding fulfillment company. Partnering with Floship allows us to deliver your goods in a quick and cost-effective way.


Risks and Challenges

We've built our relationship with our manufacturers on trust, experience, quality craftsmanship, reliability and constant communication. Having personally visited their factory and learning of the few major clients under their belt, we believe our manufacturers have the capabilities to craft you a product that meets your expectations.

We were informed that production can take up to three months depending on quantity. We've added a buffer to that in case of any unforeseen circumstances. While we are unable to predict any setbacks that may occur with regards to delivery schedule (though we wish we could), we ensure you that we're fully prepared to tackle the obstacles that may come our way, with full positivity. And we'll keep you updated along the way.


International Shipping

We provide worldwide shipping to all orders. Please check the cost of shipping to your country in the checkout menu.


Duty / VAT Charges

Please note that you will be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges depending on your country's policy.


Customs

Please note that delays may occur depending on your country's policy.


Thank you!

Thank you to our family and friends for supporting and encouraging us throughout this journey.

Thank you to the Hoco Creative team for the graphic design and video production.

Thank you to our models HH, Yen and Florence for helping out with the photo and video shoot.

And lastly, thank YOU for your kind support and time in listening to our journey. Now, we need your help in making this a reality! We would love to hear your comments and keep improving our products to better your journeys.

story:
Hi, good and kind people! My name is Sofia Selina, I'm 23 years old and I am from a small city in Siberia, Russia.


My career in modelling started when I was 14, when I was a promoter for a fashion-photographer. At that time I was also organizing photo-sessions for fashion-photography, promotions, and magazines. I opened my own modelling agency when I was 18, which is still operating successfully in Krasnoyarsk, and I started doing make-up and hair professionally at 19. When i was 20 I went to Bali in Indonesia to create art and to surf. And it is this island, with its happy and measured life, that inspired me to create my own line of clothing. After all, if everyone did what they know and love, then the world would be perfect. Don't you agree?

The Roho Roho company has operated there successfully for a year as an online store. We have pleased our customers with our style and quality, and they in turn have asked me to expand the range of materials and colours, and to add summer and evening collections.

I want to do this very much!


What We Need & What You Get


We need to raise $ 9000 to start production in January 2016. 
We want to delight you with high quality cool things!

We have 4 tasks now:

1) To expand the range of knitted clothes, add new cardigans and mini and midi dresses that you can wear three seasons of the year, which you won't freeze in and still look awesome!

2) Add a new line of silk dresses for summer and evening.

3) Make a separate capsule collection called "only black" for fans of style and, of course, fans of black!

4) So, when we have made high quality, stylish, and affordable products made from natural materials we will be ready to enter the world market. We need to invest in the promotion of the site and brand by using social networking, collaboration with various events, and of course the creation of visual content.
If we do not reach your entire goal - we will still certainly extend the existing collection of knitted goods made of natural wool.

Some of our collection 2014-2015



The Impact

We want to expand our line of clothes and make them affordable, while still only using natural materials such as silk, wool, cotton and linen.

Our clothing meets the demands of fashion, but looks original and unique; It fits well, and isn't inconvenient; It is appropriate for any occasion, and can be combined with any woman's wardrobe.

We have successfully sold Roho Roho through our online store, social networks, and in multi-brand stores. We have had happy and satisfied customers, and lots of positive feedback.

Our brand has been represented in Moscow for just half a year, but we have already organized 3 shows and 3 photo-shoots, and have cooperated with beauty contests as a partner and have provided clothes for photo-shoots for young stylists.

Roho Roho is looking for people who want to invest in us. There are many steps from the creation of a new clothing line to the consumer purchases, but lets focus on the main ones - manufacturing costs, materials, promotional costs, and delivery. With investment we can improve these steps and our business will expand.

 So, we need investment. 

There are many steps from the creation of a new clothing line to the consumer purchases, but lets focus on the main ones:

 1) Manufacturing costs

 2) Materials 

3) Promotional costs

 4) Delivery

If we will have luck to rise twice more money we gonna start our very first shop Roho Roho and we will also add two extra collections "cotton" and "linen"


Only organic materials. No Acrylic. No Polyester. No Rayon. No Synthetic fibre.


Other Ways You Can Help

Also, we kindly ask you to help us in expanding of our website by promotion in social networks: Instagram, Facebook, vk.com, twitter etc; via hashtag, tweet, post and just good and kind word about us!

story: As Pakistan is the most famous country for producing leathe goods, we need your support to bring you the best quality products in market. Your contributions can help us achieve our goals in manipulated time. Please support. 15 days money back guaranteed. We will launch our website and start production once our target is achieved. Estimated production time for pre-orders is 4-5 months, inclusive shipping on pre-orders. Thank you very much.

story:
________________________________________________________________
 

Risks and Challenges

 

Manufacturing:

Our Manufacturers have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. Sure, we might face unexpected issues and surprises, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise in a huge spirit of excitement. An overall goal of making the best possible product for you.

Product Adjustments:

As we get closer to production, there will likely be some adjustments to improve the final product. Our pre-production prototypes were made to test / refine the product. We are committed to providing an awesome product and it will always be for your benefit. We will let you know of any changes that we need to make and why.

Rewards & Fulfillment:

We have gone through multiple prototypes and testing on the LiLu Bag and feel confident that the product we are presenting to you is one you will love. However making hardware is hard. Crowdfunding has created a unique situation where consumers are expecting things to roll out on very tight deadlines that truly are difficult to perfectly predict. We have done our best to account for unexpected delays, and will do our best to handle everything in a professional manner. A supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost etc. we have accounted for them all.
         ________________________________________________________________
 

FAQ’s

 

How can I order a LiLu LED Bag?

The only way to get one is through our Indiegogo page here. People who back the project on Indiegogo get to have the very first LiLu Bags and save up to 40% of the future retail price of $150. Just click on the ‘Back This Project’ button on the right hand side of the campaign page.

What is the Warranty?

Our warranty applies to all kinds of damage (anything that is our fault or manufacturing defects). It doesn't cover user caused breakage or other damage, caused by user.

How long does the battery last?

LiLu Bag has 10 hours of  battery life so you can party all night until the sun comes up.

Where do I get the LiLu App?

The free LiLu app will be released for Android and Apple phones via the Apple Store and Google Play.
story_txt:
________________________________________________________________ 
Risks and Challenges 
 
Manufacturing:
Our Manufacturers have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. Sure, we might face unexpected issues and surprises, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise in a huge spirit of excitement. An overall goal of making the best possible product for you.

Product Adjustments:



As we get closer to production, there will likely be some adjustments to improve the final product. Our pre-production prototypes were made to test / refine the product. We are committed to providing an awesome product and it will always be for your benefit. We will let you know of any changes that we need to make and why.


Rewards & Fulfillment:



We have gone through multiple prototypes and testing on the LiLu Bag and feel confident that the product we are presenting to you is one you will love. However making hardware is hard. Crowdfunding has created a unique situation where consumers are expecting things to roll out on very tight deadlines that truly are difficult to perfectly predict. We have done our best to account for unexpected delays, and will do our best to handle everything in a professional manner. A supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost etc. we have accounted for them all.
         ________________________________________________________________ 
FAQ’s
 
How can I order a LiLu LED Bag?
The only way to get one is through our Indiegogo page here. People who back the project on Indiegogo get to have the very first LiLu Bags and save up to 40% of the future retail price of $150. Just click on the ‘Back This Project’ button on the right hand side of the campaign page.
What is the Warranty?
Our warranty applies to all kinds of damage (anything that is our fault or manufacturing defects). It doesn't cover user caused breakage or other damage, caused by user.
How long does the battery last?
LiLu Bag has 10 hours of  battery life so you can party all night until the sun comes up.
Where do I get the LiLu App?
The free LiLu app will be released for Android and Apple phones via the Apple Store and Google Play.

story:
The world's first charger supports Wireless Charging

We have created a smart sticker that can make your mobile phone charge wirelessly, simply stick it one time on the back of your mobile and enjoys a lifetime of charging without cables.

Our wireless technology supports mobile phones with micro-USB or USB Lighting like " iPhone 5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6 Plus, 6S, 6S Plus, SE, 7, 7Plus" or even USB-C like "Huawei Nexus 6P, LG Nexus 5X, OnePlus 2, Microsoft Lumia 950 & 950 XL, Samsung Galaxy Note7, Lenovo Z2 Plus,.."

 

Charge by USB-Cable

We like innovation but like to keep some old school, so you can still charge your devices by your USB Cable.

Charge Two devices at the same time

You can charge two devices at the same time, one wirelessly and one with USB cable.

 

Live Demonstration of SunBank:

 
 

Easily Expandable Using Magnets

You can add additional solar panels for faster charging, each solar panel adds 2.5 more watt to your SunBank, and they have strong magnets to connect easily. 

 

Choosing the Right Model

We are offering SunBank in three models.
7Watt / 1.5A Model --- 9.5Watt / 2A Model --- 14.5Watt / 3A Model.

 

Our Own Customized Solar Panels

Our solar panels are lighter & thinner than any other panels in the market.

 

Charge different devices

SunBank can charge your mobile phone, headphones, tablet, camera, GoPro, Smart Watch.

 

Charge Indoors or at Night

SunBank has 6400 mAh internal Li-ion batteries, so you can keep charging your devices indoors or even at night.

 

Qualcomm Quick Charge Technology

SunBank uses Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 technology which is 75% faster than conventional chargers, so now you can charge your devices at the fastest rate possible.

 

You Can't Forget Your SunBank

Remember when you needed your power-bank, then realized that you forgot it!
Don't worry, our mobile app syncs with SunBank and send you notification if you forget it or forget to charge it.

 

Bring the Geek Inside You

Now you can check how much you are generating from the Sun in this moment, and how many times you have charged your phone with clean energy. Not just that but also how much you have helped the environment by reducing CO2 or planting new trees.

 

Download our Mobile App and Check It Yourself

 

Designed to be used everyday, EVERYWHERE!

Don't know where to get some sunlight? Just stick SunBank on any surface that faces the sun and you are good to go. You can carry it around or put it on your bag or stick it on your room, office window, or even car, train, plane window.

 

Patent Pending, Cooling Material

With this cooling material, SunBank allows 15-20% more power than any-other solar charger with the same size.

 

 

 

SunBank Design

SunBank was designed to be super light, thin & portable to be carried around everyday. Yet, it is still efficient and water resistant so it can be used in extreme conditions.

We care so much about the environment, that when we manufactured SunBank, we used aluminum from recycled soda cans, protecting the environment from additional waste.

 

SunBank vs. Other Charging Devices

 

Mission of Happiana

"Clean world, one watt at a time". We live for this motto everyday & it's the cause behind creating SunBank.

Our mission is to prove that we can protect our environment without downgrading our lifestyle, because when passion for better living meets technology, the potential to go clean grows exponentially.

We have created SunBank to suit the lifestyles of different people, so it can be used everyday not just in camping or travelling, but also in becoming the primary source of energy to charge your mobile devices.

Taking a leap further..

The Solar Wearable industry is really under-developed. We have a lot of ideas in the area of sustainable development but we believe that we need to tackle them one-by one to manufacture exceptional products. So with your help bringing SunBank to the world, you are also helping us realize these ideas too.

Check out our rewards for you:

 

While we are working for this device to be manufactured, the hindrance we face is that we need 15,000$ or more to start the production line. However, this is our first product, our social reach is not big yet, but we are getting there. With your help, you become part of our journey and team.  So spread the word and tell your friends and family about SunBank. Let's make the world clean, one watt at a time.

If you can't buy SunBank but you are interested in our cause, then you can still help..

- Spread the word out and pass on our campaign to someone who might be interested. Use Indiegogo share tools! 

- Give us feedback about the device, what you like and what you want to see improved.

Q: Where is SunBank going to be available?
We are shipping worldwide so you can order your SunBank and you will receive it no matter where you are.

Q: What are the shipping costs for my SunBank?
You can know the shipping rate for your company when you click to purchase your SunBank from the perks on the right side of this page.

Q: How long does it take to charge up SunBank's (6000 mAh) internal battery using solar power?
With 7W model, it takes around 4.5 hours
With 9.5W model, it takes around 3.5 hours
With 14.5W model, it takes around 2.2 hours

Q: Do you offer a referral system for this campaign?
Yes, we do. First, order your SunBank on our Indiegogo campaign. Then, if you refer one of your friends to order SunBank too, you will be able to customize print whatever you want on your SunBank for free.
And if you get 4 friends to contribute to our campaign too, you will be refunded on your SunBank! Here's how:
1. Log into Indiegogo (NOTE: you must be logged in!) and go to the SunBank campaign page.
2. Click the Twitter or Facebook icons to share the campaign via social media OR, click the “link” icon to copy your own personal link to share by email, messages or any other private communication with your friends.
3. Your link is personal and can be tracked back to YOU. When someone clicks through to the page via your link and contributes to the campaign, Indiegogo’s system will automatically credit you as the referrer.

Q: Can I charge more than one device at the same time? 
Yes, you can charge simultaneously two devices, one wirelessly and one from the USB port.

Q: Can I charge my devices from SunBank while it charges itself from the sun?
Yes. SunBank can simultaneously charge your devices while charging itself from the sun! You can connect your devices by USB cable to SunBank and the sun will continue to fill it up.

story:
Story

Imagine you’re traveling for a job interview, to visit family and friends, or just for vacation. You remembered to pack your hair trimmer so you can get in a quick grooming at the hotel before you go out. You always bring it with you because you like to look your best on these special occasions. Except this time you forgot the charger for your hair clipper, and yes, it is all out of charge… Or maybe you brought the charger but, since you’re in Paris, you need a special adapter for your charger to work… Or maybe you’re still packing for your trip and are tired of having to pack a different charger for every device you own…

That is why we thought, “Why not make one less travel item to worry about?” Since all electronics are moving towards USB-C charging, we decided to be the first to make that move for the hair trimmer. This way you can use the same charger for your phone, laptop, and your hair trimmer. It makes it a whole lot easier when traveling.

Our Product

The Simba hair clipper is the first rechargeable hair clipper to use USB-C charging. Not only that, it also combines a lot of cool features that make it the most well rounded hair clipper:

  • USB-C charger
  • Battery percentage indicator
  • Two long lasting rechargeable lithium ion batteries
  • 5-in-1 hair clipper: full size trimmer, precision trimmer, nose/ear hair trimmer, body groomer, and foil shaver
  • 6 different comb guides
  • All comb guides and clipper heads can be easily replaced in case you lose them
  • 100% waterproof
  • A carrying case that helps you organize all of the pieces and is travel-friendly (optional)

USB-C Charging

The most iconic feature of the Simba hair clipper is the USB-C charging. This is the first hair clipper to introduce this consumer friendly technology. Our patent pending technology brings a long overdue innovation to the hair clipper market. The hair clipper comes with a USB-C to USB charging cable and a wall adapter.

Battery Percentage Indicator

Imagine the convenience of knowing how much charge you have left in your hair clipper. Our Simba clipper has a digital screen that tells you the exact percentage of battery that you have left. This lets you take your time grooming without worrying about running out of charge unexpectedly.

Lithium Ion Batteries

Most hair clippers on the market last about 45 to 120 minutes on full charge. So we decided to use two rechargeable lithium ion batteries to give the hair clipper up to 4 hours of usage. Not only that, but the batteries are also capable of fast charging so you can be fully charged in only 1 hour.

5-in-1 Hair Clipper

Instead of having to buy a different hair clipper for each of your grooming needs, the Simba Clipper comes with 5 interchangeable heads. These include a full size trimmer, a precision trimmer, a nose/ear hair trimmer, a body groomer, and a foil shaver. "What happens if I lose one of the trimmer heads?" Good question; you definitely don't have to buy a whole new set. These different heads will be available for separate purchase in case you lose one.

Full Size Trimmer:

The full size trimmer is great for getting a larger area of hair closely trimmer.

 

Precision Trimmer:

For styling of certain area you can use the precision trimmer which is similar to the full size trimmer but smaller in size.

 

Nose/Ear Hair Trimmer:

The nose/ear hair trimmer does exactly what it says. Nobody likes hair in those places anyways.

 

Body Groomer:

The body groomer is great for full body hair trimming especially for sensitive areas.

 

Foil Shaver:

The foil shaver gives you a nice smooth shave without worrying about cutting yourself as opposed to a traditional razor.

Comb Guides

We have also included 6 different size comb guides. These are great for stylish haircuts or beard grooming. "What happens if I lose one of the comb guides?" Don’t worry! As with the trimmer heads, we are making the comb guides also available for purchase separately.

100% Waterproof

Imaging having the perfect hair clipper but one accidental drop in the sink and it never works again. The Simba Clipper is 100% waterproof.

Carrying Case (Optional)

With all of these great accessories you need a good place to store them. That is why we have added an optional travel friendly carrying case. The case is made with artificial leather to make it look stylish. The case has a specific slot for the hair clipper and also for the interchangeable heads. It also has an internal pocket to store the charger and comb guides.

Social Media

 

Timeline of Events (tentative)

Our Team

 

What We Need & What You Get

Funds allocation for goal of $30,000:

  • Indiegogo platform fee: $1500
  • Indiegogo transaction fee: ~$1095 (based on 750 backers for $40 product)
  • Concept design: $2900
  • Concept development: $3100
  • Electronic hardware design and build: $5000
  • Initial prototype construction: $1200
  • Manufacture design and production quotes: $3200
  • Manufacture (750) units: $12,000

Perks:

  • Simba Clipper-Super Early Bird $40 (27% off): 1 x Simba Clipper, 5 x interchangeable heads, 6 x comb guides, and 1 x USB-C to USB charger
  • Simba Clipper-Early Bird $45 (18% off): 1 x Simba Clipper, 5 x interchangeable heads, 6 x comb guides, and 1 x USB-C to USB charger
  • Simba Clipper + Case-Super Early Bird $48 (26% off): 1 x Simba Clipper, 5 x interchangeable heads, 6 x comb guides, 1 x USB-C to USB charger, 1 x travel friendly case
  • Simba Clipper $50 (9% off): 1 x Simba Clipper, 5 x interchangeable heads, 6 x comb guides, and 1 x USB-C to USB charger
  • Simba Clipper + Case-Early Bird $54 (16% off): 1 x Simba Clipper, 5 x interchangeable heads, 6 x comb guides, 1 x USB-C to USB charger, 1 x travel friendly case
  • Simba Clipper + Case $60 (7% off): 1 x Simba Clipper, 5 x interchangeable heads, 6 x comb guides, 1 x USB-C to USB charger, 1 x travel friendly case
  • 5 x Simba Clippers $225 (18% off): 5 x Simba Clippers, 5 x 5 interchangeable heads, 5 x 6 comb guides, and 5 x USB-C to USB charger
  • 10 x Simba Clippers $425 (22% off): 10 x Simba Clippers, 10 x 5 interchangeable heads, 10 x 6 comb guides, and 10 x USB-C to USB charger
  • 20 x Simba Clippers $800 (27% off): 20 x Simba Clippers, 20 x 5 interchangeable heads, 20 x 6 comb guides, and 20 x USB-C to USB charger

This is a Fixed Funding project which means if the goal is not reached, all of the funds will be returned to those who contributed.

Risks & Challenges

Our product is in the design phase. We are currently communicating with manufacturers to produce a prototype. The actual product may look slightly different from the design shown but we will try to make it look exactly the same. There may also have to be some modification to the specifications although we do not intend to do so. These differences will only have to take place based on the limitations of the manufacturer. It is also possible that the limitations of the manufacturer may delay the actual production date.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share the campaign with your friends!
  • Go follow our social media!

And that's all there is to it.
