story:
MAXILLE

A modern take on modern brief shorts.

Your underwear says a lot about you.

When you want to look smart and not squeeze faces whenever you are dressed, this starts from what you wear inside, so you should give it your best shot.

Doubting if you can’t?

Now you can with

MAXILLE

Modest Underwear with Long-lasting impressions.

 

The wait is over; we've finally done it! We've revolutionized boxer shorts to put an end to chafe and skin irritation without sacrificing style. You no longer have to wear a single type of underwear for every kind of day-to-day activity. Let's face it, men, that's not good enough.

These underwear/shorts are divided into 3 models:

For sports as it is seamless with sweat absorption, wearable with leggings and marathons, and the likes.

Business line, because it has more space in front so you don't see your stuff when you wear a suit. It has a special sweat absorption at the rear so as to make sure you won't see any sweat, thereby keeping your stuff cool always).

Labor line, as prepared for people in uniform; police, military, mechanics, and so on.

We are here to offer the introductory package of MAXILLE underwear at 50EUR per pack and each pack will contain all the 3 models of the shorts as explained above. The money raised through the sales we make here will enough us to invest more into marketing and atelier, thereby enabling us to produce more in large quantity and be able to maintain our stance in the fashion market.

 

THE ULTIMATE MAXILLE UNDERWEAR

Throughout the years we've been bothered by the way men’s underwear looks and feels as it's not compatible with different types of situations.

These brief shorts were created for men to suit 3 different lifestyles/occasions and day-to-day activities.

The 3 models are:

Sports line: Seamless underwear, fit for compression pants, leggings, regular sports. Cooling materials with a streamlined fit on the body. Keeps your stuff in place and lowers the chance on injuries, and irritations

 

Business line: Special materials that are non-static under a woolen costume. There is more space up front. This is to ensure that when wearing a suit, not everything, especially your stuff, will be visible. There is also sweat absorption at the rear portion of the short, meant to suit the stressful moments (presentations, job interviews, first dates, meeting the family or when drinking too much coffee). Enough breathing space has been left out just in case if there will be any drops in front, the space will accommodate it and make it invisible on pantaloons.

 

Casual/Labor: Meant for men in uniform, labor clothing (Police, Engineers, Mechanics, Hobbyist, Plumbers, Militaries, Chefs, and so on), it is water repellent on the inside; sweat or other fluids would be absorbed by the underwear. Made from protective clothing materials, it will keep your stuff cool, with no irritation. On the back inside is a special seam to prevent ‘plumber cleavage’. This underwear is perfect for any active man that likes to get his hands dirty.

 

While you are here, this is the best time to cop yours at a discount, minimal and affordable cost.

We are selling an introductory offer of 5000 MAXILLE shorts at a special discount of 50EUR a pack, with each pack containing the 3 models of the brief shorts/underwear.

 

With the full funding of 210,000EUR, we will also be able to pay for the following:

  • Purchase of production materials and machineries
  • Renting/acquiring of workspace (an atelier)
  • Marketing costs
  • Hiring and paying of more staffs
  • Reward fulfillment
  • Indiegogo processing fees
  • Other miscellaneous and unforeseen costs

 

 

Success rate: In order to maintain proper pricing; there should be a minimum of orders. The lowest minimum that we could do while maintaining the same price would be 1000 packs (50,000), anything lower than that would bring us closer to lost, rather than profit.

Reach: We do have budget allocated to advertise our fundraising campaign. However, we are limited to that budget.

 

 

As with most crowdfunding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowdfunding experience. If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop.

 

In order to maintain a proper timeline, the moment between the first order and last order (before reaching the goal) will be as short as possible so that customers can maintain their interests and one bulk order can be processed at once in the factory.

 

In addition to supporting this project, you can also show your support by sharing the link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.

story:
Who we are:

PackPals is the first children's backpack that can be customized by allowing your child to interchange faces. After two and half years of beta testing, market research, and sourcing a responsible manufacturer; PackPals is ready to be introduced into the market with your help. 

How PackPals Work:

The question that started PackPals was "How can a children's backpacks last longer after purchase?" Children change their preferences constantly and their backpack should be able to do the same without losing quality or organizational options. Instead of buying a new backpack every year, PackPals' strategically placed velcro allows the user to switch between each style of face within minutes and doesn't hinder the user's ability to access the main compartment.

 

PackPals' Features and Benefits:

After listening to our focus groups and market research, we were led to this finalized design of PackPals. To start, families don't have to worry about their little ones taking PackPals on a dirty adventure because each face is machine washable and the backpack wipes clean. Also, their plush design provides comfort, joy, and friendship when the child needs it. Each PackPal comes with a birth certificate where a user gets to name their new friend, give them a birthdate, and list their name as the owner.

The quality backpack can withstand any trip due to it's structured front, sides, and bottom. This needed structure makes sure that their PackPal stands out and that the backpack sits up on its own. The main compartment has a high quality double pull zipper that makes accessing the backpack simple. Plus, the main compartment is large enough to fit any textbook, binder, and/or lunchbox.

Inside the backpack, the user has a name tag, large cushioned zipper compartment, an elastic water bottle holder, and a small item organizer. The large cushioned zipper compartment can be used to safely transport large electronics and the name tag allows the user to place their name inside the backpack. The elastic water bottle holder holds up to a 40oz bottle. Lastly, the small item organizer has a zippered pocket that can hold small items and multiple pencils. 

We are Transparent: What's in it for us and you?

With your help, we can finally make this new children's backpack a reality and start manufacturing once we reach our campaign goal. This campaign is a fixed goal, meaning we have to make our goal of $20,000 to start production. In addition to this, if we do not hit our fixed goal once our campaign is over; all contributions will be returned immediately. To learn more about what Indiegogo defines a fixed goal, follow this link. 

By contributing to our campaign, you are one of the early adopters of a new generation of children backpacks. Not only this, but you will receive a high quality backpack designed around a child's daily routine that can be trusted on any adventure.

What's Next? Three faces is just the beginning...

By late 2021, PackPals would be able to launch additional faces that are currently in the development stage. With your support, we are working to expand the current collection by another three favorites and to secure exclusive licensing deals with companies such as; Disney and Marvel. The next three faces we release in 2021 will be up to you! Vote Now!

We Want to Hear From You:

Your voice is important to us! There are multiple ways you can reach us:
 
1. Vote on the next PackPals
2. Contact Us
 

Our line of communication is always open. Please reach out to us anytime through our social media pages or our email.

Let's Do This!

Be a part of a new revolution of children's backpacks; where we demand more from children's backpacks. Even if you can't contribute by purchasing one of our backpacks, sharing our campaign and brand on any social media platform is extremely appreciated. Please use Indiegogo's share tools to spread our message and ignite the children's backpack revolution!

story:
GRYP was birthed out of our disappointment in the conventional anti-slip solutions for eyewear. They were painful and fragile. But, we couldn't deny the importance of having help to keep your spectacles firmly on your face. 
 
 
 
This also becomes a possibility of germs entering your body through your eyes, nose and face.
 
 
 

We want to give you one less reason to reach for your face

 
 

 

Choosing the right GRYP for your spectacles


 

If your temple tips fall somewhere in the middle, not quite too small or large, we recommend getting a small! This is because our GRYPs are extremely durable and elastic. Even our small GRYPs are able to stretch wider than the given specifications. 


Small GRYP with a medium-sized temple tip

Look at our small size stretch!

But if you have any questions, feel free to shoot us an email at contact@wearegryp.com, and we'll gladly help figure things out with you!

 

Simply wash it regularly (along with the temple tips of your spectacles!) with some tap water and soap. Use our Indiegogo exclusive mini cleaning brush to give your GRYPs a good clean.

 
 
Urband International is an eyewear company founded by Mr Yang Wah Kiang. He has been in the eyewear industry for almost 60 years, starting off when he was only 14 years old. After setting up a successful optical retail chain in Singapore, he felt the need to dive into research and development. After witnessing spectacle frames that couldn't keep up with the daily wear and tear, he came up with his own line of frames, Urband. From there Urband International now boasts three brands: 
 
 
Urband International aims to continually create innovative eyewear solutions for everyone. It might be our first foray in the Indiegogo world, but we'd like to assure you that we have had years of experience designing, manufacturing and producing excellent eyewear solutions to optical shops all over the world. 
 
These are some of the awards we've collected over the years.

 

We are already ready for production!

All we need is you. Our factory for production and our shipping and fulfilment centre are both ready and rearing to go. 

Shipping Details
GRYPs are ready to be shipped worldwide. Depending on your country, you may be responsible for paying for customs, duties, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information. If the customs/duties are not paid and the shipment is returned to us, you will be refunded, minus the shipping cost.


Our team has years of experience manufacturing premium eyewear with very strict quality control inspections. However, in the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit. GRYPs are thoroughly cleaned and sealed prior to packaging, so we are not able to re-sell pairs after the package has been opened. For this reason, we are unable to offer refunds once the pairs have been opened. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at contact@wearegryp.com.

story:
NobleSole makes Italian leather sneakers designed to look like dress shoes so you can mix business with pleasure.

By combining dress shoe elegance with sneaker functionality we have created a sneaker you can wear to your next board meeting and actually get away with it!  

Because our shoes are designed for both work and play you can easily transition from work to play. For this reason we've taken care to ensure they are great looking, super comfortable and of the highest quality.

2 years ago we launched our original Sneaker Disguised as a Dress shoe on Kickstarter and validated our new approach to men's footwear. Last year we expanded the collection to offer more variety and versatility. This year we're introducing 2 new styles and reinvigorating some of our most popular shoes with new colours and textures.

As seen in:

 

 

The new additions to our covert sneaker collection include a business friendly penny loafer and the classic Americana Tassel loafer. In addition, we have reinvigorated our popular oxford, brogue and chelsea styles with new textures and colours. As always, we took care to ensure these shoes are dressy enough to wear with a suit but wear just like a sneaker. 

 

 

 

A timeless classic that goes with everything from your business suit to smart casual and leisure clothing. This shoe is best-worn with a navy blazer, khakis and a knit tie.

Frequent travellers will love the slip-on/slip-off ease of our penny loafer as navigating airport security becomes a breeze. 

 

 

 

For this new style we've taken a piece of classic Americana and converted it into sneaker form. The epitome of casual elegance, the tasseled loafer is considered a business classic amongst bankers and stock brokers but just as easily transitions into a smart weekend look. 

 

 

The quintessential business shoe, the cap toe oxford has long been the most formal shoe to wear with a suit. We've adapted this classic business shoe into sneaker form to give you boardroom style without the aches and pains of traditional dress shoes. 

 

What's new?

Black Pebbled: We've added a supple pebbled leather to the black oxford to give the shoe a bit of texture when seen up close. In addition, the pebbled leather makes the shoes softer and more comfortable as the pebbling process breaks in the leather considerably.

Dark Brown: In the spirit of comfort, we've added suede to the brown oxford. Again, this adds visual texture to the shoe as well as enhances comfort due to the suede's softness. 

Mahogany: Due to popular demand, we're releasing an oxford in a beautiful mahogany/ oxblood colour. This is easily our favourite shoe colour due to its sheer versatility. It is stunning with navy or charcoal suits and even looks great with black suits.

 

Patent leather: Traditionally patent leather is the evening version of the black business shoe and therefore reserved for black tie events.  But we also like to wear them with stylishly torn jeans and a black leather jacket in our down time.

 

 

A classic daytime shoe that owes much of its popularity to the fact it goes as well with a suit as it does a pair of jeans. We've added our signature low profile sole to strike the perfect balance between classic and modern. Now you can finally replace that stiff pair of brogues sitting at the back of your closet!

What's new?

Black Pebbled:  Just like the oxford, we've added pebbled leather to the mid-foot of the shoe to give it a refined texture. 

Tan & Noble Blue Suede:   We've paired our rich tan leather with a deep blue suede to create another stunning 2-tone shoe for those who like a bold statement.

Espresso:  The classic workhorse shoe, we've brought back our brown wingtip due to popular demand.

 

Noble Blue:   For those that want something a little different than the average, we've added the possibility to unlock a stunning blue version of our wingtip. Best worn with light grey suits and tans.

 

 

We've taken care to create a truly elegant sneaker version of a chelsea boot.  The wide elastic goring on the sides makes this boot a breeze to slip on and of. And with its sleek tapered toe and low profile sole the Chelsea boot will easily take to you to office, home and beyond.

 

 

What good is a great pair of shoes if you can't find a matching belt?  We've made it easy for you to get you hands on that all too elusive matching belt by partnering with small belt-making workshop located close to where our shoes are made in Portugal.

 All belts come in one length and can easily be trimmed to the perfect length by yourself or your local cobbler. If you want to DIY, we've prepared a short guide here.

We created our shoes as an alternative to the discomfort of traditional business shoes.

Good quality dress shoes are pretty heavy duty in their construction but the downside is they hurt your feet and take a long time to break in. Rather than use these traditional construction techniques we have opted for modern strobel construction which results in a lighter and more flexible shoe.

Lastly, we have done away with old fashioned elevated heel. Dress shoes typically have 2.5 cm (1 inch) heel which throws off your body's natural alignment and can cause back and joint pain.  Our shoes have a 5mm (0.2 inch) drop from heel to forefoot so you can walk naturally and pain free.

We're confident that once you step into our shoes you will never wear another pair of old fashioned dress shoes. But forget what we say. Here is some of the great things other people are saying about our shoes:

 

 

We have designed our shoes to be versatile. So versatile that you can step into the office Monday morning ready for business and step out Friday evening ready for the weekend without even changing your shoes.

 

With a shoe that performs double duty it just got easier to pack efficiently and still be prepared for anything. No more wasting precious space in your luggage thanks to multiple pairs of shoes. Now you can skip the long wait at the baggage carousel and get right down to business.

All of our shoes come fully equipped with removable full length insoles that will mould to the shape of your foot over time.

If you require an orthotic our insoles easily slide out so you can comfortably wear the shoe without compromising your health or safety. No more sizing up or praying the shoe will stretch enough to be comfortable.

Where its made

We have carefully selected a naturally finished calf leather for the shoe uppers.  And for the inside of the shoe we use a soft yet durable vachetta lining. This combination of soft leathers, classic dress shoe styling and comfortable sneaker construction creates a shoe that will be one of the most comfortable shoes you will ever own. 

We use leather sourced from one of the best Italian tanneries and the shoes are manufactured by an artisanal, family-owned factory in Portugal's shoe capital. Check out the video below to see the factory in action.

 

 

 Our shoes are sized according to the Euro scale. If you're not familiar with Euro sizing please refer to the chart below. 

Notes on sizing:

Our shoes fit true to size and come in full sizes only. 

If you normally wear a half size (ie. 10.5 US) please round up. 

If you have a narrow foot please size down. 

If you have a wide foot, please size up.

If your foot is EEE or wider we unfortunately do not have a solution for you at this time. We are working on one though!

If using another shoe as a size reference, please use your dress shoe size instead of your sneaker size.

 

Risks and challenges

WE'VE DONE THIS BEFORE - We know to get the shoes made properly and on time. Our last campaign encountered a few challenges that we learned from and have applied those lessons to this campaign.

QUALITY - We are working with one of the top footwear manufacturers in Portugal. We have chosen premium leathers and components for our shoes.

SURVEY - We opted for IndieGoGo this time around as a way to skip the extremely time consuming survey stage. This will help you receive your shoes sooner.

Because backers can select the model, size and colour when placing your pledge we can send the order to the factory as soon as the campaign is over! 

RETURNS - If you receive the wrong size or colour, you have 30 days to exchange the shoes. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. The packing slip will have a customer support email address.

If, once you receive your shoes, you wish to change the size/colour, there is a $15 fee to cover us shipping you a new pair. Just fill out the exchange form included with your shipment and ship your shoes back to the address indicated on the exchange form. All exchanges must be made within 30 days of receiving your shoes. Exchanges cannot be processed after 30 days of receipt.

Patent leather: Traditionally patent leather is the evening version of the black business shoe and therefore reserved for black tie events.  But we also like to wear them with stylishly torn jeans and a black leather jacket in our down time.
 

 
A classic daytime shoe that owes much of its popularity to the fact it goes as well with a suit as it does a pair of jeans. We've added our signature low profile sole to strike the perfect balance between classic and modern. Now you can finally replace that stiff pair of brogues sitting at the back of your closet!

What's new?
Black Pebbled:  Just like the oxford, we've added pebbled leather to the mid-foot of the shoe to give it a refined texture. 
Tan & Noble Blue Suede:   We've paired our rich tan leather with a deep blue suede to create another stunning 2-tone shoe for those who like a bold statement.

Espresso:  The classic workhorse shoe, we've brought back our brown wingtip due to popular demand.

 
Noble Blue:   For those that want something a little different than the average, we've added the possibility to unlock a stunning blue version of our wingtip. Best worn with light grey suits and tans.
 

 
We've taken care to create a truly elegant sneaker version of a chelsea boot.  The wide elastic goring on the sides makes this boot a breeze to slip on and of. And with its sleek tapered toe and low profile sole the Chelsea boot will easily take to you to office, home and beyond.


 

 
What good is a great pair of shoes if you can't find a matching belt?  We've made it easy for you to get you hands on that all too elusive matching belt by partnering with small belt-making workshop located close to where our shoes are made in Portugal.
 All belts come in one length and can easily be trimmed to the perfect length by yourself or your local cobbler. If you want to DIY, we've prepared a short guide here.

We created our shoes as an alternative to the discomfort of traditional business shoes.
Good quality dress shoes are pretty heavy duty in their construction but the downside is they hurt your feet and take a long time to break in. Rather than use these traditional construction techniques we have opted for modern strobel construction which results in a lighter and more flexible shoe.

Lastly, we have done away with old fashioned elevated heel. Dress shoes typically have 2.5 cm (1 inch) heel which throws off your body's natural alignment and can cause back and joint pain.  Our shoes have a 5mm (0.2 inch) drop from heel to forefoot so you can walk naturally and pain free.

We're confident that once you step into our shoes you will never wear another pair of old fashioned dress shoes. But forget what we say. Here is some of the great things other people are saying about our shoes:
 
 

We have designed our shoes to be versatile. So versatile that you can step into the office Monday morning ready for business and step out Friday evening ready for the weekend without even changing your shoes.
 




With a shoe that performs double duty it just got easier to pack efficiently and still be prepared for anything. No more wasting precious space in your luggage thanks to multiple pairs of shoes. Now you can skip the long wait at the baggage carousel and get right down to business.


All of our shoes come fully equipped with removable full length insoles that will mould to the shape of your foot over time.

If you require an orthotic our insoles easily slide out so you can comfortably wear the shoe without compromising your health or safety. No more sizing up or praying the shoe will stretch enough to be comfortable.
Where its made
We have carefully selected a naturally finished calf leather for the shoe uppers.  And for the inside of the shoe we use a soft yet durable vachetta lining. This combination of soft leathers, classic dress shoe styling and comfortable sneaker construction creates a shoe that will be one of the most comfortable shoes you will ever own. 
We use leather sourced from one of the best Italian tanneries and the shoes are manufactured by an artisanal, family-owned factory in Portugal's shoe capital. Check out the video below to see the factory in action.
 

 



 Our shoes are sized according to the Euro scale. If you're not familiar with Euro sizing please refer to the chart below. 
Notes on sizing:
Our shoes fit true to size and come in full sizes only. 
If you normally wear a half size (ie. 10.5 US) please round up. 
If you have a narrow foot please size down. 
If you have a wide foot, please size up.
If your foot is EEE or wider we unfortunately do not have a solution for you at this time. We are working on one though!
If using another shoe as a size reference, please use your dress shoe size instead of your sneaker size.
 
Risks and challenges
WE'VE DONE THIS BEFORE - We know to get the shoes made properly and on time. Our last campaign encountered a few challenges that we learned from and have applied those lessons to this campaign.
QUALITY - We are working with one of the top footwear manufacturers in Portugal. We have chosen premium leathers and components for our shoes.
SURVEY - We opted for IndieGoGo this time around as a way to skip the extremely time consuming survey stage. This will help you receive your shoes sooner.
Because backers can select the model, size and colour when placing your pledge we can send the order to the factory as soon as the campaign is over! 
RETURNS - If you receive the wrong size or colour, you have 30 days to exchange the shoes. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. The packing slip will have a customer support email address.
If, once you receive your shoes, you wish to change the size/colour, there is a $15 fee to cover us shipping you a new pair. Just fill out the exchange form included with your shipment and ship your shoes back to the address indicated on the exchange form. All exchanges must be made within 30 days of receiving your shoes. Exchanges cannot be processed after 30 days of receipt.

story:
Our prototype hoodies are a huge success. Folks rave about the odor-absorbing power of our patent-pending SkunkPocket.
 

Strain Apparel is a new cannabis lifestyle brand that offers patented odor-absorbing pockets with a positive, yet discreet, celebration of the cannabis strains we all know and love. Founded in Northern California by Fred Segal design veteran, Jeff Callison and his wife Sian, Strain Apparel is a start-up company with big ideas for the cannabis apparel industry.

With your support, we can solve two fundamental problems for cannabis enthusiasts and patients:

1. Smelly pockets will attract unwanted attention.
Who has been stuck in line at the coffee shop… or the bank… or maybe even pulled over by you-know-who, with a smelly cloud of funky deliciousness surrounding your personal space? As lovely as your skunk smells, attracting unwanted attention can be a problem. This is why SkunkPocket was invented. Strain Apparel lets you take your funkiest skunk anywhere, without the glorious odors.

2. Cannabis has a branding opportunity.
“Look as good as you feel!”  We see a great opportunity to use fashion and apparel as a positive branding tool for cannabis. Our grand vision is to offer everyone a positive and stylish clothing option for representing the strains we each know and love. 

“We are passionate about creating positive fashion choices for cannabis lovers and patients. Cannabis is not just for the non-conformist any longer. We dream of giving everyday folks an option to represent their love of cannabis in their own personal style.” -Jeff Callison, CEO
 

Pre-Order today & receive $30 Off, plus a FREE Sour Diesel T-Shirt!

For our first prototype run we manufactured 88 perfectly amazing hoodies with SkunkPockets.  Because the special fabrics we use can reach upward of $80 per yard, they were not cost effective. We need to manufacture a minimum of 500 pieces to achieve a price point that makes sense for us, and most importantly, our customers.

 

What you get!

  • Flawlessly designed unisex full zipper or pull-over hoodie constructed with incredibly soft eco-fleece fabrics with ribbed hembands and sleeve cuffs.
  • SkunkPocket: our odor-absorbing pockets are built with a washable, carbon activated material that is thin, soft and durable.
  • A hoodie with couch-lock comfort.
     

Size Chart



 

Sustainability works.



Our partners proudly hold social and environmental sustainability as a core value. By purchasing from a fabric-first company, you aren’t just getting a finished product. You’re investing in every stage of its life cycle, including the materials and processes used to make it.

 

Strain Apparel does not advocate or offer anything illegal. Our clothing articles cannot enhance or facilitate the consumption of any controlled substance. We believe anything pertaining or related to cannabis/hemp should operate in respect to, and within the restraints of State law.

story:
JON & TRACY

After a year of idea and preparation, Jon & Tracy is finally launched. We would like to develop a watch brand that sells premium quality watches with classic design at a reasonable price. And we would like to kick start our brand on Indiegogo first. It is definitely a most important moment and milestone of Jon & Tracy. We hope all of you would like our watches. Here we go:

 

If you are first time to Indiegogo?

No worries.

Step 1: Click "GET THIS PERK"
Step 2: Select your item
Step 3: Continue to payment
Step 4: Your watch will be shipped in Sep 2017

 

Jon & Tracy Small Second Collection

Silver Classic Series, can be matched with black or brown watch strap

Silver Classic Series, with size 36 mm and 39 mm available

Rose Gold Classic Series, can be matched with black or brown watch strap

Rose Gold Classic Series, with size 36 mm and 39 mm available

Silver Vintage Series, can be matched with black or brown watch strap

Silver Vintage Series, with size 36 mm and 39 mm available

Rose Gold Vintage Series, can be matched with black or brown watch strap

Rose Gold Vintage Series, with size 36 mm and 39 mm available

 

Specification

A good watch is not only with its own design, but also with premium components. The craftsmanship of the factory is good and they have 2 decades of experiences in making watches  The components and samples are all quality reviewed and controlled by the factory and us. We are satisfy with their products. Let's take a look of our spec.:

 

Timeline

We are free shipping worldwide. And the watches will be quality controlled & reviewed. And the watches is going to produce and will be shipped in Sep 2017. We will keep you up to date information. Also, you are welcome to contact us if you have any questions.

 

Warranty

We provide 2 years international warranty. Proof of purchase is required for all warranty claims and service requests, so please keep your order records.

 

Why Jon & Tracy is better for you?

 

We need your support and Let's make it happen

Hi, we are Jon & Tracy, you should have seen us on the video above. We are a new start company aim to create a classic and minimalist watch with premium spec. and sell at an affordable price. A watch that is not only for time, but also durable, easy to mix and match with your fashion and suitable for many occasions. However, nothing will be easy at the beginning due to our limited budget and lack of popularity. After many discussions and amendments of the products with the manufacturer, and the sample we received, we are confident that our backers must like this watch. Jon & Tracy has its own details. Regarding the watch scale on dial, the blue, silver and rose gold colour is just perfectly plated. Also, the hands are well polished. Combine with sapphire crystal glass and its high transparency, the watch looks very clear and clean. No matter you are at out/indoor, the light is just well refracted. We will continue to build up this brand and this campaign is definitely an important moment and milestone to us. It will be a brand achieved by all backers and us. Let's make it happen! Thanks for your support of Jon & Tracy.

 

Website & Social Media

Facebook share: Jon & Tracy on Indiegogo

Facebook: jonandtracy.co

Instagram: jonandtracy.co

If you like us, please share this campaign on the Facebook. It is a huge help for us. Thank you.

story:
Hello, my name is Pierre, and I am the founder of Chronos touch

I established Chronos touch in October 2017

As the youngest out of four children, I was always told what I would need to do in order to get by in life, which was finish school, get a nice job, and get married, and most people with my mindset, didn’t want to follow the same social norms that have been taught to my older siblings, so, I needed to branch out

I got into entrepreneurship because the possibilities for advancement are endless!! the amount of money you make is completely up to you, plus, who wouldn’t want the possibility to retire 30 years before you would if you had a regular 9-5!! I'm just saying! sounds like a pretty awesome idea heard it

I made this watch in order to embody my creativity, from the aluminum watch face to the logo on the clasp, This watch is giving you all a tour into my life and aspirations! This brand is going to be a game changer because people like you can send us submissions in to have a watch designed specifically by you!! yupp I said by YOU!! Contests will start readily soon to pick the best design for our exclusive collections and we can't wait to see what you come up with!!

If you like what I’m setting out on the table then please become a contributor and back my Indiegogo page. You can also give us a like on our Facebook Page name: Chronos Touch, or follow us on Instagram @chronostouch and receive 25% off your first order.Thanks for watching now let’s make our story

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking for $20,000 which will go to the advancement of legalizing my company and upgrading the current collection, and the production for my new deity collection. If you become a contributor and spend at least $15 dollars you will receive a custom zodiac bracelet with your own astrology sign. $100 or more will get you your own watch from our current Prometheus collection. If i don't reach my goal, the funds will go towards the company.

The Impact

Watches have always been a status symbol throughout the world and we can all agree based on the watch you wear it helps explain your story. This is what i want this brand to achieve a story for anyone in any social status, any walk of life, because as a person who has always been in the best financial situations, i would still value my creativity and presence to shine better to anyone who doesn't know me.

Risks & Challenges

I'm honestly have risked everything to make this brand come to life. I currently am unemployed and my last bit of money has went into this production. So i will use all social media and local media to help grow this watch company into an empire.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's totally fine!!

I would appreciate you liking our Facebook Page: Chronos Touch

also follow us on Instagram at @chronostouch

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for the support

story:
MonoMey Studio

MonoMey Studio is all about HANDMADE crochet items, craft supplies and DIY projects. Now it has been two years I am expressing my self by making various handmade products. It is incredibly satisfying to know you made something with creative touches that is unique.

New ideas of using Macrame Cord

There was a day when I needed big storage baskets for storing my baby girl's toys. I could not find anything what I wanted. I started looking for craft suppliers that I could use to make my own baskets. This is when I found the fabulous, resistant, LONG LASTING, HIGH QUALITY and COLORFUL macrame cord. I knew how to crochet so I tried using this NEW product. And I was stunned how great the items came out with this macrame cord. 

New collection

It took almost one year to make the designs and the fabulous items. The new collection includes 10 handmade crochet tote bags and one fabulous back pack. The result speaks for itself.

E-book of Crochet Patterns

All items I am creating are handmade and it takes time and patience to make them. As crocheting is my hobby I am having limited time to make the unique products. Because of that I have to say more and more times "NO" to the ones that love and want the items I am creating. What is more, I wanted to share the work I am doing. This is how the idea of creating the crochet pattern designs came to the world. This is the way how more and more people can be involved in creating handmade items for themselves and for the loved ones. I hope these patterns will INSPIRE you too to make DIY projects.

Extra to the E-Book - a Back Pack pattern

In addition to the new tote bag collection I also wanted to make something additional. At the same time I needed a back pack for my long walks in the park with my baby girl. This is how the idea of a handmade crochet back pack came to the world. All items I am creating are being used everyday. I do believe that items people are creating by them selves or handmade items are VALUED MORE THAN MASS PRODUCTION. By creating handmade products and encouraging to do the same others I hope to increase the consciousness regarding CONSUMER SOCIETY ISSUES. 

Craft supplies - Macrame Cord

MonoMey Studio is all about Macrame cord. It is exceptional as it is high quality and colorful. I am offering almost 100 colors. All projects are made either with 3 mm or 6 mm polyester cord. You can also make your own tote bag or a back pack by following the crochet pattern instructions. In this campaign I am offering only some of the colors. However if you prefer other colors, please contact me and I will send you the colors you prefer.

Handmade Tote Bags - only 30 available!!

In this campaign I am also offering handmade, stylish and unique tote bags. The totes will be made and sent to you till April of 2019. I can make the tote with any color macrame cord you prefer. If you want different color, please contact me and we will find the best color you prefer.

Thank You!

I want to say big thanks firstly for my family for giving me the time to express myself through the hobby I love. I BELIEVE in this project and I know that if you put your trust in me I will not let you down! This project will lead me from the hobby level to day to day business. I am saying BIG THANKS for all those who supports this project.

One more help that would be appreciated -  by SHARING this project with your friends!

story:
Short Summary

At Safe Watch Global we believe in protecting our loved ones, friends and work colleagues. Whether you are at home, work or out with friends we have designed a product that is useful in everyday life with the capability to protect someone at the press of a button. In a time of need, the people who are closest to you are the people who will respond the quickest. 


Our wearable smartwatch called “Wihkum” is a third generation watch that has been tested for the last 12 months. This watch has been upgraded dramatically from the 1st gen watch. Not only is it a watch that allows the user to download their favorite apps via the Google Play Store, it can make phone calls, play music, take and store photos, send messages, read emails, access social media, maps and search the internet without the need of carrying your mobile phone. 

             

Most importantly, it also has a built in safety application. If you are in trouble or think you are in trouble, at the press of a button the phone will locate the closest person to you from your contact list and dial their number automatically so that you can talk to them straight away. As a backup, the watch will also text a pre-written message and a link to your current GPS Coordinates to 10 other numbers from your contacts via SMS. It will continue to stream your GPS co-ordinates until help arrives. Your contacts will be able to access the link to get a map of your location.

At a time of trouble or in a panic situation most people are unable to remember numbers, names or locations. At the press of a button, our built in safety application does all this for you. While wearing this device, there is no need to have your mobile phone nearby. 

Our campaign will allow us to accelerate the design and manufacture, of fashionable safety products in the near future. The campaign will are also allow us to make changes to the hardware that will allow the users to call for help at the press of the bottom button,  instead of activating the phone and then activating the application.  This saves valuable time and is easy to operate in a panic situation.


By raising the fixed amount through our campaign, it will make our first batch run economical to manufacture in bulk. Our unlocked smart watches do not come with a micro sim card. It is the purchasers responsibility to obtain their own sim card. The retail price of the smart watches after this campaign will be AUD $480. Membership to the Safe Watch Global service will be AUD $10 per annum. First run watches will come in a silver or black colour. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute cash to our campaign we would love you to message your friends, loved ones or work collegues about our product via Facebook or twitter. It might just save their life one day. 

 https://www.facebook.com/safewatchglobal

https://twitter.com/safewatchglobal

https://youtu.be/9QFOmTPvfOg
story_txt:
Short Summary
 

At Safe Watch Global we believe in protecting our
loved ones, friends and work colleagues. Whether you are at home, work or out
with friends we have designed a product that is useful in everyday life with
the capability to protect someone at the press of a button. In a time of need,
the people who are closest to you are the people who will respond the quickest. 

Our wearable smartwatch called “Wihkum” is a third
generation watch that has been tested for the last 12 months. This watch has
been upgraded dramatically from the 1st gen watch. Not only is it a
watch that allows the user to download their favorite apps via the Google Play
Store, it can make phone calls, play music, take and store photos, send
messages, read emails, access social media, maps and search the internet
without the need of carrying your mobile phone. 




             

Most importantly, it also has a built in safety
application. If you are in trouble or think you are in trouble, at the press of
a button the phone will locate the closest person to you from your contact list
and dial their number automatically so that you can talk to them straight away.
As a backup, the watch will also text a pre-written message and a link to your
current GPS Coordinates to 10 other numbers from your contacts via SMS. It will
continue to stream your GPS co-ordinates until help arrives. Your contacts
will be able to access the link to get a map of your location.


At a time of trouble or in a panic situation most
people are unable to remember numbers, names or locations. At the press of a
button, our built in safety application does all this for you. While wearing
this device, there is no need to have your mobile phone nearby. Our campaign will allow us to accelerate the design and manufacture, of
fashionable safety products in the near future. The campaign will are also allow
us to make changes to the hardware that will allow the users to call for help
at the press of the bottom button,  instead of activating the phone and then
activating the application.  This saves
valuable time and is easy to operate in a panic situation.




    
By raising the fixed amount through our campaign, it will make our first batch run economical to manufacture in bulk. Our unlocked smart watches do not come with a micro sim card. It is the purchasers responsibility to obtain their own sim card. The retail price of the smart watches after this campaign will be AUD $480. Membership to the Safe Watch Global service will be AUD $10 per annum. First run watches will come in a silver or black colour. 


 
 
 
 
Other Ways You Can Help

 If you cannot contribute cash to our campaign we would love you to message your friends, loved ones or work collegues about our product via Facebook or twitter. It might just save their life one day. 
 https://www.facebook.com/safewatchglobal
https://twitter.com/safewatchglobal
https://youtu.be/9QFOmTPvfOg

story:
Summary of Our Project - RoyalOctober Watches

Hello Everyone!


We are a bunch of closely-knitted friends who shares a common interest in classic timepieces. And here is our story:


When we were much younger, we used to do window shopping of watch stores, telling each other, "One day, I'm going to buy that". Even till today, most of those classic pieces still sits in those windows. As we grew older, we found out that such watches are exorbitantly expensive and almost unreachable towards the masses. Heartbroken and desperate, we were determined to search for a classic watch that is both attractive and affordable.


After months and years of 'window shopping', we did came across a few but ultimately decided to come up with our own. We aimed for that impossible balance between affordability, daily usability and sophisticated beauty. A watch that one could take to the beach as well as a formal dinner event.

 


Impossible? Not at RoyalOctober. We are a dedicated and passionate team that will strive to provide and solve the impossible.




Why RoyalOctober?

RoyalOctober is about our friendship and how we value people around us.

Royal

Royalty as we know, can only be passed on. Many of us dreamed and thought of what is it like to be a King, Queen, Prince or Princess. They receive the best things life has to offer. We want you to feel the same, to get the best. Thus, we placed the word 'Royal' in front, prioritizing the importance of how we treat our customers and our immense dedication to quality.

October

Our current watch face design was inspired by a teen when he was drawing two clocks, drawing the smaller one on top of the other. He was talented and also had a flair for drawing clocks. However, he diagnosed with cerebral palsy at the tender age of 3. This prompted us to take his design and make a watch to celebrate World Cerebral Palsy Day, which falls in the month of October.

50% of all profits will be donated to Cerebral Palsy foundations spread across the world.

Its a unique brand name consisting of two different yet important aspects. As much as we'd like for it, we felt that wearing another person's name on our wrist does not say much about the dedication to quality.


What We Need & What You Get

100% of the funding received will go directly into the cost of materials for the watch, labor costs and marketing/advertising costs. We plan to further create a better overall experience when purchasing a RoyalOctober timepiece. We will also consistently improve our products line-up and provide excellent after-sales support. In fact, we are extremely confident of our products that we will give a one-year warranty to all timepieces and do a one-for-one exchange if found defected.  

Our watches have a distinct touch that separates itself from other competitors. Although affordable, we have not sacrificed quality. We designed our watches to feel and look elegant. 

The Roman numeric XII marker at the 12 o'clock position signifies our beliefs in the important values of history and heritage. The remaining hour markers are individually placed and not imprinted on, thus providing a more rich and dimensional visual effect.

To further keep track of time, a minute repeater is placed at the 6 o'clock position. The minute repeater was implemented as we felt that an overlapping and ticking second-hand against the dial did not portray a smooth finish.


RoyalOctober is all about stirring up the emotions.
Perfect on any day, any occasion, at any time.



  • We chose the less subtle polished rose gold and silver cases as they are non-restrictive and the best at showing its true value.
  • Entire watch case is made with 316L stainless steel to give you rust-free assurance. Most watches only provide a stainless steel back to cut cost at the expense of quality and reliability.
  • Each case is 40mm in diameter. Wide enough to provide a clear display yet gentle on the eyes. Perfect for any gender or wrist size. 
  • The Swiss-Made Ronda movement is used as it is one of the most reliable and well-produced movement. We could go with a Japanese movement but it does not provide that refined Swiss Quality experience we all seek. 
  • A scratch resistance sapphire glass provides necessary protection at the most crucial area, yet glorifying the watch face with sophistication.

Our watches comes in 3 face colors:

Gold & Gold. Slightly softened with rosy hints to give out a gentle appeal.

 

Silver & Blue. Handsome & Edgy. Brings out the confidence and cool factor.

 
Silver & Pink. Pretty & Sweet. First of its kind and bound to create sparkles.


The Perks

6 different options to choose from. Comes with packaging and prices includes shipping charges.


Specifications

Your contributions means the world to us. Each of our watches are made with the highest of quality using only the best of the best. 

Entire Case: 316L Stainless Steel
Movement: Swiss-Made Ronda 1069
Glass: Sapphire Crystal
Water Resistance: 3 ATM (30m)
Straps: Genuine Leather
Dimensions: 40mm Diameter, 20mm Lug Width, 6.9mm Thickness

Each watch is strictly tested and thoroughly inspected before leaving the assembly plant. Upon receiving, we will check and ensure that each watch meets our high standards. We will then again, personally conduct a third round inspection to make sure that each watch which leave our hands is in pristine and perfect conditions.


Silver (Pink Hands) w/ White Leather Strap



Silver (Pink Hands) w/ Black Leather Strap


Silver (Blue Hands) w/ Black Leather Strap


Silver (Blue Hands) w/ Brown Leather Strap


  Rose Gold w/ Black Leather Strap


  Rose Gold w/ Tan Leather Strap



Shipping

We are excited to announce that we will ship worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Prices stated includes shipping charges. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes that are applicable to your region. First batch of watches estimated to be shipped between January and early February.

Warranty

Each watch comes with a limited one-year warranty from date of delivery. A one-time, one-for-one exchange will be done if found to be defected.

Stretch Goals

$25,000 - Perlon Straps!

Once unlocked, we will give one additional matching Perlon strap to each watch!
Perlon straps suits any occasion - formal to casual, workdays to weekends, ballroom to beaches, suits to shorts. You call the shots!



Project Timeline


Please Support Us!

If you are unable to contribute, fret not! We value your support! Kindly follow and like us on your favorite social media! We will constantly provide updates!

  • Facebook - RoyalOctober Watches
  • Instagram - royaloctoberwatches

And from us at RoyalOctober Watches, Thank You for your support!

story:
What's this campaign about?

Concept Monsters is a new team of fashion and design enthusiasts. We are passionate about designing quality products at the most affordable prices.

We are very excited to introduce to you all of our latest and most innovative designs made from the best materials.

So, you can be sure every pair of our versatile sunglasses you receive will not only look good on you but also protect your eyes. So grab a pair, two, or more to wear while walking down the street, playing volleyball at the beach, skiing, or going to Sunday brunch.

What We Need & What You Get

Let’s face it, a pair of high quality sunglasses comes at a price. What about 12 pairs? It’ll probably cost a bomb! What if we can deliver those pairs of high quality sunglasses to you at a price everyone can afford.

Yes everyone! And we are not referring to those $5 items you can buy at the gift shop.

That’s what we hope to achieve with Concept Monsters.

By providing exclusive membership package, members will receive a new pair of sunglasses every month. With a multitude of choices and colors!

We need your support. Come join our team and invest in our vision and bring our concept to fruition.

Get our Early Bird Special Indiegogo launch package now!

The Impact

As a member of our team, you'll get updates for life and can even get a chance to participate in our design process! You’ll also get regular updates for special members’ only discounts, promotions and free gifts!

Risks & Challenges

We'll be honest. The tooling and manufacturing cost for such a wide variety of designs and materials isn't cheap. No sir! But we are confident that by becoming part of our team with your investment in our concept, we can achieve this dream together! Let's do it!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand you may not be able to invest your hard earned money. But you can still help by:

  • Getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

More designs for you! And there'll be more coming!

story:
About Waveworks

Waveworks is an innovative high-tech microelectronics start-up that targets to design communication, consumer and medical products for various markets. Highly skilled unique teams of engineers design many novel products ranging from high performance microchips to wearable and IoT devices for global markets. Being incorporated in SoCal in 2008, the company values diversity and innovation in an effort to keep competitive edge in technology here in California. Visit www.waveworksinc.com for more information.

What is Diamodo?

Diamodo is a completely new social network tool that adds jewelry for communicating with your family and friends. Your jewelry will light up when you receive a ping from your Diamodo contacts or a call or notification.

What makes it distinct from other wearable technologies?

Diamodo is handcrafted jewelry and has many special features. Wireless power transfer functionality, LED based illumination technology all merged with various types and colors of gemstones from distinct corners of the world.

How does Diamodo work?

Diamodo connects you with your loved ones.When the loved ones receive the gift from you, they first download the free IOS or Android app, and connect to their jewelry using their existing mobile device; cell-phone or tablet. 

What is the Diamodo stone made of?

Row rocks from mines in many countries such as India and Tanzania flow into gems headquarter of the world; Bangkok for cutting and polishing.

What are the materials of the ring, bracelet and necklace?

Depending on usage, your Diamodo jewelry should last 18-24 hours before needing to be recharged.

How do I charge my Diamodo jewelry?

Charging technology would not need any contact or even locking mechanism to charge your jewelry. Just drop your Diamodo in the magic jewelry box and in just couple of hours have it fully charged and ready to wear again.

Which platforms and devices does Diamodo support?

Diamodo supports both iOS and Android users.

What phones does Diamodo work with?

iOS: iPhone 4s, 5, 5s, 5c, 6, 6+ running iOS 8 and above with support for Bluetooth Low Energy. Diamodo currently support tablets.

Android: Diamodo works on Android phones running Android 4.0 and above with Bluetooth 4.0.

What kind of notifications does the system send?

Different blink patterns for each application.

What languages does the device support?

At this time, the Diamodo app supports English only.

story:
Have you ever been sick on vacation? In a foreign country? And you could not find any medicine that you recognized?  

Or perhaps you were ill at work with an upset stomach and an important meeting in an hour?

Or maybe you got that evening phone call from your college student complaining of a stuffy nose and a sore throat with no car and no access to medical services till the morning?  

Well, the latter is the reason I designed remedy pac. After spending almost $100 on various OTC medications for my daughter to take to college, I realized that they were too bulky for her tiny dorm. To add insult to injury, the drugs expired before being even 1/4 used. 

I searched for an alternative, but there are no over-the-counter drug kits on the market. So, I decided to come up with one myself, but I had certain criteria it had to meet:

  • It had to display the drugs for all of the most common conditions, (no digging around or emptying contents out to find the right meds); 
  • It had to be small, and attractive; and
  • It had to be easy to use for someone who is not knowledgeable about OTC drugs.

Three prototypes (five prototypes, if you include my home-made creations that used staples and glue guns) and 17 testers later here it is:

These medications can treat he following:

Allergies, Arthritis, Blisters, Burns, Cold, Cuts, Congestion, Cough, Diarrhea, Fever, Flu, Heartburn, Hives, Indigestion, Itchy Skin, Itchy Eyes, Nausea, Stuffy Nose, Runny Nose, Pains and Aches, Sore Throat

So, Instead of All This

Or this

You can be carrying this

Compact size - 7.5" x 5" x 2.5

  • Brand name over the counter drugs for most common ailments. 
  • Organized in 5 individual pockets with labels that clearly identify which medicine is for what illness. 
  • A brochure is included to let you know additional information such as when to see a doctor or how to tell a difference between a cold and flu.

Each type of condition has its own pocket

Directions included

Enclosed brochure provides helpful advice

The funds will go to meet the minimum order quantities that my suppliers require.

The pouch that holds the medication is custom designed and needs to be ordered in large quantities to be economically feasible.

The OTC drugs are purchased through wholesalers and require certain quantities.

If the funding goals are not reached, the project will not go forward.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Do you LOVE the freedom and elegance of Money Clips but HATE that they loose their shape and original grip quickly?

With monCarbone TenSion we look to solve all the issues with regular money clips and create the best and last Money Clip you will ever need. As a long time users of Money Clips we set out to create a product that looks sophisticated and utilizes the amazing material advantages of our Aero-Space Carbon Fiber.

Proprietary Carbon Fiber – monCarbone Shape Memory Polymer (SMPs) Technology creates a material that always returns to its original shape and does not loose grip pressure.

Zero Tension Loss – With monCarbone Carbon Fiber SMPs bills will always hold securely no matter how thick or thin they are stacked. Unlike conversional stainless steel or metal alloys, our carbon fiber will never loose it’s original shape after use.

5 Times Stronger & 50% Lighter – Aero Space Carbon Fiber is 5 times the strength of steel on equal weight ratio and more than 50% lighter than aluminum on equal volume ratio.

Stylish and Sophisticated – Timeless design with Chrome Metal Alloy structural accent and elegant Carbon Fiber curves, TenSion is a product that not only works great but also looks fantastic. monCarbone expertly turns the dreams of carbon fiber material engineering into reality to create advanced yet efficient products that suit the modern life style.

monCarbone TenSion Money Clip is Tailor-made for the dynamic, business professional who appreciates and desires the fine luxuries of life.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT OF MONCARBONE TENSION, WITH YOUR HELP LETS BRING THIS FANTASTIC PRODUCT TO MARKET! 

WARRANTY: monCarbone offers Zero Tension Loss Warranty for a period of five (5) years. This warranty covers our product only under normal usage, which does not include damages resulting from abuse, misuse or accidents, nor include minor cosmetic damages such as surface scratches against foreign objects.

story:
Before getting into a summary of this idea, I would like to thank you for going through this campaign, it means a lot that it caught your attention!

Now, let's start with the beginning. 

I am a Bulgarian, fond of his country and who wishes to let people know how beautiful it actually is. What better way than by using one of its most renowned products - roses. The Rosa Damascena  and the rose oil that comes out of it is used in perfumes all over the world. ''What's different about this product'' you might think. I don't blame you, rose oil has been on the market for a long time.

Well I will tell you why what I want to bring to the world is different.

You have all heard of the benefits of rose water. It has amazing effects on the skin and is a great natural make up remover! However, rose oil can be used for so much more....

Ladies and gentlemen, say goodbye to ingrown hairs, herpes and irritations after hair removal.

Our creams have been already tested and the results were exhilarating! 

Not to mention that they are 100% bio, vegan and cruelty-free, something that I think is quite essential in today's world. 

As you can see, the creams exist, so this is not a mere idea. If you are willing to help me in this adventure, I will use the money to create an eye-catching design for the brand, to start producing it in big quantities, package it and sell it of course. I will also set up a website for the products, which will become my sole focus. In terms of packaging, I want to keep everything 100% earth-friendly, with as little impact on our planet as possible. This is what your money will be used for - creating an earth-friendly, truly effective and natural cosmetics brand. 

I will of course keep on investing in this project as I already have been, but I am fully aware I need your help to succeed. If you help me and donate money for my campaign, once I get this brand going, I will provide you with discounted creams so that you can familiarize yourself with what you are investing in! I want you to know what your money is being used for and you will get access to the products before any other clients!

story:
[for Japanese, visit https://www.facebook.com/BearingPairRing/]

 

Short Summary; Bearing Pair Ring (BPR)

This is a (pair of) laser-marked bearing ring(s) fidget spinner for your finger. You can wear this Bearing Pair Ring (BPR) anywhere with you. BPR uses a Japanese famous manufacture's super precision bearing  so it rotates very smoothly on your finger. It makes your anxiety better and you feel good. Need concentrated while working, thinking, studying or business meeting? This is for you. 

  • I am always wondering that the other spinners are too big and stand out...aren't you?
  • The BPR's diameter is small so its spinning power is maybe smaller than the ordinary large  spinners. 10 seconds or so...You need keep twirling and touching. Wanna just watch the spinners spinning for a minute or more? BPR maybe isn't yours. Think twice.
  • You can twirl BPR while inputting keyboard or doing something with your finger. You can not with the other spinners.
  • Precision laser marking is processed in Tokyo, Japan.
  • Marked pattern is the Japanese traditional one called "kagome" (basket eyes).
  • Personalization available with up to 10 uppercase letters (optional).
  • Don't need a pair? OK, of course! BPR SOLO version (just one ring) is also on this project.
  • There are some stretch goals! See below.

If you are tired keeping your fidget spinner pinched with 2 fingers or holding on your fingertip, BPR is the best next solution. Were you just watching your friend spinning something and did not buy any spinners before? It is your turn. You can just say "Hmm, this is what I'm waiting."

 

What We Need & What You Get

Select the size, personalize or not, and pair or solo...Done. You are all set!

  • This campaign is FIXED FUNDING! Paid? Yes, you will get BPR unless the total order is under 200 pieces. Please share on your SNS to make the goal together.
  • Personalizing option is available! Tell us your favorite letters...costs a little.
  • Say again, the minimum production amount is 200. You will be totally refunded if this campaign will not reach the entire goal.
  • The original design for lasermarking is as below, ring width is 4mm & pattern is 3mm wide;

- Kagome pattern without letters (normal)

- Kagome pattern with letters, up to 10 uppercase (optional)

 

Please know...

The BPR is almost the same size of ordinary rings. The bearing is made from stainless steel so the color you will receive is metallic silver. While processing with laser, the pattern is a bit burnt and lines turn into brown-colored. A bearing is built with inner ring, tiny steel balls and outer ring. Please DO NOT screw a tight bearing to your finger. It is rotating smoothly so very difficult to pull out. Please read the size chart carefully. If you need from US6 to 8, get BPR18mm. Need 8.5 thru 10.5, you should select BPR20.

  • BPR 16mm has 16mm inner diameter. The size is US5.5, UK-K, EU 50 or #10 in Japan.
  • BPR 18mm has 18mm inner diameter. The size is US8, UK-P, EU 56 or #16 in Japan.
  • BPR 20mm has 20mm inner diameter. The size is US10.5, UK-U, EU 62 or #22 in Japan.

Risks & Challenges

Delivery delay will occur when the demand will be too high. The other risks are also about shipping and handling. Delay occurs when;

  • lack of in-stock bearing.
  • laser marking machines become too hot and need cooling down. Delay.
  • the post office has any difficulties.
  • international delivery problems happened.

What is Poteko?

POTEKO is a Japan's famous snack brand from TOHATO corporation. POTEKO is like Pringles but in the shape of rings!! Very fun to be fitted to your finger. Light & mixed salt (seaweed salt and rock salt) flavor is called Uma-Shio. There is no relationship between BPR and POTEKO but its shape.

(C)2017 TOHATO CORPORATION All rights reserved.

Per Serving (85g):

• Energy: 462.0kcal
• Protein: 2.9g
• Fat: 27.5g
• Carbohydrate: 50.8g 
• Sodium: 394.4mg (Salt: 1.0g)

Ingredients / No Wheat, Milk and Egg

Dried Potato, Vegetable Oil, 2 kinds of salt (MOSHIO Seaweed Salt & Rock Salt), Processed Starch, Calcium Lactate, Calcium Chloride, Seasoning (Amino Acid, MSG), Antioxidant (Vitamin E).

Allergy information

Eggs, milk, wheat, peanuts, shrimp and crab are handled in the same factory.

Stretch Goals

  • Hit $10,000!

- Second pattern is unlocked!

  • Hit $20,000!

- Third pattern is unlocked and all "$5 or more" backers have additional one bag of POTEKO!

Other Ways You Can Help

You just can't contribute yet? That doesn't mean you can't help this project. Thank you!

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools if you just want to support.

We are so pleased with your support.

FAQs

  1. (Q) How much does BPR weigh? (A) About 5g. This is one of reasons why BPR can't rotate for minutes.
  2. (Q) Where is the bearing's origin country? (A) Japan
  3. (Q) What are the bearings made of? (A) Martensitic stainless steel
  4. (Q) What is the shipping method? (A) Economy Air (SAL)
  5. (Q) How many days does it take after delivery? (A) Around 1 week
  6. (Q) Can I receive the tracking code after delivery? (A) Yes. You will receive e-mail when shipped.
  7. (Q) Can I order more than 2? (A) Yes. There is no limitation for the quantity!
  8. (Q) I am a wholesaler, who should I speak to if we want to distribute the BPRs?  (A) You can simply contact: firebet10dollar-point6@yahoo.co.jp

story:
Another paper bag?  

A very simple bag with a not so simple material. Made entirely from plain Tyvek, the whole bag is sewn together to guarantee maximum resistance. Its neutrality and robustness makes it an ideal and discrete companion for everyday use. 

 

What is Tyvek?  

Tyvek is a complex snythetic material that is extremely robust as well as tear and water proof. It is commonly used for transportation, garment and has various applications in the building industry. You may even have seen it in your mailbox before! 

 

 Why?

As a designer I seek to expand my practice by using processes and  materials to discover new outcomes and possibilities. The versatility of Tyvek has enabled me to make a bag that is an alternative solution to everyday existing bags. It was my objective to make it as much a fashion accessory as a grocery bag.  

 

From envelope to bag

It is sent to you as an envelope that unfolds into a bag in 2 steps. First: remove all the sticky elements (address and tape). Second: unfold the envelope flat and that's it! Its folded format makes it convenient for storage and as a backup bag. 

Several prototypes have been tested and sent via mail to guarantee their safe arrival. Do not worry if your postman was unfriendly with your package, the surface of this material is easy to clean. 

 

Characteristics

The volume of the bag is practical and permits you to carry an endless number of things. As a bag it measures: 48 cm wide x 31 cm height x 18 cm deep. As an envelope it measures: 31cm x 18 cm x 0,5 cm height, which respects the standard format and is therefore perfectly suitable for most mailboxes. It has a recommended weight capacity of 10 kg. 

Details : There are fold lines so that the bag can be rolled and closed, similar to cycling bags. It is the folded material that creates a sealed volume for your belongings. The handles have been doubled to strengthen the bag.

The material resists to water but be careful with sharp objects.  

 

Rewards

Reward: 1 bag

 

Reward: 2 bags

 

Reward: 4 bags

 

Manufacturing 

These prototypes come straight from the factory to my studio and will be folded by my own hands to be transformed into an envelope, ready for delivery. All bags are made from original white Tyvek and sewn. It is possible to write on Tyvek, so feel free to customise your bag. As you use it, your bag will have more and more folds and creases.

 

 

Shipping:  

Since the bag is the envelope and is designed using Tyvek, it requires no other shipping material. A symbolic trace of the stamp will remain but only on the bottom of your bag. 

 

 Milestones and dates:   

The design of the bag is complete and has been tested. Prototypes have been validated and project is now ready for manufacturing. 

July - Launch of campaign

August - End of campaign and process orders

September - Production and folding at studio

October - Delivery of envelopes

story:
IP67 Waterproof, Take Pictures and Make Calls in the Rain
Take your call straight out of your shower
Stylish Sports Shape
 
Smooth High Resolution Touchscreen
 
  5MP Camera for stunning selfies
Turn on WIFI or 3G from your SIM CARD with a single Click, Use Internet, Download Apps and Navigate through GPS



The smartwatch market is still in its infancy, and if you are a first-time buyer, you might be disappointed with the present selection. The reason why is simple: it is all style and no substance. Everyone knows that you can connect your smartwatch with your smartphone, but from there, their function is a complete mystery. What can you do? How powerful are they? With Messier, this information is going to be clear from the smart. We have no reason to hide it: we’re proud of what our product is capable of. 

Its a Smart Watch with combined features of a top notch smart phone. Its Waterproof(IP67), 3g and Wifi enabled with options to use your sim card and upto 12GB SD card. Its comes with 5MP Camera and an option to use Bluetooth earpieces which have not been introduced in any watch so far.


COLOUR CHOICES:

It comes in 2 colors around the dial; Orange and Black


The Messier is waterproof to IP67 standard, meaning you will not need to take it off the next time you’re spending the day on the beach. On top of full connectivity, the Messier can function as a standalone phone in its own right, taking a SIM card, making and receiving calls, and working in conjunction with a Bluetooth earpiece. Again, the next time you plan a day trip, you can rely on your Messier – and leave that clunky smartphone at home where it belongs.

Accessories:

It comes with a USB Cable, USB Charge plug and Bluetooth Earpiece, 

First smart watch to introduce earpeice so you can free yourself from the hassle of talking to your wrists.



It comes with a 5-megapixel camera, more powerful than any other smartwatch on the market. To go along with this ultra-modern camera, the screen is high-resolution. You can review your pictures and videos with complete clarity, and you can browse the Internet too, considering that the (name of smartwatch) is 3G-enabled right out of the box.

ITEM SPECIFICATIONS:



Unlike Apple and Android smartwatches, which currently limit you to either the App Store or Google Play, you can shop the cumulative collection of apps on Messier. After all, if you’re wearing something on your wrist, you want to know that it has as few limitations as possible. Whether you are switching back and forth from something by Apple, Samsung, HTC, or any other carrier, we want to make sure that you do so in absolute comfort.

5 MEGAPIXEL CAMERA:

We have introduced a 5MP camera which is better than any other smart watch so far so you can capture the stunning moments while keeping the quality you desire.


Safeguarding your investment on-the-go, Messier comes with anti-loss technology pre-installed. You’ll be able to find your smartwatch with ease, the same way you would find an Apple product with Find My iPhone. To us, this is just another aspect of the convenience for which we strive – if you and your Messier become separated somehow, that separation ought to be temporary, and as long as we have anything to say about it, it will be.




Incorporating increasingly popular fitness-tracker technology, Messier also comes with pre-installed apps that include a pedometer, a sleep monitor, a heart rate tracker, and a posture detector. You can save photos and songs to the 12GB memory card, play FM radio stations, and use the GPS to get directions: anything that a smartphone can do, the Messier can do too, without ever leaving your wrist.


We NEED your support to make it to the mass production and you get our first model M8 at a discounted price of 195 USD plus Shipping Charges. Its retail price is 250 USD.

Risks & Challenges

Their is literally no risk with this product as its already a finished product as you can see in Demo. All we need is support to go for mass production and you can get your watch as soon as our campaign ends.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise to help us.
  • Share this with your friends.

And that's all there is to it.

Why Have you got 2 different watches in Video

We designed two models initially and wanted to launch both together but due to some constraints, we are only launching the M8 as it has the best features and technology. Others will follow suit if we make it to the mass production for M8.
