complete clarity, and you can browse the Internet too, considering that the
(name of smartwatch) is 3G-enabled right out of the box.

ITEM SPECIFICATIONS:






Unlike Apple and Android smartwatches, which currently limit
you to either the App Store or Google Play, you can shop the cumulative
collection of apps on Messier. After all, if you’re wearing something on your
wrist, you want to know that it has as few limitations as possible. Whether you
are switching back and forth from something by Apple, Samsung, HTC, or any
other carrier, we want to make sure that you do so in absolute comfort.

5 MEGAPIXEL CAMERA:
We have introduced a 5MP camera which is better than any other smart watch so far so you can capture the stunning moments while keeping the quality you desire.



Safeguarding your investment on-the-go, Messier comes with
anti-loss technology pre-installed. You’ll be able to find your smartwatch with
ease, the same way you would find an Apple product with Find My iPhone. To us,
this is just another aspect of the convenience for which we strive – if you and
your Messier become separated somehow, that separation ought to be temporary,
and as long as we have anything to say about it, it will be.





Incorporating increasingly popular fitness-tracker
technology, Messier also comes with pre-installed apps that include a
pedometer, a sleep monitor, a heart rate tracker, and a posture detector. You
can save photos and songs to the 12GB memory card, play FM radio stations, and
use the GPS to get directions: anything that a smartphone can do, the Messier
can do too, without ever leaving your wrist.
   We NEED your support to make it to the mass production and you get our first model M8 at a discounted price of 195 USD plus Shipping Charges. Its retail price is 250 USD.

    Risks & Challenges Their is literally no risk with this product as its already a finished product as you can see in Demo. All we need is support to go for mass production and you can get your watch as soon as our campaign ends.
    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise to help us. Share this with your friends.   And that's all there is to it.Why Have you got 2 different watches in VideoWe designed two models initially and wanted to launch both together but due to some constraints, we are only launching the M8 as it has the best features and technology. Others will follow suit if we make it to the mass production for M8.

story:
Pro-Belts is sponsoring this crowd-funding project to develop a championship trophy belt to commemorate Ohio State’s historic CFP victory.

Please understand, we are not asking for contributions.  We are offering three distinct products for your pre-order purchase:

  • An Authentic Championship Trophy Belt comprised of alloy plates in 18K gold and silver plating;
  • A replica belt - almost identical visually, and in size, with the Authentic Belt, this version is comprised of ABS plastic plates versus alloy;
  • A life-sized poster/rendering of the actual trophy bely.  The poster image will be sized identically with the actual belt.

Our ability to move this project forward depends on your participation.  If we successfully reach our target funding amount, we can proceed into production.  If we don’t, Indiegogo will issue refunds directly to each buyer.

Thank you for your interest. Detailed information on Pro-Belts and the product offerings is available below.

Go Buckeyes!


Pro-Belts manufactures championship trophy belts for professional and collegiate sports. Through its affiliated manufacturing company, Pro-Belts has been producing championship trophy belts for more than 15 years for the UFC, WWE and, most recently, The Washington Redskins.

Over the years, Pro-Belts founders have delivered more than 100,000 trophy belts to its clients. We have the experience and expertise to deliver an exceptional trophy belt commemorating the Buckeyes' Championship season.


Trophy belts are in the domain of gladiators. Their use is to recognize elite athletic performance and accomplishments is well established. 

Originally awarded to the winner of boxing title matches, over the years the concept has been adapted to, and adopted by other sports, most notably wrestling and mixed martial arts.

During the past few years, trophy belts have begun to “crossover”, or appear informally in other venues due to their appeal to top athletes and passionate fans that follow them and their teams.

For fans, it’s their own personal opportunity to own a trophy - to be a part of their team - to take home a memorable piece of history.

  There are three categories of products / "perks" available:

  • The Ohio State University,  Authentic Championship Trophy Belt;
  • The Ohio State University,  Replica "Game Day"  Championship Trophy Belt;
  • The Ohio State University,  2015 Championship Trophy Belt Poster.

The Ohio State University,  2015 CFP Authentic Trophy Belt

The 2015 CFP Authentic Trophy Belt is constructed of cast alloy plates richly finished in 18K gold and silver plating on a faux leather strap.

  • Over 55 inches long;
  • Weighs approximately 7 pounds;
  • 18K Gold plated adjustable snaps;
  • Comes in a black, protective cloth bag with Ohio State's logo on it;
  • Includes a wall hanger for proudly displaying your belt every day.


The Ohio State University,  2015 CFP Replica "Game Day" Belt

The Game Day Belt is a replica of the Authentic Ohio State University - 2015 CFP Championship Trophy Belt.

As a result, The Game Day Belt is much lighter and more easily carried to the stadium on game day - hence the name!

  • Gold and silver plated high-impact ABS plastic plates;
  • Synthetic leather strap;
  • Over 55 inches long;
  • Weighs approximately 2 pounds;
  • Plated adjustable snaps;
  • Includes a wall hanger for proudly displaying your belt every day.


Poster - The Ohio State University, 2015 CFP Trophy Belt

This poster has been designed so that the image of the belt is identically sized with the actual Trophy Belt.  

Hang it vertically, or horizontally as shown.

  • The full poster is over 60 inches long;
  • Printed on high quality coated stock;
  • Incorporates the school's distinctive "duck-foot" icon in the poster background. 


We begin the development of each new belt with a series of renderings. And while they're helpful, we also know that they hardly do the end product justice.

In truth, trophy belts must be experienced first hand to appreciate them.  More often than not, the first words we hear from fans is  "whoa!" or "wow!" when they pick one up. Beyond the sheer depth of the gold and silver plating finishes and the detailed strap embossing, they're surprisingly heavy, weighing in at over 7 pounds. 

They exude quality and craftsmanship.  They're the real deal.

To "bridge the gap" between renderings and the actual product, it's helpful to compare renderings with actual photographs of the finished product as shown below.


 Side-by-Side Comparison of Belt Elements 


Great tool making used in casting the plates is the foundation of producing a beautifully finished belt.    

It takes precision in craftsmanship and time to get the perfect product. Polishing and plating is part art and part science, but critical to the quality of our championship belts! 

We've provided a few pictures of the Washington Redskins' Trophy Belt plates to help show the development process from start to finish. 






Pro-Belts has been designing and manufacturing championship trophy belts for over 15 years for professional sports venues including the UFC, WWE and most recently, the Washington Redskins. We have a lot of experience delivering high quality, professional-grade belts to our customers. We are confident that we can meet the delivery dates and expectations of our supporters.

We believe the single largest risk to completing this project successfully will be in securing a license from The Ohio State University that will allow us to use the school's trademarks on the trophy belt as depicted in the product drawings.

From the perspective of a licensor, the two key factors in granting a license generally tend to be proof of market demand and manufacturing capacity.  Given our manufacturing experience and established resources, we are confident that our capabilities can meet the University's expectations. 

We also hope that the demand demonstrated through a successful crowdfunding campaign will provide conclusive market evidence to the University to confidently grant the license.

In the event we are not granted the license needed, we will return, at a minimum, 95% of the backers’ deposits. Any funds used will be solely to cover any fees due to Indiegogo for the use of their services.

story:
WILD DESIGN - Luxury furniture - ZOOMORPHIC COLLECTION

Thierry Chantrel: a Decade in the Amazonas                

by WILD DESIGN
                                     


All the dreams come true ... A man was walking, his eyes wide open.

He walked from savannah to steppe, from ocean to desert, from prehistoric times to the present day. And everywhere, from the microscopic to the gigantic, everything was beautiful. When he got back home, exhausted but enriched by all marvels he had seen, he woke up, took a pencil an drew some dreams he could rest on.

And so the world whose only aspiration is to become reality ...

         THIS AWESOME WORLD NOW BECOMES REAL !!!

After our very important investment in Product Design and the Concept of Zoomorphic by WILD DESIGN, we request your pledges to build the final prototypes of this amazing collection (after the wooden proto), realized in a new and revolutionary construction technic  =  a spectacular 3D-Printing:

        COBRA, SCORPIO, ELEPHANT & FROG (GRENOUILLE)

Faithful to our philosophy to respect and protect nature, the "World Wildlife Fund" (WWF) will benefit directly from every single of your pledges.  

                    


Hans-Juergen R. Klemm, Thierry Chantrel and Christophe Robinet are introducing "Wild Things" from WILD DESIGN France and the USA, unique pieces from the intersection of Furniture, Design and pure Art.

WILD DESIGN, based in Bordeaux (France) and Miami (Florida-USA), is creator and editor of their "Luxury Designed Furniture" addressing a very special and informed clientele with three major goals:

                               ORIGINALITY, HIGHEST QUALITY and SERVICES.

This new and UNIQUE concept dispose of a capital of quasi-unlimited creativity with 8 (eight) Theme-Collections, the first being the Edition " ZOOMORPHIC " inspired by the world of animals (40 different models + accessories).

This exceptional Collection is for the discerning lover and collector of 

                                                LUXURY ART PIECES.

WILD DESIGN is simultaneously present in Bordeaux/France and Miami/Florida, USA to serve his wide-spread clientele and will as such be as well an Ambassador of the "Excellence à la Française" in the USA.


                                   THE KING COBRA chair - Luxury furniture

The KING COBRA chair Mesurements: 73" h x 43" l x 35" (approx.) - 185 cm (H) 108 cm (L) 90 cm

This outstanding chair will be built with four base finishings:

Lacquered, Chrome, Aluminium and Series " L ".

Every Art piece is handmade, unique, exclusively numbered and dated.                Upon order, a personalisation ( a name, text, etc.) can be added on a special plate.

    

THE SCORPIO armchair - Luxury furniture


  THE ELEPHANT armchair - Luxury furniture


FROG (La Grenouille) armchair - Luxury furniture

                 

   


You just discovered the first 4 themes of our collection "ZOOMORPHIC", 4 of total 40 (!) models.

Here a sneak preview at more models which are as exquisite as the predecessors: 


                      CHAMELEON, ELK (MOOSE), ANTEATER, DOLPHIN.

                        


Do you recognize this sympathetic Panda? Be Wild Design, means be in love with our unique and complex world and actively contributing to protecting the nature.

This is particularly true in a world where climate issues and the protection of the animal species have never been as important as now. This is why, every perk you will contribute for this project, at whatever amount, will be subject of a financial contribution, redistributed directly to the WWF for the protection of the species - animals and vegetals: approx. 2,5% for the small donations and approx. 5% for the more substantial pledges. Naturally, the more perks we can receive, the better and efficient we can support the WWF.

                           For us, this is a militant act. http://wwf.org

The capital of the perks will be used to finance the first 4 prototypes of this line:                         COBRA, SCORPION, ELEPHANT and FROG (GRENOUILLE).



The success of this project is based on the 'atypical' and rare personality of its Designer, Thierry Chantrel and his extraordinary creative potential: Allround artist, autodidact surrealist, sculpturer, graphic designer, author of novels, gold digger...

He lived for 10 years in the Amazonian Forest and now resides in French Guyana. The Amazonia is where he discovered a fabulous fauna and flora. Following this enriching human experience and with the help of one his sons passionate of 3D, he starts designing the first pieces of this "Zoomorphic Collection" which is absolutely unique in its concept.

Working on this project, design became a passion, and with a flood of ideas he creates the first models of 7 other collections (i.e. The X-Collection ) and he knows he won't stay there... !



There are numerous models of finishings represented in this site which are just some guidelines, suggestions.

Every fantasy can become reality, we are your creatives and we will be at your entire service. Molds which are lacquered, chromed, colored, recovered with gold leaves, rare leathers and precious farmed raised skins, precious metals ( gold, silver, moon-gold, white gold or palladium), precious stones (branded diamonds)...

WILD DESIGN Chair Art Sculptures are our 'baby' and we will transform this unique experience into your reality.

           If you believe into the imaginary, the imaginary becomes now real...





               


We have already realized one prototype of the Eléphant which has been carefully sculptured in wood and leather, allowing to study in detail the ergonomics, resistance, comfort, and design.

We also decided to get ample counsel and support in associations with renamed and recognized manufacturers specializing in the production of luxury furniture: ebonist artistry, noble leather saddlery, gold plating, …

The most important challenge is for us to chose all those finishings you would appreciate most. BTW we will invite you regularly to participate in those choices and decisions through our pages in Facebook or by personal email in order to participate in our product and design contests and to determine our newest model creations.

For that purpose, we have even created our "WILD ELITE CIRCLE" who grants access through our SILVER, GOLD and BLACK CARDS to the protected world of WILD DESIGN and numerous additional advantages like special private and corporate projects,  warranties, maintenance- and service agreements etc.

We will also propose exceptional, exclusive "Limited Series" which you can enjoy. This is our way to integrate you -naturally- in our fascinating WILD DESIGN life.

As perfectionists and players in the Art and Interior Design industry, we are aware of the challenges of this kind of exciting project. This is why it is important for you, dear Friends, Aficionados and KickStarter-backers, to know that we will accept only the very best standards for our products.                                                                                                And this is why we are "3 musketeers" to work on this engagement :-)

         Hans-Juergen R. Klemm, Thierry Chantrel and Christophe Robinet


                                        

This is an artistic concept presentation for the new Zoomorphic Collection by Wild Design SA, Bordeaux (France) and  Wild Design LLC, Miami (USA).  The companies expressly reserve  the right to make modifications, revisions and changes  deemed necessary or desirable in their sole and absolute discretion.  All concept graphics, renderings, and text provided herein are intellectual property and copyrighted, owned by the corporations. Unauthorized reproduction, display or other dissemination of this particular style, design, or concept is strictly prohibited and constitutes copyright infringement.

story:
Patriot Shoes: Who we are and why are we doing this?

Patriot Shoes isn't a big company with grand plans to take over the world of shoes. We're a small group who are more concerned with setting the record straight than with selling a lot of shoes.

You may have read in the news earlier this summer, a major athletic shoe and clothing brand (we won't say which, but the really big) was set to release a pair of shoes which would feature the "Betsy Ross" flag. Before that could happen, the shoes were canceled at the advice of one of the companies spokes people (we won't say who, but it was a former pro quarterback who's been in the news for more than football) who called flag was a symbol of racism. The reasoning being that the flag was created at a time slavery existed in what would become our nation. But, that would mean EVERYTHING from that period of history is a symbol of racism. Slavery wasn't a the reason the flag was created. The flag was created to be a symbol of the revolution being fought to create a new nation. Slavery was not a motivation for fighting the revolution. The revolution was fought to create a nation where "all men are created equal", even if it took more time to realize that vision. Nothing on the flag represents slavery. A journalist wrote at the time "The stars were disposed in a circle, symbolizing the perpetuity of the Union; the ring, like the circling serpent of the Egyptians, signifying eternity. The thirteen stripes showed with the stars the number of the United Colonies, and denoted the subordination of the States to the Union, as well as equality among themselves." and Charles Thomson, former Secretary of the Continental Congress, wrote to the new Congress "The colours of the pales are those used in the flag of the United States of America. White signifies purity and innocence. Red hardiness and valour and Blue the colour of the Chief signifies vigilance perseverance and justice."

As patriots and lovers of American history, we were dumbfounded when we heard why the shoes would not become available for sale. At first we joked someone should make their shoes with the "Betsy Ross" flag. But we quickly decided that someone should be us, and quickly got to work. We designed our shoe that features the flag. We want these shoes to be available to people who want them to be the symbol of what they really are. A symbol of life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness!

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We aren't trying to become corporate giants and take over the shoe biz. We just want to make these shoes available to set things straight. But making shoes like this at an affordable price requires minimum orders, and we don't have a million dollar business to get things started. We're just regular guys who need fellow patriots to help us make the order. 
  • Pledging to this campaign will get you a pair of the shoes we're trying to produce and help make them available through other retail outlets once we have a supply  

  • We can make as many as we have to, if we get enough to make the minimum.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • If you agree with us and our point of view regarding the flag, and not the corporate giant, show the world by getting these shoes!
  • Celebrate what makes this nation great! Celebrate that which unites us, not divides us

Risks & Challenges

  • The first pair of shoes has already been made, but minimum orders need to be met to make them available.

Other Ways You Can Help

We have some pledges available other than getting shoes for those of you who want to help but aren't really worried about shoes. But really, it's about getting the shoes out there to prove they should have just been released in the first place.
story_txt:
Patriot Shoes: Who we are and why are we doing this?
Patriot Shoes isn't a big company with grand plans to take over the world of shoes. We're a small group who are more concerned with setting the record straight than with selling a lot of shoes.You may have read in the news earlier this summer, a major athletic shoe and clothing brand (we won't say which, but the really big) was set to release a pair of shoes which would feature the "Betsy Ross" flag. Before that could happen, the shoes were canceled at the advice of one of the companies spokes people (we won't say who, but it was a former pro quarterback who's been in the news for more than football) who called flag was a symbol of racism. The reasoning being that the flag was created at a time slavery existed in what would become our nation. But, that would mean EVERYTHING from that period of history is a symbol of racism. Slavery wasn't a the reason the flag was created. The flag was created to be a symbol of the revolution being fought to create a new nation. Slavery was not a motivation for fighting the revolution. The revolution was fought to create a nation where "all men are created equal", even if it took more time to realize that vision. Nothing on the flag represents slavery. A journalist wrote at the time "The stars were disposed in a circle, symbolizing the perpetuity of the Union; the ring, like the circling serpent of the Egyptians, signifying eternity. The thirteen stripes showed with the stars the number of the United Colonies, and denoted the subordination of the States to the Union, as well as equality among themselves." and Charles Thomson, former Secretary of the Continental Congress, wrote to the new Congress "The colours of the pales are those used in the flag of the United States of America. White signifies purity and innocence. Red hardiness and valour and Blue the colour of the Chief signifies vigilance perseverance and justice."As patriots and lovers of American history, we were dumbfounded when we heard why the shoes would not become available for sale. At first we joked someone should make their shoes with the "Betsy Ross" flag. But we quickly decided that someone should be us, and quickly got to work. We designed our shoe that features the flag. We want these shoes to be available to people who want them to be the symbol of what they really are. A symbol of life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness!

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

We aren't trying to become corporate giants and take over the shoe biz. We just want to make these shoes available to set things straight. But making shoes like this at an affordable price requires minimum orders, and we don't have a million dollar business to get things started. We're just regular guys who need fellow patriots to help us make the order. 
Pledging to this campaign will get you a pair of the shoes we're trying to produce and help make them available through other retail outlets once we have a supply  
We can make as many as we have to, if we get enough to make the minimum.


The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

If you agree with us and our point of view regarding the flag, and not the corporate giant, show the world by getting these shoes!
Celebrate what makes this nation great! Celebrate that which unites us, not divides us


Risks & Challenges
The first pair of shoes has already been made, but minimum orders need to be met to make them available.

Other Ways You Can Help
We have some pledges available other than getting shoes for those of you who want to help but aren't really worried about shoes. But really, it's about getting the shoes out there to prove they should have just been released in the first place.

story:
Introducing The Freedom Comb!

 

 

Where Life, Liberty, and The Pursuit of Happiness Meet an Awesome, Proudly USA-Made Hair Comb.

 

Introducing the Freedom Comb, an awesome product with a noble message.  How awesome would it be to pull out a comb with Donald Trump's face on it in front of your friends and family?

It's 2019 and conservatives are getting a bad rap now more than ever.  87% of Trump supporters are scared to voice their views in public in fear of being shamed.  Shamed for what you ask?  If you really dig into it, no one is really sure, but if you don't shame them you're just as bad.

That's pretty crazy.

There's nothing wrong with believing in and supporting ideals that have provided freedom for over 200 years.  In fact, we think it's great!

If you're sick of blindly following the media and being forced to have the opinion that you're "supposed to have", then the Freedom Comb is for you!

 

- Use in front of family and friends

- Amazing Gift Idea

- Show your support

 

5 Great Colors to Choose From!

 

"Banner Blue"

 

 

"Gunmetal Gray"

 

 

"Republican Red"

 

 

"Liberty White"

 

 

"Patriot Pink"

 

 

How We Will Use Funds

 

Mold cost: ~ $10,000!

Having a custom mold made and complete manufacturing process in The United States is expensive!  We are proud to keep jobs here, support capitalism and the US economy!

Manufacturing: $3,250 - $6,250

Making the combs - High USA cost-per-product rates (costs will vary by volume).

Shipping: The reason our goal is so high...

The shipping price you pay goes into that $20,000 goal you see.  The fees and taxes listed below are also applied to this.

Platform fees: ~ 10%

Indiegogo needs to make money also, and these fees go to supporting this platform.

Taxes: ~ 8%

Ahh, our beloved friend... the tax man.

At the end of this we are left with a small amount of money to...

  • Cover any unexpected costs (if you've ever run a business you know there will be some).
  • Help spread the word even more for this awesome product!
  • Create more proud freedom products!


Most importantly we are excited to gain the support of freedom loving backers!!!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We are incredibly grateful for anyway you choose to support our project.  Aside from backing the project and getting perks you can also tell your family and friends and share this page on social media.  Help us get the word out! Thank you!

story:
Hi! We are I AM Team. We consist of some young people from a country in the end of the earth namely INDONESIA. Have you ever heard of it?

Yeah! We are very passionate about what we are doing, we call it I AM PROJECT! We want to build together not only brands but communities. Certainly a creative, positive, and productive community for artists, especially local artists. We are eager to connect with more people. Especially we want to help Indonesian artists (potentially, but not yet known) to have a space and chance to work and collaborate. In Indonesia there are so many great people in the art community, we can not wait for you to see them later!

We want to work together and empower more people with their own creativity. We want to colour the world with the stories and the uniqueness of each individual. We really appreciate any stories and differences. We want every existing story to be a value to other people. We want everyone to be the best version of themselves, so we call this community and brand as I AM PROJECT!

Sound like we have a dream, huh? Yes indeed!

We have dreams and we want to start now. We know this is a small step, but very meaningful to us. To start this project we need funding, so that we are here. To begin this small step, we need your help.

We have completed a t-shirt design as our first product. We lifted the theme #UNEQUALED. This theme is somewhat clothed about our goals and dreams for this brand/community for many people. You can read more about this theme through our website. We decided to put it on this site to get support both morally, ideas, suggestions, inputs and financial support to make it happen. Any support that you provide in accordance with the amount we proposed as funding, we will return to you in the form of T-shirt #UNEQUALED. There are 3 designs you can choose, designed by our own I AM TEAM. Any funding you give will certainly be our initial capital to run this brand and community.

If the number of goals we submitted is not completely fulfilled, we will still withdraw the amount of funding that has accumulated and send our T-shirts to every backers who have committed to support us. We hope you can be patient as you wait for the baby's birth process. We will immediately produce and ship it to you.

By supporting our project, you have contributed in supporting our goals & campaign, and our local artists (young people, creative people) to have a place to work, create and produce productivity. In the future we certainly want to cooperate with friends from all over the world, it can be one of you who read this. We are also confident that you will love our products: from competing product quality, youthful design, to the behind-the-scenes issues and positive messages we deliver through our products.

Get a special price for 50 fastest backers.

By supporting this first project, we hope you will not only receive a T-shirt, but also a reflection of value for yourself. You are UNEQUALED! INCOMPARABLE!

Warm greetings from the east far,

-  I AM Project

 

Design Options :

 

UNEQUALED #1

 

UNEQUALED #2

 

UNEQUALED #3

story:
Because today we live in unprecedented times, we need unprecedented solutions.

H2W (Healthy to Wear) was created in Japan to address health and safety issues for going out in the world during these uncertain times. We use CLEANSE® to produce this first-of-its-kind line of fashionable and functional clothing, the finest Japanese antiviral compound certified to be 99% effective against viruses, bacteria and some molds.

When used properly, the H2W line of antiviral clothing and masks can aid in the goal of reducing infection rates and affect positive change in the U.S., helping to protect people and alleviate some of the suffering we are all enduring.

 

 

The unique H2W antiviral organic cotton hoodie comes with an attached mask that buttons up on the inside of the hood, offering maximum antiviral coverage and protection. The oversized thumbhole sleeves provide palm coverage for door handles and grab items, as well as easy pull on and off of protective gloves.  It is designed and made in Japan, offering the highest quality and craftsmanship.

The piece is for men and women and comes in three sizes: Small, Medium and Large. The color options are Gray, Beige and Navy. 

Made in Japan /  Organic Cotton 100%. /  Machine Wash / No Dryer

 

This one of-a-kind design is both practical and fashionable and made from antiviral organic cotton. The high neck collar can be extended upward, revealing ear loops to attach as a functional mask-like component of the top. You will never have to worry about where you misplaced your mask again. Like all our pieces, it's designed and made in Japan, offering the highest quality and craftsmanship.

The piece is for men and women and comes in three sizes: Small, Medium and Large. The color options are Gray, Beige and Black.

Adjustable ear straps / Made in Japan / Organic Cotton 100%  / Machine Wash / No Dryer

 

This premium piece of the collection is an ultra-chic Hooded Poncho & Mantle made of antiviral organic cotton. It is designed and made in Japan, offering the highest quality and craftsmanship. It is easy to put on and take off, great for public transit where you can use it as a protective layer as you pass through crowded areas, hanging it up at your destination. The piece comes with a matching antiviral protective neck guard for maximum face, head and body coverage.

The piece is multipurpose with quick unbuttoning of the hoodie to form a large mantle, ideal for extra body coverage. We think it would be especially great for mothers and infants as a wrap and can also be folded up into a portable pouch for easy storage. The piece is for men and women and comes in two sizes and the length is measured from the neck to the hem: Medium and Large. The colors are Beige, Gray and Dark Gray.

Made in Japan / Organic Cotton 100% / Machine Wash / No Dryer

 

Made of the same quality antiviral organic cotton, this Neck Guard offers versatility and quality. The unisex piece comes in two sizes, Medium and Large. The color options are Beige, Gray, Dark Gray and Black. It is designed and made in Japan, offering the highest quality and craftsmanship.

Adjustable ear straps / Made in Japan / Organic Cotton 100% / Machine Wash / No Dryer

 

This highly regarded and widely acclaimed piece is where it all started, becoming one of Japans' most popular premium antiviral organic cotton masks. It continues to be a best seller for us and we are pleased to bring it to the U.S. market. Even after 50 washes the mask retains 99% efficacy. It is designed and made in Japan, offering the highest quality and craftsmanship making this one of the best mask options available.

 

H2W started in Japan this spring by creating antiviral organic cotton masks. When we saw how thousands of these units were selling out in minutes, we quickly realized there was a big demand for our innovative products.  

Living between Japan and the U.S., I witnessed firsthand the stark differences this pandemic has had between these two countries. Japan has some of the lowest numbers of confirmed infected COVID‐19 cases and deaths (200 times fewer to date vs the U.S.), despite its high population density (2.4 times higher than New York City) and the world’s largest percentage of high‐risk individuals over 65 years of age.  

A significant reason for Japan’s success at dealing with COVID 19 is that high-quality masks are readily available, widely accepted and used. This market dynamic has resulted in some of the world’s most advanced developments of antiviral fabric and their applications.

That is why we are now bringing to the U.S. our experience in Japanese antiviral material sourcing and production, resulting in an extended line of antiviral H2W clothing designed exclusively by our world-class designer and Japanese founder.  

Alejandro Lopez  ecommune CEO

 

 

H2W - "Healthy To Wear by SkinAware" was developed in Japan.
The clothing has antibacterial and antiviral effects and is made from 100% Fair Trade organic cotton.  The processed fabric suppresses the growth of certain bacteria and has been confirmed to be effective in reducing specific viruses by 99% or more.
Based on an existing antibacterial agent used in oral hygiene, the antibacterial and antiviral properties of H2W comes with a high degree of safety and has been verified in numerous tests.

Antibacterial and antiviral functional fiber processing technology CLEANSE® is used for our ponchos, hooded tops, high necks, and neck guards.
CLEANSE® uses Etak® immobilization processing technology to strongly immobilize bacteria and viruses on the fabric surface.       

CLEANSE® (Octadecyldimethyl (3-triethoxysilylpropyl) ammoniumchloride)                     

CLEANSE® processed fabrics reduce the number of certain viruses on the fibers by more than 99%. CLEANSE® has been verified to be effective against about 20 types of microorganisms (both bacteria  and fungi) and viruses. * Human patch test: Safety product

Antibacterial/antiviral processing is not intended to treat or prevent illness. / The evaluation of antibacterial and antiviral properties is based on the original evaluation of Kurabo Industries Ltd. / The antibacterial and antiviral function was tested by a public textile inspection organization in Japan with the fabric and not with the final H2W product.

 

Hiromi Kani, Chief Designer & SkinAware CEO, is a sustainability activist in Japan. She left a successful career as a senior designer at Uniqlo and Agnes B in order to make a healthier clothing option that was better for the environment, the people who make it and the people who wear it.   Check out her journey in the video below.

story:
SWITCH TO SILK

Mom(me)’s The Word 

Momme weight in the silk world is thread count in the cotton world. Did you know, most silk pillowcases and products available on the market today are usually only 19 – 22 momme? Morning Face has a whopping 25 momme weight, and so the difference is like going from 250 thread count sheets, to 1000 thread count Egyptian cotton. The highest quality silk we could find, Morning Face is luxurious and longer lasting.
story_txt:
SWITCH TO SILK
Mom(me)’s The Word 
Momme weight in the silk world is thread count in the cotton world. Did you know, most silk pillowcases and products available on the market today are usually only 19 – 22 momme? Morning Face has a whopping 25 momme weight, and so the difference is like going from 250 thread count sheets, to 1000 thread count Egyptian cotton. The highest quality silk we could find, Morning Face is luxurious and longer lasting.

story:
Today, when everything is in, cool, trendy, branded, black or white and where everything is controlled by the latest technology and robots, there is still a place for something “live” with the added value of manual work.


Our company offers high quality men’s shirts and women’s blouses with your monogram or logo of your company created in a unique way – hand painted by artist.

The clothing with your hand painted monogram or logo of your company may be a little detail for someone, however, it offers you a great feeling and the courage to be yourself and to feel extraordinary.


We believe in what we do because we do it from the heart and love. There is a part of us in each single “handiwork”. We feel great that we can change something ordinary into something special and remind you that you are a personality.


A little but significant painting proves the fact that we are people who can admire, love and support not only creation and art but that we have an effort to inject a piece of extraordinary feature and creativity into everyday “predictable” world.


We use paints and brushes of the highest quality on the market.


Our campaign serves for a start-up business – to purchase a recyclable packaging and textile colors which are eco-friendly, durable and resistant to washing. The funds will be also used for photo shooting by a professional photographer with Master QEP certificate and professional models.   The resources will be used to present our company in mass media as well. 

How can you support us?

$5 contribution – THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!!!!! Everything counts.

PERK FOR HIM for $95 + shipping – you get a shirt with your hand painted monogram on the cuff and placket. Be sure to provide us your e-mail address so that we can contact you for your shirt size.

PERK FOR HER for $75 + shipping – you get a blouse with your hand painted monogram on the cuff and placket. Be sure to provide us your e-mail address so that we can contact you for your blouse size. 

Each contribution over $500 will be published on our website as the official sponsor of our company.

It is very important for us to get your feedback and help at our start. We will appreciate any of your observations, experience and opinions on our products. Let us know what you like, what you don’t and provide us with suggestions for improvements.

Our brand helps to build your business.

***************THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!***************

                                                  Mirka & Petra

                                                        m5 art

into something special and remind you that you are a personality. 
A little but
significant painting proves the fact that we are people who can admire, love
and support not only creation and art but that we have an effort to inject a
piece of extraordinary feature and creativity into everyday “predictable”
world.We use paints and brushes of the highest quality on the market.
Our campaign
serves for a start-up business – to purchase a recyclable packaging and textile
colors which are eco-friendly, durable and resistant to washing. The funds will
be also used for photo shooting by a professional photographer with Master QEP
certificate and professional models.   The
resources will be used to present our company in mass media as well.  
How can you
support us?
$5
contribution – THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!!!!! Everything counts. 
PERK FOR HIM
for $95 + shipping – you get a shirt with your
hand painted monogram on the cuff and placket. Be sure to provide us your
e-mail address so that we can contact you for your shirt size. 
PERK FOR HER
for $75 + shipping – you get a blouse with your
hand painted monogram on the cuff and placket. Be sure to provide us your
e-mail address so that we can contact you for your blouse size.  
Each
contribution over $500 will be published on our website as the official
sponsor of our company.
It is very
important for us to get your feedback and help at our start. We will appreciate
any of your observations, experience and opinions on our products. Let us know
what you like, what you don’t and provide us with suggestions for improvements.
Our brand
helps to build your business. 
***************THANK
YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!***************                                                  Mirka & Petra                                                        m5 art

story:
Your personal Magic Original Pants will lighten your everyday 'what-to-wear' problems.

The multi-functional Magic Original Pants can be worn for everyday tasks.
Size won't matter with the 'fit-to-shape' fabric allowing flexibility in the Magic Original Pants. The fabric is made of  72% viscose, 25% polyamide and 3% spandex.


O u r   P r o m i s e

Every quarter, we visit our factories to ensure the highest quality of work during our production process. From raw materials to the final product, we take each step of the production process seriously. We do high quality design in house and produce in fare terms within the EU.


T h e   M a g i c   O r i g i n a l   P a n t s   -   b l a c k 


T h e   M a g i c   O r i g i n a l   P a n t s   -   w h i t e


T h e   M a g i c   O r i g i n a l   P a n t s   -   n a v y 


T h e   M a g i c   O r i g i n a l   P a n t s   -   s a n d


P a c k a g e s

You want the Magic Original Pants in different colors ? Or maybe your friends want to order one too ? Great ! Save even more money with one of our special Magic Original Packages.


S t r e t c h g o a l s

If we reach 15,000$ we will launch 4 new colors:

gray, khaki, ecru, taupe

If we reach 20,000$ we will introduce the Magic original Pants with a 7/8 lentgh in 4 colors:

black, white, navy, sand

S i z e

ATTENTION: pants are rather big, please order one size smaller !

e.g: If you have a regular size 10, you should order a Magic Original Pants size 8.

Don't forget to send us an e-Mail with your name and your size !

We offer the following sizes:

2 - 18 (US)

4 - 20 (UK)

32 - 48 (EU)

Y o u r   B e n e f i t s

Pants with similar high standard quality state its cost in retail stores about $200. Since we cut the necessaries such as big marketing, floor rent and middleman we can cut the price down to $130 retail price. We offer a limited $99 charge for our Indiegogo contributors.

F A Q
Q: How do I select my size ?
A: Please send us an e-Mail to germany@magic-original.com with your name and your size after you ordered via Indiegogo. (ATTENTION: pants are rather big, please order one size smaller !)

Q: I purchased a Magic Original package. How do I choose the color(s) ?
A: Please send us an e-Mail to germany@magic-original.com with your name, the color(s) you want and your size after you ordered via Indiegogo.

Q: I purchased the Magic Original pants in one of the original colors and want to switch to a stretch goal color. Can I do that?

A: Yes! Send us an email at germany@magic-original.com and we'll take care of you.

Q: When will products will be available to ship?

A. As we have gone through all of our pre-production, we will be ready to put in our order at the conclusion of our campaign. We expect to have items on your doorstep in April.

Q: Do you ship internationally?

A: Yes, we ship worlwide. But if your not living within the U.S or the EU you have to add $20 shipping costs.



R i s k s  &  C h a l l e n g e s

Although we are working together with a very professional supplier, that has decades of experience an element of risk remains. But for a case of need we added buffers.You'll be the first one to know about any delays or unplanned hurdles.


B E   A M A Z E D
M A G I C    O R I G I N A L
www.magic-original.com

story:
about EZ T-frame

(Frame only. Clothes are just examples.)

 What if T-shirts that you don’t think you’re ever going to wear turn out to be fine decorative accessories? What if the pictures on the wall can be replaced as often as you want without cost? They're all possible with EZ T-frame.

(Frame only. Clothes are just examples.)

 With our EZ T-frame, T-shirts that are always stored in your drawers and never worn can turn out to be pieces of art.

(Frame only. Clothes are just examples.)

 During the off-season, do not just put your favorite sport team jerseys and T-shirts away. Now they can become perfect decorative accessories with EZ T-frame.

(Frame only. Clothes are just examples.)

 Hang your old good memories on the wall. It is now time for your infant and child clothing to get out of the box.

(Frame only. Clothes are just examples.)

 The EZ T-frame is made with recycled paper mainly. It is light, easy to keep, carry or store, and it helps recycling damaged or frayed T-shirts to be beautiful art frames on the wall.

Does this make sense to you? If so:    

  •  We invite you to secure your early access to the EZ T-frame, in special conditions, while also supporting it and helping to bring it into existence – please take a look at our rewards to choose how you will be part of this smart tool’s history.  
  •  We also invite you to share this campaign page with your friends and family members who may also want a EZ T-frame of their own.

Risks and challenges

 We really do not anticipate any special risks or challenges for this campaign. We have the produced, tried and tested prototypes, so the only challenge that we are looking at is that of getting the crowd to know about the EZ T-frame and back it. However, we believe that its utility is so obvious, that we believe it will generate the backing force it needs to come into existence.

story:
The Ascent Survivor paracord watch was created to be the most important survival tool in your arsenal of outdoor gear. Ascent’s conception started out of necessity for a better way of keeping crucial survival tools within reach. We designed our survival watch to withstand the lifestyle of a person who is constantly exploring and pushing their boundaries. With the Ascent Survival Watch unique design, overcoming adversity is never an arms' length away.

 The Conception

Creating the Ascent Survival Watch began after a simple realization. Keep the tools you need the most, right where you want them. We noticed casual hikers and the most extreme outdoor enthusiasts needed a better way of keeping their most essential tools close by. With this is mind, we knew that assembling the perfect collection of survival tools should not mean you have to sacrifice style for functionality.

Understanding that the most essential elements in a survivor’s kit usually has to do with three elements: Navigation, Food Supply and Safety applications. Encompassed in Ascent’s closure are the necessary tools packaged in a sleek and minimalistic way that makes sense. The enclosure unit composed of: Emergency whistle that emits a high pitch distress call that can alert rescuers. Miniature compass enclosed at a glance. Ferro Rod that when used with striker creates the necessary spark needed to start your fire. Serrated Striker that is used to spark a fire as well as strong enough to cut through necessary brush and shrubbery to build your fire.

Paracord was first used as suspension lines for U.S parachutes during WWII. Paracord has proven itself useful in hundreds, if not thousands of other lifesaving ways. The braided sheath has a number of interwoven nylon or polyester fiber cords. The braided sheath around the nylon fibers adds strength and flexibility to its overall design. This makes it compact, fashionable, and highly useful in survival situations.

Our team of designers have made numerous renditions to ensure our design and functionality made it more efficient when accessing the tools you need. After testing multiple watch faces, we found the traditional 3-hand illuminated analog face with date feature offered the easiest way to tell time in any situation.

 One of our biggest challenges was finding a way of combining a braid that would maximize the amount paracord per band as well as disassemble quickly when needed.

We found that the most commonly braided paracord patterns allowed for quick disassembly, yet sacrificed the overall length of paracord in the band.

To combat this, we designed our own Ascent Survival Paracord watch band weave, handmade to ensure maximum paracord length at 4.5-feet per band and unique customizable cord options.

Movement

We sought out to find the best input components on the market to make sure the Ascent Survivor was reliable when you need it most. Inside of the Ascent watches are Miyota 2415 Miyota which has been a reputable and reliable movement components for brands like Citizen for decades. Their movements are backed with industry leading accuracy and built to last.

 The Miyota 2415 exceeded our needs perfectly and ensured a quality timepiece. Furthermore, their movements are made with mercury-free batteries and in RoHS compliant facilities which is important when it comes to ensuring the well-being of our planet as we explore it.

Many believe that automatic watches are unmatched when it comes to reliability and timekeeping capabilities. That is a bold statement often said yet not typically the case, a quartz will tell time just as well, if not better. A quartz is a phenomenal alternative to an automatic movement. 

ASCENT WATCHES ARE BACKED WITH A WARRANTY

We believe in our watches. And you should too. If anything were to happen to your watch within the first 1 years, we hope that you will send it back to us for repair or replacement. We will cover all internal parts should they ever fail you.

SPECIFICATIONS:

- Case Diameter: 48 mm Case

 - Thickness: 12.1 mm 

 - Face Diameter: 35.9 mm 

- Band Material: 550 Grade Paracord 

- Band Width: 20 mm 

- Crown Material alloy 

 - Case Material: Alloy 

 - Back Plating: Stainless Steel 

 - Clasp: Fire Starter Buckle 

 - Clasp Material: Industrial Grade Plastic 

- Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass 

 - Display: Analog 

 - Movement: Japanese Miyota 2415 

 - Date Function: Yes 

 - Seconds Function: Yes 

 - Water Resistant: 5 ATM / 50 Meters 

Each band is equipped with 4.5 ft of paracord (data was based off the average wrist size of 7.5in).

We have established a solid relationship with our manufacturing partners over the last year. We choose to work with this reputable manufacturer group because of their attention to detail, quality control, and amazing customer service. 

There has been frequent communication between us and will continue to be throughout this entire process, talking about our goals and expectations. We can confidently say that our goals are aligned. We have developed multiple iterations of our prototype to ensure that our manufacture can back up what they promise. 

With your support we will be able to make this concept a reality. After the kickstarter campaign concludes we will send out surveys to get our backers information and then quickly begin the manufacturing process.

The bands are not adjustable each band will be made to fit the size you specify. The sizes available are ,6.5",7",7.5",8". When measuring your wrist we suggest you leave a little wiggle room to ensure proper fitting.

Ascent Survival consists of a small focused team built around the core value that when you are on the trail: only carry what works. Our team is made up of three outdoor extremists and built upon years of travel and backpacking across 4 continents. The team prides themselves on being multi-functional outdoor freaks and relish in the fact that any challenge should be easily overcome with the tools you choose to carry. With that being said, Leading product design and manufacturing relations will be the brother team of Jake and Riley. While Nick handles backer relations and concerns. With the amount of hours spent trail-testing and experimenting with various outdoor tools, we are confident in the purpose that Ascent will serve you all. With your support we will be able to make this outdoor idea, a household name.

story:
Contact Lens Case | Pill Organizer | Earrings Holder

 

Traditional contact lens cases are simply outdated.

They’re cheap, ugly, wasteful, and collect bacteria that can harm your eyes.

It’s time to change that!

 

 

How It Works

 
 
 

Highly Resistant to Bacteria

Your current contact cases are lined with growing bacteria. This bacteria attaches to your contact lenses and instantly transfers to your eyeballs.

ContaX cases repel bacteria in three ways:

  • The fabrication process of ContaX prevents the formation of biofilm (i.e. the accumulation of bacteria) by making the inner surface a smooth gliding curve so that bacteria cannot stick to it.
  • The material used in ContaX cases is higher grade and provides inherent microbial resistance.
  • ContaX is more durable and weather-resistant than traditional contact lens cases. This enables them to be easily washed with hot water and used is extreme climatic conditions with high allergens without disintegrating the material or affecting your lenses, making ContaX the SAFEST contact lens cases for your eyes! 

 

Leak-proof | Airtight

ContaX cases are leak-proof and airtight, so they prevent the contents of the case from spilling out and prevent external bacteria and other pollutants in the air from entering the case. you can travel with your ContaX cases comfortably.

 

Weather-Resistant

ContaX cases are undamaged in hot weather and cold weather. They prevent UV light and moisture from entering. ContaX cases also remain undamaged by certain everyday chemicals, so you can travel with your cases safely.

 

Magnetic | Stack | Customize

ContaX cases are magnetic so they can be stacked tall and straight to form a tower, stacked tall and staggered to form a spiral staircase and stacked sideways to form flower or other patterns. 

 
 

 

Pills Case

ContaX cases are great for storing pills because they:
  • Are antibacterial and airtight, keeping your pills clean and sanitary.
  • Prevent moisture from getting in, keeping your pills highly potent.
  • Are customizable with different color and stacking options, helping you track your pills easily.
 

 

Earrings Case

ContaX cases make great storage for small earrings because they are:
  • Airtight - preventing bacteria, dust and allergens from entering.
  • Shatter-Resistant - protecting your delicate and valuable earrings.
  • UV-resistant - protecting your earrings from discoloration and sun damage.
  • Corrosion-resistant - preventing moisture from entering that corrodes the metal of your earrings.
  • Hypoallergenic - certain plastics can cause allergies or skin rashes. ContaX is made from a high grade acrylic material that doesn't cause any skin sensitivities
Find these earrings on Etsy!
 
 
 

Click on the news below to be redirected to the article published.

 

 

 

Your style is an expression of who you are, and ContaX cases are designed to fit your personality. 

ContaX cases come in a variety of colors, and some rewards come with customized cases that make them even more unique!

 

Post a comment with the color of your choice!

 

 

 

Our mission is to create the perfect contact case for the modern contact lens wearer. That’s why we made our cases collapsible, leak-proof, and more lightweight than the bulky old cases you’re used to.

It’s time to toss your traditional contact lens cases and embark on a new revolution!

 

 

Background

I have worn contact lenses for almost a decade. As an athlete, they are way more convenient and safer for me than eye glasses. Throughout this time, however, I have struggled to properly care for my lenses: keeping sanitary, carrying in a compact travel-easy box and in fact even expressing my style! After I searched on every site I could think of, I realized that what I needed did not exist. After doing some research, I learned that other people struggle with the same issues and there's a demand for a great solution. Also, being an ex-Microsoft engineer, I had enough design and engineering knowledge to bring this project to fruition (quality engineering, effective testing, risk analysis, business projection etc.) Putting these knowledge and market need aspects together, I decided to create ContaX!

 

Partners

Jenny Miranda PR

Seattle Patent Group

Transcend Videography

Motivated Media

 

Follow ContaX

https://angel.co/contax-6

www.contaxlenscase.com

Find these earrings on Etsy!
 
 
 
Click on the news below to be redirected to the article published.   Your style is an expression of who you are, and ContaX cases are designed to fit your personality. ContaX cases come in a variety of colors, and some rewards come with customized cases that make them even more unique! Post a comment with the color of your choice!   Our mission is to create the perfect contact case for the modern contact lens wearer. That’s why we made our cases collapsible, leak-proof, and more lightweight than the bulky old cases you’re used to.It’s time to toss your traditional contact lens cases and embark on a new revolution!  BackgroundI have worn contact lenses for almost a decade. As an athlete, they are way more convenient and safer for me than eye glasses. Throughout this time, however, I have struggled to properly care for my lenses: keeping sanitary, carrying in a compact travel-easy box and in fact even expressing my style! After I searched on every site I could think of, I realized that what I needed did not exist. After doing some research, I learned that other people struggle with the same issues and there's a demand for a great solution. Also, being an ex-Microsoft engineer, I had enough design and engineering knowledge to bring this project to fruition (quality engineering, effective testing, risk analysis, business projection etc.) Putting these knowledge and market need aspects together, I decided to create ContaX! PartnersJenny Miranda PRSeattle Patent GroupTranscend VideographyMotivated Media Follow ContaXhttps://angel.co/contax-6www.contaxlenscase.com

story:
Differenziati da tutti. Indossa te stesso. Scegli un Lennoc per dire chi sei.

Who said that dressing well means to be identical? Why renouncing to a personal touch at work? Why not being always yourself, every day and in every occasion?

We answered these questions by designing some accessories that become part of any outfit, completing and enriching it with personality. They will become absolutely indispensable.

What day would it be without a Lennoc?

Perché vestirsi bene vuol dire essere uguali? Perché rinunciare a un tocco personale sul lavoro? Perché non essere sempre, ogni giorno, in ogni occasione, semplicemente te stesso?

La nostra risposta è stata immaginare alcuni accessori che diventano parte di ogni outfit, completandolo e arricchendolo di personalità. Diventeranno assolutamente irrinunciabili.

Che giorno è senza un Lennoc?


All of our products are made using the finest materials and natural fabrics, such as wood fabric and cork fabric, combined with precious silks and cashmere.

The idea of this original union originated from the desire to unite tradition and innovation, drawing inspiration from our land and our maternal grandmother’s creativity in tailoring ceremony dresses.

Cork is a real fabric, which maintains its natural colors and remains soft and smooth to the touch. The proposed match with precious silk makes our accessories unique and memorable. All of our products are handcrafted and Made in Italy.

Tutti i nostri prodotti nascono da materiali pregiati e tessuti naturali, come il tessuto di legno e il tessuto di sughero ai quali vengono abbinate pregiate sete e cashmere. L’idea di questa originale unione è nata dalla voglia di coniugare innovazione e tradizione, traendo ispirazione dal territorio locale e dalla grande creatività della nostra nonna materna nel confezionare abiti da cerimonia.

Il sughero è un vero e proprio tessuto, che conserva i suoi colori naturali, rimanendo morbido e liscio al tatto. L’abbinamento che qui proponiamo con pregiata seta rende i nostri accessori unici e indimenticabili. Tutti i nostri prodotti sono artigianali, e rigorosamente Made in Italy.

We love to imagine our accessories all-round, involving packaging too in the creation process to enhance the pleasure of using them. We love inserting echoes of our land, Calabria, in our products, making them more valuable and representative of this land potentiality.

Bergamot is a precious and world-renowned citrus fruit thriving in our coastal areas: we created an authentic emotional path, using its peel directly in the packaging of our products, especially in weekly packs.

That way, opening the package is a hymn to life: the tactile feeling of an authentic handcrafted box, the visual excitement coming from the evocative power of the union of unusual and precious fabrics, the olfactory emotion aroused by the light bergamot scent.

Ci piace l’idea di pensare agli accessori a tutto tondo, coinvolgendo anche il packaging nel processo di creazione e nel piacere della fruizione dell’oggetto stesso. Ci piace l’idea di inserire echi della nostra terra, la Calabria, nei nostri prodotti, valorizzandoli e facendoli portatori delle potenzialità di questo territorio.

Il nostro valore aggiunto è l’impiego attivo del bergamotto, un agrume pregiato e conosciuto in tutto il mondo, ma che proprio sulle nostre coste cresce rigoglioso.

Abbiamo creato un vero percorso emozionale, utilizzando la buccia di questo agrume, direttamente nel packaging dei nostri prodotti, in particolare nelle confezioni settimanali. In questo modo aprire i nostri prodotti è un inno alla vita: l’emozione tattile di uno scatolo artigianale, visiva per il potere evocativo dell’unione di tessuti insoliti e pregiati, olfattiva per il sottile aroma diffuso dal bergamotto.

Lennoc

Literally “la nnocca”, that is “ribbon” in Calabrian dialect. An ironic and refined accessory that allows to personalize and to make fascinating even the simplest look. They are crafted using cork or silk, to fit any style.

With the cork-made Lennoc, the temptation is always the same… to have them all!

Letteralmente “la nnocca”, che in calabrese significa fiocco. E’ un accessorio ironico e raffinato al contempo che permette di personalizzare e rendere intrigante anche il più semplice dei look.
Vengono realizzati in sughero o in seta, per adattarsi ad ogni stile.
Con i Lennoc in sughero, la tentazione è sempre la stessa... prenderli tutti!


The button sewn on the backside allows you to position this mini bow tie in your jacket and shirt buttonholes.

Il bottone cucito sul retro permette di posizionare questo mini papillon nelle asole delle vostre giacche o camicie.

Modern, original, precious, handcrafted… There it is the Lennoc!

Moderno, originale, pregiato, artigianale... ecco a voi il Lennoc!

Opuntia


The Lennoc… for her. Named after the prickly pear flower, it is an original accessory to embellish any outfit.

The manufacture is sartorial, made by skillful hands using silks with different weaves and colors.

La versione femminile del Lennoc. Il nome è quello del fiore del fico d’india, per un accessorio originale che impreziosirà ogni mise.
La manifattura è sartoriale, realizzata in seta da mani sapienti in diverse trame e colori.


Similarly to Lennoc, it can be buttoned to jackets and shirts buttonholes, to make your look unique and precious.

Come il Lennoc, si può abbottonare alle asole di giacche e camice, per impreziosire e rendere davvero unico ogni look.


…And you, what is your Opuntia?

E tu, di che Opuntia sei?

Pasuse

It is the acronym for “papillon” (bow tie), “sughero” (cork) and “seta” (silk). Striking, it is the perfect choice for people who want to leave their mark.

Pasuse è l’acronimo di papillion sughero e seta. Di grande impatto è perfetto per chi ama lasciare il segno.


Distinctive features? Posh!
Segni particolari? Elegantissimo!


The only problem with the Pasuse is that you won’t be able to do without it.


L'unico problema con il Pasuse è che non riuscirai più a farne a meno!


DREAMING REALITY | Sognando la realtà

Our purpose is to reach the minimum amount of 10.000 Euro. This money will be used to establish our company and to go into production, buying the raw material we need to craft all the proposed products.

Reaching the minimum sum will give us the greatest chance of our lives: founding a business in the land we love, Calabria. We would like to prove that it is not necessary to leave in order to create something.

Any amount above the minimum sum will be welcome, since it will help us to better manage the entire operation.


...and then?


Il nostro obiettivo è raggiungere la cifra minima di 10.000 euro. Con questi soldi potremo fondare la nostra azienda e andare in produzione, acquistando le materie prime che ci occorrono per realizzare tutti prodotti che vi abbiamo proposto.

Qualsiasi cifra sopra la quota minima sarà la benvenuta perché ci consentirà di gestire al meglio tutta l’operazione, ma almeno la possibilità di raggiungere la nostra quota base ci darà la più grande occasione della vita: iniziare la nostra attività nella terra che amiamo, la Calabria. Ci piacerebbe dimostrare che non è necessario andar via per creare qualcosa.



Marco&Davide

Vindica te tibi (Seneca)


We are two brothers, the love and passion for fashion is written in our DNA.

We live in south-Italy, in a wonderful land named Calabria, whose echoes inspired us in designing our collections.

We dream of an eco-sustainable fashion, which dresses itself with the territory in which it originates and combines tradition and innovation, producing unusual and elegant products using the finest materials.

Ours is a small artisan reality, in which we try to get qualified artisans involved. We like to imagine ourselves as a small dream factory.

Our biggest dream is that our company becomes reality.
We need your help to succeed.

Help us to make it happen!



Siamo due fratelli, con l’amore e la passione per la moda scritta nel nostro Dna. Viviamo nel Sud, in una terra bellissima, la Calabria, dai cui echi ci siamo lasciati guidare nel progettare tutte le nostre collezioni.

Sogniamo una moda ecosostenibile, che si vesta del territorio in cui nasce e coniughi tradizione e innovazione, creando prodotti inusuali ed eleganti con materiali pregiati.

La nostra è una piccola realtà artigianale, nella quale cerchiamo di coinvolgere artigiani specializzati. Ci piace immaginarci come una piccola fabbrica di sogni.

Il nostro sogno oggi è il più grande di tutti: far diventare la nostra azienda una realtà. E per farlo ci serve l’aiuto di tutti voi.

Aiutaci a farlo succedere!

story:
Short Summary

I have been wanting to start an automotive club for a long time; I tried in 2017 & failed. So I tried again learning from my past mistakes and challenges and created LAME AF in 2020 with four friends. We have successfully launched a full scale show back in October of 2020 with over 800 attendee's and we want to do a lot more in the future. But, we decided that we also want to make ourselves a brand. A brand with a fun background and cool designs for shirts, and stickers and much more! 

 

What We Need

Currently we have a small supply of merchandise left from our first show; but they're all of our original ideas and concepts. We have been able to introduce 5 new slap stickers into our line up earlier in February; but we want to start producing these new shirt concepts as well as new sticker slap designs. 

  • To purchase roughly 100 shirts, we need an estimated $900
  • To purchase 100 new slaps with four new designs, we need $300

The Impact

The idea of LAME AF Clothing Co & Car Club is to build a better working relationship with the community & local law enforcement. Most car clubs are frowned upon unless they're from a classic car club. So we want to be able to build brand awareness and show that we care about the community we are apart of here in Wisconsin and the Green Bay & Appleton area. 

  • We successfully raised over 50 canned goods & over a dozen of toys in our last drive. 
  • We want to be able to give back to the community; so with the more money we have the larger types of events we are able to host in order to give back to the community around us. 

Risks & Challenges

 

Currently the biggest huddle we face is the ability to get a lot of traction. We have attended several large shows and have boothed, which means to sell our merchandise there; and we are slowly building up our name! It just takes time; each time we go to a show and booth, more people begin to know who we are! So our biggest challenge is time and awareness. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The biggest way you can help out if you can't donate is to go to our Facebook Page & our Instagram page and share our pictures! We post to Instagram once a day Monday-Friday, we keep our story active on the weekends, and we try to post to Facebook more than once or twice a day! 

Please do be sure to check out our store too! We do sell a plethora of merchandise!

story:
Hello and Welcome!

I'm Melinda Milton, a mother,  artist, actress and sharer of good vibes living in Los Angeles, CA. 

  • My work has been primarily undertaken in traditional mediums such oil and acrylics.  Upon discovering the immense versatility of the digital pinting, I have been given the freedom to bring beautiful works together with no "drying time" for use on apparel.
  • Your contribution will unlock the possibility of funding the most expensive and truly important aspect of my business. 

 I hope that you will show some love and support in bringing my vision of sharing wearable art with the world.

What We Need & What You Get

  • My goal is to raise $2,100 for start up costs.
  • These cost break down as follows:
    • Trademark Registrations and Filing Fees with USPTO
    • Printing  samples of each design for quality assurance before public release.
    • Advertisement
    • Printing a limited run for onsite sales at exhibitions and shows.
  • Every high-quality shirt will be made from  %100 cotton.
  • Updates on availability of designs will announced before the campaign ends.
  •  Perks will be fulfilled by December 2018

The Impact

  • T-Shirts can become like an old friend. They spend a lot of time with you, they bring comfort, joy and most importantly; they've got you're back (t-shirts have your front too).

With the advent of print on demand I have been able to actually see my work on T-shirts, just like I envisioned. Initially my shirts will be printed as such and available through my website and a number of online retail sites. I presently have 10 designs available on Amazon.

 I'd like to create a whole line of T-shirts that bring splashes of beauty and humor to the world . My goal is to create and make available 40 designs/styles by the end of the year and 100 by March 1, 2019. The trademarks I intend to file are to protect those creations and brand name without the infringement of pirates (no arg).

My goal for the near future, is to run a limited series of screen printed T's from a local  screen print shop.

Risks & Challenges

Designs will be released and made available for selection once the application is filed. The actual approval process  and registration takes up to six months. I already have a cache of designs that I am waiting to release once I have at least begun the trademark application. 

I am really excited to share them but the challenge is spreading the word. Through social media and enlisting the help of friends and family, I hope to create a beautiful ad campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your family and friends using the share tools on this page.

Thank you so much for your support!

Melinda

story:
New Perspective for Accessories

 

We are inspired from the magnificent view of the infinite sky before we designed this bracelet. The fascinating view of cosmic clouds made us imagine to carry something in our wrist which reflects the same ambiance.It's a perfect gift for the people who can not decide something different.

So, we decided to create My Infinity with unseen futuristic design. At the beginning we could not able to create lots of designs because of unsufficent funds.It's a perfect gift for the people who can not decide something different.

However, we can assure you there will be further unique designs with your support. Currently, we have 5 liquid color options. We believe that unique futuristic design reflects your uniqueness ...

Prototypes of bracelet are almost ready.We can produce one size and 5 colors at the beginning.

For additional questions and requests please reach us from this Email adress.

myinfinitytr@gmail.com

 

Inner size : 65mm*60mm

Width:    27 mm

Stainless steel and liquid patch

Hıgh quality box
