The fascinating view of cosmic clouds made us imagine to carry something in our wrist which reflects the same ambiance.It's a perfect gift for the people who can not decide something different.So, we decided to create My Infinity with unseen futuristic design. At the beginning we could not able to create lots of designs because of unsufficent funds.It's a perfect gift for the people who can not decide something different.However, we can assure you there will be further unique designs with your support. Currently, we have 5 liquid color options. We believe that unique futuristic design reflects your uniqueness ...Prototypes of bracelet are almost ready.We can produce one size and 5 colors at the beginning.For additional questions and requests please reach us from this Email adress.myinfinitytr@gmail.com Inner size : 65mm*60mmWidth:    27 mmStainless steel and liquid patchHıgh quality box

story:
VARDIER was born in Australia when we tried to find sunglasses that combined sustainable materials and timeless style in a modern way.

After we couldn’t find what we were looking for, we decided to make them ourselves.

This collection features classic designs, comfortable styles and quality materials that are sustainable and durable.

Our action for sustainability is grounded in respect for our natural environment.

We want to move away from fast fashion, developing sunglasses that are designed to last.

 

 
We have designed a range of classic styles, working with the best suppliers in the world to craft them. We use the highest quality, sustainable new and recycled materials we can source.
 
We have developed an initial collection of 2 classic unisex styles.
 
Each style is available in 3 different iconic colorways, with 2 lens color options.
 
 
 

Our talented design team has spent many hours refining and perfecting our designs, ensuring that our sunglasses are stylish, comfortable and complement every face.

We were inspired by iconic styles, making subtle updates to bring them into the modern era.

We have spent the past few months working with leading manufacturers and suppliers to bring prototypes to life.

The final result is a timeless and comfortable collection.

 
 
 
 
 
 
We have worked with the best suppliers from all over the world to ensure that your new sunglasses are made from most sustainable, eco-friendly materials where possible.
 
We’re proud of the quality of the raw eco-materials that are cut, polished and shaped into a pair of VARDIER sunglasses.

Frames are cut and crafted from premium cellulose acetate sourced from Castiglione Olona in Italy, produced by the worldwide manufacturing leader and family company Mazzucchelli 1849 S.p.A.

Cellulose acetate is known for being strong, lightweight, and flexible.

It also has the widest range for transparency, rich colors, and finishes, and is hand polished and assembled into your VARDIER frame.

We offer 3 frame colorways in each style.

Lenses are produced specially for VARDIER by the internationally leading manufacturer Carl Zeiss AG, founded in Jena, Germany in 1846.

They are rated category 3 - UV400, and will protect you against 100% of solar UVA and UVB radiation.

The most versatile lens colors were grey and green, providing optimum general purpose use, good contrast for low-light conditions, even and true color perception and reduction of eye fatigue.

Each style is available with both lens colors. They also feature a laser-etched VRDR (VARDIER) logo.

Hinges and wire cores are formed by the worldwide leader in metal components, Visottica Industrie S.p.a. based in Susegana, Italy.

We use high-performance 5-barrel hinges paired with special components designed for use with our premium cellulose acetate.

Your VARDIER sunglasses feature real metal wire cores, giving strength and enabling fit and wear adjustments.

The screws and rivets are made from stainless steel, and designed to be tightened at home if they loosen.

 

Not all sunglasses are made equal.

Injection molded sunglasses are made from petroleum derived synthetic polymers and other plastics. They use Polyethylene terephthalate (PET or PETE), which is a general-purpose thermoplastic polymer.

VARDIER sunglasses are crafted from the most sustainable materials available.

We use cellulose acetate, which is a natural material manufactured from purified natural cellulose.

Our natural cellulose is made from pure cotton and renewable wood pulp.

This means that the final product is hypoallergenic, lightweight and very strong.

 

We have simplified the reward structure to make it easy for you to choose your favourite styles and colors.

The VARDIER sustainable sunglass collection is a limited edition offering, with only 50 produced per frame and lens color combination.

Ivy is a classically styled wayfarer with a modern update to create one of the most wearable and versatile sunglass designs.

Olive is a contemporary style featuring a refined panto shape and keyhole bridge, crafted to create a sense of elegance and timeless cool.

We have worked hard to ensure that both styles offer a comfortable fit, here are the specifications:

All measurements are in millimetres.

VARDIER backers will receive your sunglasses in a branded box together with a:

  • Natural felt re-usable medium soft carry pouch,
  • Cleaning cloth to keep your sunglasses looking fresh,
  • Care booklet.

All backers will also receive a premium cotton twill VARDIER branded tote bag.

Made with a longer handle, it is perfect for wearing over the shoulder.

The tote bag is also available separately.

 

We want you to enjoy your VARDIER sunglasses anywhere in the world, so we offer free worldwide* shipping.

Duties and customs fees that may be imposed by the destination country are the responsibility of the backer. Unfortunately we are unable to give advice as to whether your destination country will impose a customs fee and how much that customs fee may be.

* We will do our best to get these to you as fast as possible, however there can be restrictions on shipping that are outside of our control. We will contact you if there is an issue.

 

 

Thank you for reading, we hope that you back us!

Please share with your friends and family!

Thanks from the VARDIER team...

story:
<Photo by Thomas Kelley >

 

The effort to save the earth

We do many things to save our environment.  Use tumblers instead of single-use plastic cups, non-plastic straws, eco-friendly market bags over plastic bags and so on.

I agree with the idea of #zerowaste movement, and it would be very pleasant to see more people try to waste less.

As I am a bag maker, I wanted to do something about #zerowaste.  But, I did not want to be another eco-friendly market bag maker since there are plenty of them already.

 

Encounter

One day, I found a pair of old glasses in my drawer which I don't wear because of too many scratches on the lens surface.  

 

If I were careful enough, I would still wear them until now, instead of getting a new pair.

Some of my friends have the same issue, and others don't.  If your eyes are sensitive to those scratches and your vision feels a bit blurred, you would replace them with new ones. 
Because a blurred vision is not helpful when you want to focus on your work.

If you want lenses made with real glass, it would not be a problem.  However, plastic lenses are far more practical than real glass.  It doesn't shatter like glass, is easy to shape and weighs much less than real glass. 

 

As long as we use plastic lenses, scratches are inevitable.  

 

Question

How can I extend the life cycle of lenses? 
Another word, how can I keep my lenses scratch-free at minimal cost? 
If it's too expensive, why bother.

 

Problems

Most of the scratches are due to the poor choice of cleaning method.

Here are some examples.

The best way to clean lenses is to use the microfiber cleaning cloth that comes with a new pair of glasses. 

 

"However, they are not available to you when you need. "

 

It's not your fault.  You were out of options.  That's why you had to use t-shirts to clean your lenses.  Expressway to scratch land.

 

Research

I asked around why people have a hard time to carry that cloth, even though they know it's the best cleaning material for the eyewear lenses.

 

1) Collects Dust

Due to the nature of the surface structure, it collects dust and debris very well.  You can't carry it alone.  You need a sort of pouch.

 

2) Nobody likes folding

In order to put it in a pouch, you need to fold it.  Who has time for folding such a tiny piece of fabric?  And, taking it out of pouch is also troublesome.

 

3) The Eyewear Container

It seems OK to use.  It keeps the cloth away from dust and taking out and restoring action was not that troublesome.  However, it's too bulky to carry around.

 

Solution

1) We need a pouch which does not take much space.
2)Taking out and restoring action should be seamless.
3) It should look good to carry.  Your style is very important to us.
4) Affordability.  Can't emphasize enough of that because you need more than one to keep them around you all the time.  Your office desk, home, car, and your bag deserve one respectively.

If it's easy enough to use and becomes part of your daily life, you could extend the life cycle of lenses and waste less.   You could save money, too.   Those prescription lenses are expensive. Very much.

 

After many sketches and samples...

GOPOD was born.

 

 

GOPOD

It's an easy to use storage pod for a Microfiber Fabric for cleaning glasses & lenses with a built-in retractable pull and follows you wherever you go.

 

How does 'GOPOD' work?

 

1) Pick up the 'GOPOD', then release the cord with metal tab.

 

 

2) Squeeze the pod a little bit to widen the opening and grab the cloth with your fingers.

 

3) Pull the cloth all the way back.

 

4) Clean your glasses thoroughly

 

 

5) Pull the metal tab all the way back.  It will restore the cloth in a second.  Literally.

 

6) Restore the pull

 

7) Voila.  Enjoy your brighter vision

 

 

You can watch the whole cleaning process in the following video.

 
 
 
 

Benefits from 'GOPOD'

 

1) Better Vision, Better Focus

<Photo by Petr Sevcovic >

It is obvious.  If there are too many scratches on the lens surface, things will look a bit blurred.  Eventually, you'll get a headache and feel tired.

 

2) Protect your investment

I've spent an average of $150 just for the prescription lenses.  They are not cheap. 

If you take 'GOPOD' everywhere and clean lenses with the microfiber cleaning cloth, you may save a few hundred bucks in years.

If you have high-end camera lenses, you could save more.  

<Photo by Jakob Owens >

 

<Photo by ShareGrid >

 

Always use a microfiber product to clean optical lenses.  If it's not around...

"We Recommend GOPOD"

 

<Photo by Jay Wennington>

Who knows?  You may get a chance to enjoy a fine dining with the savings.

 

3) Looking Good

This classical design makes GOPOD as fashion accessories.

 

<Photo by Zahir Namane >

If you are a suit guy, perfecto. 

It fits into your pocket.  And, nobody will notice.

 

<Photo by Debora Cardenas>

Not to mention those beautiful ladies with pretty handbags.

 

<Photo by Csaba Balazs>

Tech boy? You are my guy, too. 

 

<Photo by Justin Main>

Photographer?  Please. 
Come on.  You definitely need GOPODs.

 

4) Waste Less

Longer lens lifecycle guarantees less waste.  Then, mother nature will pay you back with less microplastic filled fishes.  What goes around comes around.

 

 

Affordable

So you can get a bunch.

We want you to feel secure wherever you go when it comes to cleaning lenses. 
They should be available to you when you need.  

That is why affordability is so important to us.  

GOPOD will retail for $9.   
In this campaign, however, you can get up to 55% discount ( only for first 200 backers )
It's $4 for each GOPOD.  Go get'em tiger!

 

Just keep them in following locations.  Make them available to you all the time.

<Places you want to keep GOPODs >

 

GOPOD Features

 

1) High-quality Vegan Leather

OK.  Vegan Leather is just a nicer way to call the synthetic or man-made faux leather. However, our vegan leather feels really good and the texture looks so real.  Even the wrong side of the leather has real suede-like texture.  And, no animal was harmed.  It's made of PVC.

 

2) Drawstring made with high-quality bungee cord

This cord is made for the professional climbing gear.  It will last longer.  Much longer than you expect.

 

3) Weight is only 25g or 0.9 oz

It is so light.  You won't recognize it's in your pocket or bag.

 

 

4) Fits into your palm

The size would be 2"x 4.5" and the thickness 0.5" approx.  

 

 

5) Replaceable cleaning cloth

 

You can wash it or replace with a new one when it becomes unusable.

GOPOD comes with one microfiber cleaning cloth, but you may have many of them already.

You can also use them, too.   Just make a hole about 1mm diameter in the middle of the cloth, and penetrate it with the bolt and screw back into the rivet.  You are all set.

<Photo by wilhei>

An awl is a perfect tool to make a hole.  You may use a perforating tool for leathercraft, too.

 

The pre-punched cleaning cloth is available when you check out.  Look for add-ons.

 

6) Various Color Options

GOPOD comes with 5 colors.  

 

 

 

Hello,  I am Donni

 

 

We have a small shop for handmade bags in Busan. 

A beautiful harbor city in South Korea.

 

 

It's called ALLOPEBBLE and we make bags like below.

 

Your orders will be made with exceptional quality.

Yes.  They will be made in Korea, not anywhere else.

 

 

Timeline

 

 

You may get your perks around mid-October. 

Sounds good?

 

 

<Photo by Jesse ramirez>

 

Perks

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you feel like you need more cleaning cloths, you can add them to your order before you check out.  Our cleaning cloth is made of premium microfiber fabric and it is thicker than the one you got for free when you buy a pair of glasses.  

Also, it is pre-punched in the middle for future installation.  

 

 

Is it available other than Indiegogo?

Nope.  This is our first time to introduce GOPOD.   
If you watched the video clip above, it says at the end...

 

 

 

 

<Photo Credit for the promotion video>
 Brunel Johnson / Jasmin Sessler  / Alex Iby /  Nadine Shaabana / Pixabay

story:
ONE FOR ONE MASK

Buy one mask for you, so a refugee get's one too!

Please help us to raise money in order for us to go into our mask production and be part of a bigger game: ONE MASK FOR YOU, ONE MASK FOR SOMEBODY IN NEED.  You can also decide whether to just donate the masks. It is crucial to protect people such as refugees, who are already living in concentrated and critical conditions, therefore making it much harder to isolate themselves from others as we can.

An estimated 25% of people with Coronavirus feel perfectly fine and don't know they are infected and could be contagious. And guess what? You could very well be one of them. That's why you should wear a mask to protect other people from your stealth germs. 

WHO WE ARE

We are Sara Pacifici, Bernhard Schoenhuber and Daniel Tocca from Kauristore and Re-Bello, the first sustainable lifestyle store and brand of Northern Italy. 

We have teamed up with our friend Tessa, a selfmade Comic Designer, who runs a little label called "The Sketchup Club" and is always looking for sustainable collaborations and helping people in need by doing so. Together we created the campaign:

Buy one mask for you, so a refugee get's one too!

As you might know, the Corona Crisis has hit Italy and the rest of the world very hard.  The virus has taken many people away from us, turned the world upside down, created changes in the whole economy and daily life, that will have an impact on our future. Yes, the world maybe needed to press pause, to raise awareness and say hold on! We have to change. 

We have been working now for almost ten years as really early birds in the field of sustainable fashion with our brand "Re-Bello". This year we put our long dream of opening the first 100% sustainable lifestyle store, our little "Kauri Store", into reality. As we also got hit hard by this crisis we thought about how we can improve our life but also the life of others? We know that in Europe most of us are lucky enough to protect ourselves with masks,  but we also know that many people don´t have that privelige nor can really practice social distancing. 

Well, so we reached out to our producers and asked them to produce... masks! We believe that masks will be needed for quite some time from now on, considering that many countries already set up compulsary mask use policies. Also we believe that dentists, cosmetics, hotel personell and so on will always find a need in using them for the next months/years. The World Health Organization suggests the use of masks (also non medical) for stopping the spread of COVID19:

https://www.who.int/publications-detail/advice-...

Let´s be transparent!
Our "oneforonemask" will be a nonmedical, waterrepellent and sanitized antibacterial mask, which is washable at 60 degrees.  Wash your ONE FOR ONE MASK every evening, it will dry in very little time and you can reuse it. Why buying cheap non medical single use masks if you can buy a washable, waterrepellent mask and donate one to a refugee? Thanks to our collaboration with #refugeesupporteurope we will also guarantee the shipping of the masks to their project in Cyprus and wherever they are needed. If you decide to invest in this campaign, you will receive a mask once we go into production. If the campaign does not go through, Indiegogo will refund you your money. So nothing to lose. 

CYPRUS IS NR.1 Country in EUROPE hosting the MOST REFUGEES PER CAPITA (01/2020) 

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/world/europe...

Let's donate a smile to people who do not really have a reason to smile and also to ourselves!!! Help us to reach the production budget!!

It is crucial to protect people such as refugees, who are already living in concentrated and critical conditions, therefore making it much harder to isolate themselves from others as we can.An estimated 25% of people with Coronavirus feel perfectly fine and don't know they are infected and could be contagious. And guess what? You could very well be one of them. That's why you should wear a mask to protect other people from your stealth germs. WHO WE AREWe are Sara Pacifici, Bernhard Schoenhuber and Daniel Tocca from Kauristore and Re-Bello, the first sustainable lifestyle store and brand of Northern Italy. We have teamed up with our friend Tessa, a selfmade Comic Designer, who runs a little label called "The Sketchup Club" and is always looking for sustainable collaborations and helping people in need by doing so. Together we created the campaign:Buy one mask for you, so a refugee get's one too!As you might know, the Corona Crisis has hit Italy and the rest of the world very hard.  The virus has taken many people away from us, turned the world upside down, created changes in the whole economy and daily life, that will have an impact on our future. Yes, the world maybe needed to press pause, to raise awareness and say hold on! We have to change. We have been working now for almost ten years as really early birds in the field of sustainable fashion with our brand "Re-Bello". This year we put our long dream of opening the first 100% sustainable lifestyle store, our little "Kauri Store", into reality. As we also got hit hard by this crisis we thought about how we can improve our life but also the life of others? We know that in Europe most of us are lucky enough to protect ourselves with masks,  but we also know that many people don´t have that privelige nor can really practice social distancing. Well, so we reached out to our producers and asked them to produce... masks! We believe that masks will be needed for quite some time from now on, considering that many countries already set up compulsary mask use policies. Also we believe that dentists, cosmetics, hotel personell and so on will always find a need in using them for the next months/years. The World Health Organization suggests the use of masks (also non medical) for stopping the spread of COVID19:https://www.who.int/publications-detail/advice-...Let´s be transparent!Our "oneforonemask" will be a nonmedical, waterrepellent and sanitized antibacterial mask, which is washable at 60 degrees.  Wash your ONE FOR ONE MASK every evening, it will dry in very little time and you can reuse it. Why buying cheap non medical single use masks if you can buy a washable, waterrepellent mask and donate one to a refugee? Thanks to our collaboration with #refugeesupporteurope we will also guarantee the shipping of the masks to their project in Cyprus and wherever they are needed. If you decide to invest in this campaign, you will receive a mask once we go into production. If the campaign does not go through, Indiegogo will refund you your money. So nothing to lose. CYPRUS IS NR.1 Country in EUROPE hosting the MOST REFUGEES PER CAPITA (01/2020) https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/world/europe...Let's donate a smile to people who do not really have a reason to smile and also to ourselves!!! Help us to reach the production budget!!

story:
Hi Backers! 

We are looking for your help to create  limited edition collectable watches. Our core vision is to make watches that feature Swiss Movements and unique design elements. Watches that get you noticed and that can be passed down from one generation to the next.

Both The Grand Icon C and Grand Icon L feature a Swiss Movment that features a dual time zone, day night indicator, 24 hour clock, day and date of week. The Grand Icon L features a stainless steel case with an 18K rose gold finish. Both watches without crown measure 46 mm in size.

Key Information

1. Solid 316 Stainless Steel Construction.

2. 100 percent genuine leather band.

3. Sapphire Crystal.

4. 46 mm case, 12 mm depth.

5. Swiss ISA Movement with, 24 hour clock @ the 12 o’clock position, Second Time Zone @ the 6 o’clock position with an incorporated Day Night Indicator, Day of the Week @ the 9 o’clock position and Day of the Month @ the 3 o’clock position.

6. 3 Year warranty on the case and movement.

7. Radius has experience in making high end watches including watches for Harvard, Yale and Dartmouth universities.

8. Only 299 Worldwide builds will be offered and each watch will be laser engraved on the watch case with your specific number from 1-299.

9. Each watch will come with a Certificate of Authenticity, hand signed by our founder.

10. Each watch comes with a set of AutoCad drawings placed by hand into an envelope and sealed with a wax seal.

 

Risks and Challenges

Prior to this offer we launched the Radius watches for Harvard, Yale and Dartmouth. We received zero returns so we are confident in our ability to deliver a super premium watch. Each watch is individually tested for water resistance and our inspection procedures are first rate. We offer a 3 year limited warranty on our watch case and movement.
Both the Radius Grand Icon C and Radius Grand Icon L prototypes are finished and seen in the video so we are confident that this order will go smoothly. If there is a delay, our policy is to inform you of the delay, the reason for the delay and what action we have taken to correct the delay. We owe you our customer the truth told in a timely matter and we operate under the belief that a mistake is only a mistake as long as it remains uncorrected.

story:
https://www.elgiswatch.com

 

 

It started in mid-2015 by a group of youth who took interest in high-end watches and had a will to create high-quality watches, wanting giving total exclusivity to the community yet with an affordable price tag. The concept is to create a breakthrough in design with an exclusive feel to it. After attempts and research of watches, art, design, material, and with our own encounters with communities, now we present our Masterpiece under the name Elgis Watch, divided into two series Wilwatikta I and Wilwatikta II. So What we need is your support to get this project into production phase.

 

In the making of design, we got a big question, "can we create watch design from an ancient heritage that suits modern looks?" that is quite challenging yet tempting to us. Finally, we found the answer is to create a breakthrough that brought back an ancient heritage art that is inherited by WILWATIKTA (MAJAPAHIT) empire.

WILWATIKTA (Sanskrit name of Majapahit Empire) whose reign from 1350 to 1389 was marked by conquest which extended through Southeast Asia is inherit a lot of artifacts, works of art, and also a great story about the kingdom that describes strength and masculinity of the king. Until now WILWATIKTA considered the strongest kingdom in Southeast Asia. We believe by making watches with this design it's not just the watch that tells the time but art on your wrist that had an emotional bond.

 

Big thing starts from scratch, it was the time when we draft the initial design to get the perfect design proportion.

The dial design is a combination of Majapahit symbol and the art (Artefact, Statue) that inherent by WILWATIKTA ( Majapahit) Empire.

 

After 6 months of research and design process, we move to the next step, making the 3D CAD to visualize the concept with precise measurement

but 3D CAD is not enough, to make sure the design is perfect and comfortable to use we create several dummies with 3Dprinter. We studied numerous 3D-printed models to make sure we have the best model with the best ergonomic fit. 

Instead of injection molding, we choose the CNC Milling process to preserve a high accuracy case shape. On the finish, CNC Milling has offered better quality since a tighter tolerance can be held and a better surface finish can be obtained.The only disadvantage for milling is that every part has lots of machining time thus resulting in higher cost prices and take time. But for high quality watches the price is secondary to the quality of the end product.

For the material, we concern about its durability, toughness, and ergonomic.Stainless steel 316L and Cusn8 Bronze, both are the timeless material over the world.finally, the product is hand polished to create two different polish brush finish and mirror finish. 

WE PRESENT WILWATIKTA I AND WILWATIKTA II 

 

The sleek WILWATIKTA I is dedicated to all dress watch enthusiast who wants to add distinct cultural value to the watch, rather than a plain conventional design. The uniqueness of the dial and the 316l stainless case would balance every formal occasion. WILWATIKTA I would also stand out in casual wear with its contrast dial-marker and bold hands. The silver curvy case design is the symbol of versatility and uniqueness. By having Miyota 9015 movement and authentic engraved dial, WILWATIKTA I is ready to be your wrist partner in any occasion.

 

 

The classic WILWATIKTA II is a perfect company to your wrist by adding character and vintage look. A trademark patina, the CuSn8 bronze becomes darker and more discolored over time due to body heat, humidity, and climatic factor. It's all about to make it individual. We complete the elegance of the bronze material with gray signature "WILWATIKTA" dial and gray nubuck leather strap to match the aesthetic. We choose a Miyota 9015 movement, a desire for every watch lovers. No doubt, it is individual.

 

 

 

Movement is the most important part to watches, we choose Miyota 9015 because of its accuracy and durability. You can still wound the movement like the manual hand winding and it has hacking feature.

 

In order to pursue total exclusivity, we will ship the watches with solid wood watch box.

 

 

 

We Will attempt to keep this project right at the timeline if there is any changes or delay we will give you an update. We Will Shipped the product Right after it pass the QC and ship to you directly from Indonesia on Oct 2017.

Without any compromise in quality, we collaborate with manufacturers with experienced in creating high-quality watches that has a price tag above 1,000 USD. with an utmost guarantee on the quality. We will update any information of the manufacturing progress until the product has been shipped.

Please bear in mind that different countries might apply different Customs Duties and Import VAT that may be collected upon arrival. Any completion of the payment or delay of the delivery to the local address will be the responsibility of the buyer.

 

 

FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
We will give free worldwide shipping using EMS Indonesia. We will give the tracking code after the watches has been shipped on http://ems.posindonesia.co.id. Shipping will take approximately 1- 3 month depends on the destination country, but if you want to get it fast, you can use airmail by choosing the airmail option when you check out it. This Product Will be shipped on October 2017. 

LIMITED 250 PIECES
We only produce 250 pieces for each WILWATIKTA, 250 for WILWATIKTA I and 250 Pieces for WILWATIKTA II  which mean 500 pieces in both series. we produce a limited product to ensure your total Exclusivity. don't Wait and grab it fast.

30 DAYS RETURN GUARANTEE
You can return the watches if you receive it in unacceptable condition and or you feel it is not the product that you wanted. 30 days applied after you received the watches that we can see on the shipment tracking. Terms and condition may be applied please visit https://www.elgiswatch.com

1 YEAR WARRANTY
The watch warranty time is valid for one year after delivery date. The warranty covers material and manufacturing defects existing at the date of delivery of the purchased watch. During the warranty period, you will have the right to have any defect repaired free of charge.Terms and condition may be applied please visit https://www.elgiswatch.com

story:
Dear friend, 

I can recall a time when, as a little boy, I was lying on the grass on a sunny afternoon looking at the clouds changing shape in front of my very eyes. I can recall a time when my friend and I were playing in the woods – we thought we were soldiers, or cops, or super heroes. We could play for hours and we never saw the time fly away as we had so much fun.

I can recall a time when we were playing a game called “tag BBQ”. The goal was simple: touch a girl and get kissed. Then, when she’s “touched” she runs after boys to get kissed which was cool when you were “the chosen one”. I still remember the joy I felt when I succeeded beautifully.

The World and the Universe seemed so much of a fun place back then. All was to explore. All was to enjoy. All was so beautiful. Everything seemed so friendly.

I can’t remember exactly when this “joie de vivre” disappeared but it happened. Year after year, day after day, I had less and less until I got so low I felt like if I had a rusted knife in my heart and some obscure power was twisting it slowly. Haven’t you questioned yourself to the point you are wondering why you are living? I don’t want this message to be another sob story but it gets better. Hang on.

From elementary school right to my short lived corporate job career, I felt like I was stuck in a vise and all that was surrounding me was crushing, molding, and bending me to get and fit into a life that wasn’t mine.

One day, a friend gave me a book I “had to read”. This book had supposedly changed his life even though he looked exactly the same. I didn’t know who the author was or what I would find in the book. Sure I would find some secret from people whom I despised or I thought were in a special league I would never be a part of.

As a was reading the book a little short five-word sentence caught my attention: “Your Only Limit Is You”.

I was mesmerized at first but then I felt like I’ve been godded new powers. For the first time in years, I could still feel like when I was a little boy playing in the woods or running after girls for a kiss.

I knew it was okay to be who I was. That I could be unique and different and that I should accept myself. I knew it was okay to have dreams. I knew I was in total control of my life. Everything shifted from impossibilities to the realm of possibilities. I knew I was entitled to greatness and all begins with me. I felt like I was limitless.

My life didn’t turn around in a blink of an eye. I didn’t buy a Lamborghini the next day or a mansion in the Hollywood Hills, or received hundreds of SMS from Gisele Bundchen and Jessica Chastain. At least, “Your Only Limit Is You” gave me the courage to begin my long journey.

“A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” –Laozi

Today, we - Pier-Luc and myself (Simon) - are doing a crowdfunding campaign to fund a new breathtaking clothing brand that could possibly change the World. This brand is a tribute to the individualists who are craving to make their inner desires a reality because life's too short to be insignificant.

Here are our t-shirts :

 

YOUR ONLY LIMIT IS YOU

The phrase that was the starting point for me. The key that unlocked my true self and gave me “la force” to be who I wanted to be or be the real me. You are your only limit after all.

 

YOU ARE LIMITLESS

Simple but to the point. The “limitless” t-shirt means that you are limitless. You are born with an unlimited potential. Thus, the “limitless” t-shirt symbolizes your understanding about the psychology behind every great undertaking that put a dent in the Universe.

 

YOU ARE LIMITLESS ... REALLY

“Whether you think you can, or you think you can't - you're right.” –Henry Ford

 

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER

Yes … knowledge is power. This t-shirt could have been “Applied Knowledge Is Power”. It is one thing to know something, but it is another to apply it. It is one thing to read self-help books and it is another to apply what you just read.

“Knowledge Is Power” is for the gentlemen who understood the role and importance of knowledge and information in his life. He knows it gives him the edge over mediocrity and the tools to reinvent himself at will.

 

DO YOU BELONG TO THE COMMUNITY?

What is the purpose of having “Brass & Metti” emblazoned on your t-shirt? Well, Brass & Metti is a tribute to the individualists who are craving to make their inner desires a reality because life’s too short to be insignificant.

When you wear a Brass & Metti t-shirt it is because you abide by this philosophy - you are not a brainwashed drone. You are in the same crew as all the people who chose to believe in themselves, to embrace life and to make it a “chef d’oeuvre”. You just happened to say no to the scripted life and mediocrity.

You represent all what human beings should strive to achieve : Greatness. 

  1. Back this project
  2. Choose the number of t-shirts you wish to order by clicking on the perk's description. Then you'll be redirected to another page to enter your payment information.
  3. When the campaign is over, you will receive a survey via email from your pledge asking you for the models you wish to receive and your shipping information.
  4. Once your survey is submitted to us, your t-shirts will be shipped to you within one month and a half and two months. 

 

 

We are two guys - Pier-Luc and Simon. We always had a desire to make a positive difference in the world and to do cool, creative things.

 

 

Brass & Metti is born from our relentless desire to find versatile, high quality and good looking t-shirts that promote a positive message. Most empowering tees sold on the market today are cheap and poorly made. Plus, they are designed for gym freaks. We just came up with our own answer - Brass & Metti clothes to empower the soul.

These luxe t-shirts have seen the rise of the sun because we believe that life's too short to be insignificant. We believe in thinking differently. We believe in breaking the status quo. We believe that it is better to be a sheepherder than a sheep. We believe that you are limitless. Thus, we fashioned a t-shirt made from the finest materials that will last for years to come that represents the philosophy we abide to. So, we just happened to create the world's most empowering t-shirts.

 

 

Brass & Metti t-shirts hold a story. It hides in the seams and whispers from the fold. Each t-shirt has been designed with an obsessive attention to details like an alchemist brewing a concoction in his laboratory.

Each premium top is fashioned from sun baking cotton adroitly chosen by a skillful artisan. That fabric provides a magnificent fit that underlines the most beautiful curves of your silhouette as well as providing a velvety-comfy and smooth comfort like a sweet caress from an angel ascended from the sky. The robust seams and pre-shrunk textile promote an abiding durability and appearance for years to come.

You can trust us when we say you’ll get the same quality offered by the most prestigious clothing labels like Dolce & Gabanna, Gucci, Diesel & Ralph Lauren for example.

 

 

Most empowering tees sold on the market today are for a particular clientele - gym freaks. The main goal with Brass & Metti was to create a versatile piece of clothing that you can wear anytime anywhere.

Going to the gym is good for your health and should be part of anyone's routine. What if you could bring those positive or empowering quotes anywhere you go instead - not only in the gym. This is why we chose to focus on very simplistic and modern designs. You can wear your luxe t-shirt to the bar, in a nightclub, on a date, on the beach, at the office, etc.

Show the world what you stand for anytime and anywhere.

 

 

 

Below, is the timeline or the steps involved from the campaign creation to the delivery of your precious t-shirts. The process might seem long, but we do it in your best interests - we want to make sure you positively receive top quality t-shirts.

 

 

 

To offer the best pricings and customer experience, we chose to get rid of the middlemen (stores & boutiques). Look at the graphic below to see what we mean.

 

 

The t-shirts are made and held in our facility. You order 1 or 2 (or 10 ... thanks, buddy!) and we ship your order. That's it! That means affordable and higher quality t-shirts (which translates into more money in your pockets) and an extremely easy ordering process on a 100% secure website.

Let's be honest ... it's way simpler for us too!

 

 

Because you are so amazing we wondered if we could reward you by giving you something more with your pledge. We came up with few ideas like an appealing perfume, a keychain (Seriously? A keychain? We had better ideas).

Thus, to congratulate and to thank you for your immense support, we chose to give you something amazing - a sample of our new men's cologne "outsideofthebox” - a 100% free gift from the bottom of our hearts.

We’ve put months into the making of that little beauty. It's no ordinary perfume. It is a perfect essential oil mixture that ignites the olfactory system in a dramatic way . In fact, if no one comes to ask you what's that smell, #1 - you might be alone in your house, or #2 - you probably forgot to put some.

We promise that this special run of perfume will leave no one indifferent. Hey, it can be a good opener in a bar:

"Woman, can you tell me if that smells good?”, you said confidently.

"Yeah, sure! You smell like I would like take you home and [blank]", she replied.

Unfortunately, this Indiegogo campaign is not a dating course my friend. Just remember that we add a sample or our “parfum fabuleux” with your order - whatever the number of t-shirts you order. How cool is that?

 

 

As soon as the campaign is over, we will send you a survey. We will need to know what are the designs, the colors and the sizes you would like to receive. Once we get your survey, we will produce your tees.

Expect at least three (3) months before receiving your order. If a miracle happens and we can deliver them sooner, we will ship them sooner too. We will do our best so it happens.

For the shipping information, please refer to the perk's description. Just so you know, we are based in Canada but you can order from anywhere in the world - we offer international shipping.

 

 

We are Pier-Luc Lemmetti and Simon Brassard - two men with a dedication to extraordinary, beauty and simplicity.

 

 

Why another clothing brand? There are hundreds, thousands (millions?) clothing brands that exist in the world today. When we've told people about our desire to launch a new clothing brand they saw pure folly ... We saw boldness.

We launched Brass & Metti in May 2017 in Saint-Jerome - a small cutesque town on the North Shore of Montreal, Canada. "Brass" stands for "Brassard" and "Metti" for "Lemmetti". We think you already knew that.

 

 

You can trust us that our promise is to make and offer empowering t-shirts with:

Luxe t-shirts usually come with an extra-inflated price. We want to make it easier for you to get your hands on an empowering and virtuous t-shirt.

Good design speaks for itself. Our tees must be versatile. It must be possible to wear them anytime and anywhere.

 

 

We promise to use your contribution for the production of your t-shirts and for the growth of our company like paying the rent of our office, investing in some marketing, hiring an attorney and an accountant and, of course, paying our employees.

Because anything can happen, we must acknowledge that this campaign might not work as we would have wished or expected. We might not amass the $10,000 that we need to put this project into fruition. If that would be the case, we will refund your money. That is 100% guaranteed.

 

 

Our goal is to amass $10,000 but the more we get the more we can do. We would like to create and produce more empowering, versatile and high quality clothes and accessories to complement your look.

To make this campaign a resounding success, please, buy your Brass & Metti t-shirts now, Also we must ask you to share this campaign with as many people as possible. Because we are so cool we came up with something very interesting...

Refer a friend and get 15% of his order value. If he buys for $100, you get $15 back. If he buys for $1000, you get $150 back. There is no limit to the number of people you can refer.

Click on the following link : goo.gl/GZJiRD to understand how to get your unique URL so you can start to refer people, make money and help us make this project come true.

Refer to the sections : 

  1. WHERE BACKERS FIND THEIR UNIQUE REFERRAL LINK, and;
  2. HOW BACKERS CAN TRACK THEIR REFERRALS.

Click this link to know how to refer people and receive 15% of their order value : goo.gl/GZJiRD
story_txt:
Dear friend, 
I can recall a time when, as a little boy, I was lying on the grass on a sunny afternoon looking at the clouds changing shape in front of my very eyes. I can recall a time when my friend and I were playing in the woods – we thought we were soldiers, or cops, or super heroes. We could play for hours and we never saw the time fly away as we had so much fun.
I can recall a time when we were playing a game called “tag BBQ”. The goal was simple: touch a girl and get kissed. Then, when she’s “touched” she runs after boys to get kissed which was cool when you were “the chosen one”. I still remember the joy I felt when I succeeded beautifully.
The World and the Universe seemed so much of a fun place back then. All was to explore. All was to enjoy. All was so beautiful. Everything seemed so friendly.

I can’t remember exactly when this “joie de vivre” disappeared but it happened. Year after year, day after day, I had less and less until I got so low I felt like if I had a rusted knife in my heart and some obscure power was twisting it slowly. Haven’t you questioned yourself to the point you are wondering why you are living? I don’t want this message to be another sob story but it gets better. Hang on.
From elementary school right to my short lived corporate job career, I felt like I was stuck in a vise and all that was surrounding me was crushing, molding, and bending me to get and fit into a life that wasn’t mine.
One day, a friend gave me a book I “had to read”. This book had supposedly changed his life even though he looked exactly the same. I didn’t know who the author was or what I would find in the book. Sure I would find some secret from people whom I despised or I thought were in a special league I would never be a part of.
As a was reading the book a little short five-word sentence caught my attention: “Your Only Limit Is You”.

I was mesmerized at first but then I felt like I’ve been godded new powers. For the first time in years, I could still feel like when I was a little boy playing in the woods or running after girls for a kiss.
I knew it was okay to be who I was. That I could be unique and different and that I should accept myself. I knew it was okay to have dreams. I knew I was in total control of my life. Everything shifted from impossibilities to the realm of possibilities. I knew I was entitled to greatness and all begins with me. I felt like I was limitless.
My life didn’t turn around in a blink of an eye. I didn’t buy a Lamborghini the next day or a mansion in the Hollywood Hills, or received hundreds of SMS from Gisele Bundchen and Jessica Chastain. At least, “Your Only Limit Is You” gave me the courage to begin my long journey.
“A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” –Laozi
Today, we - Pier-Luc and myself (Simon) - are doing a crowdfunding campaign to fund a new breathtaking clothing brand that could possibly change the World. This brand is a tribute to the individualists who are craving to make their inner desires a reality because life's too short to be insignificant.
Here are our t-shirts :
 

YOUR ONLY LIMIT IS YOU
The phrase that was the starting point for me. The key that unlocked my true self and gave me “la force” to be who I wanted to be or be the real me. You are your only limit after all.
 

YOU ARE LIMITLESS
Simple but to the point. The “limitless” t-shirt means that you are limitless. You are born with an unlimited potential. Thus, the “limitless” t-shirt symbolizes your understanding about the psychology behind every great undertaking that put a dent in the Universe.
 

YOU ARE LIMITLESS ... REALLY
“Whether you think you can, or you think you can't - you're right.” –Henry Ford
 

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER
Yes … knowledge is power. This t-shirt could have been “Applied Knowledge Is Power”. It is one thing to know something, but it is another to apply it. It is one thing to read self-help books and it is another to apply what you just read.
“Knowledge Is Power” is for the gentlemen who understood the role and importance of knowledge and information in his life. He knows it gives him the edge over mediocrity and the tools to reinvent himself at will.
 

DO YOU BELONG TO THE COMMUNITY?
What is the purpose of having “Brass & Metti” emblazoned on your t-shirt? Well, Brass & Metti is a tribute to the individualists who are craving to make their inner desires a reality because life’s too short to be insignificant.
When you wear a Brass & Metti t-shirt it is because you abide by this philosophy - you are not a brainwashed drone. You are in the same crew as all the people who chose to believe in themselves, to embrace life and to make it a “chef d’oeuvre”. You just happened to say no to the scripted life and mediocrity.
You represent all what human beings should strive to achieve : Greatness. 


Back this project
Choose the number of t-shirts you wish to order by clicking on the perk's description. Then you'll be redirected to another page to enter your payment information.
When the campaign is over, you will receive a survey via email from your pledge asking you for the models you wish to receive and your shipping information.
Once your survey is submitted to us, your t-shirts will be shipped to you within one month and a half and two months. 

 

 
We are two guys - Pier-Luc and Simon. We always had a desire to make a positive difference in the world and to do cool, creative things.
 


 
Brass & Metti is born from our relentless desire to find versatile, high quality and good looking t-shirts that promote a positive message. Most empowering tees sold on the market today are cheap and poorly made. Plus, they are designed for gym freaks. We just came up with our own answer - Brass & Metti clothes to empower the soul.
These luxe t-shirts have seen the rise of the sun because we believe that life's too short to be insignificant. We believe in thinking differently. We believe in breaking the status quo. We believe that it is better to be a sheepherder than a sheep. We believe that you are limitless. Thus, we fashioned a t-shirt made from the finest materials that will last for years to come that represents the philosophy we abide to. So, we just happened to create the world's most empowering t-shirts.
 

 
Brass & Metti t-shirts hold a story. It hides in the seams and whispers from the fold. Each t-shirt has been designed with an obsessive attention to details like an alchemist brewing a concoction in his laboratory.
Each premium top is fashioned from sun baking cotton adroitly chosen by a skillful artisan. That fabric provides a magnificent fit that underlines the most beautiful curves of your silhouette as well as providing a velvety-comfy and smooth comfort like a sweet caress from an angel ascended from the sky. The robust seams and pre-shrunk textile promote an abiding durability and appearance for years to come.
You can trust us when we say you’ll get the same quality offered by the most prestigious clothing labels like Dolce & Gabanna, Gucci, Diesel & Ralph Lauren for example.
 

 
Most empowering tees sold on the market today are for a particular clientele - gym freaks. The main goal with Brass & Metti was to create a versatile piece of clothing that you can wear anytime anywhere.
Going to the gym is good for your health and should be part of anyone's routine. What if you could bring those positive or empowering quotes anywhere you go instead - not only in the gym. This is why we chose to focus on very simplistic and modern designs. You can wear your luxe t-shirt to the bar, in a nightclub, on a date, on the beach, at the office, etc.
Show the world what you stand for anytime and anywhere.
 





 

 
Below, is the timeline or the steps involved from the campaign creation to the delivery of your precious t-shirts. The process might seem long, but we do it in your best interests - we want to make sure you positively receive top quality t-shirts.
 

 

 
To offer the best pricings and customer experience, we chose to get rid of the middlemen (stores & boutiques). Look at the graphic below to see what we mean.
 

 
The t-shirts are made and held in our facility. You order 1 or 2 (or 10 ... thanks, buddy!) and we ship your order. That's it! That means affordable and higher quality t-shirts (which translates into more money in your pockets) and an extremely easy ordering process on a 100% secure website.
Let's be honest ... it's way simpler for us too!
 

 
Because you are so amazing we wondered if we could reward you by giving you something more with your pledge. We came up with few ideas like an appealing perfume, a keychain (Seriously? A keychain? We had better ideas).

Thus, to congratulate and to thank you for your immense support, we chose to give you something amazing - a sample of our new men's cologne "outsideofthebox” - a 100% free gift from the bottom of our hearts.
We’ve put months into the making of that little beauty. It's no ordinary perfume. It is a perfect essential oil mixture that ignites the olfactory system in a dramatic way . In fact, if no one comes to ask you what's that smell, #1 - you might be alone in your house, or #2 - you probably forgot to put some.
We promise that this special run of perfume will leave no one indifferent. Hey, it can be a good opener in a bar:
"Woman, can you tell me if that smells good?”, you said confidently.
"Yeah, sure! You smell like I would like take you home and [blank]", she replied.
Unfortunately, this Indiegogo campaign is not a dating course my friend. Just remember that we add a sample or our “parfum fabuleux” with your order - whatever the number of t-shirts you order. How cool is that?


 

 
As soon as the campaign is over, we will send you a survey. We will need to know what are the designs, the colors and the sizes you would like to receive. Once we get your survey, we will produce your tees.
Expect at least three (3) months before receiving your order. If a miracle happens and we can deliver them sooner, we will ship them sooner too. We will do our best so it happens.
For the shipping information, please refer to the perk's description. Just so you know, we are based in Canada but you can order from anywhere in the world - we offer international shipping.
 

 
We are Pier-Luc Lemmetti and Simon Brassard - two men with a dedication to extraordinary, beauty and simplicity.
 

 
Why another clothing brand? There are hundreds, thousands (millions?) clothing brands that exist in the world today. When we've told people about our desire to launch a new clothing brand they saw pure folly ... We saw boldness.

We launched Brass & Metti in May 2017 in Saint-Jerome - a small cutesque town on the North Shore of Montreal, Canada. "Brass" stands for "Brassard" and "Metti" for "Lemmetti". We think you already knew that.
 

 
You can trust us that our promise is to make and offer empowering t-shirts with:

Luxe t-shirts usually come with an extra-inflated price. We want to make it easier for you to get your hands on an empowering and virtuous t-shirt.
Good design speaks for itself. Our tees must be versatile. It must be possible to wear them anytime and anywhere.
 

 
We promise to use your contribution for the production of your t-shirts and for the growth of our company like paying the rent of our office, investing in some marketing, hiring an attorney and an accountant and, of course, paying our employees.
Because anything can happen, we must acknowledge that this campaign might not work as we would have wished or expected. We might not amass the $10,000 that we need to put this project into fruition. If that would be the case, we will refund your money. That is 100% guaranteed.
 

 
Our goal is to amass $10,000 but the more we get the more we can do. We would like to create and produce more empowering, versatile and high quality clothes and accessories to complement your look.
To make this campaign a resounding success, please, buy your Brass & Metti t-shirts now, Also we must ask you to share this campaign with as many people as possible. Because we are so cool we came up with something very interesting...

Refer a friend and get 15% of his order value. If he buys for $100, you get $15 back. If he buys for $1000, you get $150 back. There is no limit to the number of people you can refer.
Click on the following link : goo.gl/GZJiRD to understand how to get your unique URL so you can start to refer people, make money and help us make this project come true.
Refer to the sections : 

WHERE BACKERS FIND THEIR UNIQUE REFERRAL LINK, and;
HOW BACKERS CAN TRACK THEIR REFERRALS.

Click this link to know how to refer people and receive 15% of their order value : goo.gl/GZJiRD

story:
THIS CAMPAIGN HAS BEEN MOVED TO: http://kck.st/2fO9f56

 

 

 

There’s never been a better moment to be yourself without sacrificing it for the limitations of society. Too often activewear prioritizes trends over comfort, functionality, and modesty. We’re here to present another option - one that redefines what’s ‘in style’ and equips you with the activewear you desire.

And With Honour is bringing it to you in the form of advanced athletic apparel.

Modest athletes know the struggle in trying to find athletic apparel that fits their needs.

For years, athletic brands have been offering high-performance clothing for athletes, but they tend to be designed for those who choose to dress differently. There have even been attempts made at creating athletic apparel for modest women, including women who wear the hijab, however, they tend to fall short on ergonomics, fashion, and technology.

Thus, we have created a brand dedicated specifically to modest female athletes and their lifestyle.

 

 

Designed for your most intense workouts! The Snap-Jab is the ultimate design to meet your comfort and performance needs. It is a 2-in-1 and can be worn "beanie" style, or full style.

Throw away the pins, we've equipped it with snag-resistant snaps that will hold it in place. Whether you are boxing, playing basketball, or even playing rugby, the Snap-Jab will have you focusing on the game and not your head. The fabric also has Honour-Cool™ technology, bringing down your surface temperature by up to 15 degrees.

Features:

♥ Snag-resistant Snaps ♥ 4-Way Stretch Fabric ♥ UV Protection
♥ Ergonomic Design ♥ Odor-resistant ♥ Active Cooling

 

Ready to kick it into high gear? The Snap-Jab is perfect for your intense workouts when you're giving it your all and taking it to the next level. 

Designed with the soccer player and runner in mind;  The Aurora Hoodie is where comfort meets performance. Providing the coverage and performance you expect, without all the layering. The hood is designed to fit snug, has a hidden sleeve pocket for your phone, and adjustable side-zippers to adjust your intensity level. The fabric also has Honour-Cool™ technology, bringing down your surface temperature by up to 15 degrees.

Features:

♥ Raglan Sleeves  
♥ Hidden Sleeve Pocket ♥ 4-Way Stretch Fabric
♥ Ergonomic Design ♥ Adjustable Side Zippers ♥ Odor-resistant
♥ Active Cooling ♥ UV Protection ♥ Snug Fit

 

Comfortable, ready for an exciting workout, and modest in every way. The Hoodie equips you with the style you want for the workout you need. 

Honour-Cool™ is engineered through a multi-layered, three-dimensional, knitting process. By combining a high percentage of natural jade minerals with our microfiber technology, the Moisture System Transference (MST) process transforms fibers finer than a human hair into filaments with unique performance capabilities.

 TEMP REG - Drop skin surface temperatures up to 15°

 ANTI ODOR - Compounds deter microbial growth

 UV PROTECTION - Blocks harmful rays up to UPF 50

 QUICK DRY - Wicks away moisture & drys quickly

 JADE INFUSED - Natural mineral cooling fabric technology

 

In 2014 while the world watched records break in the Olympics, brothers Nader and Kamal, as well as their sister Muna, noticed a different phenomenon occurring. It was the fact that many women on teams didn't have options for modest athletic wear that could help cool them down. In such a high performance environment, it was shocking that there was such a lack in the apparel. 

Over the course of the next few months, they interviewed women from Jordan, Qatar, UAE, the U.S., Turkey, and more, to understand the pain points of athletic wear. It became evident that there was a desire for functionality and fashion that optimized performance. There should never be a limit on achievement based upon what you wear.  

With Honour was born out of an aspiration to empower women with functionality that doesn't compromise style. There simply aren't many options for women who are more inclined to wear modest athletic apparel. This brand is about inspiring women to feel comfortable and have options for what they seek. 

Instead of using large corporations, we hire local freelancers across 3 continents to design the amazing activewear that you see. With Honour is then tested by modest athletes worldwide. This helps to ensure products are fashionable, ergonomic, and capable of enduring the most extreme conditions. Adding on to this, we have worked with engineers and designers to generate proprietary Honour-Cool™ technology, giving our products the most advanced fabric technology ever put in modest clothing.

We have found that modest athletes are underrepresented, and often, not taken seriously. What you wear should never limit what you can achieve. So often, people are encouraged to believe that they have to align with the pre-defined standards of style. However, we believe that women should feel empowered to get active and exercise without sacrificing their desire for modesty. With Honour is here to ensure that women no longer have to trade fashion for comfort. 

We also believe in doing social good for those in need. In the future, we plan on setting up sponsorship programs for less-fortunate individuals. We also plan on donating a portion of every purchase to the United Nations Refugee Agency. We do this in the name of social good, and to help refugees around the world.

 

Production Quality

  • With any product, there is an inherent risk about the quality of the product. To mitigate this challenge we've developed fully tested prototypes that we have put through a variety of conditions to ensure they're comfortable for the long-run. Our top notch designers have spent significant time making sure that the product was designed to maintain its quality over time.

Fabric

  • The Honour-Cool™ material has been fully developed and is ready for production. It has been tested not only in a lab, but on real-life athletes as well.

Turnaround Time

  • No one wants a product delivered to them late. That's why we've appropriately mapped out the time that it will take to conclude our Indiegogo campaign, align our designers, and produce your activewear. This process ensures that you receive your product on time so you can get active modestly within your expected time frame. 

Shipping

  • We make every effort to ensure your item arrives fresh and ready to use. We utilize various types of shipping companies such as USPS, FEDEX, and UPS. Packages will have tracking and insurance in the event of a shipping related issue. We are not, however, responsible once the product leaves US soil (For international orders). But in the event of an issue we will assist in any way we can to ensure you receive your item!

Capacity Constraints

  • We'd love for people to purchase so much With Honour activewear that we run into capacity constraints. If that ever becomes the challenge, rest assured that we are working with manufacturers that can scale their production quantities quickly and effectively. Our top priority is getting you the product you expect on time.

FAQs

  • What ​ colors will they come in?
    • Black, Purple, and Blue. If you have a suggestion for a color we're open to hearing it!
  • What sizes will the hoodie come in?
    • ​Small, Medium, and Large
  • What if it doesn't fit?
    • ​We take every effort to ensure that our products fit with most average body types. However, in the event you need a size-up or size-down we'll be glad to exchange it for you!
  • What if ​I want to return it?
    • ​Unfortunately we cannot accept returns on IndieGoGo items. This is because we use your funds to bring the product to the world for the first time. This is the trade-off of a discounted reward.
  • What type of fabrics is it made out of?
    • The fabrics include a combination of: Polyester, Nylon, Spandex
  • Still Have Questions?
    • Reach out to us on Twitter: @With_Honour 

  • Looking to help without a monetary donation? Share our campaign with as many people as possible, whether it's on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, email, even screaming it from a mountain top! We, and the women who will be empowered, appreciate any support in getting our message out there. 

@With_Honour

Facebook.com/WithHonour

@WithHonour

story:
Meet the CAT Clutch

One Bag, Many Looks

To customize your CAT Clutch, tap the art you like and seconds later it’s lit up on your bag. Our CAT Clutch mobile app comes pre-loaded with over 90 pixel art animations commissioned from leading pixel artists. You may also upload your own pixel art animations (gif format) too or display custom messages. Inside there is a Power Bank to charge your phone. The bag also looks stunning sans animation too.

 

Features

 

In the Press

 

Our Customers & Use Cases

We ran a Kickstarter campaign for the CAT Clutch in 2016 and have shipped 150 bags to date. Our customers tell us the bag makes them stand out and is a natural conversation starter. Here are some pics of our real life, paying customers and where they take their CAT Clutch.

At Parties

Fashion icon, stylist, and editor Giovanna Battaglia Engelbert (photo credit: BFA)

Innovation Expert and Author Val Wright

At Company Events

At the Bar

At the Game

At Music Festivals

“Nothing I have ever carried or worn has gotten this kind of attention”

“Thank you so much for my CAT Clutch. I am the belle of the ballroom in Marfa."

“Hi Al, Just wanted to say I absolutely love my CAT Clutch! Took it to the Christmas party of one of the design companies I work for and everyone went absolutely mad for it!

"I have never been stopped more and asked about a purse. My CAT Clutch is the coolest bag ever. I love changing the design to fit my mood or environment."

Customer Reviews on Amazon 

 

On the Runway

 

How it Works

Just choose from one of the over 90 LED designs from our app and instantly it's lit up on your bag. You can also type a custom message to scroll across your bag or choose to display a text message. To get more designs, get free and paid ones from our design app store or just create and import your own. 

This one minute hands on video with the CAT Clutch will show you how to switch LED designs from our app, create your own LED designs, and how to import your own GIF animations.

A sample of the included pixel art animations you can choose from to upload to your CAT Clutch.

 

3D VIEWS ==> See and rotate the CAT Clutch in 3D -Click for Exterior 3D view and interior 3D view 

Preview all the LED designs included with your CAT Clutch

How to Import Your Own Designs

A great way to preview all the included LED designs that come with each CAT Clutch is to get our iOS app. Even without the bag, you can preview in a video what each design will look like. Get our app here and then preview each design from this screen in our app.

Our iOS app also includes an LED design store which includes additional paid and free designs.  

 

Perks for our IndieGoGo Backers

We ran a Kickstarter campaign for the CAT Clutch in 2016 and shipped 150 bags. We received some excellent feedback and are seeking $20,000 to fund another manufacturing run and bring the CAT Clutch experience to more customers. 

We have 30 bags available NOW at a discount for early birds! These 30 bags will ship immediately after this campaign in November 2017.

 

Techs Specs

SIZE: 8"x4"x2" (WxHxD)

WEIGHT: 1 lb, 5 oz

MATERIAL: Hand poured resin

APPS: iOS and Android

CONNECTIVITY: Bluetooth

DISPLAY: 512 RGB LEDs

POWER: AC adaptor & rechargeable 2500 mAH battery

BATTERY LIFE: 10-12 hours on continuous use

Read our FAQ section for more info

 

The CAT Clutch Story & Team

Like it's founders, CAT – Creative Arts & Technology – is a funky, fresh marriage of tech and fashion. Al, an IT Director at a large Fortune 500 company in Silicon Valley, geeks out making innovative tech projects in their basement, otherwise known as The Lab. And Erin, US head for an open source hardware company, and fervent fashion enthusiast, gets her groove on hanging out in her overflowing closet with her beloved cats and (many, many) purses. Nearly two decades after these two crazy cats said I DO, they have finally merged their individual interests into one cool, light up bag!

Fresh off his successfully funded PIXEL V2: LED Art Kickstarter campaign, Al was looking into new LED formats. “What’s that,” Erin said one night while he was tweaking around with a rectangular LED matrix. “It’s my latest LED format,” Al said. “You know that would look awesome if we converted it into a clutch,” she said. And Boom – the CAT Clutch was born. Erin got to sketching out bags and Al got to streamlining his Pixel Art boards to fit her designs.

 

Timeline

 

Risks & Challenges

Al Linke, one of our founders, has managed three successful Kickstarter campaigns for PIXEL, PIXEL V2: LED Art, and our initial CAT Clutch crowdfunding campaign last year where we shipped 150 CAT Clutches. That said, we have done this before and the reality is hardware/software combined projects are complex & challenging. Complications will arise over the course of this project and our commitment to you is to be as transparent as possible and keep you updated as these issues arise.

 

FAQs

How long does the battery last?

Your CAT Clutch will go 10-12 hours on continuous use.

How to re-charge the CAT Clutch?

Your CAT Clutch comes included with a charger but you can also use any standard microUSB phone charger too.

Is iOS and Android supported?

Yes, we've got apps for both. Feel free to preview our iOS app and our Android app.

What are the dimensions and weight of the CAT Clutch?

The dimensions are 8 inches long x 4 inches tall x 2 inches wide and it weighs 1 pound and 5 ounces.

Can I create and upload my own LED designs?

Yes, you'll share your GIF animation or PNG/JPG still image to our CAT Clutch iOS or Android app and then just select from there. Keep in mind the CAT Clutch is a low resolution display at 32x16 = 512 LED pixels so you'll want to scale your artwork accordingly. Googling "pixel art" is a great way to find existing art and inspiration. 

Is the CAT Clutch wafer proof?

The CAT Clutch is NOT water proof. Treat your CAT Clutch as you would your non water proof phone. 

Can the CAT Clutch display scrolling messages?

Yes, just type your message in our app and it will scroll across your bag.

Can the CAT Clutch display text messages?

This is not enabled in the app by default but yes you can turn this on in our app's settings and then any text message received will also scroll across your CAT Clutch.

Are there other styles available than Black Glitter?

When we did our initial crowd funding campaign, the Black Glitter style was hands down the most popular. So to minimize risk as sourcing different resin styles adds complexity, we are only offering the Black Glitter style for this campaign.

Will I need to pay customs / duty fees?

For shipments outside of the United States, you will be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by your country which are not included in the price. Sorry, we have no control over these charges and can't predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; so please contact your local customs office for more information.
story_txt:
Meet the CAT Clutch

One Bag, Many Looks
To customize your CAT Clutch, tap the art you like and seconds later it’s lit up on your bag. Our CAT Clutch mobile app comes pre-loaded with over 90 pixel art animations commissioned from leading pixel artists. You may also upload your own pixel art animations (gif format) too or display custom messages. Inside there is a Power Bank to charge your phone. The bag also looks stunning sans animation too.
 
Features

 
In the Press

 
Our Customers & Use Cases
We ran a Kickstarter campaign for the CAT Clutch in 2016 and have shipped 150 bags to date. Our customers tell us the bag makes them stand out and is a natural conversation starter. Here are some pics of our real life, paying customers and where they take their CAT Clutch.

At Parties
Fashion icon, stylist, and editor Giovanna Battaglia Engelbert (photo credit: BFA)

Innovation Expert and Author Val Wright
At Company Events

At the Bar

At the Game

At Music Festivals
“Nothing I have ever carried or worn has gotten this kind of attention”
“Thank you so much for my CAT Clutch. I am the belle of the ballroom in Marfa."
“Hi Al, Just wanted to say I absolutely love my CAT Clutch! Took it to the Christmas party of one of the design companies I work for and everyone went absolutely mad for it!
"I have never been stopped more and asked about a purse. My CAT Clutch is the coolest bag ever. I love changing the design to fit my mood or environment."
Customer Reviews on Amazon 
 
On the Runway


 
How it Works
Just choose from one of the over 90 LED designs from our app and instantly it's lit up on your bag. You can also type a custom message to scroll across your bag or choose to display a text message. To get more designs, get free and paid ones from our design app store or just create and import your own. 

This one minute hands on video with the CAT Clutch will show you how to switch LED designs from our app, create your own LED designs, and how to import your own GIF animations.




A sample of the included pixel art animations you can choose from to upload to your CAT Clutch. 

3D VIEWS ==> See and rotate the CAT Clutch in 3D -Click for Exterior 3D view and interior 3D view 


Preview all the LED designs included with your CAT Clutch

How to Import Your Own Designs


A great way to preview all the included LED designs that come with each CAT Clutch is to get our iOS app. Even without the bag, you can preview in a video what each design will look like. Get our app here and then preview each design from this screen in our app.

Our iOS app also includes an LED design store which includes additional paid and free designs.  


 
Perks for our IndieGoGo Backers



We ran a Kickstarter campaign for the CAT Clutch in 2016 and shipped 150 bags. We received some excellent feedback and are seeking $20,000 to fund another manufacturing run and bring the CAT Clutch experience to more customers. 
We have 30 bags available NOW at a discount for early birds! These 30 bags will ship immediately after this campaign in November 2017.

 
Techs Specs
SIZE: 8"x4"x2" (WxHxD)
WEIGHT: 1 lb, 5 oz
MATERIAL: Hand poured resin
APPS: iOS and Android
CONNECTIVITY: Bluetooth
DISPLAY: 512 RGB LEDs
POWER: AC adaptor & rechargeable 2500 mAH battery
BATTERY LIFE: 10-12 hours on continuous use
Read our FAQ section for more info
 
The CAT Clutch Story & Team


Like it's founders, CAT – Creative Arts & Technology – is a funky, fresh marriage of tech and fashion. story:
Summary

Hi! I'd love for you to support me... so here goes...

Basically, I had an idea and dream to build a fun, ethical and sustainable brand to rival Lululemon quality-wise.  The brand is to be inclusive.  To be technically superior.  Ultra-comfy - no jaggy bits. Not to shrink or fade or sag. To be affordable...and most importantly to help people, such as vulnerable people at a time of need.

I am passionate about making a positive contribution to the world and would like to help people.

I’ve designed the patterns and the luxury custom-made fabric is dreamy.  I have called it CoolSkin because it's cool, it's like a second skin and it's moisture-wicking so you never get too hot!

PRIYA isn’t just for women there are  a number of men wearing the leggings too.

Kids and teenagers  from age 7 can wear the leggings/tops. The size 4 fits a 7/8 year old, the  6 fits a 9/12 year old and from 13 a size 8.

This is a one woman business.  So I really am reaching out for help with this.

Website:  priyaactivewear.com

I have detailed below the objectives and how I think you can help me....

 

Objectives

What are the real campaign objectives?

  • Support an independent designer by buying PRIYA kits.  Ensuring the first business target is met.
  • Contribute to Scottish Women’s Aid.
  • Get feedback on the PRIYA product.
  • Grow the brand.
  • Enable me to spend time aligning with new charities and initiatives.
  • Create a varied size collection. Younger kids 2-7.
  • Seek professional advice, potentially around business models; co-operative or social enterprise routes.

 

Approach

How will we achieve our objectives?

  • Only with your kind support, contributions and suggestions.

 

Delivery

What happens when the funding target is achieved?

  • You receive your rewards – the PRIYA kit.
  • Scottish Women’s Aid and all running costs are paid in full.
  • I receive feedback from you on the product.

 

Develop

What happens after the campaign has run?

  • Back to the drawing board and build in any alterations/suggestions from the product feedback.
  • Look at designing a younger kids  collection/more varied sizes.
  • Scope out at other charities/new initiatives to align with potentially around children into yoga, meditation and sports for free.
  • Advice around going down a co-operative or social enterprise route.
  • I'm looking to build-in your feedback/networking ideas from this fantastic community and I hope that this will address the risks above.

 

The positive impact you'll make!

Your contributions to this campaign will make a massive difference:

  • Our ethical and sustainable products are quality and made to last.  This is a positive impact on our environment.
  • You are contributing to taking care of vulnerable people in their time of need.
  • So it's not just leggings and bras: it's the environment and taking care of vulnerable people in our world too.

 

Other Ways You Can Help!

If you can't contribute I would still love for you to help in any way you can:

  • I'd love for you to get involved and make some noise about our campaign by sharing!
  • Get in touch and see if there's any idea's you'd like to share or networking possibilities.

Thanks for your time, Nicky x

 

PRIYA mean BELOVED
